dbab pa'o// 'di ni klu nag po b+hu ta'i snying por rig par bya'o// nub dang nub byang na gnas pa yin no// ke le ke le hUM/ nA ga la nA ga le hUM/ ba le hUM ba le hUM/ hUM ya hUM ya/ pra tsa le pra tsa le hUM/ ya me ya me hUM/

pra be sha ya hUM/ du ra li du ra li hUM/ pu ra ya pu ra ya hUM/ na ma le na ma le hUM/ pra tsa le pra tsa le hUM/ dgra bo'i srog la ma ra ya rbad rbad/ 'di dag ni klu rgyal dung can gyi ste/ shar na gnas par rig par

bya'o// gtor zor dang mda' zor du rig par bya'o// nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas trag thur snying thur snying 'gul myags myags rtsa bzhi bskums/ shan shan srog la shan thur sod swAhA/ 'di dag ni yang snying nag po'i rtsa

bar rig par bya'o// lho'i phyogs na gnas par rig par bya'o// phaT ta la tsi pra ti tsa ya byi dza/ ba ta li dzA/ sa ma ya dzA/ pra pra ye dzA/ badzra aM ku sha dzA/ A kar+Sha ya/ a kar dza li hUM dzA khe na hUM dzA/

wa dzA gin dzA/ zin dza/ kho na dza/ tan dza hUM dza/ 'di dag ni sa bdag mtha' bzhi dbus dang lnga'i sngags su rig par bya'o// byol song glang mgo can las skabs te gsum pa'o//// stong pa nyid las phe byung de
las rig pa'i rgyal po mgo dgu bskyed/ de la mchod pa'i rdzas kun rab rtsogs sbrul nag tu pra gtang nas ni/ gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'chi bdag yab yum 'khor tshogs spyan

'dren na// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di bzhes la// bdag gi bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dzaHhUM baM ho/ nag po ti pa tsa ya nA ga rag+sha hUM dza ya/ klu dang sa bdag gnyan stod 'khor rnams
dang// klu btsan klu bdud klu srin la sogs pa// mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// klu sman dang ni dkar gsum mngar gsum rnams// 'bru bcud rnam gsum sna tshogs zhal zas
rnams// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang mchod pa lnga// gser dngul zangs lcags rin chen sna tshogs pa// nya sbal sbal lcong chu gnas sems can sha/ dam nyams dgra bo bcas pa mchod par bzhes// nag po ti
pa tsa ya nA ga rak+sha kha raM khA hi/ mchod pa 'di dag gtso 'khor rim par dpag bzhes gsungs/ hUM/ bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen po klu bdud mgo dgu pa// sbrul dang sbal nag gzhal yas chen po'i

dbus// gzas pa pho mo gcal du bkram// klu ni ri rab ngos la brten// zhal ni gnam sa bar du gdangs// dam nyams dgra bo khyur mid byed// klu smad sbrul gzhug rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang// rgya mtsho'i klu
rnams ma lus zas su za// phyag gis khams gsum nyug cing dam nyams byad du 'jug/ dbu dgu mthing nag rab tu 'jigs par bstan pa na// dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag ha la mdog/ chos nyid yang dag

don dang ldan pa'i rtags// dbus brgyad sbrul brgyad bar snang 'phyo ba ni// sa bdag chu srin mang po dbang du bsdus nas kyang// sdang ba'i dgra la nad rnams gtong ba'i brtags// 'chi bdag 'jigs byed khyod

la phyag 'tshal lo// g.yon na yum chen klu mo nag mo ni// sbrul nag 'joms pa'i rim pas dbu la brgyan// spyan nas khrag 'dzag shangs nas dud pa 'thul// zhal nas sbal lcong sdom sdig phrul lu lu// g.yas
pa gtso la zhabs su 'khyud// g.yon pa pad+ma ke ke rus bkang gtso la stob// yum chen klu mo nag mo 'khor bcas rnams la 'dud// ces pa bstod pa'i dam pa yin zhes gsungs// byol song glang mgo can las
rtog pa'i skabs te bzhi pa'o//// de nas gtad bsgrub 'chi bdag zhal gyi bsgrub pa 'di dag ste// klu gnas sa la e dbus e ldan bzhi yod pa'o// tha mar sbrul gdug brgyan pa sa yi e
gnas yin// rabs chad mdze can thod pa sha med bkru// lag par gnas pa 'chi bdag gzugs brnyan rtags la kha dog 'gyur// gshin rje'i dmod pa kha nas kha khyer bskor ti ming rus des// 'chi bdag kha

ru ming yig mang po brdzang bar bya// yum gyi lto bar mu khyud dang por phyi rol lcags khang yin// gnyis pa 'joms byed drag po tsakra ste// gsum par gzugs phung 'joms pa bri bar bya// rtsa bar 'byung ba'i
gnad bri lding ba'i tsakra bar du gzhug/ srid pa gsum zhes brjod pa'i 'khor lo de nyid yin// bsnyen bsgrub nyin mtshan bsnol ba bka' nan rgyal po ltar yin te// dgug dang gsad pa de nyid rtags dang

sbyar// yang na rgyun bskor yang na nyi ma bzhi// drag po ha la zhes te brnag par 'di la brjod// nag po baM gyi sngags ni kun gyi so yin klu yi spu gri ka ma la// 'khor lo nag po rdzogs khar 'byung ba'i spu gri
brdeg/ a sa bo d+hi rigs 'dzin rgyal po yang ni 'joms bar nus// de nas dus tshod nges pa de la gtad 'jog bya// ling ga'i gnas su gang 'dod nad dgra shes par bya ba yin// yul dang rus dang ming dang
bla dgas dang// 'khor dang dug dang dben zla 'phra ma dang// dur sa dang ni gdug pa'i gdon 'brel ces par bshad// 'dir snyogs bya ba'i dgra yang shis par bya// dug de 'jug tu bsam gtan gsum zhes

bya// rta lnga dang ni mgo can mgo med mi ldog shes par bya// mnga' gsol mun pa dur khrod byug pa shes par bya// dgug pa 'brel pa rdzas kyi gnas gnyis shes par bya// 'phang dang mnga' gsol dug kyang shes
par bya// mnan gtad 'phrang ma dbang dang bod par shes par bya// rbad dang bsad mnan gso ba shes par bya// gnad rdzas gnyan po mi rigs shes par bya// bdud dang klu rigs gza' yi rgyu ba shes par
bya// mchod bstod bsdu ba bskul ba shes pa na/ khams gsum phung nus sems dpa' 'dzin mi nus// mi rigs lnga la smos ci dgos te bdud kyang phung// gtad pa'i dus su 'jig rten dregs pa bod// bdud

dang lha srin sde brgyad ra mda' bzlog/ rgyu ba'i dus su klu dang btsan la mchod cing rbad// drag por gtad dang 'jam por gang yang rung bar ni// lto 'phye brtsis dang rigs bzhi dus tshod ma nor bar// sa

sgo dbye na drag pos sngags 'di yin// a nyang tshe/ sa myang tshe/ ze myang tshe/ rbaM tri/ tsa tri rtsa thad/ rtsa thang/ tsha khur tsha khur swAhA/ byol song glang mgo can las/ mar ya'i le'u ste skabs lnga pa'o//// rigs bzhi'i
dgongs pa rgyal po mgo dgu nyid// shar du dbu gsum dkar po ti pa tsa// lho ru mgo lnga dmar po ti pa tsa// nub tu mgo gcig gor ni ser po ti pa tsa// byang du mgo bdun pa ste sngon po ti pa

tsa// don ni gcig ste gdul bya'i ngo la de ltar shar zhes so// de yi rtsa ba dril ba las 'khor yin// rgyal po nye na mda' zor spu grir brdeg/ bram ze nye na bud+d+ha'i tsog brdungs brdeg/ rje'u rigs la ni yang snying
nag pos bya// dmangs la mdze zor nag pos 'khor lo 'phang// 'di ni kun la gces pa snying dang 'dra// sa bdag klu yi yang snying mdze zor yin pas gces// mi rigs gtad pa lnga gling bzhi gling

dang// gsum gling gnyis gling dag tu phye ba ste// lnga gling byed na dkyil 'khor mthing nag e dbus su/ shar du dkar nag lho yi ser nag yin// byang gi ljang nag nub kyi dmar nag go/ de rnams gtso bo bdun
rnams rang rang gi/ de rnams sku gsung thugs las sprul pa gsum gsum ste// stag mgo thang po dga' bo yin// sna tshogs oM la thang po a ste dga' bo hUM las gyur pa yin// gra ma skyer pa se ba rim pas

so// thod pa kha dog re ba sbrul dang rlung yin zhes// lus ngag yid la phur pa gdab pa yin// phur pa rnams kyi tshad kyang sor bzhi ste// 'byung ba bzhi po dbang du sdud pa yin// de ltar sngags dang sbyor ba rigs
dang sbyar// phur pa gdab pa dag kyang rigs dang sbyar// mda' zor byas la mda' yang brdeg/ mtshon gyi char pa kun kyang dbab// gdug na nad rlung kun 'dus bsam// lcags mkhar 'bar ba thod pa

ste// gdug sngags spyi rgyugs char yang 'bab// hri sti byos b+h+yor zhes bya ba// hri tri ro yam bcu gnyis pa// gnad kyi 'khor lo kha gcad do// lha srin kun la gtad cing bcol// ma nyes dpang yang drag tu
gzugs// gdung ba'i smre sngags ring du gdon// dmigs pa'i ming nas phyung nas ni// stag mgo can la gtad par bya// mnan pa gnas su bskyal bar bya// gling bzhi gru gsum bzhi la bya// gling gsum gru
gsum re re la'o// gnyis ni dbus dang byang du yin// zhes gsungs so// byol song glang mgo can las/ rtog pa'i skabs te drug pa'o//// gtad pa'i sbyor ba rdzogs nas ni// klu yi drod tshad 'byung ba
nges// g.yag gam mun pa byung ba na// 'khor lo gong ma spogs pa yin// dmag dang bshas byed byung ba na// dgra rtags myur du 'ong ba yin// gtang rag gtang ba'i sbyor ba bya// dkar gtor klu la dmar
gtor bdud// de ni nyin dang mtshan mo bya// rgya mtsho 'khyil pa byung ba na// ma tshogs gtor mas brid la bskul// rgyal rigs 'bag seng a tsa ra// lha gang la sogs ston pa na// gtor ma'am ni mda' zer
bca'// ras sam rgya shog dag la yang// sbrul dkar khongs su dgra bo bri// nad dang dri rgod gang 'dod bri// snying la mda' zor gzer ba ste// zhag grags gsum maM nyin gcig yin// sbal pa

khong stong nang du gzhug/ rgyal rigs gnas pa'i sa ru mnan// gtor ma dgra bo'i gnas su brdeg/ rgyal rigs las kyi mde'u ka'o// dmags dang rta pa khyi spyang dang/ bud med mang po byung ba na// thod pa nyi ma

nub nas blang// rna bar dar lce btags nas kyang// klu chen brgyad kyi snying po bri// nang du dgra gzugs a mu ka/ sbrul dang sbal pa sdig pa dang// gtor ma gzhug pa mchog yin te// cog rdungs nyin gcig
bzlas shes pas// gnyen po badzra he ru ka/ nub phyogs chu mig lteng bag can// 'di nyid gtad na las 'grub pas// bram ze b+hu ta nag po yin// thebs pa rtags kyi tshad ma gzung// 'di dag mi bzad hom

zhes bya// klu btsan sha rkyang rta ba ni// mi dmar mang po mang po na// yang snying nag po'i ling ga ni// rgya shog dag gam ka ri ka/ de la gnas pa ming gzugs zhing// sbal pa'i lto bar dgra gzugs la// nag po
yang snying bskul bas bskor// 'di la zhag grangs gsum bzlas sam// yang na gzhung bzhin shes pas na// yang snying nag po zhes bshad pa// thod pa byang shar mtshams su ste// sbal pa lho nub mtshams na
yin// zhes bshad pa ni rje'u rigs gtad// tshub ma 'khyil dang g.yag rog 'gying// gdol dang dmangs kyi rigs yin pas// mdze zor nag po'i las 'di brtsam// 'khor lo 'phang dang thun 'phang bya// zhes
gsungs pa las the tshom med// byol song glang mgo can las skabs bdun pa'o//// de nas rgyal ba'i bka' bstan pa bsrung ba'i man ngag las kyi mtshon cha byol song ha la nag po 'di ni// bka' rgyud

mkha' 'gros tshangs pa klu gnas lha khang sbas te bzhag/ skal ldan dbang phyug dpal ldan hUM ka ra// de las rgyud pa khrag 'thung nag po ste// srog gi rten pa rin chen snying dang 'dra bar bcangs// ces gsungs
nas ru khrag 'thung nag nag pos ba su d+ha ra la gdams so// klu'i 'khor lo nag po ha la 'bar ba'i rgyud/ byol song glang mgo can gyis gsungs pa rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ sa khrag tsakra sha truM nA ma tan+d+ra/ bod skad du/ sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ nag po klu'i rigs kyi bdag po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi thos
pa'i dus gcig na// zhe sdang gdug pa klu gnyan bu// dam shi phag mig ces bya ba// sa bdag klu gnyan sde dpon te// nag po 'dzum med ces par grags// rab tu gdug pa'i bu de dag/ yag+sha 'khor lo nag po

dang// nA ga de ma sa ta ma// gdug pa rnam gnyis 'chos pa'i bu'o// rgya mtsho'i gting na rab tu gnas// mi yi khams rnams 'khrug byed pa'i// lto 'phye sbrul gyi mgo bo can// zhe sdang nga rgyal 'dod chags

dang// phrag dog la sogs lto 'phye'i rigs// 'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yis// rdo rje can gyi sbyan snga ru// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ nA gas nA ga 'khol bas na// klu yi rgyal po gtso bor
bshad// klu rnams rigs ni lnga nyid de// rgyal po la sogs yin par bshad// de dag gnas pa'i bdag kyang// shar bltas drag 'bab me tog skye// sa gzhi rdo yang dkar por chags// rgyal rigs yin par

rab tu bshad// lhor bltas gting du dri yang zhim// rtag tu skye 'bri med bar 'bab// rje'u rigs yin par shes par bya// nub bltas gting 'bab sgra yang chung// rgya mtsho chen po sleb par 'bab// bram ze'i

rigs su shes par bya// byang bltas gnag cing nyams mi dga'/ rtag tu nyi ma 'char mi srid// rlung nag tshub ma rtag tu 'byung// gdol pa'i rigs su shes par bya// de dag spyi yi mtshan nyid do// re re la ni
bzhi bzhi ste// sleb par 'bab pa rgyal rigs yin// gting du 'bab cing dri zhim pa// rje'u rigs yin par shes bya// gting 'bab sgra chung bram ze'i rigs// grib gnas klung bdag gdol pa'i rigs// kun

la sbyar ba shes par bya// pho brang dag gam phyogs phyogs so// sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo las/ rigs kyi gtad sa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// nA ga de bi sa twa dang// yag+sha 'khor lo nag po yi// lto
'phye nag po sgrub pa des// dang po rang gi ma nyes bgrang// lha srin sde brgyad thams cad la// ma nyes pa yi dpang gzugs so// rigs drug klu yi gtor ma gtang// bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod lam bya// don

dang ldan pa'i rdzas kyang bsag/ dam shi phag mig ces bya ba// byol song chen po'i rigs 'di yang// ma mo dag dang bsdongs pas na// rdzings dang nyams lci'i cha bar 'gyur// bdud dang bsdongs na khrag tu
skyug/ btsan dang bsdongs pas gri thabs 'chi// dmu dang bsdongs pas sbos skrangs 'chi// nA ga gcig pus zin pas na// chu ser nag por 'bab par 'gyur// sa bdag dag dang bsdongs pas na// lus sbrid
rkang lag dag rkyang skam// gdug pa'i las de shes gyur na// de rnams gcig dang phrad par 'gyur// sa bdag sa la gnas pa dang// klu mo chu la gnas pa yin// mo rigs lnga ru byung ba ni// dam

shi nag mo lnga byung ste// mi lus sbrul mjug lto 'phye'i mgo/ phag mo lnga la yang dag zhon// de yi sbyor ba shes pa ni// nA ga gzi brjid can gyis khyim// sgo drung rgyab tu mkhas pas gtad// de yi go char rab bstan

pa// rkang pa g.yas pa'i long bu la// ri dwags lte ba'i phye ma'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i sor phrag tu// bya khyung snying po gsor las grub// nA ga ge sar bus pa dang// rgya mtsho lbu ba sbrang rtsis sbru// ri lu rgya yi rwa phul

gang// klu yi khyim nas 'dom gang du// rtsa ba brgyad du shes par bya// dam shi phag mo bsgom pa ni// lcags kyi phag mo nag mo zhon// lto 'phye chen po'i mgo bo la// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab tu 'khyil// mi yi lus

la lag pa gnyis// g.yas na sbal nag rgyal mtshan 'phyar// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar/ kha rlangs 'phros pas sbrul du 'khyug/ gzas ba po'i ske nas 'khrid// ma he dmar po'i steng du bskyon// las
kyi rlung gis rgyab nas 'phul// bdag gi drung du 'ong pa yis// gzas pa de dag de ltar ni// mig las 'phros pa'i sbrul nag gis// gzas po'i mgo bo khar bcug nas// zhe sdang stobs kyis mkha' la

lding// snying las 'phros pa'i phuHlas ni// klu bdun nag po zhes bya ba// las kyi lhar ni yang dag bsgom// ji ltar phag mo lnga regs bzhin// dkar dang ser dang dmar dang gnag/ sbrul gyi 'khor lo 'phro ba

yi// dkar gtor rgyan gyis mdzes byas la// dkar gsum mngar gsum argaM sbreng// klu shing brgyad po dngul chu bsag/ rma bya sgro la brid cing brten// de yi bsad pa'i sbyor ba yang// dar dkar gro ga shing

lpags la// nyams pa'i gzugs ni bri bar bya// a mu ka yi rdzas lnga la// yan lag mgo lus tshang bar bya// snying la ro nye za ba bri// yan lag rigs bzhi sbrul gyis 'phen// ga bu sbal pa khog stong dag/ gcig

gam yang na lnga ru bshad// nad dang mtshon cha sna tshogs bri/ kham pa'i kha 'u gong bar du// nA ga'i nor brgyad gsal bar bya/ kha zas tshigs pa rus pa dang// rtsa rgyus chad pa'i dmar khrag dang// chu yi 'bras bu

sle cig dang// yi dwags 'jigs pa'i mchod gnas brgyad// nang gi rdzas su bshad pa yin/ kham pa'i ga 'u phyi brgyad du/ khyi mo nag mo'i sna khrag dang// cog la dmar po'i khu ba dang// ro bsregs thal bas

gcan sbyar blugs// tshas kyis 'thems par bya ba gces// mi skra ra bal khyi bal dang// byang sgong sbal pa'i sha dag dang// tsha dang ba glang mkhris pa dang// ske tshe dang ni ram bu'i phye// bsregs thal ril bu
dmod pas gdab// de dag ngan sngags ngo bo yin// sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo las le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// nA ga de bi sa twa ma// sa bdag sa la gnas pa dang// klu mo chu la gnas pa

yi// sngags kyi ngo bo 'di yin te// gsang ba'i bdag pos rab tu bshad// dza ye phuHbi dza ye phu/ tsi ti tsi ti phu/ tsit+ta ang+ge phu/ na na se phu/ shang ka ru te phu/ ku lu ku ud ka te phu/ gra he sha ra ye phu/ sa shar gyi sa

bdag gnyan gyi bu// zhe sdang gzugs brnyan lto 'phye'i rigs// dam shi zhe sdang phag m-i+ig ma// byol song glan pa mthu bo che// lto 'phye chen po'i mgo bo la// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab tu 'khyil// mi yi lus la lag

pa gnyis// g.yas na sbal dkar rgyal mtshan 'phyar// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar// dung gi phag mo dkar mo zhon/ kha rlangs 'phros pas sbrul du 'khyug/ dam nyams dgra yi ske la 'khril// zhe sdang

dung lce 'bar ba yis// sa dug mdze shu g.yan pa dang// sbos dang skrangs dang dmu chu dang// skams dang 'khums pa la sogs pa'i// mdze rigs bco brgyad dgra la thong// klu glang dkar po'i steng du skyon// las

kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul// gtad do khyod kyi lag tu gtad// gtad nas gtong na khyod la sdig/ de yi sprul pa rnam gnyis ni// gdug pa rgyal rigs lto 'phye gnyis// zhe sdang gdug pa sbrul gnyis kyis// dam
nyams lag gnyis khar chug la// dug sbrul gdug pa dmar po yis// 'dud pa'i tshul du dra bar gyis// gdug pa sa la gnas pa yis// gzi brjid can gyi khyim du khrid// gtad du ma gtang sho ra ri// dam shi
sprul pa rnam gcig ni// klu bdud dkar po zhes bya ba// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab ldan zhing// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// g.yas na mtshon gyi rkyal pa thogs// dam nyams dgra la nad dal phob// shar gyi sa
bdag dam shi ma// gtad do khyed kyi lag tu gtad// gtad nas shor na gnyan min no// hUM/ lho yi sa bdag gnyan gyi bu// nga rgyal gzugs brnyan lto 'phye'i rigs/ nga rgyal dam shi phag mig ma// byol song

glan pa mthu bo che// lto 'phye chen po'i mgo bo la// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab tu 'khyil// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// g.yas na gser sbal rgyal mtshan thogs// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyur// gser

gyi phag mo ser mo zhon/ kha rlangs gser sbrul ser por 'khyug/ dam nyams dgra bo'i ske nas 'khril// nga rgyal dug chen 'bar ba yis// chu dug mdze shug yan pa dang// sbos dang glang dang dmu chu dang// skams
dang 'khums dang gas la sogs// mdze rigs bco brgyad dgra la thong// klu glang ser po'i steng du skyon// las kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul// gtad do khyod kyi lag tu gtad// gtad nas shor na gnyan min
no// de yi sprul pa rnam gnyis ni// gdug pa bram ze lto 'phye'i rigs// nga rgyal gdug pa sbrul gnyis ni// dam nyams lag gnyis kha ru chug/ yan lag bzhi nas 'then nas ni// 'dud pa'i tshul

du 'du bar mdzod// gdug pa chu la gnas pa yis// gzi brjid can gyi khyim du khrid// gtad do ma gtang sho ra re// dam shi sprul pa rnam gcig ni// klu bdud ser po zhes bya ba// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab ldan

zhing// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// mdze dang shu ba'i 'phor pa thogs// lus la nad thul khrag thul gsos/ khrag sbrul ser sbrul shigs se shigs// lho yi sa bdag dam shi'i tshogs// gtad do ma gtang sho ra
re// gtad nas shor na gnyan min no// hUM/ nub phyogs sa bdag gnyan gyi bu// 'dod chags gzugs brnyan lto 'phye'i rigs// 'dod chags dam shi phag mi gam// byol song glen pa mthu bo che// lto 'phye chen
po'i mgo bo la// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab tu 'khyil// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// g.yas nas zangs sbal rgyal mtshan thogs// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar// zangs kyi phag mo dmar mo zhon/ kha
rlangs zangs sbrul dmar po 'khyug/ dam nyams dgra bo'i ske la 'khril// 'dod chags dug lce 'bar ba yis// me dug mdze shu g.yan pa thong// sbos dang sgangs dang dmu chu dang// skams dang 'khums pa la

sogs pa'i// mdze rigs bco brgyad dgra la thong// klu glang dmar po'i steng du skyon// las kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul// gtad do ma gtang sho ra re// dam shi de yi sprul pa ni// gdug pa rje'u rigs lto 'phye
gnyis// 'dod chags gdug pa sbrul gnyis ni// dam nyams la gnyis khar chug la// zangs sbrul gdug pa dmar po yis// yan lag bzhi nas 'then nas ni// 'dud pa'i tshul du bsdu bar gyis// gdug pa me
la gnas pa yis// gzi brjid can gyi khyim du khrid// gtad do ma gtang sho ra re// dam shi de yi sprul pa ni// klu bdud dmar po zhes bya ba'i// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab ldan zhing// mi yi lus la lag pa

gnyis// mdze dang shu ba'i thul pa la// nad kyi rlangs pa phyu ru ru// lag gnyis khrag gi phor pa thogs/ kha nas sbal lcong tha ra ra// zangs kyi sdom sdig nyil li li// nub kyi sa bdag dam shi la// gtad do ma

gtang sho ra re// hUM/ byang gi sa bdag klu yi bu// phrag dog gzugs brnyan lto 'phye'i rigs// dam shi phrag dog phag mig ma// byol song glen pa mthu bo che// lto 'phye chen po'i mgo bo la// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab

tu 'khyil// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// g.yas na g.yu sbal rgyal mtshan thogs// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar// g.yu yi phag mo sngon mo zhon/ kha rlangs g.yu sbrul sngon por 'khyug/ dam nyams dgra
bo'i ske la 'khril// phrag dog dug lce 'bar ba yin// rlung dug mdze shu g.yan pa dang// spos dang sgangs dang dmu chu dang// skams dang 'khums pa la sogs pa'i// mdze rigs bco brgyad dgra

la thong// klu glang sngon po'i steng du skyon// las kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul// gtad do ma gtang sho ra re// de yi sprul pa rnams gnyis ni// gdug pa dmangs rigs lto 'phye'i rigs// phrag dog gdug pa sbrul
gnyis ni// dam nyams lag gnyis khar chug la// g.yu sbrul gdug pa mang po yi// yan lag bzhi nas 'then nas ni// 'dud pa'i tshul du 'dud par gyis// gdug pa klu la gnas pa yi// gzi brjid can gyi

khyim du khrid// gtad do ma gtang sho ra re// dam shi de yi sprul pa ni// klu bdud sngon po zhes bya ba// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab tu 'khyil// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// lag gnyis lhog pa'i phor thogs ma// sdong

rings 'chi ba'i yugs sa mo// 'brum bu sna tshogs 'thul ba'o// nad kyi rlangs pa phyu ru ru/ kha nas sbal lcong tho ro ro// g.yu yi sdom sdig nyil li li// byang gi sa bdag dam shi ma// gtad do ma gtang sho ra
re// hUM/ dbus kyi sa bdag klu'i// gti mug gzugs brnyan lto 'phye'i rigs// dam shi gti mug phag mig ma// byol song glen pa mthu bo che// lto 'phye chen po'i mgo bo la// sbrul gyi mjug ma rab tu
'khyil// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// g.yas na lcags sbal rgyal mtshan 'phyar// g.yon na sdig pa'i g.yang gzhi 'phyar// lcags kyi phag mo nag mo zhon/ kha rlangs lcags sbrul nag po 'khyug/ dam nyams

dgra bo'i ske la 'khril// tig mug dug lce 'bar ba yis// mdze dug shu ba g.yan pa dang// sbos dang sgangs dang dmu chu dang// skams dang 'khums pa la sogs pa'i// mdze rigs bco brgyad dgra la thong// klu
glang nag po'i steng du skyon// las kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul// gtad do ma gtang sho ra re// de yi sprul pa rnam gnyis ni// byol song gdug pa sbrul gnyis kyis// dam nyams lag gnyis khar bcug
la// lcags sbrul gdug pa mang po yis// yan lag bzhi nas 'then nas ni// 'dud pa'i tshul du bsdu bar gyis// gdug pa mkha' la gnas pa yis// gzi brjid can gyi khyim du khrid// gtad do ma gtang sho ra

re// dam shi de yi sprul pa ni// klu bdud nag po zhes bya ba// sbrul gyi mjug mas rab brgyan cing// mi yi lus la lag pa gnyis// lag gnyis mkhris pa'i phor thogs ma// lus la khrag thul nad thul gyon/ kha
rlangs nad kyi rlangs pa 'phyur// lcags kyi sbal lcong thar ra ra// lcags kyi sdom sdig nyil li li// dbus kyi sa bdag dam shi ma// gtad do ma gtang sho ra re// gtad nas shor na gnyan men no// sa bdag
srog gi 'khor lo las le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// sa bdag gnyan srog rigs lnga gcig/ gcig pu kho na khyad par mchog/ ba dang 'o ma zho dang mar// zhun mar snying po lta bu ste// klu yi dmod pa
nag po'o// gdug pa klu yi dug 'di ni// sa ya brjod na kun kyang 'chi// de ni ngan sngags ngo bo ste// bye ba brjod na gdon mi za// 'bum phrag brjod na 'chi bar 'gyur/ khri phrag gis kyang sbyor ka

rdzogs// rdzogs dang sngags pa go gyon te// rigs sogs dag pa'i khyim dag tu// de la sngags shing khyim du gzhug/ gdug pa khros na las rnams myur// 'byung ba tsha grang dgra byung tshe// mgo la mkha' 'gro sgro
dag gis// nyi zla 'phang du blangs nas kyang// ga 'u sbyor ba khyim du gzhug/ sa yi bdag po lto 'phye brtag/ dus sogs rigs bzhi mkhas pas brtag/ ces khyab bdag ye shes kyis gsungs so// sa bdag srog
gi 'khor lo las/ le'u ste lnga pa'o//// sa bdag srog gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ klu rigs srog rgyud rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ nA ga kA la tan+t+ra pri tsu mA ra ya na ma/ bod skad du/ klu nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung shig ces bya ba/ klu'i bdag po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i

dus gcig na// klu yi rgyal po 'jigs byed che// nA ga rag+sha yag+sha zhes// sbrul nag mgo dgu drag po gzugs// 'chi ba'i bdag gam gshin rje ste// klu yi rgyal po yin par bshad// gdol pa nag po dmangs kyi
rigs// 'dir ni nag po yin pas na// rgyal po rje'u bram ze la// kun la las ni bcol ba las// de la gtad par bya ba min// ji ltar rjes su snang bas dpag/ rigs sogs mkhas pas brtag pa

las// byang dang byang shar gnas mchog ste// sa dbyibs gnag cing 'jigs pa'i dmas// rtsub dang drag po'i shing ldan pa// brag dang chu 'thab rgya gram lam// nag po lkug pa de min pa// klu yi gnas gzhan
spangs pa yin// ji ltar rgyal po rang la ldog/ rje'u bram ze las mi nus// don med las 'gyangs yug pa yin// nag po gdug pa gshin rje ste// ji ltar gnas pa'i sa dgra yang// gtang dmag drang ba'i sa

phyogs te// ji ltar nag po nyid la sbyar// nag po khru ba kha zhes pa// gdol pa nag po chig shur pa// hur thum byed pa'i khyim thab yin// de phyogs sa'i prag shi chu// klu nag lce mdung bcu bdun te// gshin rje'i
gnas khang skyon ra yin// chu glang la sogs dud 'gro'i gzugs// rwa dang rmig bzhir rtsal rdzogs pas// lce mdung zhes su bshad pa yin// de bzhin sbal pa'i sbar bzhi dang// sdig pa'i rwa dang
mjug rtse yin// nya'i gshog rtse rtsal rdzogs bzhin// ji snyed sems can gzugs la dpag/ 'di dag sa khram nag pos te// 'di dag nges pa kho na yin// rgyal po la sogs gnas mi sbyar// byang shar gnas
mchog g.ya' gong na// mtsho nag dug dang 'dra ba 'khyom// gdol pa mthong ba'i dug gcan yod// phyag na rdo rje mthu stobs kyang// nag po dug de 'joms pa men// 'chi ba'i bdag po gshin rje gshed// sprul
pa'i 'khor lo 'di bsgoms na// lus kyi klu rnams dbang du 'du// sdig pa go cha bsgo ba dang// lhag gsum lus la bsgom byas te// nag po'i sa phyogs de dag tu// gzer gdab dug chu re bas bskor// sha ru
rtsi sman ldan pas bskor/ khru gang 'og tu mkhas pas gtad// klu yi rgyal po byin dga' ste// sa bdag ldog na 'jigs skrag 'thibs// tsha thur nag po'i 'khor lo bsten// gtad khram gtad bya gtad dmag
drang// zhes gsungs so// klu nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung gshigs las/ gtad pa'i dmigs pa btsal ba klu'i rgyal po'i le'u ste dang po'o//// klu yi rgyal po 'chi ba'i bdag/ gsang sngags dug ni spu gri

ste// klu yi rang gnad srog yin pas// lha men mtshon cha lta bu yin// nag po gdug pa'i smon pa yin// yang dag par ni bshad par bya// yang snying nag po'i srog gi gzer// oM nag po ti pa tsa ya nA ga rag+sha he khu
la phe shan nag pos shig shig chum hu ya hu ya/ klu nag po mgo dgu pa zung zung/ chings chings/ a mu ka/ mA ra ya/ klu yi rgyal po mgo dgu pa'i// srog yi ge spu gri yin// spu gri bcad pa'i yul med

par// mtshon cha bcangs na rang gcod yin// nA ga du/ ga nA du/ nA ga shan du/ he mi he mi/ nA ga 'dus 'dus/ 'khor gyi klu rnams bsdu ba yin// nag po baM tsi tsi rgyas trag thur snying la 'gul myags myags rtsa

bzhi skums shan shan srog la shan thur sod swAhA/ yang snying nag po zhes bya ba// gsad pa'i yang snying spu gri yin// nA ga rA dza a nan ta nan/ nA ga pu nA ga pu/ ka hUM dza hUM dza/ pad+ma ni dza sham khab la ni dza/ dgra bo

dam pa ya ni dza/ ga la ge'u su ni dzA/ bstan pa'i bar char byed pa yi/ sha truM srog ni nr-i yin te// de dag 'gugs pa klu yi sngags// kyo ba lu gu rgyud ces pa// klu yi bdag pos bshad pa yin// nA ga shan ting dun

sri ba sa nA ga nan/ nA ga rA dza na na nA ga mi ra rbud/ shan ti sha nu tshubs/ nag po o ra li gsham/ nA ga dun dun gyel// nA ga du ya yA/ tsubs tsu nyu sha rbad// klu yi dmod gzer nag po ste// ngan sngags nag
po thun gcig pa// dmod pa spu gri klu yis bshad// sa byi pa cog khug ling khug ling he he phaT/ oM badzra krod+ha sa ma ya phaT/ sa byi bcog ling ma ma mugs mugs hi byi la cho cho/ a la gug ling

swAhA/ klu yi bdag pos gzer ba ste// dbang sdud gcun par bshad pa yin// phe ga lag sha hu ya hu ya/ bskyed pa sku yi yi ger bshad// gshed chen nag po nA ga'i bdag/ khyab bdag rdo rje drag po che// srog gi

ngo bo de nyid de// gdug pa'i yi ge 'bar ba che// myos byed 'bar ba drag po che// nges par nA ga'i srog gi 'bru// dug chen mtshon chas gcod par byed// nA ga rag+sha de ba ho/ zhes gsungs so// klu nag po'i rgyud
sdig pa phung shig las/ gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// dpal ldan rdo rje drag po yis// las su bya ba yang dag go/ 'bras bu smin dang lo tog rgyas/ khyad par dbyar gsum zla ba
yin// dbyar sa nas ni dgun sa'o// 'di dag 'khor gyi klu rigs yin// rgya mtsho'i gting du gnas par bshad// de nas dbyar gyi brgyad pa la// chu mig dong ru klu rnams 'ong// rtags kyi tshad mar shes par
bya// pho brang mtshon dang phun gyis shes// me long mnyen shes bshad pa'ang yod// gnyan ra gdug pa'i sa bdag la// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhir bya// sman dang 'o mas chag chag gdab// rgya mtsho'i

gting du gzhal yas dbyibs// pho brang lcags kyi khad pa la// yid kyis rgyu ba'i sgo gcig ldan// gru gsum mthing nag zla gam dmar// zhi ba sbrul gyi chun 'khor ldan// klu shing rgyang bu klu gzugs ldan// gtor

ma la sogs mchod rdzas bsham// ga 'u nag po zhes bya ba// mdze can thod pas gshag par bya// pho thod mo thod steng dang 'og/ dbang po kha dog dmar po yin// rtsibs drug tsakra dmar po ldan// drag sngags klu
gzugs yang dag 'brel// dkar gsum me tog khu ba las// nyams pa'i gzugs la sdig pa drug/ lnga phung 'joms phyir yan lag 'dzin/ kha sbyar lcags kyi khang pa yin// mgo lcog de'i nang du ste// klu yi

dug kyang de bzhin bya// stong pa nyid ni rab gsal ba// yi ge'i rang bzhin de dag la// zhe sdang gdug pa'i sku ru bsam// phrag dog rdo rje'i go cha ste// sra brtan mi shig rdo rje mchog/ de las 'phro 'du klu yin

pas// rang la 'dus na gtsang mar rigs// ha la nag po yin par bshad// 'khor bsdu ba dang gnyen po la// bcu bzhi sngags kyi 'phreng ba ste// klu yi rgyal po bsgrub par bshad// de rtags mngon par 'byung ba

ni// sdig pa sprin ltar gtibs pa dang// nya sbrul glog ltar 'khyug pa dang// chu srin 'brug ltar sgrogs pa ni// phyi de 'gyur med rmi ltas yin// mngon rtags rdzas la sdom rgya chags// gsang rtags lus la 'byung
bar bshad// de rtags mngon par grub pa na// nA ga sde bzhis 'gugs pa'i las// a mu kha yi srog gtig ste// drag sngags bcu bzhi gnyis yin no// a mu ga la btsag bsku bcing// sol bas
byugs dang btson du 'dzin// rang lus rtags las grol dang nye// rdzas la sdom sdig tshang bcas na// de rtags mngon du gyur pas na// bsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad par bya// bsad dad dbang sdud yang snying

ste// bzhi bcu bzhi dang brgyad gnyis te// nyi shu rtsa lnga ldan pa la// brgyad cu rtsa lnga mA ra ya// phung shig nag po'i las su bshad// las kyi mtha' brtul de rtags ni// dmag dang mtshon chas brgyab pa dang// ra
dang ri dwags bsad pa dang// sdom sdig rdzas la sbyar ba dang// lus kyi rtags las grol bar bshad/ khram gdab las bcol kha dbye zhing// mkhas pas klu la gtad par bya// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed

pa// myur du rlag par yang dag bshad// klu nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung shig las/ klu'i rgyal po bsgrub pa dang gtad pa'i las 'phrin las kyi rtog pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//// drod rtags tshad kyi las mtshon

pa// nA ga rak+sha'i rnal 'byor che// drod rtags rgyal po lnga gnyis so// bdag po yod na nyams 'jigs shing// sa dbyibs srog chags gzugs 'dra la// rgyal po lta bu rmi na'o// gsal la mi yengs dgra dngos
sam// bla rtags byung ba nges pa yin// chu mig mdog 'gyur skam pa dang// bla rtags byung na mA ra ya'o// bsam pa ma yengs dngos por tshugs// dmag dpon byed na las la mngag/ bdag po dbang du gnas
pa yin// bsam rgyud gsal la shes pa rngam/ khams gsum bdag po dmag 'dren pa// 'gyur med las su bshad pa yin// ri sogs 'jam bzhag 'jigs gzugs med// nyams 'phyo phya sangs nyams bag

med// rmi ltas lung stong 'gro ba rmi// bdag po med pas spang bar bya// ting 'dzin mi gsal rta lug 'tsho// a mu ka de don mi 'grub// bskyar te bsgrub pa spogs par bya// chu 'gyur gzhan du 'phos ba na// chu

chen 'grub pa rmis pa na/ khram la ma thebs mnan te bsad/ bsam pa seng seng byed pa dang// ting 'dzin mi gsal bying ba dang// 'tsher shu stong par phyin pa rmi// nA ga bskyas pa'i shul yin pas// gtad kyang

kho bdag med pas 'gyang// bdag nyid bsam ngo zhan pa dang// 'jigs shing skrag dang 'dam du zhugs// phyar ba khra bo gyon pa dang// lus la rma byung sems can 'dzug/ de ni ldog pa'i rtags su bshad// klu

nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung shig las/ drod rtags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gshed khram nag po gsang ba ste// gshin rje klu dang btsan bdud ging// ma mo khram ka nag po ste// 'debs pa'i phyir na khram yin
te// mi 'chor bya phyir khram yin no// dregs pa'i yang snying nag po yin/ ya mA rA dza nag po dgra'i snying la ya ya ya/ gshin rje nag po dza thun dgra bo la b+h+yo/ 'di dag gshin rje'i khram nag

ste// gdug pa'i mtshon cha nag po'o// nA ga ken rtse 'dus 'dus dza thur dgra la b+h+yo/ klu yi byad khram nag po yin// a be she he thum dza thur dgra ya b+h+yo/ btsan gyi khram nag 'bar ba yin/ nag po kha mun dra de chod

tsa thur dgra la b+h+yo/ tsa thur snying thur snying la yam/ bdud kyi bsad khram nag po yin/ badzra sa du snying dgra la yaM b+h+yo/ gi gi rtsis rtsis las kyis so// dza thur snying la yaM yaM snying thur dgra la b+h+yo/ ma mo'i khram

nag ces su bshad// dregs pa khram la gdab pa dang// las la rbad de bskul ba dang// bsad pa'i yang snying mchog tu bshad// klu nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung gshigs las/ khram nag bstan pa ste le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// ma grub phung gshigs spogs pa'i las// bco brgyad sngags kyis spyan drangs la// 'bru dgus rnam shes gzugs la gzud// sum cu bzhi pas gnad la dbab// dregs pa'i khram gdab 'phrin las

bcol// 'bru rgod drag pos brlab par bya// zhes gnad kyi mtshon cha 'di gsungs so// a mu ka tsa srog rbad/ raM raM nA ga mu kha raM raM/ yang raM raM rbad raM raM/ gsang ba e gnas drag po ru// tsher ma can gyi shing
btser la// gdug pa'i ling ga ldan byas la// klu yi gnod gzer drag pos bsad// ces gsungs so// ji srid rang la ldog pa na// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi ldan pa na// klu yi rang gshed gsang ba ste// gnyen po

ldan pas 'khor lo bskor// ldog pa srung ba ma yin la// kun la bya ba ma yin te// nA ga rag sha zhes bya ba/ dug gi yan lag lta bu ste// bya ba kun 'grub rlag ces pa/ khyab bdag rdo rje rgyal pos bshad// klu

nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung gshigs las le'u ste drug pa'o//// klu yi rgyal po 'chi bdag gtso// nges par las la rbad pa ni// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rum nas// 'chi bdag nag po sku bzhengs cig/ sbrul
nag lus la sdig pa'i dbu// phung shig sbrul gyi ral pa can// nag po 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// sngags pas dung dung bos pa'i tshe// skad cig lhang lhang tser tser 'bod// 'khor gyi klu rnams dbang du
sdud// spyan nag khrag gi char pa 'bebs// g.yas na sbrul nag zhags pa rnams// g.yon na nad kyi rkyal pa thogs// nad dang mdze rigs yams su 'bebs// shangs nas rlung nag tshub mar ldang// 'jig rten
khams kun nad kyis 'gengs// zhal nas sdug pa'i nga ro yis// 'jig rten klu rnams las la 'khol// klu bdud nag po 'jigs pa'i sku// nag po sku yi g.yas phyogs nas// sdig pa smug nag 'jigs par
'gyed// rwa bgrad tshangs pa'i 'jig rten khengs// phung bshigs dug gi sdig pa yin// pho nyar sdig pa smu gnag 'gyed// nag po sku yi g.yon phyogs nas// sdig pa khams nag 'jigs pa

'gyed// sa 'og rim dgu klog byed cing// sa bdag klu yi pho nya 'gyed// rbad na dgra yi yul khams 'jig/ nag po sa gtom rgyal ba bya// nag po'i sku yi rgyab phyogs nas/ khrag gi sdig pa dmar po la// bse
yi ru rings gnam du sleb// pho nyar klu glang mang po 'gyed// klu btsan 'bum la dbang sgyur la// nyams pa dgra la mdze rgod glo bur thong// nag po sku yi mdun phyogs na// gser gyi sdig pa 'jigs pa
la// dung ru gnam du zangs se zangs// pho nyar dung phag khra mo 'gyed// sa bdag nag po'i dmag dpung sdud// sdig pa phung shigs sku bzhengs shig/ nag po 'dzin shes gtor mi shes// yum dang 'khor du

bcas pa rnams// dam rdzas bdud rtsi mchod 'bul gyis// dgra bo dam nyams 'khor bcas rnams// rtsa ba dgu rgyud rlung la bskur// yang na myos shing lkugs su chug/ yang na smyos shing 'bog tu chug/ yang na

mdze dang shu ba thong// zhes pas bskul bar yang dag bshad// nA ga sa nA ga 'khol ba yin// klu yi rgyal po na ga'i rgyud// gsang ba yang tig spu gri'i rgyud// nag po bskol ba'i las rgyud 'di/ khyab bdag ye
shes ngas bshad pa'i// mtshon chas bstan la yun gnas byed// mkha' 'gro nye bar thugs brtse'o// klu nag po'i rgyud sdig pa phung gshigs las/ las la bskul ba zhes bya ste le'u bdun pa'o//// klu rgyud
sdig pa phung gshigs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs so//// ka ma la dang hUM ka ras/ klu gnas kyi thugs gter 'di ba su d+ha ra la gtad pa'o// rgya rgya rgya/ rgya rgya rgya////
rgya gar skad du/ nA ga kA la tsakra/ bod skad du/ klu'i 'khor lo nag po/ mA ra ya bsad pa'i 'phrin las/ gshin rje nag po'i 'khrul 'khor/ dug sbrul nag po lto dkrug gsang ba yang snying nag po/
klu'i srog tig nag po zhes bya ba/ klu'i rigs kyi bdag po 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rigs kyi bdag po 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sprul pa gshin rje klu dang gza'// rin chen lhun po'i ri rab

ste// phyogs bzhi dag la re re la// nyi shu rtsa lnga grangs kyis so// rgya mtsho ljon shing sa dang brag/ nam mkha' la sogs rigs mthun pa// klu yi rgyal po'i gnas de dag/ pho brang la sogs gzhan dag kyang// rang

rang rjes su mthun pa ni// rigs la khyad par yin par snang// rgyal po bram ze rje'u dmangs// gdol pa mtshams kyi cha la ste// 'di dag tu ni rnam par bshad// shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi nang// re re la ni
bzhi bzhi ste// rigs kyi khyad par yin par bshad// shar na rgyal po seng ge gdong// bram ze'i rgyal po bod gdong yin// nub ni rje'u rigs wa gdong ste// byang na dmangs rigs bya rog
gdong// mtshams na gdol pa gnas pa ste// shar lho mgo stong lus nag po// byang shar na ni rtag mgo can// nub byang 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// lho nub nag po mig gcig go/ de dag rgyal ba'i zhal mthong
min// myur mgyogs bden pa mi shes pas// gdol pa zhes pa rigs kyi cha'o// lo dang zla ba zhag dang dus// rtags dang 'byung pas btsal ba// nges par thebs dang 'khyams pa dang// ldog dang 'gor ba dus
yin no// 'gras pa'i dus su 'grub pa dang// gtad pa'i dus su shes par ni// dgra dang zas dang grogs su shes// 'di dag klu yi bdag pos bshad// 'jam pa'i bdag po klu yi gshed// zil gyis mkhar

lding nag pos mnan// dbang du rta mgrin rgyal pos bsdu// las la klu mo nag mos gzud// pho brang srang dang srang sgo dang// bya ra sa la sogs par ni// rig la re re snang bas gtad// gtad pa klu yi rgyal po

ste// sa yi bdag po'i lto bar gtad// 'di ni klu yi bdag pos bshad// dug sbrul nag po lto dkrug gi rtog pa dang po'o//// de nas bsad pa las ston ni// ma rA ya zhes bya ba ni// byang phyogs brag gam chu

mig go/ yang na nag po gal ba'i gnas// lho phyogs brag nag sog po 'dra// yang na rgya mtsho'i dong yang 'dra// gnod sbyin drag po yod pa'i gnas// 'di dag tu ni bshad pa yin// dbyar zla tha ma'i nag po'i
dus// las la 'khor los sbyor ba ste// dkyil 'khor e ldan rtsig byugs la// klu bdag 'khor la gtor ma sbyin// 'jig rten pa la gser skyem gtang// thod pa nag po'am ro ras la// mkhas pas 'khor lo

bri bar bya// steng gcod gshin rje nag po ste// 'og gcod bdud mo re ma ti// bcu bdun g.yas dang g.yon du bri// hri ti st-i phyi'i kha gnan te// rang la mi ldog phar la thebs/ kha gnon gzer bu bshad pa

yin// bar du bsad pa'i tsakra ni// nag po klu yi 'khor lo ste// sbal nag lto bar a mu ka/ phyi rol bsad dang sgrub pa ste// bcug sa dang sbyor shes par bya// 'khor lo nyi ma bzhi pa ste// mtshan mo klu yi dmod

pa dang// yang snying nag pos bsad pa ni// ya ma rA ya yi srog thun zhes/ khyab bdag ye shes nges bshad do// dug sbrul nag po lto dkrug gi rtog pa gnyis pa'o//// dang por sems nyid stong pa nyid// snying

rje ngang las hUM mthing ste// thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje che// de las khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// mthing nag gyad kyi 'jigs tshul can// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// be con sdigs mdzub zhabs bgrad pas// de
yum bdud mo re ma ti// lcags kyu tsit+ta bsnams pa'o// las kyi lha yang de 'dra ste// 'khor lo nag po'i bdag nyid yin// tsit+ta e ka hUM zhes pa// sems dpa' bzhugs dang mchod bstod bya// klu

yi bdag po mdun du ste// mgo dgu yab yum bka' stod tshul// sngags ni nyin dang mtshan mo ste// nyin ni gshin rje'i bsnyen pa la// mtshan mo klu yi bdag po bsgrub// sgrub rtags cir yang ma nges te// sbrul
nag g.yag rog mon pa dang// sbal pa nag po mthong na 'grub// glang chen ma thong ldog dang 'grub// rtags ni chad mar nga yi bshad// dug sbrul nag po las le'u gsum pa'i rtog pa'o//// gsang sngags ngo

bo 'di dag go/ oM ya ma me ta k+Sha/ ra dza sa to/ ru na yo ni/ rA ya tsa ni/ sa ma ya hUM phaT/ 'di dag klu'i 'khor sdud pa'o// na ga du nA ga du nA ga he li he li nA ga 'dus 'dus/ 'di dag ni gtso bo bsgrub

pa'o// a shaM nag po hi pa tsa/ na ga kro d+hi shwa ri tri shaM rbad/ bu gu sha ra rbad/ ti pa tsa pa tsa kha la baM sha truM sha mA ra na dzA dzA/ 'di dag snying nag pos bsad pa'o// nag po baM tsi tsi rgyob/ trag thur snying 'gul myags

myags rtsa bzhi bskums// shan shan srog la shan thur sod swAhA/ 'di dag nyi ma bzhi pas bsad pa'o// ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ che ge mo a mo khraM pra ma ya/ ya me to ru na yo te/ che ge mo a mu khaM rag+ta tsa ra ya/ ya

ta yo n-i ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM mu ra tsa ra la/ yak+She ya tsa ni ma ra ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM mA ra ya/ nA ga khaM thum myags/ dgra'i srog la ni rbud rbud ya/ nyin bzhin spu gri so so'o// dug sbrul nag po las

'khor lo bskor ba dang gsang sngags kyi rtog pa bzhi pa'o//// 'khor lo nyi ma bzhi ru bskor// mtshan mo bsad pa klu yi sngags// dgongs dang tho rang thun sngags dang// reg chod drag dril la bzlas// 'di
ni 'khor lo rdzogs nas zhag/ gsum du gtad pa'i gsang sngags te// dril bas brdeg ces ngas bshad pa// rdo rje rnon pa'i las yin no// las kyi gshin rje pho mo bskul// gza' dang yam shud dmar po
yang// bskul bas rdo rje drag pos bshad// gsum du gtad pa'i gsang sngags te// dug sbrul nag po las gsang ba don gyi las te rtog pa lnga pa'o//// yang snying nag po gsang ba'i don// nag po klu yi dug
mda' yin// sbrul nag chen po byas pa'i khar// gro ga ming rus rdzas la bya// la bya'i sbal pa'i khog par gzhug/ nag po klu yi gnas su gzhug/ dus la mi 'da' kho na nyid// dang po dkar la brid pa

yin// 'dris nas dmar yang dbul bar bya// klu yi bdag po sngags 'dis bod// oM nA ga sha shu kha dum pa la nA ga rA dza 'dus sa ma ya hUM dza dza/ klu yi rgyal po bod pa yin// e h+ye hi nA maHsa man+ta nA ga ru pa dza

la dza la swAhA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags su 'dod/ oM a la la ho nA ga ra dza pu tsa ya na pu tsa hring hring/ gtor ma dbul dang mchod pa'i sngags/ oM na ga rA dza nag po baM tsit+ta rgyas/ yan lag skums sa

ma ya/ mA ra ya/ tsi tsi dza la khrag rgyas he he na ga 'dus/ khraM baM ba ru na tsi tsi rgyas/ kha khrag snying la rgyas/ na ga ru pa ru pa hUM phaT/ nA ga rA dza sa ma ya/ snying la khrag du mugs dam dza dza/ bsad pa'i yang snying bsgrub

pa yin// oM nA ga tsa nag po baM tsit+ta rgyas/ yan lag skums/ sa ma ya/ ma ra ya/ tsi tsi dza la drag rgyas/ he he nA ga 'dus 'dus/ khraM baM pa ru na tsit+ta rgyas/ kha khrag snying la la rgyas/ nA ga ru pa ru pa/ dza la dza la/
che ge mo ma ra rbad/ bsad pa'i yang snying nag po yin// btsan dug khol ma lta bur bshad// dug sbrul nag po las/ yang snying nag po'i rtog pa drug pa'o//// hUM/ bskal pa'i rlung nag 'khyil pa'i dkyil
'khor nas// rig pa'i rgyal po 'chi bdag mgo dgu pa// bdud kyi bdud cig 'chi bdag klu yi bdud// 'chi bdag nag po yab yum sku bzhengs cig/ bka' yi pho nya las kyi srog gshed dang// klu bdud klu

btsan sa bdag klu srin gnyan// bstan pa bsrung phyir 'phrin las 'di ni 'chol// dam nyams ru tra'i 'khor rnams rtsa rgyu gcod// nag po ti pa tsa ya nA ga rag+sha mahA ba li ta khA hi/ hUM/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gting rum

na// rigs bzhi'i klu rnams bzhugs pa ni// gzhan la mi 'bod mi g.yob kyis// nag po gdal pa can gyi rigs// bzhugs ni chab mi gdong na bzhugs// chibs su rus sbal nag po chibs// chu srin nag po'i khri stengs na// nag
po 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// sbrul nag stong gi zhags pa 'phen// gtad pa'i dgra bo yan lag chings// g.yon pa med pa'i nad rnams kyis// tshor ba med pa'i snying la gtong// snying nad 'bar ba'i
nad kyang gtong// slar 'tsho bya ba'i ming yang med// tsi tsi dza la'i mnga' bdag ste/ khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// na bza' sbrul nag slag pa la// sbal sbrul mang po phrul lu lu// tsha ba'i 'bu
srin nyil li li// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ces ni gdol pa khyad par bskul// dug sbrul nag po las bskul gyi rtog ba bdun pa'o//// rang la mi ldog gnyen po ste// stong nyid lta ba de nyid

yin// gnyen po na ga rag+sha ste// ngan sngags 'di dag gsang ba yin// oM bruM kri bruM khraM/ gab pa'i yi ge yin par bshad// 'khor lo mi ldog hri ti'i gzer// pho nya mi ldog bskul ba'i gzer// dza ti gur kum gla

rtsi gsum// lus ngag bsrung ba'i gnas su gdab// rma bya 'ug pa srin bya gsum// rgyal mtshan lta bur gzugs par bya// sgrib shing yin pas bcang bar bya// dri chen dri chu khong du gtang// btsan dug a ru ra
dang sbyar// dri chu dang sbyar ba khong du gtang// 'di dag pa'i yang snying yin// mi ldog pa'i las yin te// dug sbrul nag po'i rtog pa brgyad pa'o//// dug sbrul phung gshig nag po 'di// yA ma nA

ga rag+sha ste// dug gi mtshon cha lta bu yin// yang snying nag po gtad kyi rgyud// phung byed nag po mgo dgu'i gter// byol song ha la gdong pa'i mda'// phung byed 'khor lo lto bsdebs rgyud// nag po rigs kyi

bdag po ste// nA ga ha la zhes bya ba// mi 'bar tshangs pa klu khang na// rgyal po ka mas brda bkrol ba// 'di ni yang snying lta bur bsdus// 'chi bdag klu'i zla gsang yang snying nag po/ dug sbrul lto dkrug ces bya
ba rtog pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// rdo rje gdan gyi ka gdan gser zangs can nas phyung pa// ba su d+ha ra'i mnag pa'o// mang+ga laM//
rgya gar skad du/ de ba ya tra san tra ru nyu ta pi la ya nA ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag

'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// 'og min gyi gnas mchog dam pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa/ 'khor dpag tu med pa yis bskor ba'i bskor ba med pa'i tshul gyis
bskor te bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ rang gi 'khor du 'dus pa rnams kyi nang na langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste bskor te phyag 'tshal lo// mi
chags pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs ni mchod/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba la sogs pa mang po gtor te/ pus mo'i lha nga g.yas pa sa la btsugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das thugs rje'i
bdag po/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ lha srin thams cad ni 'khrugs te/ la las nad kyi bskal pa btang// la las mtshon gyi char pa phab// la las sad dang ser ba ni btang// la las mu ge'i bskal pa ni

btang// la las char gyi rgyun bcad// rtsi thog thams cad kyang bskams// ma rungs pa sna tshogs btang ste// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams zad du nye// 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes gzung zhing byin
gyis brlab tu gsol ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i don thugs su chud nas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig brgya byin lha'i gtso rab tu nyon cig khyod kyis zhu ba spobs pa
legs so// ngas bstan pa'i skabs dbye'o// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ brgya byin gyis zhu ba spobs pa dang gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis thams cad dbang du bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu dregs pa can thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ub kyis 'dus nas/ la la ni brgyal/ la la ni ngu

zhing brang brdung/ la la rang skra rang 'bal/ la la khrag tu skyug la la 'gyel/ la la ni ci byung ba yin zer nas thams cad brgyal bar gyur te/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad gso ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu dregs pa de dag thams cad brgyal ba sangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ub kyis 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor zhing phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad
ces mgrin gcig tu smras/ kye bcom ldan 'das thugs rje bdag po chen po/ bdag cag rnams khyod kyi 'bangs su mchi'o// ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes bka' stsol cig ces gsol to// de na bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dregs pa khyed rnams kyis nga'i bstan pa srungs cig 'khor rnams skyongs cig de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das bstan pa zhes bgyi ba ji ltar
lags/ srungs ces bya ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dregs pa rnams nyon cig bstan pa zhes bya ba ni chos 'dul ba dang/ mdo sde

dang/ mngon pa la sogs pa mtha' dag go/ srungs zhes bya ba de rnams dang/ rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'tshe ba byed pa rnams sgrol cig sod cig pa'o// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa rnams dbang du bsdus shing las la bsgo ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom
ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// sde dang rigs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon

cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// sde dang rigs rnams bstan pa ni// la la byang chub sems dpa'i sde dang sa la gnas pa'i tshul/ la la de ba lha'i rigs te srid pa'i nor 'dzin
byed/ la la zhe sdang bdud kyi bu ste bdud gcod las rnams byed/ la la nga rgyal btsan gyi bu ste gzer nad bdag po byed/ la la dkor bdag rgyal po'i bu ste srog gi bdag po byed/ la la bdud mo
ma yams rigs te gzer nad khrag nad gtong/ la la the brang 'dza la'i rigs te stong gsum smug 'bros byed/ la la sde brgyad gdug pa'i bu ste ser ba dreg thogs 'bebs/ la la gnod sbyin gdug pa'i sde

tshogs sha dang khrag la dad/ la la sa bdag klu gnyan rigs te gdug pa nad kyi bdag sde dang rigs ni mang du mchis// rtsal dang nus pa dpag las 'das// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen
po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi sde dang rigs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i
rgyal po 'di rnams ni// byang chub sems la gnas par bya ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye brgya byin nyon cig

bdud lha sbyin bya ba dang/ bdud gangs pa bzang po dang/ bdud skos rje drang dkar dang/ btsan ye rings rgyal ba dang/ skyes bu lde btsan dang/ btsan 'od khyung dkar po dang/ rgyal po i ni sems dpa' dang/
rgyal po sems dpa' dang/ 'od chen dang/ rgyal po 'od dkar dang/ bdud mo rgyal byin ma dang/ bdud mo ye ka la dang/ the brang in tra sems dpa' dang// ja la dbang sdud dkar mo dang// klu nye dga' dang/
sa bdag brtan ma dang/ gnod sbyin gang pa bzang po dang// bcu drug po 'di rnams ni/ bgegs kyi byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug go/ de nas yang brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye bcom
ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ dregs pa rnams ni shin tu gsad la dga' ste/ srog dbugs kyi bdag po byed pa la/ sha
dang khrag la dad pa 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes ci'i phyir zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig
bgegs kyi byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug po 'di ni sha dang/ khrag dang/ srog dbugs za ba las log nas/ shin tu rnam par dkar ba ste/ dug lnga ni byang/ yang dag pa'i don la chub/ ma yengs te sems

dpa' byang chub sems dpa'o// dug lnga la dregs pa'i srog la dam pas dregs so// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre srong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bgegs kyi byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bstan pa'i le'u ste
bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i stong sde 'di rnams la// bcos pa'i
las rnams bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dregs pa'i rgyal po stong sde ni// bcos pa'i las rnams bstan pa ni// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams kyis smras
so// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dmu lcam mched bzhi dang/ bdud mo dang nyis brgya lnga brgya la rang rang gi bu la ming po pho bdud bdud rnams babs nas/ 'di skad smras

so// gsang ba'i las rnams bya ba ste// gtsang ma dar gyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna gcal du bkram pa'o// rin chen gtsang ma'i skyogs dag tu// gsal ba'i me mar brgya rtsa brgyad gtang la gzhag 'bru gtsang me

skyogs gang du rin chen sna lnga kha yang bcad/ bya rgod ma yi mda' gcig la/ dar sna lnga yis brgyan pa'o// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud lo snyig babs bsag

pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// hUM/ ming po bdud chen rnams ni tshur nyon dang// 'o cag zhe sdang bdud kyi bu// zhe sdang rang gar spyad pas nongs// mi la bdud babs bskos pas te// bdud la bdud babs srid de
na// gsang pa/ dag ston pa'i bka' bsgo na// 'u cag dregs pa stong gnas te// bdud la bdud babs ming po bdud chen rnams la bsdig/ bdud chen rnams ni tshur nyon dang// 'ug cag zhe sdang bdud bu

ste// zhe sdang rang gar spyad pas nongs// zhe sdang nyid kyang sems yin te// sems nyid kyang ni zhe sdang ngo// sems dang zhe sdang gnyis med pas// thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin no// sems dang sangs rgyas
gnyis su med// sems ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sems// gnyis bstan pa yi lung la nyon// zhe sdang sdug pa da khrol cig/ snang gsal 'od kyis da chod gyis// snang gsal 'di la dpe mchis kyang// 'di ni

snang gsal 'od chen po// dkar ba rus pa'i glud du bsngo// smug pa sha yi glud du bsngo// dmar ba khrag gi glud du bsngo// ser ba chu ser glud du bsngo// gnag pa skra yi glud du bsngo// du ba dbugs kyi glud du

bsngo// gdangs pa sems kyi glud du bsngo// zer brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi glud du bsngo// gzugs lnga phung pa lnga yi glud du bsngo// 'byung ba dag gi glud du bsngo// snod ni phyi yi yul du bsngo// bcud ni sems kyi

glud du bsngo// 'di ni snang gsal 'od kyi mngos// zhe sdang bdud po rnams la bsngo// zhe sdang bdud kyi mdud pa khrol// srog bdag rgyal po srog bdud che// snang gsal 'od kyi mdos 'di bzhes// srog dbugs
gnyis kyi mdos 'di bzhes// srog dbugs gnyis kyi mdos// glud kyis srog slu ba'o// nga rgyal btsan gyi tshogs// bdud sel the brang gis// gdug pa ma rungs 'khor// snang gsal ni mdos
'di bzhes// 'bru mchog ni stong las sbyar// gser g.yu rin po che// gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// mda' mo ni sku yi rten// dar sna 'byung ba'i gzhi// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// ces rim pas

bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud las/ bdud nyi babs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud rnams kyis rang rang gi bcos thabs 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting

'dzin ldan pa des// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi steng du// 'bru sna tshogs pa'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen por brtsig kha dog 'dra 'bag rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing
dang nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba'i dar gyis brgyan par bya// de la nam mkha' lnga yang gzugs// tha ma bshos bu bcu gsum ste// bdud kyi mda' khra bcu gsum brgyan// nam mkha' bcu gsum de bzhin

bya// ngar nag drangs yang de bzhin no// bya nag lug nag glang nag dang// dra dang gdug pa'i gzugs kyis bskor// sha khrag phung dang bcas pa ste// rin chen lnga dang chas su ldan// de ltar bsags la bsngo
ba'o// lha 'dre srong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// yab bdud bcu gsum gyi yas bsag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// zhe sdang chen po bdud tshogs rnams// gdug pa'i dug chen ma rungs pa// bdud las ni
gnyan ma mchis/ che yang ni bdud kyis bsad/ chung yang ni bdud kyis bsad/ skye 'gro kun gyi bdud// srin pa yongs kyi bdud// bdud chen ni 'khor dang bcas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ srid pa'i
bdag po rnams yang bdud chen po/ ri ste 'gong yag rje nag po bkrag med dang/ bdud rje ni rmang khug dang/ skos rje drang dkar dang/ ma le ge zhags dang/ snya steng ngag btsan dang/ skyin bu mchu dmar
dang/ thom po ni thom chung dang/ btsan bdud ni yor po dang/ stag zhu ni mched bzhi dang/ ral pa spyi bcings dang/ lkug ma 'dzu mul dang/ zangs pa'o chen dang/ ru bdud gdug pa dang/ dmu bdud gtor
dkar dang/ gza' bdud ni rngam pa dang/ nyi bdud 'od chen dang/ bdud rgyal na sbyin dang/ bdud ye bdud dam pa dang/ mtshams bdud rol po dang/ shar bdud dkar po dang/ lho bdud sngon po dang/ nub

bdud dmar po dang/ byang bdud ljang ser dang/ dbus bdud nag po dang/ rol po skya dgu dang/ rol po skya bdud dang/ rol po skya lnga dang/ rol po skya gcig dang/ rol po skya gsum po/ rnam bdud ni rog ti
dang/ sa bdud yer pa dang/ dmu bdud ni sngon po dang/ me bdud dmar po dang/ bdud yam rje nag po dang/ bdud rol gdug pa ma rungs pa/ sil ma stong gi tshogs dang/ dur bdud rer ba
dang/ brag bdud nag po dang/ so bdud rol po dang/ bdud kyi sgo ba bzhi/ bdud kyi 'phrang pa bzhi/ gying pa bzhi dang/ phyag gnyan chen po bzhi/ bdud chen ni 'khor dang bcas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos

la spyon// zang zing longs spyod rgyan dang ldan// rim pas bskul zhing bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud bcos pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nang yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/
rgyal po chen po sad bzhi dang bcas pa rang rang gis bcos pa'i las rnams smras so// bdag cag rnams ni gdug pa nad kyi bdag po ste/ bdag cag rnams ni bcos pa na// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan

pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma dar gyi gzhi stengs su// bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa byas nas su// cha gang bshos ni ri rab gzugs/ kha dog rigs dang mthun par

bya// dri zhim mthun pas byugs par bya// rtse la ting lo bzhi yang gzhag/ zhugs mar mar dang thang chus bgyi/ khrag dang mar gyis bgyi// mkhris dang mar gyis bgyi// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre srong

gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po sad dang bcas pa'i yas bsag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// hUM/ rgyal po byang chub sems dpar cha ma mchis/ g.ya' bal ni pha yi rgyu/ rma ba la ni ma yi rkyen/ nya lcibs ni

mtsho yi gos/ g.ya' bal ni sngon po nas/ mi 'tshal de dgu ru 'tshal/ mtshams rje de lte 'o rtsal/ rgyal mi sngo ni rta ru sngo/ g.yu mig ni khyi li li/ 'bog gi bgo 'dre mdzad/ smyo ba'i smyo 'dre mdzad/ lag pa ni bco

brgyad la/ g.yu dang mu men lag glo dang snying la 'debs/ smyo dang 'bog pa mdzad/ chibs su ci chibs na/ g.yu rta bya rog gdong ni chibs su chibs/ nam gyi gung smad rgyu/ g.yu mig sngon po rgyas/ bud med sngon
po la/ g.ya' sngon thul pa can/ phyag na ci bsnams na/ g.yu yi mi mo dang/ g.yu yi sbrul gcig bsnams/ 'khris dang rtsings kyi bdag sngo mo 'khor bcas kyang/ mchod kyis ma nyan cig smos kyis ma skyon

cig/ rma'i sku zer ba rma'i 'dod pa ma lam/ che bzang ni thang shing la/ rma bya mdongs kyi na bza' gsol/ dbu la ni gzha'i thod/ gzha'i thod ma lags te/ nad kyi dbu rgyan can/ rma thul ni ma lags te/ dug gi

ri mo can/ nam gyi gung stod la/ sngon dmar sbrul ltar 'khril/ btsan bdud ni kun gyi rje/ jo bo ni ma bdud ma/ zhol zhol ni sgra yi gzugs/ rma ba kri na chen mo bdun/ rma yi ni sku zer la/ rma yi ni mdos lam
lam/ zhol zhol ni rma ri zhol/ bud med kyis stong khams khengs/ rgya nad mig ser la/ gzhogs skams dang kha yon bdag po lags/ pho nya'i phyag brnyan pa/ zhol zhol sgra'i gzugs/ rma ba kra

che'i bdud/ mchod kyis ma nyan cig smos kyis ma skyon cig chu bal nya lcibs la/ mi ser rta ser byung/ klu bdud kun gyi rgyal po ste/ ser brag ni nyi ma'i mig mi ser rta ru ser/ khol brgyad ni rje dang dgu/ mi
gcig lag pa brgyad/ ser dang zor dang bcas/ g.yu yi 'phra dang bcas/ zangs kyi mdung dang bcas/ shel gyi ni skyon dang bcas/ zangs kyi khri dang bcas/ lcags kyi mda' dang bcas/ zhags pa bdun dang

bcas/ rje bcas khol du yang bcas/ rje mchod na khol yang mnyes/ snga ru yang ma mchod de/ da rung yang mchod mi 'tshal/ mi 'tshal ba'i dbang ma mchis/ rdo rje ni bgegs pa yis/ nyi 'char zla yang 'char/

'char ba ni sa las 'char/ char 'bebs ni sa 'bab kyang/ bab pa sa la 'bab/ cho gcig rgyal gyi cho 'phrang cig na rgyal gyi 'brang/ pho brgya ni phyag 'tshal ni/ gla ba spos kyis bros de mchod/ bcu gang ga pur
gyis mchod/ mo brgya phyag 'tshal na/ g.yar mo kyugs kyi zho/ g.yag dkar btsos kyi bdag me tog sna dgus mchod/ rgyal po cir rdzun/ rgyal po gza' ru rdzu/ lha dkar ni pa wa sangs/ gza' chen ni dgu yis

bskor/ rdzu yang ni cir rdzu na/ gser gyi nyi ma dgu ru rdzu/ shel gyi zla ba dgu ru rdzu/ g.yu yi nyi ma dgu ru rdzu/ zla ba phyag 'tshal na/ bdud du ma 'bab cig nyi ma phyag 'tshal na/ gshed la ma 'bab cig nub kyi

dkar po pa wa sangs/ rgyal po cir rdzu na/ gnam lha dkar po spun dgur rdzu/ dung thul dkar po la/ mtshal gyi nya mig can/ g.yu yi gzha' ris la/ dar gyi bya phur ro// phyag na ci bsnams na/ shel gyi gling bu

bsnams/ dung gi pi wang bsnams/ gnam gyi lha la glud 'bul lo// rgyal po cir rdzu na/ gser gyi khyung chen dgu ru rdzu/ me yi gshog pa can/ g.yu thabs glog tu 'gyu/ khros na 'brug tu rdzu/ g.yu 'brug gdug

pa can/ pha rdabs na gser gyi ser ba 'bab/ kha nas rmu lcags thog yang 'phro/ 'dab chags ni stong tshogs kyang/ khyung las ni mnyan ma mchis/ cir rdzu cir sprul yang/ mchod do khyung la mchod/ rgyal po cir

rdzu na/ g.yu yi ni seng ge la/ 'od kyi ral pa can/ kha nas bdud rtsi 'dzag sna nas rmu thag brkyangs/ gcan gzan stong tshogs kyang/ seng ge las gnyan ma mchis/ gangs ri sengs pa sad/ rgyal po cir rdzu na/

g.yu 'brug ni sngon po la/ chu mig ni dgu yi bdag khong nas ni mchod dgu 'khyil/ spyan sa ni mdze dgu steng/ klu bran stong gis bskor/ klu rje rgyal bar rdzu/ 'bri dkar 'o mas mchod/ mchod do ni sprul spang
sang/ klu rje sprul pa sad/ rgyal po cir rdzu na/ gnyan rje ni dung le rje/ sa bdag ni stong gis bskor/ gnyan lag rgyal po'i bdag gnyan 'brug bdud kyi rje/ gnyan rje gang pa sad/ sad chen bzhi
la glud 'bul lo// zhes rim pas bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po sad dang bcas pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ ma bdud bcu gsum gyis

bskor ba dang phyag 'tshal nas/ rang rang gi las 'di rnams smras so// bdag cag rnams ni 'chos pa na// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye na
la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen po gzugs/ kha dog 'dra 'bag rigs dang bstun// de nas bsam shing nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba dar gyis brgyan pa'o// bya dang bshos bu bcu

gsum ste// 'brang rgyas yang ni de bzhin bya// de ltar byas la brgyan pa ste// nam mkha' bcu gsum mda' dang bcas// de ltar ri rab de la gzugs// yas ni rdzas dang mthun pa ste// sha khrag phud dang bcas

pas brgyan// mdzo rtol dre'u rnga mo bong bu dang// nad rkyal mtshon drug dgra khram shing dang// gdug pa'i rdzas rnams rim pas gdag/ de ltar rdzas rnams kun gyis brgyan// rim pas bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha
'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo'i yas bsag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// bdud mo chen mo ma rungs ma// ma bdud bcu gsum gdug pa can// gdug pa'i ma bdud ma rungs pa/ khyed ni
nad yams kun gyi bdag/ srid pa'i nad bdag 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// ma bdud gdug pa ma rungs pa// bdud yul nag po pha gi na// yul dang khri rungs chen na// bdud kyi bya

nag di ri ri/ khrag gi gru char si li li// lce spyang kang ka tshogs ni di ri ri// gdug pa'i gcan gzan di ri ri// de na bdud mkhar ldems se ldems// mi bdud sdug pa thod rus mkhar// thod pa'i mkhar chen
ldem pa na// ma bdud chen mo bcu gsum bzhugs// bdud mo nag mo bong zhon ma// mthig nag ral pa can te stong gsum rgyug/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed ma// sha za khrag 'thung ral pa can// gdug pa'i cha

byad dur khrod chas// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur ma// dbang sgyur nad kyi bdag mo khyod// srid pa kun gyi nyul le ma// skye 'gro kun gyi dbugs len ma// bdud mo brgya byin kun dga' mo// gdug pa'i lus la
srid pa'i bdag/ ral pa can la gdug byed ma// bdud mo kun gyi gtso mo ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// bdud mo chen mo ma rungs pa// mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku lus la// ral pa gsigs shig mche
ba gtsigs// ral pa 'bar ba sprugs pa'i tshe// srid pa kun yang 'dar zhing g.yo// la la 'bum brgyas gdug cing g.yo// chibs su rnga mo ga pa bcibs// par bu khrag gis gang ba bsnams// de
ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// bdud mo chen mo g.yu bun ma// sngon mo ral pa'i zar bu can// ral pa'i zar bu g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil// gdug pa'i las la rngam stabs can// chibs su g.yu yi mdzo mo
chibs// rngam pa'i lus la gdug pa can// de ring srid pa'i mdos la smyon// gdug pa'i cha byed ma rung 'khor// srin mo'i mgo la bdud mo'i gzugs// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral ka gsol// rngam chen sbrul
pa 'gyed pa ste/ kha nas khrag gi mda' 'phen ma// rngam stabs can la sprul pa 'gyed// nad rkyal khur nas stong gsum 'gengs// sna nas 'tshub ma gtod par byed// snyan nas 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs
ma// bdud mo ma rung gdug pa can// rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan spras ma// drel 'u 'u ro na chibs su chibs// sngon dmar mtshon gyi zhags 'phen ma/ khyod ni gdug pa'i nad bdag ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos
la spyon// bdud mo de yi gcung mo ni// bdud mo lus la khrag mig ma// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gos su gon/ khrag gi phor pa lag na thogs// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// srid pa yongs la dbang byed
ma// g.yon na ba dan rtse gsum bsnams// gdug pa mos te srid par rgyug/ srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// bdud mo de yi gcung mo ni// gdug pa mo ste sngags pa'i

gzugs// dmar mo lus la zhing lpags gon// g.yas pa gri la g.yon pa thod pa khyer/ kha nas khrag mda' 'phen par byed// mig nas me yi tshub ma gtong// sna nas rlung gi tshub ma gtong// srid par rgyug gyin
skye 'gro sgrol// gdug byed chen mo mdos 'di long// bdud mo de yi gcung ma ni// chu bdud sngon mo zil pa can// sngon mo g.yu 'od 'bar ba ste// gdug byed ma rungs nad bdag mo// chu dar sngon mo gos su

gon// lag na bar bu nad rkyal bsnams// chibs su chu rta gzhung chen chibs// chu rta de ni gzhung chen la// gru dang gzings kyi sga gtad ma// chu de yi steng shed na// dar khra sngon mo gur du phug/ gur chen de yi
steng shed na// srid pa'i bdag mo ma rungs ma// mthing nag bya nag char du 'bebs// dom dang kyung ka ta ra ra/ gdug pa lus can ma rungs pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// me bdud dmar mo ral pa

can// ral can ma rungs pa/ ral pa can la me 'od 'phro/ srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur ma// gdug pa nad kyi bdag mo ste/ zas su srid pa'i sha la za/ skom du srid pa'i khrag la 'thung/ srid pa yongs la dbang
sgyur ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// bdud mo ma rungs gdug pa can// mthing nag 'bar ba'i bdud mo ste// bdud mo ral can 'khor pa mo/ bdud mo mkha' la rngam bi byed// ming ni
bdud mo mtsho skams ma// rngam byed chen mo mdos la spyon// srid pa kun la dbang byed ma// bdud mo ser skya dang ma 'byin// g.yag gi pags pa gos su gon// g.yas na khram bam nag po bsnams// g.yon na

ban d+ha khrag dang bcas// gdug pa'i lus can ma rungs pa// chibs su rnga mo ga pa chibs// skye 'gro kun la nad gtong ma// bdud mo gdug byed ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed ma// de ring srid pa'i
mdos la spyon// bdud mo chen mo gdug pa can// gdug byed ma rungs nad kyi bdag/ bdud mo sngon mo ral zer can// sku la g.yu yi thul pa gsol// ral pa gsigs pas srid pa sgrol// bdud mo ma rungs
gdug pa can// bdud mo chen mo sprul pa'i gtso// gdug byed nag mo ma rungs ma// la la sha za khrag 'thung ral pa can// la la gdug byed hal byed ma// mthing nag 'bar ba srid pa 'joms// ban d+ha thod
khrag rdebs byed ma// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur ma// la la me bdud dmar po ral pa can// ral pa dmar po si li li// me 'od dmar po ltag nas 'phen// bdud mo chen mo drag shul can// de ring srid pa'i
mdos 'di bzhes// gdug byed sprul pa khyab byed ma// smug nag 'bar ba'i lus po la/ khrag gi re lde dmar po gsol// phyag na gdug pa'i mdung rings dang// g.yon pa ban d+ha thod khrag rdebs// gdug byed
nag mo mdos 'di bzhes// bdud mo chen mo sham sham mo// dur khrod gling du gnas bcas nas// srid pa yongs la sgrol byed ma/ khyab byed gdug pa mi srun ma// mig nas me 'bar kha nas khrag 'thor ma// de
ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// bdud mo chen mo ma rungs ma// srid pa yongs la dbang byed ma// dmar nag ral pas stong gsum 'gebs// lag na thod pa'i mda' 'phen ma// spyugs pa glu len khrel ba'i
bzhad mos 'debs// srog zan nag mo mdos 'di bzhes// gdug pa'i nad bdag ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur ma// sku lus ser nag 'khyil pa la// g.yas na thod pa g.yon na mdung dmar
khyer// mi yi g.yang gzhi gos su gon// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// bdud mo chen mo ma rungs ma// sku ni ljang nag 'bar ba la// gdug po ral gtsigs mche ba gtsigs// skye 'gro skeg gi khram shing

g.yas// nad lnga mtshon gyi gru gu g.yon// srid pa bsgyur cing skye 'gro sgrol// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// gdug pa'i bdud mo ma rungs pa// bdud mo chen mo sprul pa'i gtso// la la ljang nag dar nag
can// la la ser mo khris thor ma// la la dmar mo nad gtong ma// la la sngon mo gdug byed ma// la la dkar po dung spyo ma// ma bdud chen mo bcu gsum ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di

bzhes// bdud mo de ni stong gi tshogs// srid pa yongs la dbang byed ma// la la bdud mo hal chen ma// la la sman mo nad gtong ma// la la bdud byed phung sbom ma// la la sen mo rgyug 'gro ma// la la thab

dang gzhob 'dre ma// gdug pa'i bdud mo 'khor dang bcas// ri rab ni 'byung ba rten pa'i tshul// nam mkha' yul la mda' ni mkhar// 'di yang srid pa'i mdos su bsngo// zhes bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo mdos kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ btsan rnams kyis rang rang gis bcos pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// bdag cag rnams ni

'chos pa na// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen po
brtsig kha dog rigs te nam mkha'i gur// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i gur// nam mkha' rigs bstun rtsa gcig gzugs// grub pa'i bshos bu lnga mkhar thabs mda' yis brgyan par bya/ zur gsum

nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ mdzes pa'i nam mkha' nyi shu gcig ra lug sha ba dgo ba dang/ bya dang khyi la sogs pa bsag phud dang gtsang ma rin chen lnga// dmar po dar gyis brgyan pa'o// 'bru sna la sogs bsag

pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan gyi rdzas bsag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// hUM/ rgyal po chen po btsan gyi 'khor// btsan ni stong dang btsas/ btsan las ni gnyan ma mchis/ kha

drag ni bdud las rgol/ mchu chen ni cha las dgu/ do sngo rgya la sngo/ 'gran 'tshol klu la 'tshol/ btsan yul pha gi na/ do gsum 'od chen na/ zangs mkhar dmar po ldems se ldems/ byu ru kha bad khyi li li/ dung
gi sgo mo thams se thams/ de yi nang shed na/ spyi btsan kha bzhi mig brgyad pa/ sku la dar ber dmar po gsol/ dbu la bse yi rmog zhu gsol/ phyag na bse gzhu bse mda' bsnams/ chibs su bse rta dmar
po chibs/ kha bzhi pa la mig brgyad pa/ bral snang kha gcig mig gnyis pa// ltag nas kha gcig mig gnyis byung/ g.yas na kha gcig mig gnyis pa/ g.yon na kha gcig mig gnyis pa/ gdug pa'i btsan
chen ma rungs pa/ 'khor ni btsan 'phran stong gis bskor/ khrag gzer dmar po mda' ltar 'phen/ gzer nad gtong bar byed pa'o// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ 'byung ba lnga'i btsan ni/ mi dkar rta ru
dkar/ nyi ma shar gyi btsan/ sa dang rlung gi bu/ dung mkhar dkar po'i nang na gnas/ dung mda' dung gzhu phyag na bsnams/ zhags dkar ni mda' ltar 'phen// 'khor yang dri za stong dang

bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// nyi ma lho yi btsan/ me dang drod kyi bu/ btsan sngo rta ru sngo/ gnam sngo mchog tu sngo/ mchog dkar dra ru bcas/ zhags pa mda' dang bcas/ lcags mkhar sngon mo nang na

bzhugs/ gdug pa'i bya dang khyi/ lho btsan stong la dbang sgyur ro// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ nyi ma nub kyi btsan/ chu dang brlan gyi bu/ ban dmar ni rta ru dmar/ zhags dang mda' ru chas/ bse bya ling

nge ling/ bse khyi ni kang ke kang/ gzhu mo dgra dang bcas/ zhags pa mda' dang bcas/ klu btsan stong la dbang sgyur ro// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ nyi ma byang gi btsan/ 'byung ba rlung gi bu/ btsan sngo

rta ru sngo/ g.yu mkhar sngon po de na gnas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ nyi ma dbus kyi btsan/ 'byung ba rnams kyi bu/ btsan smug rta ru smug mda' dang gzhu ru smug mchong dkar smug pa'i nang na gnas/

gdug pa'i sgra skad di ri ri/ dbus btsan 'bum dang bcas/ dbus btsan stong la dbang sgyur ro// de ring srid pa'i mdos la dbang/ btsan rol po rkya dgu dang/ rol po rkya bdun dang/ rol po rkya lnga dang/ ya
ma rgya tshogs rnams/ gdug pa'i na bza' sku la gsol/ bse phub re re rgyab na khur// phyag na bse mda' bse gzhu bsnams// mtshon gyi zhags pa bsnams pa ste// na bza' mdzes dang ldan/ chibs su btsan

rta re re chibs/ skyes bu btsan chen po/ rin chen rgyan dang ldan/ dung mtsho dag la rgyu ba ste/ gang la phrad par mtshon zhags 'debs/ shod kyis kha yang 'thor/ zer nad gtong ba'i bdag de ring srid pa'i mdos

la spyon/ btsan gyi rgyal po ba/ gnam btsan 'phrul du rje/ sngon po zhags pa thogs/ gangs btsan rum bu rje/ btsan dkar rta ru dkar/ gdug pa gang rum rje/ spang btsan mi ser rta ru ser/ g.ya' btsan mi sngo
rta ru sngo/ gdug pa kha rum rje/ btsan chen ni stong dang chas/ 'byung ba brag gi btsan/ gnas pa brag dmar logs la gnas/ rin chen 'bar ba'i brag phug na// bse sgo ni dmar po gsal/ g.yas na phur
'phang can/ g.yon ni cho long ris/ dung gi ra gzhi can/ de yi nang shed na/ brag btsan dmar po bzhugs/ btsan dmar rta dmar te/ rin chen sna lnga rgyan gyis spras// bse mda' bse gzhu dang/ zhags pa

dmar po 'phen/ skye 'gro ma lus sgrol/ gzer ba'i nad kyang 'bebs// ltas ngan ni byang na 'bebs/ sprul pa btsan phran stong/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ btsan gyi rgyal po bse btsan bu rje/ 'byung ba sa
la dbang sgyur ro// rmu btsan ni rol po dang/ bse btsan rol po dang/ skyes bu ni lung btsan dang/ spang btsan thod dkar dang/ du ra ra tse dang/ a mi gter dang hUM mi gter/ khyed rnams btsan

gyi rgyal po ste/ ma thogs glud la spyon/ skyes bu ni lung btsan de/ dmag gi dpung chen po/ btsan yul ni ral gsum na/ bse mkhar dmar po ldems se ldems/ g.yu yi kha bad khyi li li/ de na skyes bu chen po
bzhugs/ srid pa'i btsan chen dang/ dmag dpung ni stong dang bcas/ khrag gzer nad gzer 'bebs pa'i bdag po ste/ btsan 'khor ni stong sde dang/ srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ se yul rus gsum na/ se
btsan rol po bzhugs/ mchod dkar smug po ldems se ldems/ g.yu yi kha bad khyi li li/ de yi nang shed na/ se btsan rol po bzhugs/ btsan smug rta ru smug zhags pa mda' ltar 'phen/ gdug pa'i btsan
chen 'khor dang bcas/ mdung rings phyag na bsnams/ btsan dmag stong dang bcas/ srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ yul dang btsan yul 'od ma tshal/ de na btsan chen rgyal ba bzhi/ btsan gyi lus la g.yag
gi mgo lag na shing rings gdug pa thogs/ kha nas khrag gzer mda' ltar 'phen/ sprul pa ni mang po bkye/ gdug pa'i lus la cho 'phrul can/ btsan gyi lus la glang gi mgo/ shing lo ni gos su gon// sho rde
'u ni phyag na bsnams/ khrags khrag gi zer 'phen ma/ sprul pa mang po 'gyed/ btsan mi'i lus la lug gi mgo/ dar de gos su gon/ phyag na ru mtshon 'phyar/ gdug pa'i 'khor dang bcas/ srid pa'i mdos

la spyon/ rgyal gyi rgyal po ba/ mi lus bya'i mgo bo can/ srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ klu btsan mched de gsum/ klu btsan ser po dang/ klu btsan dmar po dang/ klu btsan nag po dang/ srid pa'i mdos la spyon/

dur btsan khra bo dang/ dri btsan dmar po dang/ sil ma stong gi tshogs/ gnas kyang 'byung ba lnga la gnas/ skyed kyang 'byung ba lnga las skyed/ sdud kyang 'byung ba lnga las sdud/ da ni srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/

gzugs brnyan sku yi glud/ zang zing mang po longs spyod glud/ sgra snyan mang po gsung gi glud/ mdangs ldan sems kyi glud/ rin chen lnga gter gyi bdag mda' bkra sku yi rten/ nam mkha' yul gyi glud/ ces
rim pas sngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan bcos pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po srog bdag mched bzhis rang gis bcos pa'i las 'di
rnams smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// ras dkar gtsang ma'i gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna bcud gsum phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la
ri rab chen po brtsig/ dpag bsam shing dang ldan pa'i gur// 'byung ba dar gyis brgyan pa'o/ kha dog rigs dang mthun par bya// mda' dang nam mkha' de bzhin gzugs// rin chen gtsang ma'i
skyogs bzhi ru// bshos bu ldem pa bzhi dag la// mkhar thabs mda' ris bzhi yis brgyan// nam mkha' yang de ni bzhin brgyan// chang bshos dag mthun pa'i yas kyis bskor/ de la rta g.yag ra lug bya yis

brgyan// spyan gzigs dang ni dar zab kyis brgyan/ phung dang rin chen bcas pa'o// 'bru drag gcal du bkram/ de ltar bsags pa bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyan po las bsags

pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// hUM/ rgyal po chen po srog gi bdag srog bdag srid pa'i rgyal po che/ phyogs phyogs ni pha gi na/ gdugs kyi shar phyogs na/ ri yi byang shar na/ yul yang shel gyi yul/ mkhar

yang shel gyi mkhar/ shel mkhar rtse dgu gnam du ldems se ldems/ de yi nang shed na/ ya cho dkar po bzhugs/ rgyal gyi pha smos pa/ ya la shod kyi skyes cig pha/ ma srid pa'i rgyal mo yin/ de yi rgyud las skyed

pa'i sras/ rgyal po ming sring gnyis su byung/ ming po ya co dkar po dang/ ma bdud rgyal pos bya/ sring mo mo btsun ug chos yin/ ma bdud rgyal mo'i ming nas byung// rgyal po gcig la ming gsum byung// ya co

dkar po zhes pa bya// shar gyi lha chen zhes pa'ang bya// btsan 'gong rgyal po zhes pa'ang bya// rgyal po chen po de/ rgyal dkar rta ru dkar/ bla na mi dkar ldems se ldems// 'og ma rta dkar phya ra ra// sku la
dung thul dkar po gsol// phyag na shel mkhar dkar po bsnams// zangs gri rked la btsugs/ 'dzam bu gling bzhir rgyug skyes pa'i srog kyang gcod/ na chung gi srid kyang 'phrog byis pa chung gi dur yang
'dabs/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed de/ li yi yul du byon/ ming po stobs mi yis/ li rta dkar po la/ bse yi sga yis bstad/ rin chen phum bu bkal/ rgyal po de la phul/ ming yang ling pas sad du
btags/ de nas yang le yul du byon/ yang le rgyal po yis/ g.yu rta bya rgod phul/ ming yang yang pa sad du btags/ de nas mi nyag yul du babs/ g.yag dkar ru dmar yang phul/ ming yang lter sad du
btags/ de nas zhang zhung yul du byon/ lug dkar bya dkar phul/ ming yang shel ger btags/ rgyal po chen po de/ sha khrag dbugs kyi bdag po yin/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ phyogs phyogs shar

phyogs rnam gyi dkyil shed na// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i mkhar chen ldems se ldems// de na srog bdag dkar po spyan gcig bzhugs/ khyed kyi pha smos pa/ chu srin rgyal po ma btang ka/ ma ni srid pa'i rgyal mo
ste// de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa'i las// rgyal po ming sring gnyis su byung// ming po dkar po spyan gcig pa// sring mo e ka dza ti ral gcig ma// ming po dkar po spyan gcig pa// rgyal mi dkar
rta ru dkar// dbu la ral gcig sha ra ra// dpral na mig gcig lhangs se lhangs// shel mi dkar po ldems se ldems// zhal nas tshems gcig thams se thams// phyag na skyogs dkar thal la la// 'khar

ba'i rnge'u chung glo la btags// 'dzam bu gling yang 'od kyis khengs// gnam gyi ral byed bdag po ni// sa chu phyed kyi bdag po la// sku la gcan gzan thul pa gsol// seng ge dkar po'i thong ka can// phyag na

shel gyi gri gug bsnams// skyes pa brgya yi srog kyang gcod// byis pa brgya yis 'ur 'debs so// na chung brgya yi srid 'phrog go/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ khyod kyi ging ma ni/ mgo ni mig gcig

yin/ phyogs phyogs pha gi na/ byang shar mtshams shed na/ bse mkhar dmar po ldems se ldems// g.yu yi kha bad khyi li li// bse'i sgo mo la gsal/ byang ri mthon po'i kha shed na// rtse la gnod sbyin stobs
chen gnas// zur la yam shud dmar po gnas// rtsa na btsan btsun phyag nyan 'drol// zangs mkhar dmar po ldems se ldems// lo rom bse yi sgo mo la// mthing shul sngon po'i ri mo can// byu ru dmar po'i

g.yag shing can// de yi nang shed na/ yam shud dmar po bzhugs/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ dkar po 'od po che/ khyod kyi ma smos pa/ srid pa'i rgyal mo yin/ de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa las// ming po yam shud
dmar po de// sring mo ba ga hri ti lags// yam shud dmar po dang/ zangs khri dmar po'i gdan la bzhugs/ yam shud dmar po de/ sku la stag lpags zhul khug gsol// dbu la stag zhu ring po gsal// phyag
na zangs kyi zhags pa 'dom dgu brgya dgu bcu bsnams/ mo brgya srog gi bdag po bse khrab bse'i mdung dang bcas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ lho shar rnams kyi kha gshed na// de la khu le lag dgu
bzhugs// gser mkhar ser po ldems se ldems// g.yu yi kha bad khyil li li// de'i nang na khu le lag dgu bzhugs/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ bar snang stong gi kha shed na// 'od dpung stug po lams se

lams// 'od dpung de yi nang shed na// lcags kyi sdig pa kha dgug nas// de ni khyod kyi pha yin no// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting shed na/ gser gyi srog ma kha med gnas// de ni khyod kyi ma yin no// de gnyis rgyud
las sprul pa las// rgyal po mgo gcig lag pa dgu// lag gcig nam gyi mthongs su nyab// lag gcig stengs 'joms la nyag/ lag cig stong khams lo tog nyab// lag gcig srog gcod nang du
gtor// gcig ni srid dang dkar rgyud nang du gtong// de la ming btags pa/ tri se lag dgus bya/ khu le lag dgu bya/ 'jug pa chen pos bya/ rdzus pa chen pos bya/ gser rta ser po chibs/
gser mu skyed la btsugs/ gser khrab ser po gsol/ rgyal po 'khor bcas rnams/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ ces bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po bcos pa'i le'u ste bcu
drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ sa bdag rnams kyis rang rang gi bcos thabs 'di rnams smras so// bdag cag rnams ni 'chos pa ni// gsang bdag stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa

des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlabs pa tshul bzhin bya// de la gru bzhi ri rab tshul// steng du gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs

bzhi bzhi// mda' dang nam mkha' 'phang rnams dang// bya dang 'brang rgyas ngar glud dang dgu// rim par 'tshogs par snyam ste ri rab steng du dgod// ngar dgu bya dgu 'brang rgyas dgu// mda' dang nam mkha'i
