grangs kyang de bzhin no/ khyi 'brug glang lug gshed bzhi yang// phyogs mtshams bzhi ru dgod pa'o// lo gzugs rim par dgod pa'o// gzhan yang phag khyi glang bu dang// bya rta la sogs gzungs kyis

bskor// sbrul dang sbal pa nya dang sa bdag gzugs// mthun pa'i 'bru sna chan dang bcas// sman dang bcas pa de bzhin no// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// sa bdag
gi yas bsags pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// hUM/ sa bdag ni gdug pa'i tshogs/ sa la dbang sgyur te/ gnyan chen ni sprul pa'i bdag de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// dbus kyi sa bdag chen po

ni// sa bdag rin chen rgyal po zhes kyang bya// rtsang rtsa 'khor ba zhes kyang bya// pad+ma ge sar khri la bzhugs// gser gyi 'khor lo dag la bsgyur// srid pa'i sa bdag chen mo'i ming nas phyung// de ring srid pa'i
mdos 'di bzhes// 'byung ba sa la dbang sgyur ma// gser gyi phag mo chen mo ste// sa la dbang yang sgyur/ mdzes ldan pa'i mnga' bdag mo// lha mo brtan ma sa yi bdag/ rin chen gser gyi sa gzhi dag la
mnga' mdzad ma// 'khor ni sa bdag klu mo mang pos bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// sa bdag pa ni chen po dang// the se ni gdug pa dang/ rtsang kun ni mdze po dang/ sa bdag ni gdug pa'i
tshogs/ phyogs mtshams ni srun pa'i bdag dgug pa'i sa bdag 'khor/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ sa bdag pa ni chen po ste/ dbus kyi spo la gnas pa ste/ sa bdag gdug pa ste/ dkar po stag la
zhon/ gdug pa'i nad gtong byed/ shing lo dkar khra gos su gon/ shing ris lag na thogs/ rgyal rigs stong dang bcas/ gdug pa'i nad bdag ste/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ sa
bdag chen po lho phyogs na gnas pa ste/ ser po gdug pa'i lus/ shing lo ser khra gos su gon/ rje rigs kun la dbang yang byed/ nub kyi spo la gnas pa yi/ sa bdag dmar po bya'i bu/ shing lo dmar po gos

su gon// gdug pa'i shing ris thogs/ byang gi spo la gnas pa'i/ ljang khu ni bem pa la/ shing lo ljang khra gos su gon/ gdug pa'i gnyen tshogs kun/ skrangs dang rdzings dang sbur gyi bdag mdze dang shu ba g.yan

pa'i bdag de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ sa bdag ni phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga/ srid pa'i mdos bzhes dang/ sa bdag pha smos pa/ shi ri pata bya ba yin/ ma ni khrag chen sdig med ma/ bu sa bdag khro bo

dpung dgu byung/ phyogs mtshams steng dang dgu na gnas/ sring mo phra mo dpun dgu byung// 'byung ba lnga la gnas pa ste// la la 'byung ba sa la gnas// la la 'byung ba brag la gnas// la la 'byung ba shing la

gnas// la la 'byung ba chu la gnas// la la ska dang rdzing dang lteng ka dang// lu ma gya gyu la gnas/ gdug pa'i sa bdag chen po ste// la la ba dang glang bu gzugs// la la grog khyi phag glang bu gzugs/ la la
grog sbur nag chags te/ la la mdzo rtol rum pa'i gzugs// la la nya sbal rtsangs pa'i gzugs// la la dud 'gro ma rungs gzugs// la la zhe sdang sbrul du gnas// la la gdug pa khyi ru gnas// sa bdag
gnyan gyi tshogs nad kyi bdag srid pa'i mdos bzhes cig gdug pa'i nad khrol cig mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa gtong ba'i bdag/ zha grum ma lus gtong ba'i bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos cig 'bul// rin
chen sa gzhi rgyas pa'i 'brus// gter ldan mthun pa'i yas 'bul gyis// dkar gsum mngar gsum sman rnams 'bul// dbang po lnga'i glud du 'bul// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes la// nad ka chod la dal
ka bsgyur// mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa ma gtang zhig/ srid pa'i mdos 'di la/ sman lnga sbos lnga mngar gsum rdzong 'dabs so// de ni gshegs cig gnas su gshegs// sa bdag 'akor bcas gnas su
gshegs// skyod cig skyod cig nas su skyod// ces lu ma'am/ chu mig gam/ gnod sar bskyal lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag bcos pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// bam po dang po
rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ de ba ya ya tri ban tri shu nya pa ti pa paM ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal
lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gnas mchog dam pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad
ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// drag po'i ser ba dbab pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// las dang nus pa dpag 'das dang// drag po ser chen dbab pa na// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan pa
des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// sngags dang bskul dang rdzas dang gsum// bya thabs dag tu bstan pa'o// de yis ser ba 'bebs par byed// thog dang ser ba dbab pa'o// zhes gsungs so// lha
'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ zhus lan bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams
la// drag po'i ser ba'i las bstan pa// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// rim pa bzhin du bsgrub pa'o// bdud ser drag po 'bebs pa na// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin

ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// brag ri nag po mchi ma can// ya ga rten dang 'brel pa ste// drag po'i maN+Dal gzhung bzhin bya// mon pa nag po'i thod pa ru// dur khrod rkang gi smyu gu yis// mi
rta khyi yi khrag dag gis// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gsum bri// dbus ni zlum po dag tu gcad// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bdud kyi sngags// shar nas g.yon du bskor nas dgod// dbus su dmigs pa'i ming dang
rten yang bca'// de la gtsor ldan seng ldeng phur par gzir// gcan gzan dgu dang mda' chags dgu// sha khrag snying dang bcas pa dag/ zi ru dug dang myos chang bcas pas dgang/ mthing nag dar gyis kha

gcad la// mtshon gyi gru gus bcing bar bya// de la bsnyen cing bsgrub par bya// sha khrag mnyes pa'i gtor mas mchod// sngags bzlas rab tu bskul byas la// rtags rnams byang nas dbab po dang po bsnyen pa

de la bsnyen/ bar du bsgrub pa de la bsgrub// tha ma rta yang des kas bya// de yis ser chen 'bebs par byed// drag po'i las su bstan pa ste// de yis rta bcas bcug pa na// rten la 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin

no// oM yag kha la dun tshe sa ma ya sri sri bam shal shal phob ya phaT/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i sngags so// sa ma ya hUr gam rme de rag ti ri yam brag kha la hUr hUr phroM phroM li shar b+h+yo/ de yis

'bebs par byed pa'i sngags/ ya tring kha laM sa ma ya du ru dril ya phob/ sham tri tsa sho phob ya/ des ni gzir zhing sbrul pa'i sngags/ de yis ji ltar 'dod pa dbab pa'o// hUM/ zhe sdang chen po bdud chen
rnams// gdug pa'i zhe sdang bdud kyi bu// zhe sdang gdug pa'i drag shul can// gnas ni bdud yul nag po de nang gnas// las su drag po byed pa ste// yab bdud rgyal po bcu gsum drag shul can// drag po
sna tshogs gdug pa'i 'khor// sil ma bdun tshogs ma rungs pa// bdud las drag pa med pa ste// bdud yul nag po sgo dgu na// zhe sdang bdud tshogs di ri ri// lcags mkhar sngon po ldems se ldems// de na
bdud tshogs gdug pa gnas// nag po bdud tshogs ma rungs pa// skos rje drang dkar srid pa'i bdag/ srid pa'i dregs pa thams cad la// dung ser 'bebs par skos thog gcig/ ma rungs dug chen ri

stengs mgo yag rje// srid pa dkrug pa'i las mdzod cig/ nag po bkrag med sprul pa che// bdud dmag dbyung ba'i dus la bab// ma le ge shags nga rgyal can// nga rgyal brag ri de rtsigs shig/ snyag lte ngag
btsan gdug pa can// bdud chen gdug pa'i 'khor dang bcas te rol// bdud rje mang ge sprul pa'i gtso// skyin po mchu dmar nga rgyal 'dod chags 'khrug cing spyon// thom mo thugs kyi sprul pa 'gyed// thom
chung ma'u kun bur 'dre bas// stag zhum ched bzhis phyogs rnams dkrug/ zangs pa bdud kyi tshub mas thob// btsan bdud yor po mkhar la dar chen phyor// ya bdud bcu gsum drag ser phob// 'byung lnga
bdud kyi 'byung bas dkrugs// rol po skya tshogs dmag gi 'khor// gdug pa bdud kyi 'khor tshogs rnams// bdud ser dbab pa'i dus la bab// bdud kyi sprin nag mkha' la mdun ltar dril// ri rab

rtsenas 'brug cig sgrogs// tsha grang gdug pa'i sgra cig phyung// tsha grang 'od kyi mda' cig phyung// 'byung ba rlung gi gzhu cig bdungs// dung ser dkar po'i mda' cig 'phongs// rtsi tog shing tog rtsad nas

chod// bdud ser mkha' la char ltar phob// ces bskul zhing sngags bzlas dbab pa ste// bsgrub kyang thod pa de la bsgrub// tha mar rta yang de kas bya// ngan sngags them bur sgrub pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud las/ bdud kyi ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang ni smras pa/ btsan gser gdug pa 'bebs pa na// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i brag dmar gnas sam
dgon gnas su// de ru dkyil 'khor gtsang bar bya// 'phar ba dmar po'i thod pa la// ra khyi rta yi khrag gis ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni dgu ru bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten dag la// gdug
shing phur pa sor ldan pas// rten dag rim pas gzir ba'o// 'khor lo rtsibs la btsan gyi ser sngags bri// g.yon nas rim pas bskor ba'o/ khrag sna mang po snying sna bsog/ wa 'phar rta dang ra khyi
bsog/ 'dab chags bya dang gcan gzan rnams// snying sna khrag sna gtor mas dgang// dug dang myos chang nyungs kar ske tshes byas// thod pa chen po de bkang nas/ kha ni dmar po dar gyis gcad// tshon

gyis thag pas bcings nas su// de la bsnyen cing bsgrub pa bya// dbab dang byung dang dril ba'o// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa de la bya// mtha' mar rta yang de ka'o// de ltar rim par gsal bar bya// sha khrag spyan

gzigs bshos bu mda' dang nam mkha' bcas// btsan rnams mchod cing bskul dang sngags bzlas dbab pa'o// tsa tsa kha dur phra tsa sa ma ya 'ur ling tsa gur shag shag phraM hra li shar b+h+yo/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub

pa'i sngags su shes te/ rtags byung las la sbyar bar bya'o// tsa sho ling shar kha la dur ma ke tse da'i tsa sha ra shal lta phob ya/ ling ling phra shar ri li ri li shar b+h+yo/ de ni dbab pa'i sngags su shes// shul shul da
ri ka ba'i 'dus hUM trag ling thig shar hi la ya/ de ni yur zhing dril ba'i sngags so// de ltar sngags las bskul dang las bcol dbab/ de yis ser chen drag tu 'bebs/ hUM/ nga rgyal chen po'i btsan gyi

'khor// gdug pa btsan gyi 'khor rnams// btsan gyi nga rgyal 'bar ba ste// rje rigs gdug pa btsan gyi sde// spyi btsan chen po dmar po gtso// dmar po gdug pa las la spyon// 'byung lnga mkha' la dbang sgyur
btsan// gdug pa btsan chen ma rungs 'khor// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// skyes bu lung btsan rje dang sems can rol dang rje// gdug pa'i btsan chen po gtso/ gdug pa'i btsan rol po ya ma tshogs/

sil ma stong tshogs gdug pa btsan gyi 'khor/ stong sde ni ma rungs pa/ srid pa kun la dbang sgyur ba// btsan po ni 'khor dang bcas/ khyed ni nga rgyal btsan gyi bu// btsan ser drag po dbab pa'i dus la
bab// ri rab rtse nas 'brug cig sgrogs// bar snang khams su glo gcig 'khyug/ tsha grang 'od kyi mda' cig phyung// ser chen dbab pa'i dus la bab// 'byung ba rlung gi gzhu cig brdungs// dkar po dung gi
mda' cig 'phangs// lo tog shing thog rtsad nas chod// gdug pa btsan mkhar dus la bab// phyi btsan chen po dmag dpung bsdus// 'byung ba btsan gyi 'byung ba dkrugs// rol po skya tshogs ba dan rtsi la
phyor// skyes bu lung btsan btsan ser dmar po dgongs// sems can rol pos ba dan rdzi la phyor// gdug pa sil ma tshogs kyis nam mkha' dkrugs// btsan ser dmar po dbab pa'i dus la

bab// ces bskal zhing 'phang ba ste/ ser ba 'bab pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan ser dbab pa'i le'u ste rtsa gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud nag

po bkrag med/ spyi btsan dmar po dang/ rgyal po dkar po spyan gcig dang/ yam shud dmar po dang/ gza' ra hU la dang/ the brang rdo rje legs pa dang/ klu 'jog po dang/ bdud mo bong zhon ma dang brgyad kyis

rang rang gi ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di smras so// drag po'i ser chen dbab pa na// gsang bdag stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i dug rig gnas chen du// mon pa nag po'i thod pa ru// mi ra khyi
yi khrag gis ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad par bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten bcas la// ting 'dzin ldan pa de yis phur pa gzir// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bdud dregs pa'i sngags// shar du rgyal po shar

lhor gza'// lho ru yam shud lho nub the rang ngo// nub tu bdud la nub byang klu// byang shar bdud mo dgod pa'o/ khrag sna tshang dang snying sna dang// nyungs kar nyungs nag ske tshe dang// zi ra rgya 'bras la sogs

dgang// myos chang dug dang bcas pas dgang// dar gyis kha bcad tshon gyis bcing// de la bsnyen cing bsgrub dang dbab pa bya// dang por bsgrub kyang de la bsgrub// tha mar rta yang de kas bya// de ltar byas la

bsgrub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i sngags smras pa// oM ga tra ya ni traM pa na sib 'ub kar phroM d+hi b+h+yo/ tsa sha la thul traM ha'i ti thul shar b+h+yo/ ga ti tsa shar ra tsa sha sha ni shar shar tre ma b+h+yo/ ga pi ga pi ya ma ti sha d+h+ri la d+h+ri

la phob ya b+h+yo/ tri tsa ba la/ shi lang ma ra tsa sha thun b+h+yo/ ya ma tri sha ma ra rtse thum ril b+h+yo/ oM nag le ril shar 'od 'phro shu shar ti then ril b+h+yo/ trag rag sha se khu du hri ru ru tsi d+h+ril d+h+ril b+h+yo/ de yi thim bur bsgrub
pa ste// sngags 'das bar bar bskul bar bya// mthun pa'i dam rdzas de yis mchod// de yis ji ltar 'dod pa dbab// thod pa rtar gzhug bskul la dbab// de yis las gang yang thogs pa med// hUM/ dregs
can ni gdug pa can/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed cing// gdug cing gtum pa'i drag shul che// bar snang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sprul pa'i dregs pa'i stong sde dang// 'byung bar rnams kyi steng shed
na// srid pa'i rgyal po 'khor bcas gnas// 'byung ba chu yi dbyings shed na// gdug pa klu yi tshogs chen gnas// ri rab chen po'i rtse shed na// rgyal mchog yam shud dmar po gnas// dur khrod chen po'i
dbyings shed na/ khams gsum dbang byed bong zhon ma// dug mtsho dug ri kha shed na// bdud chen gtum po tshogs kun gnas// nga rgyal chen po'i brag ri la// btsan rgyal po shu bo
gnas// gdug pa chen po pha bdun mo dang brgyad// sa gzhi g.yo 'gul gdug chen phob// nag mo bkrag med sprin nam mkha' la bsdus// btsan chen chu bos ba dan rdzi la phyor// dkar po spyan gcig dung sar
bgongs// gza' mchog rgyal po ri rab rtse nas 'brug sgrogs cig/ dga' bo 'jog pos rgya mtsho gting na skyol// bdud mo bong zhon rgya mtsho gting nas bcol// bar snang de ring dmag gis khong// dregs pa

pho bdun mo dang brgyad// 'byung ba rlung gi gzhu cig bdungs// dkar po dung gi mda' cig 'phongs// tsha grang 'od kyi mda' cig phyung// rtsi thog shing thog rtsad nas chod// ces bskul zhing dbab bo// lha 'dre

stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ pho bdun mo dang brgyad kyi ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dmu lte dkar dang/ btsan lte dkar dang/ the brang
dkar dang/ bzhis rang rang gi ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// drag po ser chen dbab pa na// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma'i maN+Dal
byas nas ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bzhi pa la// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten bcas la// gtsang ma'i phur pas gzir bar bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la lte dkar sngags// shar du

dmu la nub tu 'dud// lho ru the brang lte dkar la// byang du btsan gyi lte dkar yin// nyungs kar dang khrag bcas dag par bya// ra tsa khrag dang ri dwags khrag/ rta yi khrag dang khyi yi khrag/ myos chang dug dang sbyar
bas dgang/ kha ni dmar po dar gyis dgab// tshon sna lnga yi gru gus bcing// bshos bu phung dang spyan gzigs dang// sha dang khrag tu bcas pas mchod// de ltar sngags bzlas bsnyen cing bsgrub// de yis

las rnams 'grub par byed// dmu tri kha la tsa sha bdun// trog trog sib kha la yam b+h+yo// pa sha ra du ya tri re ra te yam sha ra sha ra phob ya/ tsi ting sha ra la ma pi sha ra la bri li li phob ya/ tri ta pa la/ sha ra sha

ra praM ling phob ya/ de ltar 'das shing dbab pa'o// tri ni ka lam sha ra lha myag myag shar ya phob/ mu tri ka laM sa ma ya/ tsab tsab 'ur 'ur skyes la ne ra ya/ 'ur 'ur shar shar phroM phroM thig nig phob ya/ de ni dril te

dbab pa'o// de yis thim bu bsgrub pa ste// sngags bzlas bar bar bskul bar bya// de yis ji ltar 'dod pa dbab// thod pa ltar gzhug bskul la dbang// dang po bsnyen kyang de ltar bsnyen// tha mar rta yang
de kas bya// hUM/ thugs dam can de srid pa'i bdag/ drag la rtsa dang ldan pa des// dregs can gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa kun la dbang sgyur cing// ma rungs 'joms byed mthu rtsal
can// dmu bdud btsan dang the brang tshogs// dmu chen lte dkar gdug pa can// lus ni smug nag 'bar ba la// ral pa can la gdung pa'i 'khor// bse chen smug po'i thul pa gsol// dbu la bse yi rmog zhu
gsol// phyag na bdud kyi mdung shing bsnams// chibs su dmu yi rta rgod chibs// rin chen 'bar ba'i dbu rgyan can/ khyod ni dmu chen lte dkar te// dmu chen 'bar ba bskyod tsam na// dregs chen kun yang
rgyug gum gum// gnam las thog dang ser ba 'bebs// sa dang bar snang dmag gis 'gengs// bdud rje ma rungs dus la bab// bdud chen gdug pa lte dkar te// ma rungs gdug pa 'dul ba'i
gtso// mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// ral pa can la khyung shog can// mche ba gtsigs pa thod pa thogs// dar lce nag po bsnams pa'o// chibs su nag po bdud rta chibs// 'khor du yang 'dud phran
nag mang pos bskor// drag po ser chen dbab pa'i dus la bab// btsan ta ser lte dkar ma rungs pa/ gdug pa'i btsan chen rngam pa'i tshogs// dmar po ber chen sku la sogs// g.yas na bse yi mdung
dmar bsnams// g.yon na gdug pa'i dar lco bsnams// chibs su btsan rta dmar po chibs/ kha nas btsan ser dmar po 'bebs// gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs dam la brtags// drag po thog ser dbab pa'i

dus la bab// the brang lte dkar gdug pa can// sprul pa drag po ma rungs pa// srid par rgyud par byed pa ste// ser skya lus la ba dan 'phyar// lte ba the brang grong khyer bskang// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur
cing// bar snang khams nas dbang sdud byed// dregs pa stong tshogs dbang bsdus nas// srid pa yongs la dregs pa ste// drag po ser chen dbab pa'i dus la bab// gdug pa'i the brang 'khor dang bcas// lte

dkar chen po khyed bzhi yang// drag po'i ser chen dbab pa'i dus la bab// 'byung ba rlung gi gzu cig brdungs// dung sems dkar po'i mda' cig 'phongs// ces las bya'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen
po las/ lte dkar bzhi'i ser ba'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po chen po bzhis rang rang gis ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// rgyal ser drag po
'bebs par 'dod na/ gsang ba'i stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// spyang ki sngon po'i thod pa ru// sme ba'i khrag sna gsum po yis// 'khor lo rtsibs ni drug pa
bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten btsugs la// gdug shing phur pas gzir la gzhag/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs la rgyal po'i sngags// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya'o// de ltar khrag nyungs dug dang
myos chang dag gis dgang// dar gyis kha bcad de la bsgrubs// bshos bu phud dang bcas pas mchod// bsnyen bsgrub dbang dang sprul dril la// sngags bzlas bskul la dbab pa'o// dang po bsgrub kyang de la

bsgrub/ thar mar rta yang de kas bya// oM ka tra sa sa ma ya ra tsa shu lam pa sha phroM dril shar shar phroM prim phob yang/ ga tri pa sha ra ga phring ling pu tse shar b+h+yo ling ya/ yur yur ling ling sa ma ya ka ru na rba na rba na

ril b+h+yo/ de yis bsnyen cing bsgrub par bya/ phur dang dbab pa'o// de nas drag po bskul zhing dbab pa'o// hUM/ rgyal po chen po gdug pa can/ khyed la khyab pa'i sprul pa ste// bar snang yangs pa'i khams shed
na// 'obs 'khar yangs pa'i nang shed na// srid pa'i rgyal po srog bdag bzhugs// srog bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// gdug pa'i rgyal po mched de bzhi// gza' dag sprul pa khyod yin na// gza' rgod drag
po ser chen phob// 'od kun dbar ba khyod kyi gnas// sprul pa zer gsum zer la chibs// gdug pa'i rgyal po ma rungs pa// gnam la dkar po 'od chen bzhi// phyogs mtshams srun nas sad chen
bzhi// gdug pa'i rgyal po gdug pa can// sa la gnas byang phyogs skyong bdag khyod ni rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/ sku ni 'bar la 'od du 'bar// dar zab mdzes pa gos su gon// gdug byed 'bar ba'i 'od
'khor bcas// drag po'i ser chen dbab pa'i dus la bab// ser chen 'bar ba 'dir phob la// gdug pa ma rungs 'dul ba'i dus la bab// rgyal po chen po sprul pa'i gtso// drag po ser chen dbab pa'i dus

la bab// sprin de dkar dmar dril bas sna tshogs 'od dang bcas drongs la// gdug pa'i rgyal po ma rungs 'khor// 'byung ba rlung gi gzhu brdungs la// dung ser dkar po'i mda' ru 'phongs// rtsi 'bras rtsad

nas gcad pa'i dus la bab/ ces bskul cing dang po bsnyen bsgrub de la bya/ tha mar rta yang de kas bya/ de yis las rnams 'grub par bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal pos ser ba dbab pa'i
le'u ste rtsa bzhi pa'o/// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar/ ma bdud bcu gsum gyis rang rang gi ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// bdud mos ser ba 'bebs pa na// gsang ba'i
stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// rim pa bzhin du bsgrub pa ni// brag nag 'chi ru 'dug pa la// mthun pa'i gnas der 'dug nas ni// rim pa bzhin du bsgrub par
bya// de ru maN+Dal gzhung bzhin bri// mon mo nag mo'i thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gsum bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten bcas la// gdug shing phur pas gzir ba'o// 'khor lo
rtsibs ni bdud mo'i sngags// rim par bstan te dgod pa'o// gcan gzan dgu'am 'dab chags dgu/ khrag sna tsang bar blug par bya// nyungs mo ske tshe zi ra dang/ til nag gang bu bcas pa'o// dug sna myos

pa'i cha dang bcas// de ltar bcas la thod pa dgang// mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la// thod pa de la sngags kyi thim bur bsgrub par bya/ snying na sha khrag gtor ma phud dang bcas// sngags zlas bar bar

bdud mo mchod cing bskul bar bya// bsnyen cing bsgrub yang de la bya// tha mar rta yang de kas bya// ngan ngag thim bur bsgrub pa'o// de la gsang ba'i sngags rnams bzlas// oM rag mo rag mo tsab mo khrag la mu

sha baM ril sha ma la b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu shi ling rbad ming sa ma ya phroM ya/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i sngags su shes// ru ru shar shal ta phob baM ling ling sha ru pu ri pu ri b+h+yo ya/ de ni dbab

pa'i sngags su shes/ du pa'i ling shil rag mo tsub sha ral rbad rbad/ na dur sha phroM thig tha phob ya/ de gzir zhing sbrul te dbab pa'o// de ltar bzlas la las bya'o// hUM/ bdud mo chen mo gdug pa can/ srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur
mo// bdud mo ma rungs dus la bab// srid pa'i bdag mo ma rungs ma// ma bdud chen mo bcu gsum ste// bdud mo za sha bzhi la bstod// bdud mo spyugs 'dren srid par rgyug/ 'byung ba sa la gnas pa'i

tshe// sa bdag ma chen srid pa'i yum// 'byung ba sa yi mnga' bdag mo// bar snang khams na gnas pa'i tshe// srid pa'i rgyal mo b+h+yo bzlog mkhan// gnam sa mun rum sred phyed ma// bar snang khams kyis glog ma
srin// 'byung ba gnam la gnas pa'i tshe// srid pa'i bdag mo thog ser bdag/ snyan nas 'brug stong di ri ri// ljags las glog 'gyur lams se lams/ shangs nas rlung nag tshub mas 'debs// ljags la
khrag gi ser chen 'bebs// gdug byed ma rungs srid pa'i bdag/ bdud srin nag pos mkha' la mdung ltar 'dril// tsha grang 'od kyis mda' cig phyung// 'byung ba rlung gi gzhu cig bdungs// dkar bar dung
ser mda' cig 'phongs// rtsi thog shing thog rtsad nas chod// bdud mo chen mo ma rungs ma// thog ser bdag mo sprul pa can// gdug byed ma rungs dam la shog/ bdud mo chen mo bcu gsum yang// sku ni
'bar ba'i cha lugs la// thugs ni sgrol byed srog dang bcas// gsung ni gdug pa'i sgra sgrog ma// 'phrin las drag po'i ser chen 'bebs// gdug pa'i las mdzad sha ra ra// spyugs pa'i glu len kyu ru
ru// drag po'i thog ser 'bebs pa'i dus la bab// ces bskul zhing dbab bo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo bcu gsum gyi ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste rtsa lnga pa'o//// de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ klu rnams kyis rang rang gi ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'dug pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// phag pa rog

po'i thod pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten bcas la// seng ldeng phur pas gzir ba'o// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la klu yi sngags// nya dang byi dang khyi ra khrag/ dug chang til

rnams thod pa dgang/ kha gcad de la bsgrub par bya// bsnyen cing bsgrub dang dbab dang zil phung bya// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis klu rnams mchod// sngags rnams bar du klu bskul la// dang por bsgrub kyang de la

bsgrub// tha mar rtag gzer de kas bya// ser ba rta la 'khor lo bzhi dbab pa'o// oM nA ga sha d+hi la shar shar 'phrol 'phrol sa ma la ya du ru sha da d+hi la b+h+yo/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i sngags su shes/ oM nA ga

ra ga sha tas la na re skyes la ner pu lu sha ra thig sha ya b+h+yo/ de ni dbab pa'i sngags su shes/ bu ra sha 'ur 'ur sa ma ya 'pheng lam tsa ya phob ya/ de ni yub gcig dbab par shes/ de ltar bzlas pa dang/ hUM/

klu chen gdug pa zhe sdang can// gnas pa rgya mtsho ri rab bang la gnas/ khyed ni gdug pa klu yi bu// klu gdug ma rungs drag shul can// dga' bo 'jog po mtha' yas dus skyong dang// pad+ma chu lha dkar po wa ru
na// gdug pa'i klu chen brgyad po yang// ri rab stengs nas 'brug sgrogs cig/ tsha grang 'od kyi mda' phyung zhig/ gdug pa klu ser char ltar phob// ser ba dbab pa'i dus la bab// ribs bzhi klu tshogs
gdug pa kun// drag ser dbab pa'i dus la bab/ sbrul mgo gzhon nu'i dus la bab// rgya mtsho gcol dang ngad pas thob// gdug pa'i ser chen dbab pa'i dus la bab// sa bdag klu gnyan ma rungs

tshogs// drag ser 'bebs cing da tshur sbyon// rtsi 'bras rtsad nas chod la thong// klu ser sa la phob la thong// zhes bskul zhing dbab bo// tha ma gar 'bebs sar yas rba dbab/ de yis las rnams grub par

'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klus ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste rtsa drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ the brang rnams kyis ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di

rnams smras so// the brang ser ba 'bebs pa na// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mdun pa'i gdug gsum gnas chen du// de ru maN+Dal gzhung bzhin bya// ri bong sna rings thod pa ru// mi rta ra khyi'i khrag
rnams kyis// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug bri// dbus su rten gzugs phur pas gzir// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la the brang sngags// rim pa bzhin du 'bri'o// nyung kar khrag sna myos chang dug gis

dgang// dmar po dar gyis kha gcad la/ thod pa de la bsgrub pa'o// bsnyen bsgrub dbab dang sprul dril ba'o// sngags bsgrub bskul dang las bya'o// oM tri ra sha ra ga sha ra sha ra d+hil sen sen 'ub bzhu pri phob

la/ de ni bsnyen cing sgrub par byed/ hUM hUM sha de ba rta 'ga' na d+hi sha ya phob ya/ de ni dbab pa'i sngags su shes// ra go ra go sha ra 'ur dril sprul b+h+yo/ de ni gzir zhing sprul pa'o// de ltar bsgrubs la dbab

pa'o// hUM/ srid pa'i the brang gdug pa can// gdug byed ma rungs drag shul can// srid pa gsum gyi dbang chen po// stong gsum rgyug cing dregs pa'i kha lo sgyur// gdug byed ma rungs drag shul can// la la sa

la gnas pa'o// lta lha'i nor 'dzin pa'o// la la bdud kyi dgun bu ba// la la btsan gyi gying chen po// the brang chen po khyed rnams la// drag cing gtum kha rgyug 'gro bdag/ 'byung ba lnga po dbang bsdus
la// drag ser dbab pa'i dus la bab// sprin chen mkha' la bal ltar 'khod// 'brug chen ldir la glog dgur 'gyus// zangs ser dmar po dbab pa'i dus la bab// ces bskul zhing las bcol ba'o// lha

'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang gis ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste rtsa bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ skyes bu lung btsan gyis rang gis ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di smras
so// btsan ser drag po 'bebs pa la// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// de ru ser chen bsgrub par bya// dmar po khyi yi thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bzhi pa bri/

dbus su rten dang bcas pa bya// 'khor lo rtsibs la btsan gyi sngags// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// tshal bu ti khrag dang dmar po ri'i khrag bya pho mtsha' lu'i khrag dang gsum// nyung kar dang ni zi ra

khrag/ dug dang myos chang sbyar bar bya// de ltar thod pa dgang byas la// dmar po dar gyis kha gcad bsgrub// snying sna phud dang bshos bskor 'chang/ spyan gzigs rim par bcas pa yis// mchod cing las la

bskul bar bya// de ltar gsang ba'i sngags bzlas bsgrub// gsang ba'i sngags su bstan pa ni/ oM tsa tsa/ kha la dun ting sa ma ya dur trag 'ur chol gyi li tha ri shar ya b+h+yo/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i

sngags// oM ga ro sh+shar trag gur ling sha ra ka ling sa ma ya traM b+h+yo/ de ni yur zhing dbab pa'i sngags// oM ga laM trag sha ma ti 'ung kaM shar ya b+h+yo/ de ni dril ba'i sa gnan te dbab pa'i sngags// de ltar rim pa
bzlas dang bstab pa'o// hUM/ btsan chen skyes bu sprul pa'i bdag/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed ma/ khams rnams 'joms shing las las drag/ dmar po lus la bse yi chas// skyes bu gdug
pa'i skyes cig pa// bar snang khams su rgyug pa'i tshe// mdung dmar 'debs shing srid pa sgrol// btsan sprin dmar po mkha' la sdud// btsan dmag stong sdes srid pa dkrug khams gsum ma lus sbrub

pa thong// 'byung ba sa la drod g.yos la// rgya mtsho gdug pa'i klu dkrugs la// the brang stong gi bang chen khyed// dregs tshogs mang po'i dpung skyed la// ri rab kha nas 'bru gcig sgrogs// rgya mtsho'i gting nas
mda' cig phyung// 'byung ba rlung gi gzhu cig bdungs// dkar po dung gi mda' cig 'phongs// rtsi shing 'bras bu rtsad nas chod// drag po'i chu 'khyags char ltar phob// 'byung ba'i thig chen thog ltar

drangs// ces bskul zhing dbab pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ skyes bu lung btsan gyis ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste rtsa brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brag btsan
dmar pos rang gi ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// ra tsa dmar po'i thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs ni lnga pa 'dri// 'khor lo rtsibs la btsan gyi sngags// dbus su
dmigs pa'i rten bcas bris// gdug pa'i phur pas gzir ba'o// nyung kar khrag dang dug chang dag gis dgang// dmar po dar gyis kha gcad la// de la rim pa bsgrub par bya// bshos bu dam rdzas dag gis

mchod// ngan sngags thi bur bsgrub par bya// de yis bsnyen bsgrub dbab par bya// tha mar rta yang thod pa de ka'o// de nas gsang sngags smras pa/ oM ga ru sad tsa shol ba bar ri shar shar phob/ 'ur sha li b+h+yo/

de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i sngags// oM tsa tsa sho la baM raM raM skor skor ling shar du ya phob ya/ ki li ki li traM b+h+yo/ tsa tsa sha ra tri b+h+yo/ de nas gzir dang yur sngags so// hUM/ brag btsan dmar po dam

las bzhengs// srid pa'i the brang kha la gnas// rgyu ba bar snang khams su rgyu// dmar po bse yi rta pho bcibs// bse rta ni dmar po la/ khra chen dar ma'i gshog pa can// rin chen 'od lnga rgyan spras pas// srid
pa yongs la dbang sgyur byed// bdud byed ma rungs srid pa'i rta// de la brag btsan dmar po bcibs// phyag na bse mdung dmar po bsnams// bse'i ba dan can/ rlung gi 'khor dang bcas/ tsha grang 'od kyi
ngar dang ldan// gcod pa'i so dang ldan/ g.yo ba'i shugs dang ldan/ nus pa'i dpal dang ldan/ bar snang khams su g.yab pa'i tshe// dmar po sprin chen mkha' la sdud// gdug pa'i rlung dmar mkha' las
ldang// btsan ser dmar po char ltar 'bebs// gdug pa'i btsan ser dmar po yis// sdug gu'i rtsi 'bras myal theg gcod// ces bskul zhing dbab bo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ brag btsan dmar pos ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste rtsa dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ se btsan rol pos rang gi ser ba dbab pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// btsan ser
dmar po 'bebs pa na// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// thun pa'i gnas su 'dug pa ni// de ru dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bya/ khyi rgya bo mig bzhi'i thod pa ru rta nag po'i khrag gis/ 'khor lo rtsibs ni
bzhi pa ste/ dbus su rten gzugs phur pas gzir// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la se btsan sngags// rim pa bzhin du 'bri ba'o// nyungs khrag dug chang sbyar bas dgang// de ltar dar gyis kha gcad pa// de la mthun

pa'i rdzas rnams te// bshos bu spyan gzigs phud dang bcas pas mchod// de la sngags kyis grub pa'o// oM ra tse ra tse tu ra sh+tu ra shul shul trag shar phro b+h+yo/ 'u ram phaT b+h+yo/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i sngags/

oM ra tsu kha la b+h+yo/ ril ril li// ba'i pi pi shi b+h+yo/ de ni dbab pa'i sngags su shes// u li sa ma ya ling ling 'ur kam thig thig phroM shar b+h+yo/ de ni yur dbab sngags su shes// de ltar rim pas bsgrub
pa'o// hUM/ bzhengs shig bzhengs shig srid pa'i bdag/ zhig 'jigs srid pa kun la dbang mdzad de/ se btsan rol po'i kha rum rje// sku ni smug nag mdzes pa la// me tog mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan// 'od
'bar 'ja' kha'i thod cig bcings// g.yas na thog gi zor ba bsnams// g.yon na glog gi zhags pa 'phen// zhal nas 'brug sgra chem chem sgrogs// sna nas rlung nag tshub mas 'debs// gdug pa'i btsan
chen ma rungs pa// drag po'i ser chen 'bab pa'i dus la 'bab// ces bskul zhing dbab bo// de nas drag po'i las rnams bya// tshig gis spyan drangs mchod pa dang// las bcol de bzhin bya'o// sngags ni

ngan sngags thim bur bsgrub// dang po bsgrub kyang thod pa de las bsgrub// tha ma rta yang thod pa de kas bya// gzer gsum nges par de ka na'o// gzhom pa'i 'khor lo brgyad pos bya// phyogs mtshams steng 'og de
bzhin bsrungs/ de'i las kyi don rnams 'grub pa'o// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ se btsan rol po'i ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// thog ser gyi bam po ste
gnyis pa'o// thog ser gyi bam po rdzogs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan thugs rje'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po chen po
rnams// mi bu rnams la bdud babs na// mnyam par brje ba gang gis bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams ni// mnyam par brje na sems can dag gis
brje// de yis brje na bshol bar snang// zhes gsungs so// ra tsa dkar po dag la ni// ske ru dregs pa'i ming rus gdags// rwa la g.yu yis brgyan pa ste// 'bru zas nor skal khal du bkal// lus la

mtshal gyis thig le bya// dar dang zab kyis mdzes par brgyan// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba bya/ nag po spyi dkar bdud la bsngo// byang lug ra rnams dkar ba ni// rgyal po dag la sngo ba'o// bya nag lug nag

khyi nag bdud mo la/ re 'u rgyal po the brang la/ lug smug bya dmar klu dang sa bdag la/ de ltar bsags la bsngo ba bya// gang la dgos pa'i so so'i bsngo ba bya/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs
pa'i thom lug bsag pa'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// dregs pa ni stong gi tshogs/ zhe sdang ni gdug pa'i tshogs/ 'dod chags chen po chags pa'i tshogs/ nga rgyal gdug chen po/ phrag dog gdug pa'i 'bor/
de ring srid pa'i yas cig 'bul// de ring srid pa'i skos cig 'debs// mi la bdud babs na/ shing la rta brtsams sam/ bdud la gzhag gzung na/ de ring mnyam nyid ni brje bar bya/ bden mthun gnyis

brje bar bya/ bden pa'i chos cig bshad/ dag gi smrad cig 'drol/ yid kyis klu cig bsam/ mnyam nyid ni brje bar bya/ dregs chen ni stong gi tshogs/ mi bas ni glud la spyon/ sems can ni mdzes pa la/ lnga
phung yan lag mdzes pa'i bzhi// rus pa rin chen mkhar du brtsigs// rtsa rgyus rin chen gser gyi dra bas bsdus// rin chen 'bar ba'i shas btsas nas// rin chen zangs kyi pag gis gtums// mnyen bcud

khrag dang chu ser spras// dang po sems kyi gzhi mo bting// srog gi rlangs pa 'byung ba dbugs// dngas ma'i mtsho bzhi nang du btsas// 'byung ba lnga yis skyed de bsten// srid pa chags de bar du sgos// dang po
'ja' tshon sna lngas 'char// phyis ni srid pa chags 'jig rten// bcud sems dag pa thig le bde ba'i ngang// 'di ni sems can gtso bo ste// gdug pa'i dregs chen khyed la 'bul// 'thom mo zhe sdang gti mug

nga rgyal dang// phrag dog 'dod chags nang du 'thoms// lo gcig srid pa'i dregs pa rnams// ma rig rmongs pa'i drag po'i 'khor// 'di ni byol song mngon shes can// phyi la srid pa chags 'jig tshang ste srid

pa'i glud// mi dang mnyam nyid brje ba'i glud/ phyi'i glud du mnyam/ nang bcud du mnyam/ mnyam nyid brje ba'i gzung ba thong// zhes rim pas bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams
lang thom pa'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams kyis rang rang bcos pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa
des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la/ byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen po bya/ kha dog 'dra 'bag rigs dang

bstun// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i spyi// 'byung ba dar gyis brgyan pa'o// sbrul ris brgyan gyis ri rab kha// phyogs ma nor bar brgyan pa'o// sbrul dang sbal pa rtsangs pa dang// dra dang glang dang mthun pa

dang// klu gzugs sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// 'brang rgyas dang ni dar bya dang// mda' dang nam mkha'i ri rab brgyan pa'o// 'o ma sman dang 'bru bcas pa 'gram pa'o// dkar gsum chan dang bcas pa'o// de

ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu yas bsag pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// hUM/ klu chen ni 'khor dang bcas/ zhe sdang ni gdug pa'i tshogs/ gti mug ni blun pa'i
'khor/ rigs bzhi phrag dog can/ klu tshogs ni mang po rnams/ sil ma stong gis bskor/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ klu chen ni brgyad po ste/ ri rab bang rim dag la gnas/ mtsho mo rungs kyi dkyil/
dga' bo ni rgyal po ste/ sku mdog ni dkar po la/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka can/ g.yas pa ni shel gyi bum pa bsnams/ g.yon pa gzhags kyi gru gu rnams// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// klu 'khor gdug pas
bskor// gdug pa nad kyi bdag po lags// mdos bdag mdos bzhes cig/ klu rgyal 'jog po ste/ sku mdog ni dkar ser la/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka can/ g.yu gshog sngon po ldems se ldems/ de'i nang shed
na/ bse mkhar nang shed na/ klu btsan dmar po bzhugs/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ gnam gyi drod de rgyal ba lags/ ma mi gdug rum lcam cig la/ de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa'i/ klu btsan ni mched de

gsum/ tha chungs klu btsan dmar po lhag/ klu btsan ni dmar po ste/ rta dmar bya rgod bcibs/ gdug pa klu yi rgyan gyis spras/ klu btsan ldem pa la/ dar dmar la ka gsol/ sbrul gyi za ra tshags/ mtha' ma
bse sbal cha ga can/ sbrul dmar sku yi regs/ g.yas na sbrul yang khyug g.yon na bse bya lding/ bar snang glad bu rol cig 'u yis 'debs// chu glang 'bum yang khu yis 'debs// phyag na bse mdung dmar po
bsnams// gdug pa'i dpal dag ldan// g.yas kyi sna ni brag btsan dmar pos 'dren// g.yon gyi sna ni se btsan rol pos 'dren// gdug pa'i klu ni 'khor stong dang bcas// the brang ma rungs ban chen
byed// sa srin dgu bcus bang chen 'gyed// sil ma klu tshogs nad yams gtong/ khyod ni klu btsan gdug pa can// klu btsan chen po ma rungs pa// zha dang grum dang skrangs kyi bdag/ smyo dang
'bog dang lkugs kyi bdag/ sdig pa ni stobs kyi bdag rdzings dang skrangs kyi bdag de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// zhe sdang gdug pa'i nad 'di khrol// klu btsan dmar po slar la btul// nad rnams ni
sos par mdzod/ klu btsan ni chen po khyod/ stong gsum rgyug pa'i tshe/ rta dmar glog tu 'gyur/ btsan dmar 'od du 'bar/ spyugs pa'i bod skad phu ru ru// gdug pa'i dmag dpung sil li li// sdug pa'i

mdos chen 'di bzhes la// nad kha dog chod la dal kha bsgyur/ ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu btsan dmar po bcos pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das

kyi spyan sngar/ mtsho sman 'khor dang bcas pas rang rang gi bcos pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang bar gsog par bya// dar

chen rgyan dang ldan par bya// de la ri rab brtsig pa'o/ kha dog rigs bstun rgyan dang ldan// nam mkha' brgyad dang rtsa brgyad gzugs// smyug braM brgyad dang gtsang brgyad la// rin chen phur bus brgyan pa'o// bya

smug lug smug de bzhin bskang dang rta// gtor ma cha dgu dbul/ shar du dkar gtor/ lho ru 'bru sna tshogs gtor ma/ nub tu sman sna tshogs gtor ma/ byang du 'o ma sna tshogs gtor ma/ shar lho me tog sna
tshogs gtor ma/ lho nub chu sna tshogs gtor ma/ nub byang du sman sna tshogs gtor ma/ byang shar du sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma/ dbus kyi gtor sbram 'bras chen zho// phud dang spyan gzigs de bzhin
bsag/ gsog dang shas brgya rtsa brgyad do// 'phur dgu 'dzul dgu gzugs dang bcas// dbus shar du dar dkar gur/ lho ru gur ser/ nub tu gur dmar/ byang du gur ljang/ phra men skyogs dgu/ gtong

snod do// de ltar klu gzugs sna tshogs chang bshos dang// phung dang rin chen de bzhin te// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba bya// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// mtsho sman gur mdos bsag pa'i le'u ste so
lnga pa'o//// srid pa kun la dbang bsgyur ma// klu dang ma mos bdag the brang 'khor// gdug pa'i mtsho sman 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// e ka ma ni chos kyi dbyings// nag mo

bong zhon rgyug 'gro yum// tsa mun ti ni srid pa'i bdag/ rgyal mo lnga ni dbang sgyur ma// mthing nag dkar mo dbu gu sman 'khor bcas/ gdug pa nad kyi bdag mo khyod// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ hUM/ e
ga ma ni srid gsum chos kyi dbyings// nag mo bon bzhin srid pa kun gyi bdag/ sha za khrag 'thung ral pa can// mthing nag lus la rngam pa mo// dur khrod chas la sprul pa mo/ khram bam thod pa
dbyug pa can// bya dmar nad rkyal mtshon gyi gru gu// g.yas na khrag gi bud med brgyad// g.yon na nad bdag bcu gnyis te// gdug byed chen po mdos la spyon// tsa mun ti ti klu'i yum/ khros pa'i lus la

gdug pa'i chas// nad kyi rkyal pa khal du bkal// klu mo chen mo tsa mun ti// ma mo chen mo tsa mun ti// sman mo chen mo tsa mun ti// mi bzad dug chen mdos la spyon// rgya mtsho chen mo 'jings kyi bar shed

na// dar dkar 'bar ba'i gur gcig phug/ gur chen de yi nang shed na// nya chen rtsa mo gcal du bkram// dkar mo sbrul gyi za ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/
rus sbal dkar po'i khri steng na// pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan steng na// srid pa'i rgyal po dbu dgu bzhugs// dbu la dar dkar la bu gsol// chibs su chu srin pir la bcibs// phyag na bdud rtsi bum pa

bsnams// 'khor ni sman dang ma mo stong gis bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// gur chen de yi shar phyogs na// dar dkar 'bar ba'i gur phub ldi ri ri// gur chen de yi steng shed na// nya chen rtsa mo
gcal du bkram// nya chen de yi steng shed na// dkar mo sbrul gyi za ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan stengs na// shar phyogs dbang

gi rgyal mo bzhugs// 'khor yang sman tshogs stong gis bskor// phyag na dung gi bum pa bsnams// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen dar gyi gur du phub// gur chen de

yi steng shed na// nya chen 'khar ba gcal du bkram// sbrul chen ser khri za ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed na// ri ni gser gyi gzhal yas khang// pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan stengs na// lho phyogs dbang gi rgyal
po bzhugs// 'khor yang klu dang sman mo stong// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// gur chen de yi nub phyogs na// dmar po dar gyi gur du phub// gur chen de yi nang shed na// nya chen se ba gcal du

bkram// sbrul chen dmar khra za ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen byu ru'i gzhal yas khang// pad+ma dmar po'i gdan stengs na// nub phyogs dbang gi rgyal po bzhugs// klu dang ma mo'i 'khor

dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhengs// gur chen de yi byang phyogs na// ljang khu dar gyi gur du phub// nya chen gtum pa gcal du bkram// ljang khu sbrul gyi za ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed
na// ri ni g.yu yi gzhal yas khang// pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan stengs na// byang phyogs dbang gi rgyal mo bzhugs// 'khor ni klu dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di

bzhes// rgya mtsho chen po'i phar tsam na// rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal yas na// de na sman ma dang ma mo stong sde gnas/ sa bdag klu gnyan stong sde dang// zhe sdang gdug pa da khrol la/ khyed ni mi bzad gdug pa'i

tshogs// de ring srid pa'i mdzes 'di bzhes// ces rim pas sngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mtsho sman bcos pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ the brang
stong gi rtsa gcig gis rang rang bcos pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// 'bru sna bcu gsum phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin

bya// de la ri rab chen po rtsig kha dog rigs dang bstun par bya// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba dar gyis brgyan pa'o// bshos bu stong rtsa brgyad la/ mda' phra stong rtsa brgyad kyis brgyan

pa'o// ri rab de yi shar du'o// ngar bu stong rtsa brgyad la/ nam mkha' stong rtsa brgyad btsugs la lho ru/ 'brang rgyas la bya stong rtsa brgyad phod kyis brgyan pa nub tu'o// chang shos stong rtsa brgyad la 'gong thum stong

rtsa brgyad la byang du'o// rta'i thod pa stong la mkhar stong bris pa shar du/ dre'u'i thod pa la mkhar stong bris pa lho ru/ rtol thod stong la mkhar stong bris pa nub tu/ bong stong la mkhar stong bris pa byang du/ gzhan

dang yang rta dang bya dang khyi dang ba skya dang bcas pas bskor/ sha khrag phud dang rin chen bcas pas mchod// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang rdzas bsags pa'i

le'u ste so bdun pa'o//// hUM/ the brang ni stong gi tshogs/ la las 'byung ba sten pa de// srid pa'i the brang stong gi bdag/ stong gsum kun tu rgyug 'gro'i bdag/ skye 'gro kun gyi nyu le bdag/ de ring srid

pa'i mdos la spyon// the brang stong ni rtsa gcig ste// la la byang chub sems dpa' stong sde la gnas pa'i tshul/ la la de ba lha'i rigs te nor 'dzin byed/ la la zhe sdang bdud kyi bu ste bdud gcod las rnams
byed/ la la nga rgyal btsan gyi bu ste gzer nad gtong/ la la dkor bdag rgyal po'i bu ste gsod gcod las rnams byed/ la la bdud mo ma yams bu ste nad yams gtong/ la la the brang stong sde gsum rgyug
'gro byed/ la la gdug pa'i sde brgyad pa'i drag shul byed/ la la gnod sbyin sha za'i rigs te sha dang khrag la dang/ la la ja la stong gi sde ste bka'i bang chen byed/ la la sa bdag gdug pa'i rigs te
gdug pa'i nad yams gtong/ the brang stong sde ma lus kun/ khyed ni srid pa'i rgyug 'gro byed de nad yam gdug pa gtong bar byed/ smyo dang 'bog nad gtong bar byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos

la spyon// brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa' ste// sa la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i tshogs/ khyed la gdug pa mi mnga' yang// rigs ni 'byung po the brang ste/ khyed kyang srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// snang gsal 'od

dang bcas pas mchod// brgyad kyi sde ni lha yi rigs// gzhon nu mdes pa'i sku lus la// rin chen lnga yi rgyan gyis brgyan// chibs su gyi ling re re bcibs// gser gyi sga la phra men brgyan// rin chen sna lnga
rgyan dang bcas// yid bzhin nor bu lus la bcangs// la la dag la phan pa byed// la la dag la gnod pa byed// de ni the brang tshogs te lha yi bu mo gzhon nu spyod/ yid bzhin nor la mnga' mdzad pa/ rin
chen gser gyi mkhar na gnas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// la la zhe sdang bdud sde mthing nag 'bar ba'i lus/ ral pa 'bar ba gyen du 'greng// chibs su stag gu ris bkra bcibs// gri thogs stongs
sum dag tu rgyug/ mi la bdud du byed pa ste// bdud la phyags mas 'debs par byed// srog dbugs ma lus dbang du sdud// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// la la rtag gi he dom can// mthing nag 'bar
ba'i lag dgar chibs su chibs// stag mo chibs nas rgyug 'gro byed// la la gzig la chibs na rgyug 'gro byed// la la rnga mo ske rings chibs nas rgyug/ la la bred mo lag dkar chibs nas rgyug/ la la gre

mong la gar chibs nas rgyug/ la la ba kyang yu mo chibs nas rgyug/ rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan cha can// rin chen rgyan bran si li si li// la la ti ri da ga chibs nas rgyug/ la la bong bu rnga reng chibs nas
rgyug/ stongs sum dag tu rgyug 'gro byed// srid pa'i sha la 'dre rgyal rtse ba mi bu ris su gcod par byed// dud 'gro phyag mas 'debs par byed// gdug pa'i nad yams gtong bar byed// ma rungs gdug pa
srid pa'i bdag/ srid pa'i 'khor tshogs the brang kun// lcags mda' lcags gzhu 'gengs byed cing// mthing nag bdud mig zhon/ la la tso mo ru re zhon/ la la thang yag rog mo zhon// thabs bdud mo mo bran

la 'dzud// gdug byed the brang mdos la spyon// lcags kyi mi ring sdod po dgu// lcags mda' lcags gzhu lag na thogs// mche ba gtsigs shing rgyug par byed// sdig pa'i gang kyang sgra yang 'byin// ma rungs
gdug pa bdud kyi bu// srid pa'i the brang las la 'gyed// ma rungs gdug 'khor mdos la spyon// btsan dgong dmar po mdos la spyon// dmar po lus ni gdug pa'i chas// la la 'bar ba dmar po
zhon// la la 'dab bzang bya dmar chibs// la la 'ol pa bzhad la chibs// la la 'ug pa wa la zhon/ kha nas khrag gzer nad gzer 'bebs// btsan shod dmar po 'dem par byed// gdug

pa'i 'khor tshogs ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs su rgyug par byed// la la lings bon khrag la dang par byed// sprul pa sgral zhing rgyug srid par sha la rgyug 'gro byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// rgya ni rgya

dgong khra bo 'khor// dkar po 'od chen sta la zhon// ser po sna yon 'phang byang zhon// de 'o kha ser rta ring zhon// ma rung kha chen rgyal byed dengs po zhon// gnam la 'od chen spyang khu zhon// the brang chen po ma
rungs 'khod// srid pa'i srog dbugs bdag po ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'dir zhes// the brang stong tshogs ma lus kun// la las bdud mo ma yams bu// mi sdug gzugs ni nad rkyal bud// la la kha rngam
mang po 'gyed/ spyug pa brda yis gar byed cing// ma rungs gdug pa'i the brang tshogs// la la stag gu ris khra zhon nas rgyug/ la la dom bu brang dkar zhon nas rgyug/ la la mdzo rtol dre'u la zhon nas

rgyug/ mtshon dang nad yams mang po 'bebs// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// la la gnod sbyin sha'i bu// dmar po gcer bu sha za'i tshogs// dur khrod dag tu gnas bcas shing// skye 'gro ma lus sgrol bar

byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// la la sde brgyad cho 'phrul du// mi yi lus la 'brug gi mgo/ la la rngam chen gtum pa che// bar snang khams na gnas pa ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// la la the
brang klu gdug bu// gzhon nu mdzes pa gsum rgyug cing// chibs su phag dang sram la chibs// lag na nya chen blud bu bsnams// nad yams gdug pa kram bur mdze nad gtong// de ring srid pa'i mdos
la spyon// srid pa'i dgong po spun dgu la// gnam la gnas pa'i spun gsum byung// gnam gyi dkar po 'od chen dang// rnam the dkar po dang/ gnam la byang chub gsum/ dar dkar ral kar re re sku la
gsol// za 'og ni thong ka can/ shel kar dung dkar re re 'dzin/ sle'u gra gos ni re re gsol/ rgyal mtshan dkar po re re bsnams// bzhugs pa gnam la bzhugs// rgyu ba sa la rgyu ba/ bar snang gnas pa'i
spun gsum po// ti sri lag ge cag ge gsum/ khri cig nag po dang/ tri se ser kra dang/ ba ti nag po'i na bza' re re gsol// kra lnga rgyal mtshan re re 'dzin// pa mkhar 'o mkhar dung mkhar
'dzugs// bzhugs pa bar snang khams la bzhugs// rgyu ba 'dzam bu gling du rgyu// sa la gnas pa'i spun gsum po// the se bdag gi chu rings gsum// zo kya mkhar skye rde rgyal 'dzin// sle kra gos ni re re
gsol// bzhugs pa sa la bzhugs/ rgyu ba stong gsum rgyu/ srid pa'i the brang spun dgu yang// skyes pa pho brgya srog la sgol// byis pa brgya yis dus su ra sa 'debs// bse mo de ring srid pa'i

mdos la spyon// bse mkhar dngengs po sgo gcig la// srid pa'i the brang skyes to re// yang le shol gyi skyes gcig po// 'dus pa bse do ro// mang pa tshe ngo re/ spyi rings lag to ste re/ skye 'gro yongs la gnod pa

ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// the brang chen po ba/ bse'i mi ring bdun/ bse'i sba ba bskur tsam re re skyes/ lag na bse 'khar re re thogs// 'dzam bu gling du rgyug pa ste/ khyed ni byur sgo spun bdun

yin// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// the brang sbom po mchu rings ni// gnam sa gnyis la 'khrug pa ste// ltas ngan cho 'phrul kun gyi bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// yul yang bse yul dmar po gru

bzhi na// bse mkhar ldem pa na/ the brang spun lnga ste/ byung sgo spun bdun dang/ ngan sgo spun lnga dang/ ltog mgo spun bdun dang/ gdug pa'i the brang tshogs/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// la la rgyal 'gong khra
bo ste// la la btsan 'gong dmar pos te// la la bdud 'gong nag pos bya// la la gzu dang dpang po mdzod// la las drag po'i thog ser 'bebs// la la shwa dang 'od pa 'gyed// rlung dang ser bu gtong bar
byed// gdug byed the brang ma rungs 'khor// 'byung ba ri rab brdeg pa'i tshul// mda' ni mkha' la nam mkha' yul// zang zing longs spyod glud// mdangs ldan sems kyi glud// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di

bzhes// the rang khram kha gzhan du bsgyur// ces rim pas bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang stong rtsa gcig bcos pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o//// bam po gsum pa rdzogs so//// de
nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams kyis rang rang gis ltas ngan dbab pa'i las 'di smras so// bdag cag rnams ni dregs pa'i stong sde ste// las dang nus pa dpag las 'das// mi bu

rigs rnams thams cad la// ma rungs ltas ngan sna tshogs btang ste/ zhing pa rnams la shu ba lkug pa btang ste/ bdud rnams kyis ni nyal ba 'dra ba cig btang/ btsan rnams kyis ni gru bzhi btang/ rgyal po
rnams kyis gzha' bkug pa 'dra ba gcig btang/ ma bdud rnams kyis skye 'dra ba gcig btang/ the brang rnams kyis gru gsum 'dra ba gcig btang/ dza la rnams kyis long ga 'dra ba btang/ sde brgyad rnams
kyi thig btab pa 'dra ba gcig btang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis dar mo gcig btang/ sman rnams kyis mnga' 'dra ba btang/ sa bdag rnams kyis sbrul 'khyug pa 'dra ba gcig btang/ klu rnams kyis zla bo
gcig btang/ spyir lkug pa gcig btang ngo// de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis 'dzings pa btang ste/ bdud rnams kyis glag sder 'dzings pa btang/ btsan rnams kyis gza' spyang sder 'dzings

pa btang/ rgyal po rnams kyis sha ba ru 'dzings pa btang/ ma bdud rnams kyis stag sder 'dzings pa btang/ the brang gis gong sreg 'dzings pa btang/ bya la mas 'ug pa 'dzings pa btang/ sde brgyad kyis khra
spar 'dzings pa btang/ gnod sbyin brgyad kyis bya sbar gshog 'dzings btang/ klu sa bdag gis sbal pa sder 'dzings btang/ nya mo rnga 'dzings btang/ spyir bsder 'dzings btang/ de nas yang dregs pa

rnams kyis sbram btang ste/ bdud kyis bya sbram dang rgod sbam btang/ btsan rnams kyis gla ba dang dgo ba'i sbram btang/ rgyal po rnams kyis sha sbram gtang/ bdud rnams kyis gcan gzan sbram btang/ the

brang gis wa dang bong sbram btang/ bya la mas nya sbram btang/ klu dang sa bdag gis nya sbram dang bya sbram btang/ de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis 'di rnams btang ste/ bdud kyis dmu lo dang mgo mangs
btang/ btsan rnams kyis zha bo btang/ rgyal pos kha me dang nor bar btang/ ma bdud rnams kyis spu mi gdug pa btang/ the brang bya la mas 'go mjug nor bar btang/ klu sa bdag gis rkang lag med par

btang/ de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis tshe ma btang ste/ bdud rnams kyis mdzo tshe ma btang/ btsan rnams kyis ra tshe lugs tshe ma btang ste/ rgyal pos mi tshe ma dang rta tshe ma btang/ bdud mo rnams kyis tshe ma

btang/ the brang rnams kyis ba tshe ma btang/ klu sa bdag gis nya tshe ma btang/ yang dregs pa rnams kyis ltas ngan btang ste/ bdud kyi khyi la rtsed pa btang/ btsan gyis ra la skar mda' btang/ rgyal pos rta la
drug khrom btang/ ma bdud kyis lug la ro khal btang/ the brang dang bya la mas mi gdug pa sna tshogs btang/ klu sa bdag gis sha ba bkra btang/ de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis ltas ngan than pa btang/

bdud kyis bya nag khra btang/ btsan gyis 'ug pa btang/ rgyal pos go ba btang/ ma bdud kyis kyung ka ske ka dang/ the brang gis srin bya btang/ bya la mas bya rgod btang/ sde brgyad dang gnod sbyin gyis ne'u le
btang/ klu sa bdag gis ngang pa btang/ bdud kyis 'od zer btang ngo// btsan gyis dmar la bred pa btang ngo// rgyal pos dkar la dgongs pa btang/ ma bdud kyis nya mig tu btang/ the brang bya la mas

dmar phro ba btang/ klu dang sa bdag gis sngo la 'khyil par btang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyis ltas ngan btang ba'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan
'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams kyis// ltas ngan btang ba de bzhin na// bzlog cing bcos
pa ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// ltas ngan

bzlog pa'i las su btang ba ni// shul ma rnams ni 'byung ba na// gang byung rang re mdos dang drag po srog gi bzlog/ 'dzings pa rnams ni drag po 'thing 'bur bzlog/ tshe mas rnams ni rang re bam gyis bzlog
pa'o// sbram rnams de rang bal gyis bzlog/ bya rnams byung na than bsgyur la btang/ 'od rnams byung na srid pa'i yas kyis bzlog khams tsad dang bcas pa ya/ de rang yas su btang bas bzlog pa'o// spyi
rnams drag po yas kyis bzlog/ de yis gang yang bzlog par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ltas ngan bzlog pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan sngar brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// bsgrub na gsang sngags gang gis bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// bsgrub pa'i las su bya ba na// gsang sngags 'di yis bsgrub pa ste// sngags ni dregs pa'i bla mtsho yin// spu gri
nags tshal me bzhin gnas// dmigs pa rab tu spel byas nas// ma bzlas yang ni srog la 'khor lo bskor// bzlas nas dbang dang 'bud dang 'debs 'dra ste// gang la dmigs pa sgrol bar byed// de yis
las su bstan pa na// gsad pa dang ni gso ba dang// dbab pa dang ni gcad pa dang// mnan pa dang ni gzir ba dang// gdug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang// bskrad pa dang ni zhi ba dang// btang ba dang ni bzlog

pa dang// bcing ba dang ni khram rnams so// de yis las rnams 'grub par byed// sngags tshigs re yis grub par byed// oM kro d+ha yag sha kha laM tung tri srog la ya ma ni dza/ mu kha laM pa sad he'i ba ta yaM ga bud daM

rbad ya/ mu tsa kha du na he li sa ma ya rbad ya/ mo rag sha kha la du tri sham bya/ nag mo rtsa la la han rbad ya/ kha la dan tri sha la kha thun rbad ya/ sa ma ya ru ru rbad trag lam ya/ mu ti kha ra sham rbad ya/ hi li pa ta sa

ma ya ku ru sham rbad mu tu thibs ling sha rbad ya/ kye tshe ru ru rbad tri ya/ ka laM traM khaM rbad/ sa ma ya ru ru bi sha ba ya rbad/ rag to mu tsa baM rba/ ga tsa mu to shag sa ma ya/ kha mi shaM rbad ya/ tra mu sa raM rbad ya/ kha lam

ma ta chum ya/ hi pa shaM dan ti r-i rbad/ dri pa sham dan ting r-i rbad/ mung rtse kra he kra ma yam/ sad ra ra pra ma ya ti rbad/ nag po tsa la he du na rbad/ dza dur snying la la rbad/ sa ma yaM ka shaM ra ru mu ru

rbad/ badzra ka sha rbad ya/ sa ma ya ru rbud lung yang/ hi li ma de yam rbad/ ka sha ti tsa pa raM rbad ya/ mu tsa ram sha rbad/ tsu ru tsu ru shal rbad/ sa ma dug laM rbad ya/ sa ma yam sta ga ru thuM ya/ ru pa'i sha la laM rbad

ya/ kha gdangs pa sha ru rbad ya/ ma pa sha ru rbad ya/ khaM khaM ru ru rbad ya ba sha ta ni/ yam mu sti phra ma yam/ kha ru kha ru thigs ling rbad/ badzra ya sha ram pa ni/ su ru pu sha rbad/ kha 'dar srog la hUM thums ya rbad/

su ni pa sha mu raM kha raM sta pa sha ni sa ma yo ki da ra thibs ling ya/ mu ba raM sad/ ti rib rbad/ ru pa'i rbad/ sha ti rbad/ kha li rbad/ tsa tsa kha la sho la baM/ pa ni tsa sho ru to rbad/ sa ma ya ka lam shaM rbad ni la/ ga ti

ru ti tsa sha mu ru ti rbad ya/ ga lam te sha ra ga te du tsa khams rbad/ mu ta badzra sa du laM sha rbad/ tsa tsa kho ru sha rbad yaM/ mu pa sha ra ma rgyug ling rbad ya/ sa ma ya ta ru thibs rbad/ mu ra sham pi ni rbad tsa ka laM ma he

ni ba thums la ya/ pa d+ha ya tsa sho la mu to rbad/ pa ta ra ge he du tsa sho la/ ru tsa yam rbad ni/ he li dzra ding ru rbad ya/ ka gsum pa sha sha trag mi ya/ tsa tsa paM pi ling sha rbud tsa sho tsa la rgyug breng sham rbad ya/ mu ni

pa sha pha la he sha ma rbad ya/ mu gan te ling sa ma ya rbad/ ta lang shar ti yam rbad/ kha la tsa dung yam shad de b+h+yo/ ru ti par sta kha la sham dung ling rbad/ tsa ga la ma si du ya ma ni/ ma ma ru sha la rto kha lam he rbad

ya/ tring kha laM he ling sad/ badzra gzhung zhung la bsad yaM yaM/ tsa sho laM pa ya sa ma ru ti dza ke rbad rbad/ mu ti ka ra yaM/ badzra sa ma ya tsa sho laM paM baM pa ra le/ rgyug brang skor tshu ril ya/ he le tsag kram pa sha bsad

du ni rbad ni ya/ ka laM he 'dus ya/ mu rta ru ka laM bsad ya/ hi li ka sha rbad rbad ya/ mud ka raM he ba duM ya/ mu tsa raM pa sad ya/ ya ru gaM gaM rbad ya/ tra ling sad ni pa sha ram/ he ka mu ri pa sa ma skor sha song/

trang tra ru ru me ye rbad ya/ ka laM sad rum shaM rbad ya/ ri ti tsa la sad yam/ ba ro sho rbad/ nga ro sho rbad/ mug to rbad/ ke sha rbad//// oM ra tsa pa sha ru ru sha kha la 'ur rbad ya/ oM ling ga ra ging ka ra/ pa tra pa

tra/ to to she to to she/ mes mes pa ba ri ba ba ri/ sha wa ri sha wa ri/ sil sil/ yu ti yu ti/ ging ka ra srog la yam yam/ se phung shag b+h+yo/ khaM b+h+yo/ staM b+h+yo/ ni b+h+yo/ maM b+h+yo/ phri b+h+yo/ yag sha staM pa kI la ya/ rag sha

stam pa kI la ya/ tsa ram kha lam de kI la ya/ du na tshal pa kI la ya/ nA sha ta ma pa kI la ya/ ging ka ra shaM sha 'ur 'ur shog ram rbad/ ra de dza da srog la shaM shaM rbad/ ka lam du srid yam rbad ya/ ka laM du srid yaM

rbad ya/ mu ro sha laM he ru ka sam rbad ya/ rA dza srog la hur lang rbad ya/ kha dar pa tram lam sam yam/ pa tra kha la 'ur tra ma yam rbad/ srog la ra d+he badzra san ti ya shaM rbad/ ging ga ra srog la

hUr thums rbad ya mu tra ra dza sham rbad rbad ya ya/ oM tro tha na tro pa ni/ pa tra pa tra/ shu la shu la/ da sha 'dri ba gang kha ra/ ging mo'i srog la sham sham rbad/ hur thums tsa la breng breng ya ya/ be be ra ya shan d+hi rbad/

po pa ti ta rbad shag ya/ be ba ga du sha ti rbad ya/ ka tra ru ru sham b+h+yo/ ma ru ru sha tsa ni yaM yaM rbad/ dza dur snying la yam yam/ in ta ga laM sa du ram b+h+yo/ tri sha ra ka sham du rbad/ kha la ma dung sha tring ram pa ya ya/

mu tsa kha la da ra tse su ra ma rbad ya/ he le mi sad ni yam/ tri sha ga pa ri rbad u traM kha ya/ badzra gang lo shom rbad/ tri sha la ra ga yaM rbad/ hri dri raM phum sad b+h+yo/ kha la ma du tsa sha ma ram/ su ru ra dag ya b+h+yo/ du tri kha

la yam/ rbad/ ga gro ga la duM rbad/ se tsa ga la traM b+h+ya/ mu tri sha raM rbad ya/ kha la 'a dang tse ru tri pa sha raM b+h+yo/ kha dur ma dur tsa sha laM b+h+yo/ sa ma ya ru du thibs te ling rbad/ sha ka laM du na thibs ya/ in tra ba ti kha

la ya rbad/ kha dur khri pa tsa la b+h+yo/ mur gting ya ya/ tsu tsu sha ram rbad ya/ mu ti kha laM ya/ trang la tre treng kha reg sha b+h+yo/ gu ra ma da pa sha ya/ mu ka ra ti sha bya/ he ling ga hag shaM rbad ya/ sa ma ya mung ti pa ta ya

ma rbad/ pa sham ka laM ti yang/ te tso khu li rbad ya/ me ru sad ya lad rbad yang/ tra sha kha dung lang ga pa/ he 'du srog la yam ya/ ti ma sha rag sha rbad ya ya/ ga la ma san tri ya ma b+h+yo/ mur ta pa ya/ kha laM ste tsu

ta ma bya/ be ba du sam rbad ya/ ga lam he ti ya/ mu ga ram he pa rbad/ san sbri pan tra ra ga yam yam/ ka li saM yaM yaM/ badzra kI la sha da dzra/ ma ma ru ru thims 'da' lam pra sha ya ma/ rag mo srog rtsal du na ti kha

la b+h+yo/ ma ma dag tu tsar lings sa ma ya ni dza/ kha la dan ti ru pa'i sha rbad/ mu ta kha la rbad ni yam yam/ kha du sa ma pa sha la ma rbad ya/ he le ma sku pa sha ram pa ni yam/ ni la ni la trag tu tsar sha rbad/ yag sha

kha 'da' sha ma dur ling rbad/ sa ma pu ra ga lam shar ya rbad/ hi sa ma ya rbad na yaM yaM/ ka laM pa ta pa ru ru sa ti la mal rbad ya/ ka sha ma du na lam rbad ya/ be ga ben smig smig shar ru ru sham ma laM b+h+yo/ ru ru

tsam sha yag mo ni laM b+h+yo/ ru ti kha la 'da' sham ya b+h+yo/ sa du ram/ 'gi li ling ya/ ra ga ra sho ka lam rbad/ he ling mi ling sa tra ya rbad/ du na du na thibs su sad/ rag to rag to tsa mur sha rbad/ kha lam he su

ri sha rbad/ de na dur ti ka laM sha ma laM ya rbad/ baM tsit+ta ku de he ra sha yam rbad ya kha la du tri rbad ya/ sa mur sham yi/ khri mur sha ya/ ha la ta pa ra sha ya/ ma rums sad ne ye rbad/ kha la tsa sha tsa brang ya/ tra sa ra

du yam/ ma ma ru sha la rbad bya/ rag sha kha la rbad du yam/ mu ti kha ra shad du yam yam du na sa du phra ma rbad/ kha la du sha ra ga sham yam rbad ya/ mu ra ga sham rbad ya/ he tri kha la ru sha ba rta yaM ni

rbad ya/ mu kham sha yag sha rbad/ rag sha mur kha ya rbad/ rag sha kha 'dar srog la yams/ yag sha kha ling rbad ya/ tsa dur sham lam rbad du ya/ kha la he du sa ma yam rbad/ tring ga la pha sha mu ti yaM/ he hing ka sha

ra ma yaM/ yag sha kha la ru tri rbad b+h+yo/ mu sha kha la raM rbad//// nA ga rag sha kha laM ya/ na ga pe she ram pa ni/ na ga ge ser ma sha na ga shi lang kha tsar pa sha ya/ nA ga sa ra du sa ma pra sha ya ma/ nA ga laM sen yaM

tri ka ra sham b+h+ya/ nA ga ra du ya/ nag he laM b+h+ya/ nA ga sha tse bya/ nA ga sha tse bya/ nA gA pra sa ya/ nA ga se na ya/ nA ga mi pa ste ya/ nA ga le na ga le/ sa ma ya 'ur cho/ ling ling sha tsa na ga re ya/ kha la ru ru sha pad

ni/ sa du kha tsa pa sha ya/ nA ga hUM laM ma bya/ nA ga 'ur raM/ nA ga she ram/ nA ga du ni ram/ pe ra he sa ya/ nya ling sa ling sha ya/ kha la he pe sha ya/ be du da la pa gtang tse ha/ kha lam sha bya/ i lam sa d+hi ni ya/ ba

la ba la sha ya/ he sa ra mu ta ya/ mu raM he duM ya/ kha laM san tri ya/ mu tra sha dur laM ya/ ka sa du na sa ra thibs/ pa sa ba sha ra mu gar ra ma ya/ sa ma ya ra du dka' laM bya/ he ra he ra sa du ya/ sa ma ra ga sha du ya/

lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye
ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// bsgrub pa'i las rnams bya ba na// bskyed pa'i yi ge gang gis bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams kyi// bskyed pa'i yi ge bstan pa ni// yi ge 'dren pa'i sa bon te// dregs pa bla rtsa yi ger gnas// yi ge de

las bskyed pa'o// ya ni bdud rnams bskyed pa ste// tsa las btsan rnams bskyed pa yin// ra las rgyal po bskyed pa ste// ma las bdud mo bskyed pa yin// ta las the rang bskyed pa ste// 'a las dza la bskyed

pa'o// na las sde brgyad bskyed pa ste// sha las gnod sbyin bskyed pa'o// sa las sa bdag bskyed pa ste// phu las klu rnams bskyed pa'o// de las bskyed pa'i phyi nang gsang ba gsum// rim pa bzhin du bya bar

gsungs// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi yi ge bskyed pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol
to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// dmigs pa gtad par bya ba ni ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// dmigs pa gtad pa'i las byed ni// bdud la gtad par bya ba na/ gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// thun pa'i gnas
su 'dug nas ni// gsang ba'i stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mon pa nag po'i thod pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis bri// sme ba'i khrag sna gsum gyis so// dbus su dmigs pa'i gzugs bris
la// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bdud kyi sngags// g.yon nas bskor la bri ba'o// dmigs de la dug shing phur pas gzir/ khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dag kha ni dar nag dag
gis gcad// tshon gyi skud pas rgya gram bcing// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis bdud rnams mchod// bdud bskul las bcol gnyer du gtad// ma nyes dpang gzugs 'dis nyes bya// bden pa dar las bcol

bsgral bar gnyer du gtad/ gong gsum dag tu sba ba'o// de'i dmigs pas khrag tu skyug cing nad kyis 'chi/ zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum
pa'o//// btsan la gtad par bya ba na/ stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// 'phar ba dmar po'i thod pa la// cang shes rta yi khrag dag gis// 'khor lo rtsibs ni
dgu pa bri// 'khor lo rtsibs la mtshan nyid sngags// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten bcas la// ming dang rus su ldan pa'o// de la gdug shing phur pas gzir/ khrag dang dug gis dag par bya/ kha ni dmar po
dar gyis gcad// tshon gyi skud pas rgya gram bcing// mthun pa'i las kyis btsan rnams mchod// bden bdar dpang gzugs 'dis nyes bya// dmigs pa gtad cing bsgral ba'i las kyang bcol// gong
gsum dag gam brag gi thems la gnan// des ni dmigs pa khrag skyug nad kyis 'chi// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o//// rgyal po
la dmigs pa gtad pa na// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// spyang khu sngon po'i thod pa la// gcan gzan gdug pa'i khrag sna yis// 'khor lo rtsibs ni lnga
pa'am// yang na brgyad pa bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la rgyal po'i sngags// dbus su dmigs pa'i gzugs bris la// mgo dang yan lag nying lag ming rus tshang bar bya// gdug pa'i shing gi phur pas
gzir// gdug pa'i rdzas kyi dgang bar bya// dar gyis kha gcad tshon gyis rgya gram bcing// de la sngags 'das bsgrub pa'o// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mchod byas la// bden bdar dpang gzugs

las bcol gtad// rgyal po dag la gtad par las kyang bcol// gtsug lag mchod rten ma chad pa lha khang dag tu gtad/ de yis smyo 'bog nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/
rgyal po la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o//// ma bdud la btad pa/ gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des/ rabs chad nag po'i thod pa la// tshe ma rungs khrag dag gis// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu
gsum 'bri// dbus su dmigs pa de bzhin te// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bdud mo'i sngags// gdug shing phur pas dmigs pa gzir// gdug pa'i rdzas kyis dgang bar
bya// sngon mar byad thag dam du dkri// de la bsnyen pa byas nas su// bdud mo rnams ni thun pa'i rdzas kyis mchod/ bdud mo mchod cing dmigs pa gtad// dur khrod dag tu sba bar bya// de'i dmigs pas
brlag par gdon mi za/ zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o//// the brang dag la gtad pa ni// bong bu sna ris thod pa ru// 'khor
lo rtsibs ni bcu gcig bri// dbus su dmigs pa de bzhin te// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// dug shing phur pas gzir ba'o// 'khor lo rtsibs la the brang sngags// rim pa bzhin du bri ba'o// dbus su
dmigs pa'i rten bcas la// ming dang rus su ldan pa'o// gdug shing phur pas gzir pa ste// gdug pa'i rdzas kyi tshon thag bcing// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa las bcol te// lung gdum dag tu sbas pa

na// dmigs pa 'grol bar the tshom med// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o//// de nas yang sa bdag la gtad par bya/ gsang bdag ting
'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// ra rog thod pa dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni dgu pa bri// 'khor lo rtsibs la sa bdag sngags// dbus su rten dang bcas pa la// mi dang rus su

ldan pa la// dug shing phur pas gzir byas la// bsnyen cing bsgrub la gnan par sba// de yis dmigs pa rlag par 'gyur// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag la gtad pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad
pa'o//// ja lam la gtad pa ni/ stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// rnel dri mo yi thod pa la// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni bcu pa bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i gzugs bris
la// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// 'khor lo rtsibs la bya la'i sngags// gdug pa'i phur pas gzir byas la// dug rdzas gdug pa'i rdzas kyis dgang/ kha ni dar gyi gcad par bya// tshon gyi skud

pas rgya gram bcing// mchod dang bden bdar dpang rnams bya// rkang gcig shing ngam yal ga can// spyan na dmigs par 'gyur zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ja la ma la gtad
pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o//// klu rnams dag la gtad pa la// klu bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// thun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// phag pa rog po'i thod pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad par
'dri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la klu yi sngags// dbus su dmigs pa bris nas su// yan lag nying lag ldan par bya// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// gdug shing phur pas gzir la bya/ kha ni dar gyis gcad par
bya// tshon skud lnga yis rgya gram bcing// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis klu rnams mchod// de yis bsnyen cig bsgrub par bya// bden bdar dpang gzugs las bya ste// dmigs pas klu gtad las kyang bcol// klu yi

snying la gnan par bya// de yis dmigs pa gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu la gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o//// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// mi bu glud kyis slu ba la// mda' dang nam mkha' ji ltar lags// 'di la glud tshad ji
ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin sprul pa che// dregs pa'i rgyal po stong sde la// mi bu glud kyis slu ba
ni// mda' dang nam mkha' bslu ba dang// mda' dang nam mkha'i yon tan bstan pa ni// nam ni nang gi bcud yin te// mkha' ni phyi yi bcud yin te// nam ni rig pa'i ye shes te// mkha' ni gnyis med dag
pa'i don// nam ni skye ba med pa'i don// mkha' ni gnyis med dag pa'i don// nam ni skye ba med pa la// mkha' ni 'gag pa med pa'o// nam ni skye 'chi med pa'i sems// mkha' ni dmag phung yan lag
go/ nam ni rigs pa'i ye shes te// mkha' ni srid pa chags pa'i dpe// dag pa chen po'i glud bsngos pas// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal grol ba'o// nam mkha' 'di ni glud du bsngo// mda' ni sku yi tshad yin
te// mkhar ni bzhugs pa'i rten yin no// mda' ni dpag bsam shing bu ste// mkhar ni ri brag chen po ste// mda' ni sku tshad rten pa'i glud// mkhar ni rin chen mig mangs ris// srid pas bsdus dang 'byung
bas bskyed// 'di yang mi yi glud du bsngo// mda' ni bzhugs pa phyi yi mkhar// nam mkha' 'dren pa'i rin chen khang// 'di yang mi yi glud du bsngo// de yis 'chi ba zlog par byed// ces gsungs

so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mda' dang nam mkha'i glud du bsngo ba'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ klu btsan dmar po bcos pa 'di smras so// gsang ba

stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab gru bzhi la// nam mkhar dmar po ldem pa gzugs/ kha dog rigs sam dmar bar bya// bshos
bu dmar po zur gsum ldem pa la// mda' bkra mkhar thabs rgyan ldan gzugs// spyan gzigs dkor cha phud dang bcas// mi dmar rta dmar rgyan dang ldan// bse khyi bse ra bse lug bskor/ khrag gi nya dang
bse yi sbal// zangs la sogs pa'i bskor ba'o// bya dmar dag gis brgyan pa dang// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba bya// hUM/ klu btsan ni dmar po ba/ gdug pa chen ni ma rungs pa// btsan btsun ni klu yi
sde// gdug pa'i sras gcig po/ glang thabs nad dang gdug nad kyi bdag po lags/ bzhugs pa 'byung ba'i bar na bzhugs/ 'byung ba chu dang khrag gi bar shed na// rin chen bse mkhar po ldems se

ldems// g.yu'i kha bad sngon po khyil li li// rtsa na bse'i pha 'ong gur tsam gnas/ bse'i pha 'ong gur tsam la/ gdug pa'i mtsho chen brlabs se brlabs// gser nya khrag mig khyur ru ru// bse sbrul dmar po

khyur ru ru// bse sbal dmar po dir ri ri// bse bya ngur pa dir ri ri// g.yu gshog sngon po ldems se ldems// bse mkhar de yi nang shed na// klu btsan ni dmar po bzhugs/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ gnam gyi dro
de rgyal ba lags// ma ni gdug rum spyan gcig ma// de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa yis// klu btsan ni mched de gsum// tha chung klu btsan dmar po lags// klu btsan ni dmar po ste/ rta dmar po bya gdong

chibs/ gdug pa klu yi rgyan gyis spras/ klu btsan gyi sku lus ldems pa la/ dar mdam ri ral ka gsol/ sbrul gyis ni za ra tshags/ nya tshe ni za ra tshags/ mtha' ma bse sbal cha ga can/ sbrul dmar gyi sku reg
can/ g.yas na sbrul yang 'khyug g.yon na bse bya lding/ bar na glang bu ru dmar rol cig 'u yis 'debs/ chu glang 'bum yang khu yis 'debs/ phyag na bse mdung dmar po bsnams/ gdug pa'i dpal dang

ldan/ g.yas kyi sna ni brag btsan dmar pos 'dren// g.yon ni sna ni bse btsan rol pos 'dren// gdug pa'i klu 'khor stong dang bcas// the brang ma lus bang chen byed// sa srin dgu bcu bang chen byed// sril
ma klu tshogs nad yams gtong/ khyod ni klu tshogs gdug pa can// klu btsan chen po ma rungs pa// zha grum nad dang skrangs kyi bdag/ smyo dang 'bog dang lkugs kyi bdag/ sdig pa dang ni ltol
po bdag/ rdzings dang ni skrangs kyi bdag de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// zhe sdang gdug pa'i nad 'di khrol// klu btsan dmar po slar la btul/ khyod kyis nad rnams sos par mdzod// klu btsan chen po
khyod/ stong gsum rgyug pa'i tshe/ rta dmar glog ltar 'khyug btsan dmar 'od du 'bar/ spyug pa'i brda skad phyur ru ru// gdug pa'i dmag dpung si li li// de ring gdug chen mdos 'di bzhes// ces bsngo

ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu btsan dmar po bcos pa'i le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye
ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// stong gsum brgyug 'gro ja la ste// 'di rnams bcos pa ji ltar lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rungs rgyug 'gro

ja la bcos pa ni// gsang ba'i bdag po stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma'i ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa gzhung

bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen po brtsig/ dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'o// ri rab kha dog rigs dang bstun// nam mkha' sum brgya drug cu ste// ngar bu 'brang rgyas sum brgya drug cu de la gzugs// 'brang

rgyas sum brgya drug cu la// mo 'phangs sum rgya drug cu gzugs// bya dang gzugs brnyan sum brgya drug cus bskor// sha khrag rdzas dang mthun pa'i yas kyis bskor// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong

gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ja la ma'i yas bsags pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o//// hUM/ ja la chen po ma rungs pa/ gdug byed stong gsum phung khrol byed/ nad kyi bdag po rgyud 'gro ste// sum brgya drug cu
gdug pa'i 'khor// gdug tshogs ma rungs khams gsum gnas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// bya la chen mo gdug pa'o// stong gsum dbang sgyur gdug pa can// rgyug byed nag mo ma rungs ma// sha za

khrag 'thung ral pa sbrugs// bdud bong zhon nas rgyug byed ma/ khram bam g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon// srid pa yongs kyi nyul le ma// gdug pa nad kyi mnga' bdag mo// srid pa kun la dbang sgyur zhing// mi bu
ris su gcod par byed// dur khrod phyags mas 'debs par byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// ja la gsum brgya drug cu ste// brgya ni srid par nad yams gtong// brgya ni 'jigs te phung khrol
byed// brgya ni srog la rgol zhing 'jig rten dregs pa'i mngal gzhug las la byed/ nyi shu rtsa gcig b+ha ga'i bang chen byed// bcu ni gzu dang dpang po byed// bcu ni dmag gi dpung yang
byed// dgu ni 'jig rten thog ser 'bebs// bcu gcig so mtshams srun par byed// ja la chen po ma rungs ma// gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs ma rungs byed// la la mthing nag 'bar ba byed// mche gtsigs

rngam la bcu glu len// la la gtsod la chibs nas rgyug/ la la rnga mo ske rings chibs nas rgyug/ 'jig rten kun tu khrag mthong ma// ma bu rigs su gcod par byed// dud 'gro phyags mas 'debs par byed// de
ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// gdug pa'i nad gtod ja la ma// srin mo lus la stag gi so// pags rlon gyon zhing thod khrag 'thung/ mi nad mang po 'bebs par byed// ltas ngan bya rnams sna tshogs

gtong// gdug pa'i cha byad ma rungs ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes cig/ lnga ni nag po khrag mig ma// nad kyi rkyal pa re re khur// mtshon gyi gru gu sdog cing 'phen// srid pa yongs la dbang gnod ma// de
ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// bud med nag mo khrag mig ma// mi yi g.yang gzhi gos su bgos// lag na gri thogs gsod la dga'/ khyod ni skye 'gro sgrol byed ma// ja la kham rje ming nas phyung// gdug
pa'i bud med sngon mo dgu// g.yag lpags rlon pa gos su gyon// ral nag 'khyil cing khrag mig bzlog/ lag na dang the thad pa thogs// chibs su gsal mo dgu la chibs// dre'u dgu ni rol tu khrid// g.yas
na btsos po khral la la// g.yon na skyugs mo khral la la// gnam las thog dang ser ba 'bebs// mi la yams nad 'bebs par byed// gdug pa'i tshogs chen mdos bzhes cig/ bcu gnyis gdug byed nad

du gtong// sha rkyang rnga mo bong bu dang// mdzo rtol dre'u dang gtsod la chibs// zhing nad dal yams gtong bar byed// mthing nan ma ram chen mo ste// la la nad kyi rkyal pa 'bud// la la mtshon gyi gru gug
'khal// la la khrag bam ris su bris// la la shod sde'u bgrang zhing 'grems// la la byang bu bam la 'debs// la la bdud kyi bang chen 'grems// la la khri dang khrag tu sbyor// la la gdug pa'i sbyug gu

len// la la nad rnams chang ltar stor/ khyed ni gdug byed nad gtong ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// srid pa'i bdag mo bya la rgyug 'gro ma// dregs pa rnams kyis sna 'dren ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos
'di bzhes// ja la chen mo ma rungs ma// la la bya dmar 'dab bzangs bcibs// la la bong bu sna rings chibs// la la khyi dmar sna rings chibs nas rgyug/ la la ra skyes kham pa chibs nas rgyug byed
ma// la la sbra chen gdong dmar chibs/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// ja la bang chen nyi shu gcig/ skyes pa'i lus la dge bsnyen chas// rgyab na khreng khung re re khur// lag na mda' gzhu bdud

gri thogs// gsad dang gcad la rab tu brtson// 'jig rten kun gyi bang chen byed// 'jig pa'i dpon du byed// dmag ni dmag dpon byed// tshong gi tshong dpon byed// mda' sgra shar ra ra// mdung sgra sil li

li// gzhu sgra 'ur ru ru// gdug pa'i tshe brang tshogs// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// ja la nag po gdug pa can// la la mthing nag chas la bdud kyi bang chen byed// la la dkar mo'i chas la rgyal po'i

bang chen byed// gdug pa'i ja la ma rungs pa/ la la nag mo bdud gcod ma/ la la thab gzhob sna 'dren byed// la la 'dre lnga'i sna 'dren ma// la la mthing nag 'bum stong ma// la la srin mo sham sham ma// la
