la ngam grog phug la gnas// la la sgren mo phung 'khol ma// la la nyams ma khrag gi phor thogs ma// la la dur khrod gdug byed ma// la la byis pa phyung gi dur 'debs ma// la la srid can dam zan ma// la la

phur byed gdug khrol mo// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// gdug pa'i cha la sum brgya drug cu yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// ces rim pas bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ja la
ma bcos pa'i le'u ste nga bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams
la// bsgrub pa'i las rnams ji ltar lags// gsad pa'i las rnams gang lags pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dregs
pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// bsgrub dang gsad pa'i las bstan pa// dregs pa bdud chen bsgrub pa na// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// de ru dkyil 'khor
gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag la// mtha' mar gru gsum nang du rtse gtad gsum// de dbus dmigs pa gzhug par bya/ tshon sna lnga yis bya dang bcas/ gru gsum mtha' ma bdud kyi phur pas
bskor/ sha khrag 'tshogs pa'i gtor ma bsham/ 'dab chags gcan gzan snying 'phreng dang/ phud dang bcas pas bsgrubs pa ste/ spyan drangs mchod pa bstod bcol bya/ gsang sngags bzlas dang sgrub par byed/
gsal gsum ldan pas gdab par bya/ de ltar ma lus bdud bcu gsum bskul dang rang sngags gdab rang rang tshig dang bcas pas bskul la las bya'o// hUM/ bdud chen gdug pa bcu gsum mo// srid pa
gsum la dbang byed de// bdud gcod las brtson gyug stabs can/ khyed ni nga rgyal drag shul can// drag po las la bskul gyis gshegs su gsol// gdug byed gtum po khyod ni ma rungs drag
shul can// rngam chen 'bar ba gdug pa can// gdug byed ma rungs sprul pa'i bdag/ sprul pa gsod byed drag shul can// ya bdud bcu gsum khyed la bstod// ri ti 'gong yag bdud rum rje// nag po bkrag

med ldam chen gtso// skos rjes brang mkhar srid pa'i bdag/ srid pa'i bdud rje mang khug dang slon po che/ ma le ge shags nang 'grol 'gren// snye ldeng ngag btsan ngag rnams 'joms// srin bu mchu dmar snying
'byin po// thom po sgrol byed gtum po 'joms// thom chung dgu ni gsod la dga'// rtag gu mched bzhi lnga phung 'brel// bdud chen yor ba dpag chen bu// ral pa chen po ga go sreg/ gdug pa'i bdud po

las la yang// dmigs pa sgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bskul zhing las bya'o// mtha' ma la gnan pa'i las dang sbyar/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o//// de
nas btsan rnams bsgrub par bya ba ste/ gsang ba'i stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gdug pa'i gnas ku 'dug nas ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ldan pa la// dbus su gru gsum dmar nag zla gam sgo dang
bcas// gru gsum nang du dmigs pa'o// drag po'i rdzas dang bcas pa'o// mtha' ma btsan gyi phur pas bskor// ra dmar rta dang bcas pa'o// se phor phud dang bcas/ dmar gsum dang bcas snying gi
rdzas// dmar po dar gyi yol ba bya// spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa bya// gsal gsum ldan pas gdab par bya// btsan la gtad dang bsgral bar bya// tha ma gnan zor thun pas bya// de yis las rnams
'grub par byed// hUM/ btsan chen nga rgyal ma rungs pa// nga rgyal btsan 'khor gdug pa'i tshogs/ khyod ni rje rigs gdug pa can// srid pa yongs la dbang byed tshogs// drag po las la gshegs su
gsol// hUM/ btsan chen spyi btsan dmar po ste/ kha bzhi pa la gzugs khams sgrol// gzer nad 'theb tshugs bdag po byed// dmigs pa bsgral ba'i dus la bab// lnga spung tshoms cig spyi btsan rje// lnga
dpung shig cig 'byung lnga btsan// dmigs pa'i khug cig rol pa'i tshogs// dbugs phrogs btsan chen 'phrul po che// rus pa choms cig brag btsan 'bar// gdug pa'i btsan khyed kyi dus la bab// dmag

dpung bskyed cig sil ma stong gi tshogs// gdug pa'i btsan gyi dus la bab// ces bskul ba dang/ btsan gyi sngags kyis dmigs bsgral lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan bsgrub pa'i le'u
ste nga drug pa'o//// de nas rgyal po sgrub par byed pa na/ stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// de ru dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// gru gsum bzhi ni dkrigs pa
las// ling ga re dang rdzas re'o// rgyal po phur pa re re'o// sha khrag rdzas dang bcas pas mchod/ bshos bu phung dang bcas pas mchod// dar dkar gyi ni yol ba byas// gdab dang dbab dang las rnams

ni// sngags dang tshig gi rim pas bya// dmigs pa bstab dang bsgral ba'o// bya dkar la bdogs rta ru bya// snying sna rten rdzas de bzhin bsags// mthar ni gnan pa'i las dang sbyar// hUM/ rgyal po chen po srog

gi gshed// srog bdag rgyal po chen po mched de bzhi// bzhugs ni bar snang khams na bzhugs// rgyu ni 'dzam bu gling du rgyu// drag po'i las la spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// hUM/ srid pa'i rgyal po gdug pa

can// srog bdag chen po mched de bzhi/ khyed ni ye shes rtsal chen te// gdug pa sgrol la rab tu brtson// a co dkar pos dmigs pa'i lnga phung phrol// dkar po spyan gcig don snying phyung// yam shud dmar

pos nang khrol brobs/ khu le lag gus rtsa rgyus brobs// rgyud bzhi mchod la sgrol la thong// srid pa'i rgyal po srog la rngam// ging chen 'bar ba las la brtson/ khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab// ces bskul zhing

las la bcol lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// rgyal po bsgrubs pa'ile'u ste nga bdun pa'o//// de nas ma bdud bcu gsum bsgrub na/ stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su
'dug nas ni// dkyil 'khor gru gsum zla gam sgo dang bcas// dbus su dmigs bzhugs pa ste/ sngon dmar thag pas brungs dang bcas// de ltar bdud mo'i phur pas mtha' ma bskor// sha khrag gtor ma

tshogs par bshams// snying sna khrag sna tshogs tshad bsog/ bya mtshal snying dang ra rog snying// skyes pa dar ma'i snying dang gsum// ming gi med du mi rung ngo// mthing nag dar gyi yol ba bya// gsal gsum ldan
pa'i bdud phur bcu gsum bskor// gdab cing bsgral ba'i bstan pa'o// de yis las rnams 'grub par byed// spyan drangs mchod bstod las bcol bya/ hUM/ yul de bdud yul ma gi na/ khri lo rungs chen ma gi
na// de na bdud mo stong tshogs gnas/ khrag gi gru char si li li// bya nag gdug pa phang ma phung// thod dus gdug pa'i mkhar cig ldems se ldems// de na bdud mo bcu gsum gnas// bdud kyi dmag
tshogs sha khrag tshogs// bdud mo ma tshogs dmar la shog/ bdud mo dmag gi rgyal mo ste// rgyal mo khyed la rten cig 'dzugs// mdung rings gsom pa la/ dam dpangs rings lcag gis 'thud la ba dan
gnag gis btags/ srin po srin mo'i skra lags mod/ khyod g.yabs la ma gzhag cig g.yas g.yon so li ga srin mo'i rkang lags mod/ 'drad la ma gzhag cig mdung rtse dpal dang ldan/
srin mo'i tshems lags mod/ gcod pa la ma gzhag cig dar sna mang po btags/ srin mo'i lce lags mod/ sngags ma gzhag cig bya nag rten du gzugs/ sha khrag rdzas kyis mchod/ ma bdud bcu gsum

gyis/ dmigs pa sgral ba'i dus la bab/ lnga dpung yan lag chings la thong/ tsit+ta dmar po phyung la thong/ nang khrod dmar po brobs la thong/ zhes bskul la las bya'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/
bdud mo bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po de dag la// bsgral ba'i las
rnams de bzhin la// zor dang thun gyi las rnams bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi tshogs// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// zor

dang thun gyi las byas la// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// bdud kyi thun chen 'phang bar bya// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru/ khrag sna tshogs dang dug sna tshogs// nyung nag til dang bcas pa
dang// myos pa'i chang gis bsings byas la// dmigs pa'i rten yang de yin te// de gas pa'i thun gyis brab/ nag po dar gyis kha gcad la// bdud thun nag po brdeg par bya// gang la brgyab pa 'chor mi

srid// bdud chen sngags ni rim par bzlas// oM nag po ba hur thun rgyob// sha ram ta thun ya/ ya sha khra laM thun ya/ sa ma ka laM thun ya/ tsit+ta la rbad/ thun yang de ltar bzlas la brdeg pa'o// hUM/ zhe sdang
gdug pa'i bdud pho bcu gnyis kyang// gdug ri 'khang ri rtse nas bzhengs// ya bdud chen po bcu gsum yang// mthing nag 'bar ba'i gdug pa can// mche gtsigs ral nag gyen du 'khyil// g.yas na thun

b+h+yo shar ra ra// g.yon na thun 'phen sil li li// bdud thul dmigs pa de la rgyob// bdud kyi thun 'di gdug chen ste// gang la brgyab pa rdul du thong// zhes bskul zhing 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud

chen po las/ bdud kyi thun gyi le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//// de nas btsan gyi thun brdeg pa ni/ stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dur khrod wa yi thod pa ru// thun gyi rim pa bsag pa ste// rta dang ra dang khyi

khrag gsum// nyung kar myos pa'i chang bsings la// dmar po dar gyis kha gcad la// de la thun ni bsgrub par bya// bskul dang sngags brdeg de las bsgrub// thun khol thod pa 'phar ba byung ba'am// 'od dang

du ba byung ba na// thun ni rim par brdeg pa'o// de yi thun sngags drag po ste// tsa tsa kha lam sha ma dung ling thun ya/ phra nas nang sha lang thun/ ro to bu la sha ra thun la/ rgyud brengs ma ya 'ur

chub thub yang/ de ltar thun sngags la brdeg pa'o// hUM/ btsan chen gdug pa'i dus la bab/ nga rgyal chen po btsan gyi bu// gdug pa'i thun cer 'phen pa'i tshe// btsan dmag stong sde shar ra ra// gdug pa'i
brda skad dir ri ri// spyugs pa'i brda skad phyur ru ru/ khrag zor dmar po tal la la// btsan thun dmar po dmigs pa de la rgyob// ga dug khrag thun 'phang ba'i khrag/ lnga dpung yan lag 'bral bar
byed// srog rtsa dmar po skam par byed dam// gdug pa'i thun gyis brgyab pa'i tshe// srid pa kun yang dmyal thag gcod// btsan thun brdeg pa'i dus la bab/ khrag zer 'bab pa'i dus la bab// spyugs pa'i

brda chen de la phob// ltas ngan bya rnams de la phob// ces bskul zhing brdeg pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan gyi thun gyi le'u ste drug cu pa'o//// de nas ma bdud 'phangs pa

ni// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gri la shi ba'i thod pa'am// skyes pa grir shi ba'i thod pa ru// nyung nag ske tshe til dang bra'o// mi rta khyi dang ra yi khrag/ gzhan yang

gcan gzan khrag la sogs pa sbyar/ dug chang sbyar bas bsings pa la// mthing nag dar gyis kha gcad la// thod pa de la bsgrub pa bya// de la gsang ba'i sngags kyis brdeg/ oM rag ma sha ba trag li thun ya/
sa ma ya ga ru thibs ling ga gi thun ya/ sa ma ya ling shad de thun ya/ de yis brdeg cing bsgrub pa ste// gsang ba'i gnas su brdeg pa'o// hUM/ bdud mo chen mo gsod byed ma// sha khrag dri la rab tu
dgyes// srid gsum yongs su rgyug cing snying khrag 'thung// sdig pa'i gad mo rgod cing gsod pa'i las rnams byed// mi bu rigs su gcod cing dud 'gro phyags mas 'debs// gdug pa'i bdud mo stong tshogs
kun// bdud mo mi zad bra gra 'cha'// bdud mo mi bzad spyug glu len// bdud mo'i nad yams 'bebs par bya// srid pa'i thun 'bebs dmigs pa'i sgo la rgyob// bdud mo thun spyo rngam pa'i tshogs// thun

khrag spyo zhing spyug glu len// brda chen yob cing las rnams byed// dmigs pa sgrol zhing las la drag/ las byed gdum mo ma rungs ma// bdud mo thun 'phen shar ra ra// srid pa'i sha za lings se lings// de

ring drag po'i thun 'di phab// dmigs pa lnga phung yan lag phrol// gdug pa'i thun cig rgyob la thong// zhes bskul zhing las bcol ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo thun gyi le'u ste re
gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bdud rnams kyis las 'di smras so// bdud kyi mda' zor 'phang ba na// mthun pa'i gnas su khrag gi gtor ma dang// phud dang bshos bur bcas pa mchod cing/
mda' gzhu la bdud kyi yi ge bkod la/ de bsgrubs te 'phang bar bya'o// hUM/ srid pa kun gyi bdag chen po// bdud chen ma rungs drag shul can// yul dang bdud yul ya gi na// nag po sgo dgu ya gi na// zhe

sdang gdug pa'i mtsho chen mer re re// gdug pa'i gcan gzan sgra skad dir ri ri// sprul pa'i bya skad dir ri ri// gdug pa'i bya mkhar sngon po ldems se ldems// rtse la g.yu yi na bun thul lu lu// bse yi sgo
mo thabs se thabs// de na bdud chen mes po bzhugs// nang gi thod rus mkhar du bya// mi thod 'bar ba'i rtsig pas brtsigs// 'khor yang pho bdud stong gis bskor// bdud po 'khor bcas de na
bzhugs// bdud las che ba'i mthu che med// skye 'gro sems can srog dbugs len// mi bdud gyen la gcod/ bdud 'gros bdud shi rtsi dar gcod/ bdud gcod 'khor bcas la/ drag po zor gyi las la
shog lcags kyi gzhu mo la/ zangs kyi mchog ma can/ bse yi shul gcig tang/ lcag bu nan gyis mnan/ bdud pa'i rgyud kyis sbrengs/ lcags mda' sngon po la/ ltas ngan sgro bzhis sgron/ zangs kyis bcas
kyis mnan/ gdug shing mde'u gcig gsal/ mda' dang gzhu ru bsdebs/ stag mo ha ra shubs stsal/ ra ltag gis hor shubs 'thab pa bsal/ ska nag skan ma nan ma chung// 'phrul gyi me long spyan ma
brtul// gzhu bkang rgyud du ma bcad cig/ mda' 'phang slar la ma ldog cig/ bdud kyi mda' zor dug chen ni// dmigs pa'i skra la brgyab pa'i tshe// dmigs pa'i lnga dpung yan lag phrol// dmigs pa'i sgyu

ma'i phung po gtan nas su phrol/ ces bskul zhing 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi mda' zor gyi le'u ste re gnyis pa'o//// de nas btsan gyi mda' zor gyi las bya'o// gsang ba'i

stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa de// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// sgrub pa chen po gzhung bzhin bya// sha khrag rdzas dang mthun pa'i yas kyis mchod// mda' gzhu mdzes pa dag la ni// btsan gyi mda' zor

sngags sdub 'phang// oM tsa tsa kha la tsu ru sha ru yam rbad thun ya b+h+yo/ sa ma ya trag shad he ya b+h+yo/ de ltar 'das dang bsgrub byas la// de nas dmigs pa de la 'phang ba'o// hUM/ srid pa'i btsan chen stong gi
tshogs// yul de btsan yul ya gi na// gro ru mu rung btsan gyi bu// gdug pa btsan chen rdab pa che// gsad dang gcad dang las la brtson// gsad pa'i las la rbad pa'i tshe// btsan yul stong gsum gru chen
med// bse mkhar dmar po ldems se ldems// bse mkhar dmar po ldem pa la// g.yu yi bad btags khyil li li// de na gdug pa'i btsan gyi tshogs chen gnas// gdug pa btsan gyi stong sde
tshogs/ khrag zor nad gzer kun gyi bdag/ gdug pa'i mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab// spyi btsan chen po ba dan phyor la dmag dpung bsdus// bsa'i gzhu mo drungs cig skyed/ 'byung ba lnga'i btsan chen
gyis/ mtsho mo dgrugs/ skyes bu lung pa tsan dmag dpung 'phal la chud/ bse btsan dol pos gdug pa'i dug mda' rgyob// sil ma stong gis dmag dpung skyed// rol po skya tshogs skya mda' khongs// mda'
zor dmar po 'phang ba'i dus la bab// bse'i gzhu mo la/ bse'i shul cig btang/ zangs kyi nan mas mnan/ lcags kyi mchog ma can/ 'brog bu ngar ma'i rgyud kyis sbrengs/ stag mo'i hor shubs gsol/
'phrul gyi me long spyan ma brtul/ ska nan ka chung btags/ bse mda' dmar po la/ mda' cig ka na har pa na/ badzra kha na b+h+yo/ 'da' cig kha na 'ug pa'am/ badzra mu kha b+h+yo/ mda' cig

kha na gtad pa'am/ kha kha kha mud kha b+h+yo/ zla cig kha na pho rog ma/ gsal ldan ha ti b+h+yo/ stag gi hor shugs theb ma zhan/ 'phul gyi me long spyan ma brtul/ ka nan ka chung nan ma chung/ btsan gyi gzhu sgra 'ur ru ru/ gdug pa'i mda'
ljags/ gdug pa'i btsan chen ma rungs pa/ khengs par kheng la phog par rgyob/ ces bskul la 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan gyi mda' zor 'phang ba'i le'u ste re gsum
pa'o//// de nas rgyal po'i mda' zor 'phang ba ni/ gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gnas dang bsgrub pa de bzhin bya// de la maN+Dal gzhung ltar bsag/ rgyal po sngags ni rim par dgod// oM tsag na

rbad na thums pa sha laM sa ma ya b+h+yo/ sri sha mkha' la 'ur ya b+h+yo/ de ltar bzlas pas bsgrub pa'o// hUM/ srid pa'i rgyal po chen po ni/ bzhugs ni bar snang khams na bzhugs// nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdugs la
mkhar// srid pa'i rgyal po chen po ste// sku ni nam mkha'i mi bo che// brjid ldan srid pa srog gi bdag/ srog bdag srid pa ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed cing// sku la gcan gzan thul pa

gsol// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// chibs su nyi zer zla zer chibs// skyang trang khu trang mi par sad/ srid pa kun la dbang byed pa// de ring mda' zor gdug pa 'phang ba'i dus la bab/ dung gi
gzhu mo la/ bse'i mchog ma can/ lcags kyi nan dang bcas/ gdug pa 'brong bu'i rgyud kyis sbrengs// mda' ni ltas ngan bya ba'i sgo bzhi bskyon// mde'u gdug pa'i me dbal can// nyams pa'i yul du mda'
zor ya// lnga dpung bsreg pa'i dus la bab// ces 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po mda' zor gyi le'u ste re bzhi pa'o//// de nas bdud mo'i mda' zor 'phang
ba/ gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des/ mthun pa'i gnas su gzhung bzhin du/ sha khrag rdzas dang bcas pas bsgrub// mchod dang bstod dang las bcol bya// gsang ba'i sngags rnams bzlas la

bsgrub// oM rag sha mthun zor la rag sha kha la hang sha bzod ya/ yu ra yam rag sha kha la b+h+yo/ zhes mda' dang gzhu la yang bri/ mda' dang gzhu la bsgrub pa bya/ khrag nyungs 'bar bas yang ni brdeg/ la las
bdud la 'phang ba'i zor lam bstan// gang la brgyab pa rdul du rlogs// ces 'phang ngo// yul de bdud yul ma gi na/ khri la gru chen ma gi na// bdud mo khri bzhir nag mo bzhugs// bdud mo bcu gsum
gdug pa bzhugs// bdud mo gdug pa ma rungs pa// la la nad yams mang po gtong// la la khrag nad rims nad gtong// la la nad lnga mda' dang bcas// la la gdug pa'i thun chen 'then// thun chen
'phang ba'i dus la bab// mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab// bdud mo thun 'phen shar ra ra// gdug pa'i gzhu sgra 'ur ru ru// gdug pa'i mda' sgra ljags se ljags// bdud mo mda' 'phen dpa' la
rngam// mthing nag ral pa sigs se sigs// spyugs pa'i glu len kyur ru ru// gdug pa'i sgra chen sgrogs pa mo// bse'i lcags kyi gzhu mo la// lcags kyi bshul ma lo// zangs kyi nan mas mnan/ bse'i

mchog ma can/ gdug pa 'brong gi rgyud mos sbyongs/ gdug shing smyug ma la/ ltas ngan sna tshogs sgron/ gdug shing skyer pa'i mde'u gsal// bdud mo chen mo mda' zor 'phongs// ska nan ska ma chung/ stag mo

hor shubs mtheb ma zhan// 'phrul gyi me long spyan ma brtul// gdug pa'i mda' mo shugs ma chung// gdug shing skyer pa dpal ma zhan// ces bskul la 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/

bdud mo thun zor gyi le'u ste re lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams kyis rang rang rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa/ ming ni ki rkang drag po zhes bya/ drags pa dang gang 'drad de yang

brlag srod la bdud ni rgyu ba ste// srod gung the brang rgyu ba'o// tho rangs dang po rgyal po rgyu ba'o// gung chung bdud mo rgyu ba'o// srod par dag la btsan rgyu ba'o// tho rangs tha chungs ja ma la'o// yal yol gnod

sbyin rgyu ba ste// rtse shar sman rnams rgyu ba'o// zer las bdag rgyu ba'o// dros la klu rnams rgyu ba ste/ nyin gung la ni stong sde kun rgyu ba'o// phyi dro'i dus na dmu rnams rgyu// zhes gsungs so// lha dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'i le'u ste re drug pa'o//// de nas yang ston pa'i spyan sngar dregs pa'i rnams kyis rang rang gis phrad pa'i dus smras pa/ bdud dang phrad na tshe

phung/ btsan dang phrad na gzer nad kyis 'chi/ rgyal po dang phrad na smyo 'bog gis 'chi/ ma bdud dang phrad na yams kyis 'chi/ the brang dang phrad na hUr thoms 'ong/ ja la ma dang phrad na btab bsnol 'ong/ sde

brgya dang phrad na 'bros pa'o// gnod sbyin dang phrad na khrag skyug sa bdag dang phrad na mdze 'ong/ sman dang phrad na hur thums 'ong/ dmu dang phrad na 'thums nas 'chi/ dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes gcig dang/ dgu

dang/ bco brgyad dang/ nyi shu dgu la rgyu/ dgun zla tha chungs kyi tshes bcu gcig la rgyu/ ston zla tha chung gi nya la rgyu/ dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes dgu la rgyu/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las ki kang rgyu'i dus dang
phrad pa las/ rtags rnams bstan pa'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ skyes bu lung btsan gyis rang gis bcos pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// gsang ba stobs kyi ting
'dzin ldan pa des// gtsang ma dar gyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna dag gi phye ma la// bshos bu ldem spyan gzigs bcas// mda' dang nam mkha' bcas pa ste// phud dang rin chen bcas pas mchos// 'bru sna la

ni gzugs brnyan te// rta dang bya dang khyi dang gsum// dmar po dar gyis brgyan pa bskor// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ skyes bu lung btsan gyi rdzas bsags pa'i
le'u ste re brgyad pa'o//// hUM/ brag dmar ral gsum na/ bse mkhar dmar po ldems se ldems/ g.yul bad khyil li li/ bse sgo rin chen g.yu'i ri bzhi can/ de'i nang shed na/ skyes bu lung btsan

bzhugs/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ btsan rje khri rum rje/ skyes bu'i ma smos pa/ rgyal mo sgegs kyi rje/ de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa las/ skyes bu lung btsan dang/ sring mo srig gi bdag mo byed/ skyes bu lung btsan
dang/ btsan chen mi dmar rta dmar byung/ btsan dmar ldem pa la/ ral pa dmar po 'da' rdzam shar ra ra// chibs su bse rta dmar po chibs// dbu la bse'i rmog zhu gsol// sku la dar dmar ral pa
gsol// gser sga ser po chibs/ chibs ni bse rta la/ dung gi sga yis bstad/ gser gyi rgyan gyis spras/ mchong gi gan dang bcas/ dar stan dmar po gtad/ srid pa'i btsan chen bcibs/ rgyan ni bse'i
mdung dmar btsugs/ phyag na bse mda' bse gzhu bsnams/ kha nas khrag dmar mda' yang 'phen/ snyan nas rlung du 'tshub/ btsan shad dmar po thor/ gdug pa'i gzer nad gtong/ g.yas na brag btsan
stong/ g.yon nas btsan stong/ sku stan brag btsan brgya/ dbu la gnam btsan stong/ zhabs las btsan stong/ thugs ka gsang btsan stong// smin ma g.yag btsan stong// btsan dmag stong sde
'gyed// srid pa kun yang sgrol la brtson// skyes bu chen po bskyod tsam na// btsan chen sil bam stong gi tshogs// spyugs pa dir ri ri/ 'od mda' dmar po tshub dmar 'tshub// mdzes pa'i rta 'dra shar ra

ra// gdug pa'i btsan chen 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu chen po khyod/ srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ gdug pa'i nad 'di khrol/ ces rim pas bsngo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ skyes bu bcos pa'i
le'u ste re dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brag btsan chen po rnams kyi rang rang gis bcos pa'i las 'di gsungs so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas

su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma dar gyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyi brlab pa byas nas su// de la rin chen skyogs dag tu// bshos bu ldem pa dag ni// mda' dang nam mkhas khyab par

brgyan par bya// de ra dmar dang bya mtshal dang/ khyi dmar dang ni phu dang bcas// spyan gzigs phud dang bcas pa/ wa dang 'ug pa bla rgod dang// de ltar rim par bya ba'o// btsan rnams 'du ba'i gnas su

bsngo ba'o// dar ni dmar pos yol ba byas so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ brag btsan gyi las bsags pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o//// hUM/ gdug pa chen po btsan gyi bu// btsan gdug pa ma
rungs pa// gdug pa kun la dbang bsgyur zhing// srid pa kun gyi bdag po byed// brag btsan chen po gdug pa can// gdug cing rtsub la ma rungs pa// srin mas btsan chen gsad la dga'// brag btsan chen
po gdug pa can// 'byung ba brag gi them la zhog/ brag dmar 'bar ba'i logs bzangs la// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// de la g.yu'i ri bzhi can// bse sgo ni dmar po gsal// de'i nang shed

na// brag btsan dmar po bzhugs/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ brag rum rgyal rje sras/ brag btsan ma smos pa/ srid pa'i rgyal mo sgegs chen ma// de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa las// brag btsan ming sring gnyis su
byung// ming po brag btsan dmar po ste// sku mdog dmar po la// ral pa gyen du 'khyil// sku la dar ber dmar po gsol// phyag na bse mdung dmar po bsnams// le brgan dbu thod can// bse'i mda'
gzhu bsnams// tsha tsha ni dmar po 'gro// bse phub rin chen gzugs// ma'i gdan la bzhugs// chibs su dmar po bya gdong chibs// gdug pa'i btsan chen po// rin chen sna lnga rgyan dang bcas// gdug
mdzes rgyan dang ldan pa ste// sprul pa btsan chen mang po 'gyed// brag bya 'ug pa kha ru thogs// srod la srid bya'i bu mo gtong// gung la brag sha gla ba chibs cing rgyug/ tho rangs brag gi wa mo

chibs cing rgyug/ 'od dang ni sprul pa 'gyed// sdang bya khra bo ltas ngan 'bebs// btsan chen ni gdug pa ste// brag bya dmar po lings se lings// bse'i zangs kyi dmar po bskangs se bskangs// brag ru'i gyi
bar na gnas// gdug pa'i btsan chen po// btsan las ni brag pa med// brag po khrag zer dmar po 'phen par byed// g.yas na mdung dmar ldem pa ste/ g.yon na mtshon sna lnga yi/ zhags pa yi 'debs/
gzer nad gdug pa gtong bar byed// gang phrad pa zhags pas 'debs/ khyod ni khrag btsan gdug pa can// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// rang gi gdug pa'i nad 'di khrol// sring mo khrag gi bud med
las// bse'i thul pa gsol/ gdug pa'i gad mos 'debs/ gsod cing gsad la dga'/ khrag nad du 'bebs/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// btsan gyi rkyal pa kha gzhan du bsgyur/ lha 'dre stong gi dra
ba'i rgyud chen po las/ brag btsan bcos pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ sems btsan rol pos rang gis bcos pa'i las 'di smras so// stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan
pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma dar gyi gzhi stengs su// bse phor dmar po'i dmar po'i nang du ni// bshos bu ldem pa khru gang la// gcan gzan 'dab chags tshang bas bskor// spyan

gcig bskor chas brgyan pa'o// rta pa dmar gyi khra smug dag la ni// btsan gyi khram dang btson drug bskur// de ltar phud dang rin chen bcas// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ se btsan gyi yas bsag pa'i le'u ste don gnyis pa'o//// hUM/ se btsan gyi gdug pa can/ se btsan gyi sprul pa'i tsho// ri sul ni drungs rtse nas/ mchod mkhar smug po ldems se ldems/ de'i nang

shed na/ bse'i sgo thabs se thabs/ de na btsan rol po skya bdun bzhugs/ bse btsan ni rol dang rje/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ tum tum rgyal drug rje/ se btsan ma smos pa/ sa bra ni lcam gcig ma/ bu ni bse

btsan rol pos bya/ se btsan bu ni se btsan rol po rje/ bse'i lha chen te/ srid pa'i gzhi 'dzin byed/ btsan smug rta ru smug mchong rta ni smug po la/ bse'i sga yis gtad/ rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis spras/
gdug pa'i btsan chen de/ dar ber smug po gsol/ srid pa yongs la dbang bskur byed/ mchong gi mdungs rings 'debs/ yongs la 'bebs par byed/ ba dan sprin ltar khrug gdug pa'i se btsan rol pos/
se btsan ma rungs gdug pa can/ gnas ni bse ri dgon la gnas/ gdug pa'i bya rnams mang po 'gyed/ ma rungs gdug pas 'gro/ srid pa yongs su rgyug se btsan stong dang bcas/ la la

mdung dmar 'debs/ me'i ba dan dmar po khug la la sprul pa stong pa dang/ btsan gyi shod rde'u 'grem par byed/ la la bse'i mda' gzhug las rnams bsgrub pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/
dregs pa hom gyi le'u ste don drug pa'o//// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams
la// ltas ngan bya rnams gtang ba gang gis bgyi// las rnams byed du ma 'dod na// gzir shing shis bstan pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams kyis// ltas ngan bya rnams btang ba na// stobs dang ldan pa'i lha sgom pas// gtsang ma'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// dregs pa

rnams ni mchod byas la// de la gtsang ma'i gzhi stengs su// 'bru 'jam dag ni sbrus pa la// 'ug pa khra dang spyang khu dang/ go bo ba dang gong sreg gi gzugs ni legs par byas nas su// tshon gyis khadog legs

par bsgyur// de dag rim pas dgod pa'o// mchod dang bstod pa byas nas su// de nas sngags bzlas bya rnams bskyed/ oM to ya ti kha la trang trang yeng yeng skod brug yeng rbad ha du ya/ ya tra sa me ma tra ya/ kha

la ni sha ba ru ya/ hUM/ lu ka he drung bya/ de ltar bzlas pas bya rnams lhab lhab 'ong ngo// de nas bya rnams la tsha lam bstan pa/ ru ti ya yan shul gang gis rin/ shar ya b+h+yo khu le dza du khu dza he phaT b+h+yo/ de ltar
bzlas la gang 'bebs phyogs su bstan// de yis ltas ngan bya rnams 'bab// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pas ltas ngan bya dbab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o//// dregs pa'i
rgyal po 'di rnams kyis/ shi sa'i las rnams bstan pa ste// bsad pa stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dkyil 'khor chen po'i lho nub tu// gru gsum mthing nag dmar nag sum rim bya// dbus su dregs
pa'i gzugs bris la// de la snying po ldan pa'o// zur gsum ldan pa rtse gsum dag la ni// 'jam dpal gsang bdag rta mgrin gsum par bskod la bsgrub pa'o/ khro bo gsum gyis gzir zhing 'di 'das/ dza

dza pa sha ya sha dza du yam/ ra rtse ka lam sha sha ya dza/ re ga po to ni dza dza/ dza dza ma ma tsa la dza/ tri tha ra ba pa ni dza dza/ e ti ka dza/ se me da ya dza dza/ nA ga he re du ni dza/ sa ma ti/ de ltar 'das la gzir
ba'o// ltas ngan gso ba'i las bya'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa'i shi sa bstan pa'i le'u ste don brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bsngo ba'i las 'di bya'o// de ring srid

pa'i mdos cig bsngo/ dregs pa ni stong mchod phyir/ ri rab ni chen po la/ dpag bsam gyi shing phu dang/ gnam la ni phur dgu dang/ sa la 'dzul dgu dang/ bar na ni 'grim dgu dang/ sha khrag ni sna tshogs

dang/ 'jig rten ni dge nor dang/ rin chen ni sna lnga dang/ mthun pa'i ni yas kyis mchod/ 'byung lnga ni rten pa'i tshul/ ri rab ni srid pa'i rten/ srid pa ni rims chags dang/ skye 'gro ni gzugs kyis bskor/

rin chen sna lnga'i bcud/ mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ 'di yang srid pa'i mdos su bsngo/ bshos mchog ni ldem pa 'di/ che ba ni ri rab tshad/ gru bzhi ni mdzes pa'i gzugs/ kha dog ni rin chen no// mda' bkra
ni sku'i rten/ 'di ni mkhar yin phyi nang gsum// nang ni gsang chen 'od kyi mkhar// phyi ni rin chen 'bar ba'i mkhar// 'di yang sku'i rten du sngo// nam mkha' 'di ni yul yin te// nang gi yid bzhin

gsal ba'i// phyi ni rin chen sna lnga'i yul// nam ni nang gi bcud yin te// mkha' ni phyi'i yul yin te// nam ni rig pa'i ye shes te// mkha' ni gnyis med dag pa'i don// nam ni skye shi med pa'i don// mkha'

ni gsal ba med pa'o// 'di yang dag pa'i klong du bsngo// dar glud sku'i tshad du bsngo// byad na rten gyi mkhar glud du bsngo// 'brang rgyas rten pa'i tshul bzhin no// zang zing longs spyod glud du bsngo// gzugs

brnyan sku'i glud du bsngo// sgra snyan gsung gi glud du bsngo// snang gsal thugs kyi glud du bsngo// 'bru sna lnga gos su bsngo/ zhe sdang gdug pa khrol la bde ba'i gnas su gshegs/ ces bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra

ba'i rgyud chen po las/ glud bsngo ba'i le'u ste don brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dge bsnyen nyi shu rtsa gcig gis rang rang gi ser ba'i las 'di smras so// dge bsnyen brag ser
'bebs 'dod na// stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gro ga shog bu dag la ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni nyi shu gcig/ yang na 'khor lo bcu pa bri/ de la dge bsnyen ser sngags dgod// 'khor lo shug gu dril

byas la// skyes pa dar ma'i snying bshags pa'i nang du gzhug bshags pa dar gyi skud pas btsems/ dar sna lnga yang gdags par bya// de yi wa yi thod par gzhag/ thod pa de la bsgrub pa bya// ngan sngags thim

bur bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i sngags smras pa/ kyi da ra ga sa ma ya sha ra sha ra shal ta ya/ tri rag sha ra ma phob ya/ sa ma ya du li pa'i pi shar shar ling ling 'ur kha ma b+h+yo/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i
sngags// sa ma ya 'ur 'ur thog ling shar khrom kha ling shi la phob ya/ de ni dbab pa'i sngags su shes// badzra tra gung la ril ril 'ur shar b+h+yo/ de ni gzir zhing spur ba'o// ngan sngags thim bur

bsgrub pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dge bsnyen nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste don dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud kyi bcan po nag po
ral pa can dang/ btsan gyi bcan po skyes bu dmar po dang/ rgyal ba'i gcan po gnam lha dkar po dang/ the brang gi gcan po rnam pa 'od chen dang bzhis/ rang rang gi bsgrub pa'i las 'di rnams smras
so// bdag cag rnams ni bsgrub pa ni/ gsang ba'i stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des/ mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug na ni/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum brtsegs mar bya/ de'i dbus su dmigs pa gzhag pa ste/ gtso

dang bzhi'i phur pas bskor ba'o// sha khrag 'thun pa'i gtor ma dang// bshos dang zhal zas mthun pas mchod// cig gis spyan drangs sngags kyis mchod// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa de bzhin te// brdab dang rtan

dang gsad pa'i las bya'o// de yi las rnams grub par bya'o//// de nas gsang ba'i sngags smras pas// yag sha kha ling rbad ya dza/ tsa sho lam pa sha sha ni rbad/ dza dza ra tsa ka la ma shag 'ur b+h+yo ya/ tri ging ka

ra sha sha tra ga 'ur b+h+yo/ de ni bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i sngags su shes/ tra ya tra ya sha la rbad ya/ tsa ga la dam li li tsa sha rbad ya/ ka lir tsa pa sha ga ging ka ra rbad ya/ tri ling shaM ka ra rbad thuM ya/ de nas brdegs
dang brdab dang bstab/ de yis dmigs pa brlag par byed// de nas bskul ba'i las bstan pa// hUM/ srog bdag dbang mdzad gcan cen bzhi// gdug pa'i mkhar chen bzhi las bzhengs// ma yel gcan
bzhi dam la shog/ bdud kyi spyan pu ma rungs pa// mthing nag ral pas g.yogs pa ste// mche ba zor ba bkug pa 'dra// lag na thod pa khrag dang gri// bdud ber nag po gsol// las su bcad dang gsad la
dga'// zas su sha dang khrag la dgyes// gdug byed gral phyir dam las bzhengs// btsan gyi gcan po skyes bu rje// dmar nag ral bsig mche ba gtsigs// zhags pa tshon dang bcas pa ste// gzer nad khrag
skyug bdag po yin// rngam chen 'bar ba dam la bzhes// rgyal po gcan cha gdug pa can// mi dkar rta dkar srid par rgyug/ nyi zer zhags pas 'gug cing 'dzin// dug 'thung gcan la mche ba
gtsigs// sgrol byed 'bar ba'i dus la bab// the brang gcan chen ma rungs pa// dkar po 'od chen 'bar ba 'dzin// sgrol byed chen po'i dus la bab// ces bskul lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ gcan bzhi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ mkhar ba can bzhis rang rang gi gnas bsgrub pa 'di smras so// bdud kyi rgyal po lcags
kyi 'khar ba can dang/ rgyal po dung gi mkhar ba can dang/ gnod sbyin bse'i mkhar ba can dang/ bzhi pa ting nge 'dzin ldan pa des/ mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// drag po'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin

bri// spyang 'phar ra khyi snying bzhi rnams// bse phor gcig tu bcug la rten// sha khrag mdzes pa'i gtor mas mchod// bskul dang sngags dang las rnams bya// gdab dang bstan dang gnan dang gzir// de yis

las rnams 'grub par byed// lag sha kha la 'dar ba'i ser rbad/ tsa ke la shar rbad ya mu khe rbad ya/ sha ki la ya rbad ya/ de ltar bzlas nas bsgrubs pa na// rtags rnams byung nas gdab pa'o// mi kyi li yag

sha du mA ra ya dza dur rbad/ ki li sha du mA ra ya dza dur rbad/ ki la rayashake dza dur rbad/ ki li mi liM yag sha dza dur rbad/ de ltar bzlas la bsgrub pa'o// hUM/ bdud chen gdug pa mkhar ba can// mthing nag
ral chen rngam pa che// srog rtsa dmar po rngubs la thongs// btsan chen zangs kyi mkhar ba can// dmar nag ral pa srid gsum 'joms// rgyal po gdug byed mkhar ba can// dkar po dung ral shel gri
'dzin// srog rtsa skam pa'i dus la bab// gnod sbyin bse'i mkhar ba can// dmar po bse'i ral pa can// gdug byed ma rungs 'joms pa'i bdag/ nyams pa bsgral ba'i dus la bab// stong 'tshogs gdug

pa'i nang shed na// gdug byed mkhar chen drag po bzhi// dmigs pa'i lnga dpung gzhom pa'i dus la bab/ srog rtsa chod la 'phur pas thob// ces bskul zhing dmigs pa bsgral ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud
chen po las/ mkhar ba can bzhi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gya gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud kyi 'phrang pa nag po gri thogs dang/ btsan gyi 'phrang pa ser po stobs chen

dang// rgyal po'i 'phrang pa dkar po mig gcig dang// bdud mo'i 'phrang pa nag mo brang mig ma dang/ the brang gi 'phrang pa ser po kha yon dang/ ja la'i 'phrang pa nag mo khyab byed ma dang/ gnod sbyin 'phrang pa

'khor lo can dang/ klu gnyan gyi 'phrang pa 'dug byed thom po dang brgyad kyis rang rang bsgrub pa'i las rnams smras so// gsang ba'i stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// de

ru dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ldan pa la// nang du dkyil 'khor gru gsum mthig nag bya// nang du dmigs pa'i rten dang bcas pa'o/ kha la 'phrang ba brgyad kyi phud dgod// de ltar sha khrag gtor ma dang// snying na ni
phud dang bcas/ de ltar bsags la bsgrub pa ste// de rnams spyan drangs mchod bstod las rnams bya'o// de nas sngags kyis bsgrub pa ste// sngags 'di dag ni thim bur bsgrub// lag na ka laM ti

ru chum dril rbad/ ya ti kha la rgyug por ding rbad/ ti ri ti ri 'ung tog ya/ kha laM kha thun rbad/ ya ma ti sha rbad la ya/ sa du sa la rbad na ya/ kha du kha du chol bya rbad/ ru ti na ga hri nga ya bya/ de ltar bzlas dang

gdab dang btab par bya/ de nas rbad cing btab pa'o// hUM/ gdug byed 'phrang chen rum chen na// 'phrang pa chen po gdug pa can// 'phrang pa chen po ma rung gdug chen po// gdug la rngam pas 'phrang chen
bsrung// rngam la gdug stangs 'jig par byed// gdug byed 'phrang na gnas pa ste// srid pa yongs la gnod cing gsod// mi yi lus la gdug pa'i mgo/ ral pa can la rgya zor dang// mda' dang mdung rtse

mtshon cha thogs// rngam stabs can la 'phrang chen bsrung// sgrol byed mi srang sba ba'i gzugs// mtshan thogs skye 'gro ma lus sgrol// gdug pa'i sgrol byed 'phrang pa brgyad/ khyed ni rngam pa'i 'brang srungs

pa// 'dzur med 'phrang gi bdag po yin// legs nyes kun gyi ltangs 'dzin byed// mna' dang gzu yi dpang po mdzod// nyams pa sgrol la sangs rgyas bstan pa tshugs// sha khrag za zhing spyugs glu len// drag po

khyed kyis dus la bab// ces bskul lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'phrang ba brgyad bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gya gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dge bsnyen nyi shu rtsa
gcig gis rang gis bsgrub pa'i las 'di rnams smras so// bdag cag dge bsnyen nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bdag cag rnams kyi bsgrub pa ni// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su
'dug nas ni// dkyil 'khor gzhung dang ldan par bri// gru gsum sum brtsegs dag tu bya// dmigs pa phur pa de bzhin te// mtha' ma phur pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// ra yi snying la rten du bca'// bshos bu
mda' dang bcas pas mchod// phud dang zhal zas de bzhin mchod// spyan drangs mchod dang las rnams bcol// sngags rnams kun kyang gdab par bya// de yis las rnams 'grub par byed// oM badzra du ging ka

ra b+h+yo/ badzra sha laM b+h+yo sha b+h+yo/ badzra yag sha sem ti b+h+yo/ sa ma ya ging ka ra dza hur b+h+yo/ badzra sha ka lam ka rbad/ badzra bong bong tri b+h+yo/ badzra pu ra sha tri ya/ badzra ni sha kun sham rbad/ badzra ka la ma san ti ya/ badzra ka ru

sha lam rbad/ badzra hur thum srog la yam/ tri ling shang ka rbad/ sa mu raM pa rbad/ kha du ya ma rbad/ mu tri ram pa ni rbad/ yam rje ni shag sa ma ya shol bam ya/ tri sha ra ga ru dum rbad/ tri ling ling sha rbad/ mu ga
ro sha rbad/ 'ur ling ging ka ra rbad ya/ hUM/ dge bsnyen chen po nyi shu gcig/ drag la mthu rtsal ldan pa des// stobs kyis pha rol dpung rnams 'joms// gdug pa'i drag shul rab tu che// gzu
dang dpang po legs nyes 'dzin// dregs pa tshogs kyi dmag gnyes cing// drag po g.yul 'gyed rtsal 'chang tshogs// gdug byed ma rungs nyi shu gcig/ sku ni dkar dmar 'od dang ldan// mdzes pa dar gyi
ral ka gsol// gdug pa'i mtshon thogs pa la rngam// srog gcod pa la rab tu 'ur// brgyal nad blang thabs gtong bar byed// dmigs pa'i mgo lus 'grel bar byed// pags bshus rgyal mtshan byed pa
ste// gdug pa'i ging dpa' log ge log/ dmigs pa'i tsit+ta phyung la shog/ lnga dpung yan lag drongs la shog gdug pa'i mtshon gyis thob la shog/ dmigs pa'i dgra bgegs mkha' la bya ldings// skyes chen

stag ltar 'phyo zhing nyams pa sgrol bar byed// bar snang khams na bzhugs tsam na// ri rab kha nas 'brug sgrogs ma/ bar snang tsha grang mda' 'byin ma// drag po'i ser chen chad ltar phob// dmigs pa'i 'bras

bu rtsad nas chod/ ces bskul ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dge bsnyen bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gya gsum pa'o//// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yi rang nas bstod pa/ kye ma
bcom ldan thugs rje can// byams mgon 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal// ma rig mun sel 'gro ba 'dren pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas ston pa khyod la bstod// e ma ho sangs rgyas ston pa che// dgos 'dod skong ba'i
nor bu rin po che// 'jig rten rnams kyi skyabs chen po// dgos 'dod skong ba khyod la 'dud// 'gro ba ma lus 'dren pa'i dpal// e ma ho thugs rje thabs mkhas pas// nyon mongs ma lus skyong byed
pa// sangs rgyas dregs pa'i gtso la bstod// ces yi rangs nas bstod pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la yi rangs nas bstod pa'i le'u ste gya bzhi
pa'o//// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// bcos pa'i yon tan ji ltar
lags// ma bcos skyon rnams ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po
'di rnams la// ma bcos pa yi skyon bstan pa// sad dang ser ba mu ge dang// mtshon gyi char chen dbab pa dang// mi rnams tshe thung longs spyod chung// de bas bcos pa rab tu gsungs// bcos pa'i yon tan
bstan pa ni// lo legs 'bru 'khrungs rtsi thog rgyas// mtshon dang mu ge nad yams 'chad// mi rnams dar cing longs spyod rgyas// tshe ring bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// de ltar gyur na 'jig

rten bde// de bas bcos pas rab tu gces// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams bcos pa'i yon tan dang/ ma bcos pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu rtsa lnga
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin la sogs 'khor rnams kyis/ nga'i rgyud 'di chongs shig klogs shig thub par gyis shig nges par gyis shig rin chen srog ltar

'chang ba gyis shig mig gi sgrol ma ltar tshos shig nga'i rgyud 'di thams cad gso bar byed pas/ mtsho byed rgyal po'i rgyud ces bya bar zung zhig thams cad gsad par nus pas/ srog gi 'khor lo'i rgyud ces bya

bar zung zhig dgos pa thams cad 'byung bas/ nor bu rin chen bya bar zung zhig ces gsungs so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams rang rang sa la bkod do// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ yongs su bzungs shing gtad pa'i le'u ste gya drug pa'o//// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ de ba ya tri san tri shu nya ta pi paM ga ni tri ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bam po bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po 'khor
dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ bcom ldan 'das la ma chags pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan byams
mgon bdag/ 'gro rnams bdag sogs don gyi phyir// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams kyi// bcos shing zhi ba'i las rnams bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// 'gro bsdus sems can don gyi phyir// dregs pa bcos shing zhi bar bya ba na// srid pa'i mdos dang yas chen dang// gto dang tshig gis zhi zhing lo bar 'gyur// de yi las kyi rim

pa ni// dregs pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis smros// ces gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ zhu lan bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas ston pa'i spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams kyis drag po'i

zor gyi las rnams smras te/ bdud rnams kyis las 'di smras so// lcags kyi gzhu mo la/ zangs kyi mchog ma can/ rin chen rgyud kyis sbrengs/ gzhu la bdud sngags te/ chang pa la bdud mes kyi sngags/ mchog
ma la sgo bzhi'i sngags/ rdzing g.yas g.yon la bdud 'byung ba'i bdud dang/ ya bdud bcu gsum sngags/ gdug pa'i mda' la ltas ngan gyi bya'i sgros bskyon la/ de la bdud sil ma'i sngags
kyis bri'o// mda' dang gzhu dang gdug pa'i shing gi mde'u gsal/ mde'u zur la bdud ging gi sngags bkod la/ des mde'u byin gyis brlab bo// de ltar khrag dang/ dug dang/ sha khrag gis gtor ma btab

cing dmigs pa'i phyogs su 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud kyi zor gsag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bdud kyi zor gyi sngags/ oM hri d+h+ri sha mu ti pa yang ti ya lam yag

sha rag sha sa mi bzor ya/ oM bri kha la ri shi than shan pri mi li sham sham ya bzod/ tra ti ro sha kha la haM bzor ya/ zhes bri zhing bzlas pa'o// de nas drag po'i las la bdud bskul te/ bskul zhing 'phang
ba'o// hUM/ bdud yul pha gi na/ bdud rgyal gdug pa can/ bdud rgyal 'khor dang bcas/ nag po sha zan bdud kyi bu// nag po gdug byed sprul pa'i gtso// gdug tshogs mang po'i sprul par 'gyed// bdud mo
mi zad pa/ ya bdud ni bcu gsum yang/ srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ gdug pa yi ni las la drag/ drag po zor la bskul ba'i tshe// pho bdud bcu gsum byung// pho bdud bcu gsum ni/ la la bdud kyi gzhu mo
'gengs/ la la bdud mda' rgyal gzhu khongs la/ sil nas ni mda' sna drongs/ gdug pa'i dpal byed tshe/ drag po ni zod 'phen tshe/ pho bdud ni shar ra ra/ gdug pa'i sku lus ni mthing nag la/ phyag na

gdug pa'i mtshon cha thogs// bdud rngam zor 'phen 'phyo zhing 'phen// pho bdud mda' mo shugs kyis drag/ gdug pa'i mde'u srog rtsa gcod// sgyu ma'i phung po bsregs ces bskul cing 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong
gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud rnams kyi zor gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ btsan rnams kyis zor gyi las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin dang ldan pa

des/ bse'i gzhu gcig la/ chang pa la spyi btsan gyi sngags/ mchog ma la brag btsan/ rdzing gnyis la 'byung ba la sogs pa'i sil ma'i sngags bri/ de ltar gdug pa'i mda' mo la/ 'ug pa dang srin bya dang ne'u

le dang/ bya dmar bzhi'i sgro bskyon/ skyer tsher gyi mde'u gsal la/ mda' la btsan gyi zor sngags bri/ de ltar 'cham pa dang dar dmar po'i phur lce gdags/ phud dang spyan gzigs sha khrag bsham zhing mchod/
de ltar bsags la bsngags shing dmigs pa'i phyogs su 'phang/ de yis las rnams grub par byed/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan zor bsag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// hUM/ gdug pa
btsan gyi bu/ nga rgyal skyes gcig pa/ btsan chen sprul pa'i sku/ btsan las gnyan pa med/ spyi btsan chen po ste/ btsan 'phran 'bum gyis bskor/ btsan las rtsal drag med/ phya las skos mkhas
med/ btsan chen gdug pa can/ mi dmar rta dmar 'tshogs/ khrag gzer nad kyi bdag sprul pa bsam yas so// gdug pa mda' zor bdag dug zor dmigs pa sgrol/ yul dang btsan yul pha gi na/ gdug
pa btsan gyi bu/ btsan chen shar ra ra/ khrag mda' cil li li/ dug mda' kyil li li/ btsan yul pha gi na/ bse yi gzhu sgra 'ur ru ru/ bse yi mda' sgra lcags se lcags/ btsan gzhu 'ur ru ru/ bse yi gzhu
mo la/ lcags kyi mchog ma can/ zangs kyi nags mas mnan/ 'brong bu rgyud kyis sgreng/ bse yi bshul cig btang/ bse mda' dmar po la/ ltas ngan sgro bzhi bskyon/ sgro la gdug pa'i chas/ btsan gyi ngan
sngags bri/ skyes bu spyi dang chas/ gsang ba'i las kyis sribs/ mda' chen gnyan chas te/ ngan sngags dug bcas te/ skyer mde dbal rno bas/ nyams pa'i sgyu ma'i phung po gtan nas sregs/ mda' 'phangs

dam nyams sgrol/ yul mkhar ltas la yang/ dregs pa'i gur la yang/ srog rtsa dmar chod la/ btsan zor lta la la/ mda' yi sna 'di btsan gyis drongs/ oM ta tse pri li na tse ma b+h+yo b+h+yo ya ya phyi rtig zor gyi li pri

ta si ni se te/ tsa tsa pri ling tsa ra ling ya ma gzor/ de yis gar 'phangs brlag par byed ces 'bri zhing 'phang ste/ bskul te las la sbyar la/ ji ltar dmigs pa de phyogs la 'phang/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud

chen po las/ btsan zor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po rnams kyis rang rang gi zor gyi las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// drag po'i las

rnams byas rjes la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang// gdug pa'i gzhu mo rgyal gyi yi ge gong bzhin bkod/ yi ge dbus su dkar po spyan la sogs pa'o// gdug pa'i mda' gcig la/ lta ngan sgro yis bskyon/
mda' la rgyal po'i sngags/ rim par dgod par bya/ mde'u dug med rtsal/ the rang mig gcig sngags/ mchog ma dag la ni/ dar dkar phur lce gdags/ de ltar mda' gzhu bsdebs/ oM sha pri shag taM a lo

sa ma ya khruM taM bu raM b+h+yo/ zhes zor sngags bris la/ de la gdug pa'i mda' gzhu dang/ bskul zhing 'phang ste las la bya'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po'i zor gsag pa'i le'u ste drug
pa'o//// hUM/ rgyal po ni gdug pa can/ rgyal srid ni srog la dga'/ khyab pa ni chen po mched/ srog bdag gdug pa'i tshogs/ mi dkar ldem pa la/ g.yu yi smin ma can/ gdug pa'i dpal dang bcas/ drag
po'i zor 'phen shar ra ra// gdug pa'i dbal 'phen sil li li// yam shud dmar po ste/ mi dmar rta ru dmar/ bse mda' bse gzhu rnams/ gdug pa'i nga ro sgrog srid pa ma lus 'joms pa'i
bdag gang la khyod shes na/ do nub drag po'i mda' zor 'phongs/ dkar po spyan gcig pa/ khu le lag pa dgu/ mched bzhi gdug pa'i 'khor/ mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab// drag po'i zor 'phen shar

ra ra// rgyal po mched gsum po/ skya trang khu trang mi pang sad// do nub zor 'di 'phongs/ nyams pa'i srog rtsa gcod// rgyal gyi mda' zor 'di 'phangs pas// gdug pa nyams pa'i srog rtsa gcod// sgyu ma'i phung

po gtan nas sregs/ kha la gdug pa sprul pa'i gtso// ma yal dam las bzhengs// gdug pa'i mda' zor 'phongs// ra dza sa ma ya tri shaM par li b+h+yo// zor sna rgyal gyis 'drongs/ ces 'phang ba'o// lha 'dre stong
gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po'i zor gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sa ma ya ma bdud bcu gsum gyis rang rang gi zor 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smras

so// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru/ sha khrag sna tshogs dang phud kyis bdud mo mchod cing/ lcags kyi gzhu la lcags kyi rgyud sbrengs shing// bdud mo bcu gsum sngags kyis sbrengs// gdug pa'i mda' la ltas

ngan sgro// gdug pa'i gra ma'i mde'u btsal// de la khrag gnas so// de ltar mda' rnams 'phang bar bya// gang la dmigs pa'i rten la rdeg/ oM ru ru sha ma thums bri ling ya b+h+yo/ sa ma ya pra ta ya b+h+yo/ khraM ma staM chu

dza b+h+yo/ zhes pa bris la 'phang ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ma bdud kyi rdzas gsag pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// hUM/ bdud yul ma gi na/ bdud kyi rgyal mo gdug pa mo// mthing nag
'bar ba'i bdud mo tshogs// sha za khrag 'thung ral pa sprug cing byon// bdud mo bcu gsum yang/ gdug pa'i mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab// mda' zor dmar po cil li li// gdug pa'i bdud mo shar
ra ra// bdud mo zor 'phen dpa' la rngam// bdud mo thun 'phen shar ra ra// bdud mo las mdzad sil li li// bdud mo dar nag g.yab 'dod lings se lings// bdud mo spyugs pa'i glu len kyur ru
ru// bdud mo zor 'phen shes pa'i tshe// mda' zor gdug pa sib se sib// bdud mo nyams pa'i srog rtsa gcod// gdug byed bdud mo khyed rnams kyis// gdug pa'i mda' zor 'di 'phangs pas// nyams

pa'i yul mkhar khyim rnams su// nyams pa'i srog rtsa dmar po chod// nyams pa'i sgyu ma'i phung po sregs// lnga phung yan lag drungs nas phyung// gdud pa'i bdud mo dgra la zor// ces 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi
dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo'i mda' zor gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ the brang rnams kyis rang rang gi zor 'di smras so// se ba'i gzhu la se ba'i

mda'// srin bya'i sgro la gra ma'i mde'u// de la the rang sngags rnams bri// bong bu rna rings thod pa ru// sha khrag mthun pa'i yas kyis mchod// oM tring tri pra i na sham badzra mi li pri sha ya b+h+yo/ de ltar bri zhing 'phang

dang drag po'i las rnams bya'i/ the brang bskul zhing zor la 'phang/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang gi mda' zor gsag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// hUM/ the brang chen po ma rungs pa// srid pa
gsum gyi rgyud 'grol ma// rdo rje legs pa sprul pa'i gtso// zhang blon drag po rdzu 'phrul can// rgyug 'gro stong sde zor lam drongs// zor gyi las mkhan sprul pa'i gtso// mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la

bab// gdug pa'i mda' zor 'phangs pa'i tshe// nyams pa'i snying la mda' zor ya// nyams pa'i lnga phung yan lag bsdus// nyams pa'i srog rtsa dmar po chod// nyams pa'i sgyu ma'i phung po sregs// the brang zor
'phen shar ra ra// stong ste stong gsum 'gro la bdag/ nyams pa bsgral ba'i dus la bab// drag po mda' zor sil 'phangs pas// the brang stong sde gdug pa can// gdug pa'i mda' la bdag gi med// the brang

mda' zor nyams pa'i tshogs la bzor/ ces bskul zhing 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the rang zor gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ mkhar ba
can bzhis rang rang gi zor gyi las 'di smras so// lcags kyi gzhu mo la/ bse yi bshul btang ba/ dung gi mchog ma can/ gdug pa'i rgyud bsgrengs shing/ gcan bzhi'i sngags kyis bskor/ ltas ngan mda'
yis brgyan/ gcan bzhi sngags kyis bris/ gdug pa can la bslabs/ gdug pa ma lus kun/ sha khrag gtor ma dang/ phud dang rdzas kyis mchod/ gzu dang dpang yang gzugs/ mda' gzhu bslabs nas su/

gdug byed zor sngags bris/ oM bu ri da ni mag shar prig prig shaM shaM rag sha kha la pri sham b+h+yo/ de ltar bris bsgribs nas/ gang dmigs phyogs su 'phang ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan
bzhi mda' zor gsag pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// gdug pa'i gcan bzhi ste/ rngam pa las la 'gyed/ drag po mdung stabs kyis/ nyams pa'i snying 'byin byed/ gcan bzhi srog gi bdag stong 'tshogs
kun gyi rje/ sprul pa khyab 'jug tshogs/ srog gcod las la rngam/ mda' zor 'phang bas dus 'bab/ mda' zor 'di 'phangs pas/ nyams pa rtsad nas gcod/ do nub mda' zor 'di 'phangs kyi// gdug pa'i
gzhu mo rtsal ma chung// 'bigs pa'i mda' zor kha ma rtul// stag gi hor shugs 'theb mo can// sprul pa las la yengs ma nga// sgrol ba'i ging chen gdug pa'i tshogs// mda' zor 'phang ba'i
dus la bab// nyams pa'i snying la dag gzer cig/ sgyu ma'i phung po gtan nas bshig/ sprul pa'i khyab bdag 'khor bcas kyis// dmigs pa brlan phyir mda' zor ya// zor ro mda' zor dmar po dgra la
zor// ces 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bca' gzhi mda' zor gsag pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 'phrang pa bzhis rang rang gi mda' zor
'phang ba'i las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des/ gdug pa'i lcags kyi gzhu mo mda' dang bcas// de la gdug pa'i dug dang khrag gis byug/ dug mde rtsal la byin gyis brlab// mda'

dang gzhu la 'phrang pa bzhi yi sngags// oM ri san pra ta ya ha li ga li shaM pra ma yaM te sad laM pa ta ya pra shag ya b+h+yo/ de ltar bri dang bsal bar bya// mthun pa'i rdzas dang snying bzhi rdzas kyis mchod// de ltar las

byas 'phang bar bya// dpang dang ma nyes gzu dang dpang// de ltar las bcol 'phangs na dmigs pa brlag par 'gyur/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'phrang ba bzhi'i mda' zor rdzas gsag pa'i
le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// hUM/ bdud yul tshogs chen po las/ 'phrang ba gdug pa nad kyi bdag 'phrang bzhi ni che bzhi ste/ gdug pa'i 'phrang bzhi srun byed cing// gdug pa'i nyams pa ma lus
sgrol// bdud btsan rgyal po ma yams 'phrang// gdug rtsub nad kyi bdag po ste// gdug byed nyams pa sgrol ba'i bdag/ srid pa'i bdag po gdug rtsub can// mda' zor dmar po 'phang ba'i dus la
bab// drag po mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab// 'phrang ba gdug pa'i mda' zor 'phros// dregs chen 'phrang bzhi gcan 'phrang na// 'phrang ba zor 'phen sil li li// 'phang ba gdug pa
grongs// gdug pa'i dregs pa dmag tshogs 'bum// gdug rtsub sprul pa'i pho nya 'gyed// gdug pa'i gzhu mo srungs ci ma/ mda' sgra shar ra ra/ gzhu sgra lcogs se lcogs/ gdug pa'i mda' 'phangs pas/
nyams pa bsgral du gsol/ mda' zor gdug rtsub sprul pa'i zor la bzor// dmigs pa bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bskul zhing 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa zor la
bskur ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ gdug pa'i brag btsan dmar po dang/ se btsan rol po dang/ skyes bu lung btsan dang gsum gyis rang rang gi zor gyi las 'di
smras so// bse yi gzhu mo la/ lcags kyi mchog ma can/ bse yi bshul cig btang/ zangs kyi nan mas mnan/ de ltar 'brong bu rgyud du sbyar/ bse mda' dmar po la/ 'ug pa khra dang sprin byas
sgron/ skyer pa'i mde'u la/ ra yi khrag gis byugs// de la btsan gyi zor sngags dgod// gdug pa'i dpal dang bcas// sha khrag gtor mas mchod// snying sna gdug pas mchod// de ltar bsags nas ni// oM

tsa sho ba ri gug ling skor sa ma ya ti pra sha shar b+h+yo/ mu ru shaM pha ri ya rig shaM b+h+yo/ ka la nad a saM pa ri ya b+h+yo/ de ltar bris la bskul zhing 'phang// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// btsan gyi mda' zor
gsag pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// gdug pa btsan gyi bu/ skyes bu lung gi btsan/ btsan mi dmar rta ru dmar/ bse mda' ni bse gzhu rnams/ mda' zor ta la la/ mda' 'phen gdug pa sgrol/ brag
btsan dmar po khyod/ 'byung ba brag gi them la gnas/ btsan dmar rta ru dmar/ gdug pa'i mtshon thogs so// skyes bu ni brag gi btsan/ bse gzhu dmar po bdungs/ bse mda' dmar po 'phen/ bse yi
bse mdung gsigs/ drag po mda' zor 'phongs/ bse btsan rol bu rje/ gdug pa btsan gyi bu/ btsan gdug sprul pa'i 'khor/ btsan las gdug che med/ rta kham nag chibs/ mchog dkar gra gcig

'gugs/ srid pa yongs su sgrol/ gdug rtsub sprul pa'i gtso/ mda' zor dmar po 'phongs/ nyams pa'i snying la gzor/ yul mkhar khyim la bzor/ lhas dang rdzing la bzor/ phung po lnga phung skoms/ rtsang dang
'byung ba bsdus/ drag po'i mda' zor 'phang ba'i dus la bab/ gdug rtsub zlog cing nyams pa de la gzor/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan gsum zor gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ btsan rnams dang/ gcan rnams dang/ gdug pa'i sprul pa rnams dang/ 'bebs rtse can rnams dang/ mkhar ba can rnams dang/ gdug pa'i sprul pa dang bcas pa dang/ de

rnams kyis zor mda' 'phang ba'i dus la bab/ gdug pa ngar ma'i gzhu mo dang/ gdug pa'i mda' la ltas ngan sgro/ dug gi mde'u la dpal gyi khrag de la gang byed sngags kyis bri/ oM ru pi shaM ru ru ka ra ye yaM

pra prig prig ya ya b+h+yo/ kha la nad sen he li pra dra prig yaM pra ro sha ra ti b+h+yo/ du lings ma dun pra sha thums thums rbad sha ma b+h+yo/ pa ri shu ra taM ka li har her rbad rbud thum ris ya ling shar praM ya ya b+h+yo/ oM tu ma wa

la khyeM sha ra ba ra ya ya b+h+yo/ sra ru ru saM myag thuM ka ro tsa tsam b+h+yo/ zhes mda' dang gzhu la gang byed pa bris la/ de la dar gyis brgyan la 'phang ba'o// de yis gang dmigs phyogs su 'phang/ dregs pa can dang
'khor ba can la sogs pa'i las so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa sgo rnams kyi bcas dang sngags kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// hUM/ dregs pa chen po ma rungs pa// skye

'gro ma lus sgrol byed po// bdud byed las rnams byed pa 'ong// drag po'i zor 'phen shar ra ra// gdug pa'i dregs chen ma rungs ma// 'byung bas bskyed pa'i shing rgod dang// srid pas bskyed pa'i gzhu rgod

dang// drag pos 'dzin pa'i bshul rgod dang// rin chen 'bar ba'i nan ma dang// gdu rtsub 'bar ba'i mde rtse dang// drag po 'bar ba'i nus mthu rtsal// drag chen gshul la sprul pa'i mda'// gzhu mo rgyud kyi
sprugs pa'i tshe// mda' ni gdug byed thig chen 'debs// mde ging gdug pa thogs med gcod// nyams pa'i yul du mda' zor ya// gdug pa'i gzhu mo 'ur ru ru// gdug pa'i mda' mo ljags se

ljags// dregs chen zor 'phen dpa' la rngam// spyugs pa'i glu len gdug pa sgrol// nyams pa'i phung po gtan nas sregs// lnga phung yan lag rdul du lhogs// rngam pa'i sgra chen dir ri ri/ pags chen g.yab

'dor lings se lings// sprul pa'i dregs pa mang po kun// nyams pa bsgral ba'i dus la bab// ces bskul zhing 'phang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi mda' zor gyi le'u ste
bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bco ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// bcos pa'i yon tan ji ltar
lags// ma bcos pa yi skyon ni ci// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams kyi// ma bcos pa yi skyon bstan pa// sad dang

ser ba rtsa dang mu ge dang// rims nad dang ni yams nad dang// tshe thung longs spyod chung ba dang// don med mi shis sna tshogs 'byung// de ltar byung na mi rnams 'phung// de bas bcos pa rab tu gces// bcos

pa'i yon tan bstan pa ni// lo legs 'khrungs mu ge'i bskal pa chad// tshe rings longs spyod che zhing mi rnams dar zhing rgyas// de bas sad dang ser ba med cing zhi zhing bde// de ltar gyur na 'jig rten

bde// de bas bcos pa rab tu gsungs// ces smras so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams bcos pa'i yon tan dang ma bcos pa'i skyon bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas yang
lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor cing phyag 'tshal nas/ ma chags pa'i mchod pa dang me tog mang po gtor nas 'di skad mgrin gcig tu bstod do// e ma
ho/ 'jig rten mgon chen po/ e ma ho sangs rgyas ston pa'i mchog 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs chen po/ sangs rgyas ston pa khyod la bstod/ e ma ho/ yid bzhin rin po che/ 'phongs pa rnams kyi re
ba skong/ thams cad 'byung ba rin po che/ dgos 'dod 'byung ba rin chen khyod la bstod/ ces mgrin gcig tu bstod do// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams kyis
bstod pa'i le'u ster nyer gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor khyed rnams kyis/ nga'i rgyud 'di zung zhig chongs shig lhogs cig dar bar gyis

shig thub par gyis shig mig gi 'bras bu ltar chongs shig gsang ba'i srog ltar chongs shig nga'i rgyud 'di dgongs pa thams cad tshang bas/ nor bu rin po che gter du thogs cig thams cad sgrol ba drag po
'bar ba srog gi gshed bya ba zung zhig thams cad gso bas 'tsho byed rgyal po'i rgyud bya bar thogs cig gtad thub par gyis cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// gsungs so// de nas brgya byin

la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams shin tu yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par bltas te rang rang gi sa la 'khod do// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyud yongs su gzung zhing gtad pa'i
le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// bam po tha ma'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ de wa ya tri/ san tri shu nya thA si sa ma tan tra/ bod skad du/
lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas dam pa na bcom ldan 'das
gsang ba'i bdag po des/ bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la longs spyod cing/ 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ rang gi 'dus pa rnams kyi nang
nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/ ma chags pa'i mchod pas ni mchod/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas bskor ba byas te/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba la sogs pa mang po ni gtor/
pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das thugs rje'i dbang po/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la lha ma
srin thams cad 'khrugs nas/ la las nad kyi bskal pa btang/ la las me'i bskal pa btang/ la las chu'i bskal pa btang/ la las mu ge'i/ la las sad dang ser ba/ la las rtsa dang mu dri/ la las mtshon
gyi/ ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs btang ste/ 'dzam bu'i mi rnams zad du nye/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes gzung zhing byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ nyon cig lha dbang rab nyon cig khyod kyis zhu bar spobs pa legs// nga yis gsang ba'i bka' dbye'o// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gleng gzhi brgya byin gyis zhu bar spobs
pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu dregs pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das
kyi thad du 'ubs kyis 'dus nas/ la la ni gan cing bub/ la la ni ngu zhing brang brdung/ la la brgyal/ la la rang gi skra 'bal/ la la ni ci gang yin zer te/ thams cad brgyal bar gyur nas/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis thams cad gso ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu/ de dag thams cad brgyal ba sangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas/ mgrin
gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// kye bcom ldan 'das thugs rje'i bdag po byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bdag cag rnams dpa' bo khyod kyi 'bangs su mchi'o// bka' stsol cig ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du bgyi'o
zhes so// de nas b+ha gas bka' stsal pa/ dregs pa khyed rnams kyis nga'i bstan pa srungs cig ces bka' stsol to// dregs pa rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bstan pa zhes bya ba gang lags/ bsrung
zhes bgyi ba gang la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig ces gsol te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig dregs pa stong gi tshogs/ bstan pa zhes bya ba ni chos 'dul ba dang/

mdo sde mngon pa la sogs te theg pa mtha' dag go/ bsrung zhes bya ba ni de la spyod pa'i phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la bar chad byed pa sod cig sgrol cig pa'o// zhes gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa rnams dbang du bsdus shing las la bkol ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol
to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// sde dang rigs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas b+ha gas bka' stsal pa// sde

dang rigs ni mang du bstan// la la byang chub sems dpa'i sde dang rigs te sa gnas tshul/ la la brgya byin lha yi sde// srid pa yi ni nor 'dzin byed// la la zhe sdang bdud kyi sde ste bdud gzhom las rnams byed/
nga rgyal btsan gyi sde ni gzer nad gtong ba'i bdag la la skor bdag rgyal po'i sde ste srog gi bdag po byed/ la la bdud mo ma yis sde ste nad yams mang po gtong/ la la the brang stong gi sde ste

srid pa'i rgyug 'gro byed/ la la bya ra ma ma rung sde ste bka' yi bang chen byed/ la la sde brgyad cho 'phrul sde ste thog dang ser ba 'bebs/ la la gnod sbyin rnam pa'i sde ste sha dang khrag la dad/ la la sa bdag klu
gnyan sde ste gdug pa'i nad rnams gtong/ sde dang rigs ni mang du mchis// las dang nus pa bsam las 'das// ces smras so// sde ni 'byung po'i rigs kyi sde// rigs ni dregs pa'i rigs kyi rigs// ces
gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa'i sde rigs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma
bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la/ gdug rtsub ma lus zhi bar bya na ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig ces gsol to// de nas b+ha gas bka'
stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// gdug rtsub ma rungs zhi bya na// srid pa'i 'khor rnams mdos kyis bcos pa ste/ bdud mo ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa la/ dmu
lcam mched bzhi dang/ bdud mo nyis brgya lnga bcu la/ ming po bdud chen rnams babs nas/ de nas bdud mo rnams kyis ni// rin chen 'bar ba'i kong bu ru// gsal ba'i me mar brgya rtsa bltams// gser

skyogs ser po dag tu ni// gtsang ma'i 'bru bcud bltams nas ni/ kha ni rin chen sna lnga gcad// thugs sten mda' mo yud gsum la// 'byung ba'i dar snas brgyan nas ni// 'di rim pas bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong
gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud kyi snying babs kyi yas gsag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// hUM/ ming po bdud chen rnams tshur nyon dang/ 'o cag zhe sdang bdud kyi bu// mi la bdud babs bskos pa
ste// bdud la bdud babs srid de na// bdud la bdud ni babs na// ming po bdud chen rnams la sdig/ sangs rgyas ston pa'i bka' 'go nas// 'og cag bdud sde mang bzhugs te// bdud la bdud babs
srid de na// 'u cag zhe sdang bdud kyi bu// zhe sdang rang gar spyad pas nongs// sems dang zhe sdang gnyis med na// sems ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas te// sems dang sangs rgyas gnyis med na// gnyis med
bstan pa'i bka' la nyon// zhe sdang sems kyi gdug pa grol// snang gsal 'od kyis dam chod kyis// ma rtogs rig pa'i sems la nyon// snang gsal 'di la dpe mchis te// dngas pa sems kyi glud du

bsngo'o// dmugs pa sha yi glu du bsngo// dmar ba khrag gi glud du bsngo// dkar ba rus pa'i glud du bsngo// zer brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi glud du bsngo// snod kyi phyi yi yul du bsngo// dngos po nang

gi glud du bsngo// mda' ni sku yi rten du bsngo// dar sna dbang po lnga yi rten du bsngo// phud ni gsol ba'i bdud rtsir bsngo// rin chen sna lnga bdud dang ster du bsngo// zhe sdang gdug pa'i mdud pa khrol// gti mug
mun pa 'thibs pa sol// nga rgyal brag gi rtse nas choms// 'dod chags rgya mtsho 'thibs pa sol// phrag dog gdug rtsub rtsad nas choms// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams zhi bar gyis// srid pa'i bdud pho 'khor
dang bcas// snang gsal 'od kyi mdos 'di bzhes// ces rigs pas bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud kyi babs chags bcos pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bdud rnams bcos

byas nas// gsang ba stobs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa des/ mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ma'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri
rab chen po brtsigs/ kha dog 'dra ba'i rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba'i dar gyis brgyan par bya// nam mkha' bcu gsum yul du ste// mda' khra bcu gsum mkhar
du'o// de la gzugs brnyan mdzes pas bskor// bshos bu dang bcas las dag ste// gzugs brnyan mdzes pa mang pos bskor// glang nag lug nag bya nag dang// 'dab chags rgyu dang mda' chag dgu/ 'bru

sna bcu gsum gcal du'o// gtsang ma'i phud dang rin chen bca'// bya nag dag gi rgyal mtshan dang// sha dang khrag tu bcas pa'o// de ltar du ni bsags la bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/
bdud kyi bsags pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// hUM/ zhe sdang chen po bdud kyi bu// skye 'gro ma lus bdud gcod pa// bdud po bcu ni ma yin nam// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// yul dang bdud yul
phag gi ni// bdud yul nag po mgo dgu na// bdud mtsho nag po brlabs re brlabs// bdud mkhar nag po ldems se ldems// bdud mkhar de yi nang shed na// bdud kyi rgyal po thod pa'i 'phreng ba
can// bdud rjes ma rungs gdug pa can// bdud mo'i rgyal mo haM sha ma// 'khor yang bdud phran mang pas bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// ya bdud ni gcig gsum ste// bdud kyi rgyal po re ti

'gong yag dang// bdud mo ni sma khug dang/ nag po bkrag med dang/ bkos rje brang dkar dang/ ma le ni ge shag dang/ snya le ni ngag btsan dang/ skyin po ni mchu dmar dang/ thom po ni thom chung dang/ bdud
rags gzhu ni mched bzhi dang/ ral pa ni spyi chings dang/ za ma ni ngo che dang/ btsan bdud nam yongs po dang/ ya bdud ni bcu gsum po/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ bdud kyi bkos rje brang
dkar de// sku mdog dkar la ldem pa la// dar dkar gyi ral ka gsol/ phyag na dung dkar dkar po rnams// 'khor du bdud phran mang pos bskor// srid pas bkod pa lag srid pa'i mdos bzhes cig
bdud kyi rgyal po re ti 'gong yag de// mthing nag ral can mche ba gtsigs// g.yas na bdud kyi khram bam bsnams// g.yon na bdud kyi tho dbyug bsnams// mi phung bdud gcod bdag po yin// de ring
srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud kyi rgyal po ma rungs pa// bdug po nag po bkrag med de// mthing ral can la mche ba gtsigs// zangs nag ral ka sku la gsol// phyag na zhags dang rta gri bsnams// bdud

rta nag po rting dkar chibs// zhe sdang chen po bdud kyi bu// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud kyi rgyal po bdud rje sma khug de// smug nag rngam pa'i mda' gzhu thogs// bdud spyang sngon po chibs su
chibs// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// bdud kyi ma le ge shags de// dmar nag gdug pa'i stag la chibs// mdung sogs bdud kyi mtshon cha bsnams// gsad pa'i las la rab tu brtson// de ring srid
pa'i mdos la byon// bdud kyi rgyal stag gzhon mched de bzhi gcig/ sku la stag lpags zhal ba re re gsol// dbu la stag zhu re re gsol// bdud rta ral can re re chibs// 'khor yang bdud phran mang pos
bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud kyi rgyal po rangs sa spyi chings de// mthing nag rngam pa'i gzig la chibs// phyag na bdud rtar khram bam bsnams// mi bu bdud du gcod par byed// de ring
srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud kyi rgyal po ba za ma ngo che ni/ dmar nag mche ba gtsigs shing bzhud// gsad pa'i las brtson/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud kyi rgyal po btsan bdud rom pa
de// dmar po khram thogs lcags chen gsol// phyag na thod pa khrag can bsnams// ya bdud ni bcu gsum ste/ mi yi bdud du gcod par byed// dud 'gro phyags mas 'ded par byed// bdud po bcu gsum
'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// mdos bdag mdos bzhes cig glud bdag glud bzhes cig ya bdud 'khor bcas kyang/ zhe sdang gdug pa'i mdud pa khrol// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga

yi bdud// bdud chen ma rungs pa/ 'byung ba'i bdud lnga ste/ shar gyi bdud dkar rta ru dkar// lho yi bdud ser rta ru ser// nub kyi bdud dmar rta ru dmar// byang gi bdud ljang rta ru ljang// dbus kyi bdud

sngo rta ru sngo// bskyed kyang 'byung ba lnga ru bskyed// sdud kyang 'byung ba lnga ru sdud// gnas kyang 'byung ba lnga la gnas// 'byung ba lnga yang ni/ mtshon cha ni zhags dang bcas/ 'byung ba lnga 'dus nas/

mi bu ni bdud du gcod/ dud 'gro ni sha dmar byed/ 'khor gyi bdud phran mang po yang// sha dang khrag la rab tu dad// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud chen rol po skya dgu dang// bdud chen rol pa skya
bdun dang// rol po skya lnga dang/ rol po skya gsum dang/ bdud po rol po skya gcig dang/ rol pa skya 'khor bcas/ sku la mthing nag ber chen re re gsol// phyag na mtshon cha zhags pa bsnams// bdud kyi

rol pa rgyus pa'i tshe// tshe srog dbugs la len par byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud kyi yab rje nag po dang// dur bdud ni rngams pa dang/ brag bdud ru bdun ni tshogs pa dang/ smu bdud ni lto
dkar dang/ mtshams bdud ni smug po dang/ gsang bdud ni nag po dang/ lha bdud ni gang po dang/ ngur bdud ni rngams pa dang/ brag bdud ni 'tshogs pa dang/ se bdud ni smug po dang/ nyi bdud ni zla
bdud dang/ gza' bdud ni skar ma dang/ sil ma ni stong gi tshogs/ kun kyang bdud pho rngams pa ste/ pho bdud ni 'khor dang bcas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ bdud chen gdug pa can/ gsod pa'i
stag mgo dang/ sma rje lcang mgo dang/ dmig chen dom mgo dang/ lkugs pa lug bzhi dang/ bdud chen rngam pa rta thogs shing/ gsod pa'i las rnams kun la brtson// bdud nyan pa rna bsang dang/ snyab pa
lag rings dang/ lta ba mig rnon dang/ rngams pa tshal chen dang/ bdud kyi ni sgo ba bzhi/ gdug pa'i tshogs can kun/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ bdud chen rngam pa ma lus kun// la la rngam thabs gsad la
dga'// la la gdug pa'i sprul pa 'gyed// la la sha dang khrag la 'gyes// la la bdud gcod las rnams byed// la la sngon gyi lan chags 'ded// la la phung pa'i khog srun byed// la la dur khrod sha
la spyod// la la dri yis tshim par byed// la la gnod pa'i gdon du byed// bdud pho ma rungs pa/ la la bdud spyod sha la spyod sbyong byed// srid pa yongs la dbang du byed// gsad pa'i las rnams kun la

brtson// mdos bdag chen po mdos la byon// glud bdag chen po glud long la// yongs la dbang byed rngam pa'i bdud// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// zhes spyan drangs shing rim pas bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi
dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud kyi mdos kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// bdud kyi zhe sdang zhi ba'i phyir// gdug pa bdud kyi mdos bsngo'o// hUM/ zhe sdang zhi bar bya ba
dang// gdug pa'i bdud tshogs mchod pa'i phyir/ 'bru sna mang po dang/ ri rab dang ni gling dang bcas// gzugs brnyan dag ni mang pos bskor// stag lpags gzig dang dom dred dang// sha khrag
ni 'bru bcud rnams/ bshos chen ni rin chen bcas/ mda' dang nam mkha' bcas/ gdug pa zhe sdang bdud kyi bu/ bdud chen ni ming nas phyung/ thod chen ni 'bar chen 'bar/ srid pa'i bdag po yin/ thod

'phreng ni rngams pa dang/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes cig zhe sdang ni gdug pa'i bu/ lhas byin gyi sprul pa che/ nag po ni ma rungs dang/ ri ti ni 'gong yag dang/ srid pa'i khyab byed dang/ bdud po ni 'khor
dang bcas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ bdud ni 'khor dang bcas/ gsod byed ni ma rungs pa/ khog bsrungs ni bdud blon rje/ rngams chen ni sha za ba/ pho bdud ni 'khor dang bcas/ de ring srid
pa'i mdos bzhes cig/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// pho bdud bcu gsum bya bar grags// srid pa sha dang khrag la dad// mi bu ni bdud du gcod/ dud 'gro ni shan mar byed/ ma rungs ni 'khor dang
bcas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ rkos pa'i ming nas phyungs/ rkos bdag ni rkos la bzhes/ rtsis bdag ni rtsis kha phyis/ nad bdag ni kha bcings la/ gnod byed ni zhi bar byed/ mi 'gyur bskos pa
'khor dang bcas/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes cig/ glud bdag glud long zhig pho bdud ma rungs pa/ 'byung ba lnga la gnas/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga/ bdud mo ni las la dregs/ 'byung lnga bdud pho'i ming/
zhe sdang ngan pa slar la bsdus/ bdud pa'i bdud tshogs kyang/ srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ bdud rol pa skya tshogs te/ mtshon sna lnga ni zhag dang bcas// gser dngul zangs lcags mda' gzhu 'phen// nad

mtshon rnam pa lnga yis 'debs// dus dus rtag tu rgyu bar byed// bdud chen ma rungs brdung ba ste// mi zad rol pa'i ming nas phyung// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i mtshon cha 'dzin// dus dang lo tshegs mtshams su
'byid// legs dang nyes pa'i las phan gnod// gdug pa 'khor bcas mdos 'di bzhes// srid pa'i bdud po ma rungs pa// che yang ni bdud kyis bsad/ chung yang ni bdud kyis bsad/ zhe sdang ngan pa slar
la brtul// gdug pa'i bdud tshogs rong tshogs kun// sil ma stong tshogs sprul par bcas// ri rab nam mkha' mda' dang bcas// spyan gzigs skor cha phud dang bcas// mthun pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ sgo
ba 'phrang ba yis/ gdug pa'i tshogs kun mdos 'di bzhes// bdud 'khor ma lus mdos 'di bzhes// srid pa yongs la khyab par bsngo// de ltar bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/
bdud kyi bsngo ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa/ btsan rnams bcos par bya ba na/ gsang ba stobs dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin des/ mthun pa'i gnas der

gzung nas/ gtsang ma ma nyams gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ma'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen po brtsegs/ kha dog rigs dang bstun/ dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i
gur// 'byung ba dar gyis brgyan par bya// btsan bshos gru bzhi la ni/ mda' khra re re gzugs pa'o// zur gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig la// nam mkha' rigs mthun re re'o// gzhan yang gzugs brnyan mang pos

bskor// gla ba sgo ba sha ba dang// wa 'phar khra dang 'ug pa dang// bya dmar khyi dang spyang khu dang// srin bya dang ni ne tso dang// nag chung bya dang hor pa dang// ra dang lug la sogs pa dang// mdzes pa'i gzugs

brnyan mang pos bskor// dmar ba dar gyi yol ba bya// spyan gzigs sha khra phud sogs dang// 'bru sna bca' dang mdzes pa'i sa// rin chen srin mo brgyan dang bcud// de ltar rta pa phub can lnga// mdzes pa'i

rgyan dang ldan pa yis// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan gyi rdzas bsags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// hUM/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// gzer nad ma lus gtong byed pa// nga rgyal btsan
tshogs ma yin nam// srid pa'i btsan chen mdos la byon// yul dang btsan yul pha gi na// btsan yul dngo gsum bya ba na// de na btsan chen rong 'tshogs rnams// btsan las snyan la mchis/ kha drag bdud la

rgol/ mthu chen phya la rku/ do sngo rgyal la sngo/ 'gran 'tshol klu la 'tshol/ gdug pa yi ni btsan gyi tshogs// bse mkhar smug po ldems se ldems// g.yu yi kha bad khyil li li// de yi nang shed na/ srid pa'i spyi
btsan kha bzhi rmig brgyad bzhugs// sku la ber chen dmar po gsol// phyag na btsan mda' btsan mdung bsnams// btsan gyi gcig gi lus po la/ kha bzhi ni yod pa byung/ rta gcig gi lus la/ rmig pa ni

brgyad du byung/ de la ming btags pa/ btsan kha bzhi mgyogs pa sde brgyad ces kyang bya/ 'khor yang btsan phran mang pos bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// 'byung ba ni lnga yi btsan/ nyi ma dbus kyi
btsan/ 'byung ba ni nam mkha'i bu/ btsan dbug ni rta ru smug mchong mkhar ni smug po'i nang na gnas// mchog mkhar ni gra ru 'khrugs// zhags dang ni mda' ru chas// dbus btsan ni mang pos bskor/ srid

pa'i mdos la byon/ nyi ma shar gyi btsan/ 'byung ba sa yi bu/ dung mkhar gyi nang na bzhugs/ btsan dkar ni btsan/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ nyi ma lho yi btsan/ 'byung ba chu yi bu/ btsan sngo rta ru sngo/
zhags dang mda' ru chas/ btsan phran 'khor gyis bskor/ lcags sngon po'i nang na gnas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ nyi ma nub kyi btsan/ 'byung ba me yi bu/ mi dmar rta ru dmar/ zhags

dang mda' ru chas/ zangs mkhar dmar po'i nang na gnas/ 'byung ba nub tu dbang sgyur zhing/ nub btsan stong dang bcas/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ nyi ma byang gi btsan/ 'byung ba rlung gi bu/ btsan ser

rta ru ser/ zhags dang mda' ru chas/ gser mkhar ser po ldems se ldems/ byang btsan stong dang bcas/ 'byung ba lnga yi btsan lnga yang// gnas ni 'byung ba lnga la gnas// bskyed kyang 'byung ba lnga yis

bskyed// sdud kyang 'byung ba lnga yis sdud// 'byung ba'i btsan lnga yang/ 'byung ba tsha grang nad kyi bdag/ gzer nad gdug pa'i bdag po yin// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// lung ma ni ral gsum du/ bse

mkhar ni dmar po la/ g.yu yi kha bad can/ dung gi re bzhi can/ byi ru'i sgo mo can/ de yi nang shed na/ skyes bu lung btsan gnas/ sku lus dmar po ldem pa la// ral pa can la mche ba can// sku la na bza'
dmar po gsol// phyag na mda' gzhu mtshon zhags bsnams// srid pa'i btsan chen ma rungs pa/ khyod ni srid pa'i bdag po ste// sems las lha btsan gang bur srid// sha las sa btsan stong sde srid/ khrag

las chu btsan stong sde srid// rus las brag btsan stong sde srid// dbugs las rlung btsan stong sde srid// skra las shing btsan stong sde srid// dros las me btsan stong sde srid// glo ba las ni gangs btsan stong sde
srid// mchin pa smu btsan stong sde srid// yan lag sde bzhi las/ btsan chen kha bzhi srid/ pags pa las ni yul btsan/ chig mgo bcu gsum las/ rol pa ni skya tshogs srid/ sgal tshigs ni mgo rnams las/

rol pa skya tshogs srid/ btsan chen ni ma rungs pa/ spyan g.yas g.yon las/ nyi btsan zla btsan srid/ nang khrol ni sman lnga ni/ dur btsan 'khor bcas srid/ skra dang spu las ni/ nags btsan ma rungs srid/
