sul mangs g.ya' btsan sngon po srid// pho ba spang btsan ser por srid// lte ba spo btsan 'khor bcas srid// srid pa'i btsan chen 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu skyed byed 'khor dang bcas// 'khor dang bcas pa
mdos la byon// se te ni grum chen na/ mchong mkhar smug po ldems pa'i nang shed na// srid pa'i se btsan rol pa bzhugs// de ring btsan gyi rgyal po ba// a mi ster dang us mi gter// gdug rtsub gzer

nad bdag po dang// rngam pa mi sdug ang mi ster// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// btsan gyi rgyal po ba/ du ra ni rwa rtse ste/ mi sdug khrag nad bdag po yin// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// gnam btsan ni
'phrul bu rje/ btsan smug rta smug zhags pa 'dzin// btsan dkar rta dkar dung zhags 'dzin// g.ya' btsan ya ba rje/ btsan sngon rta sngon mda' dang gzhu// spang btsan 'bar ba rdo rje ste// btsan
rta ser po ral gri 'dzin// brag btsan ni 'bar ba rje/ btsan dmar rta dmar srid pa'i bdag/ ma rungs gdug pa sgrol la brtson// btsan chen rngams pa mdos la byon// nags btsan rngam pa srid pa'i

bdag/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// gsod byed ma rungs mdos la byon// srid pa'i bdag po btsan gyi rje// g.ya' btsan rngam pa mdos la byon// btsan chen gdug pa ma rungs pa// ya ba skya ni rngam pa'i

tshogs// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// ya ba skya ni bcu gsum dang// ya ba skya bdun dang/ ya ba skya lnga dang/ ya ba skya gsum dang/ ya ba skya gcig dang/ srid pa'i btsan ma rungs pa/ gdug pa ma lus rngam
pa ste// chibs su btsan rta re re chibs// rin chen 'bar ba'i sra ba can// mtshon gyi zhags pa sdog cing 'phen// gang la babs pa gzer nad gtong// btsan gyi kha yogs mi la 'debs// sha la ni rta la du
byed// btsan chen gdug pa ma rungs pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// srid pa'i btsan chen po// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// btsan chen gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa'i btsan chen gdug pa
can// la la mi gdug rta mgo can// la la btsan gyi shing rings khyer/ kha nas khrag gzer mda' ltar 'phen// gdug pa'i btsan ma ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la nad gtong ba// de ring srid pa'i mdos la
byon// btsan ni mi lus g.yag mgo can// btsan ni mi lus bya mgo can// btsan ni mi lus sha ba'i mgo/ btsan ni mi lus lug gi mgo/ btsan ni mi lus 'ug pa'i mgo/ lag na zangs kyi sog
le thogs// sha la ni spyod sbyongs byed/ khrag la ni 'thor 'thung byed/ de las sprul pa'i btsan chen ni// gdug pa'i btsan tshogs ma rungs pa// la la rngams pas gdug pa ste/ khrag nad gzer nad bdag po
yin// srid pa'i btsan ni gdug pa can// sprul pa khams gsum yongs su gtong// ltas ngan sha bdud mos 'debs// mi mthong 'ug pa'i sgra yis 'debs// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// ces rim pas
bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan bcos pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga rgyal gzer nad zhi ba'i phyir// btsan rnams dag la bsngo ba
ste// hUM/ nga rgyal ni btsan mchod phyir/ 'bru sna ni gcal du bkram/ gtsang ras ni gdan du bting/ srid pa mi 'gyur ri rab rten// srog shing mi 'gyur dpag bsam shing// brten pa 'byung ba lnga la
brten// gnas lugs 'gro ba'i gzugs bkod de// srid pa chags byed rten pa dang// rin chen sna lnga rnam pa'i rten// srid pa mi 'gyur sku rten mkhar// 'bru sna mang po gcal bkram nas// spyan
gzigs bskor cha de bzhin bkang// dmar po dar gyi yol du bri// bse yi skyogs la chang phud bltams// 'phur dgu 'dzum pa'i gzugs kyis bskor// srid pa'i btsan la mchod/ hUM/ nga rgyal ni btsan tshogs

gdug pa'i 'khor/ nga rgyal ni zhi bya'i phyir/ spyi btsan ni ming nas phyung/ dmar po ni gzer nad bdag mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes cig 'byung ba lnga yi bu/ rin chen sna lnga'i bdag mtshon zhags ni gdug pa

can/ tsha grang ni gzer ba'i bdag gdug pa'i ming nas phyungs/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ srid pa yi ni skyed byed btsan/ btsan chen ni kun gyi yab/ skyes bu ni ming nas phyungs/ brag btsan ni stong sde'i
bdag khyab byed ni nad kyi 'chab/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud long la/ se phung ni grangs kyi btsan/ srid pa'i btsan chen po/ rol pa ni ming nas phyungs/ kar kong stong gi btsan/ rol
bu'i ming nas phyungs/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud longs la/ su ri ni g.yu mkhar bdag g.ya' btsan ni ming nas phyungs/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud longs la/
gser gnas ni gser gyi bdag spangs btsan ni ming nas phyungs/ drungs chen ri yi mkhar/ nags btsan ni ming nas phyungs/ lungs pa zangs kyi mkhar/ gso byed ma rungs pa/ g.ya' btsan ni ming nas
phyungs/ srid pa'i btsan tshogs kyang/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud long la/ ya ba ni skya tshogs te/ nyul byed ni tshe len po/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud longs la/ a mi
ster la u mi ster/ du ra ne btso dang/ lha btsan ni gang bu yang/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ klu btsan ni 'khor bcas dang/ sil ma 'khor tshogs kyang/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud long la/
sku yi glud dang gsung gi glud// thugs kyi glud dang bcas pa 'di// mda' ni mkhar te nam mkha' yul// mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud long la/ zhes rim rim par bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra
ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan la bsngo ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po bcos par bya ba ni// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas

su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen po brtsig kha dog 'dra ba'i rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing dang
nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba dar gyi sna lngas brgyan pa'o// bshos bu ldem pa bzhi dag la// nam mkha' rigs mthun re re'o// mda' khra mkhar thabs re re ste// rta dkar g.yag dkar mdzo dkar
dang// lug dkar ra dkar bya dang khyi// stag gzig dang ni seng ge khyung// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis bskor ba'o// za 'og gur dang dar dkar yol// bse phor dngul phor gser skyogs dang// sha khrag spyan
gzigs phud dang bcas// 'bru sna bcu gsum gcal du bkram// mda' dang me long brgyan pa'o// de ltar bsags la bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po bsag pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
pa'o//// hUM/ rgyal po chen po srog gi bdag/ srog bdag chen po ma rungs pa// srog bdag ni mched de bzhi// srog bdag ni sprul pa'i bdag/ tshe srog dbugs kyi bdag po rnams// de ring srid pa'i mdos

la byon// phyogs phyogs pha gi na/ shar phyogs pha gi na/ shel yul bya ba'i dkar po na// shel mkhar dgu brtsegs gnam du ldems se ldems// g.yu yi kha bad khyil li li// dung gi sgo mo thabs se thabs// de

yi nang shed na/ srog gi bdag po ya jo bzhugs// rgyal po gcig la ming gsum pa// rdo rje legs mchog ces kyang bya// btsan 'gong btsan mchog ces kyang bya// shar lha chen po zhes kyang bya/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/

yang la shel gyi skyes bu zhes kyang bya// ma ni srid pa'i rgyal mo yin// de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa'i sras// rgyal po ming srig gnyis su byung// ming po jo bo dkar po lags// sring mo mi btsun ub chos g.yar mo
bsil// ming po chen po bcos su gsol// rgyal po yang phod dkar po dang// rgyal po'i sku mkhar ldem pa la// gcan gzan gdug pa'i na bza' gsol// shel gyi zangs gri rked la btsugs// rta se dkar skya
chibs su chibs// dung mkhar ni phyag srid pa'i kun gyi bdag dang po 'dzam gling bzhir babs/ de nas li yi yul du byon// li yis phyag tu glud phul nas// mi spangs sad kyi rgyal por btags// yang gcig

li yi yul du byon// yang lis phyag tu glud phul nas// yang spangs sad kyi rgyal por btags// de nas mi nyag yul du byon// mi nyag gis glud phul nas// ldeng no sad kyi rgyal por btags// de nas zhang zhung

yul du byon// spyan mig g.yas pa shel du byung// de phyir shel ge shag ces bya// rgyal po chen po ste/ srid pa'i skye 'gro srog gi bdag/ phyag kyang thugs kyi dkyil du byung// lcags gri rnon po phyag na bsnams// pho

brgya srog gi bdag po mdzad// klu rta rnam pa gsum du byung// glud kyi dang po ru/ lug rta se 'o dang/ ra dkar po gnya' nag go/ glud kyi bar pa ru/ bya rta bo'o// glud kyi mtha' ma ni/ bshos mchog ldems pa
dang/ smyug ma tshigs dgu dang/ 'bru bcud ni ser kha la/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ hUM/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa/ dkar po spyan gcig pa/ phyogs phyogs ni pha gi na/ nyi ma

shar phyogs pha gi na// shel yul dkar po pha gi na// shel mkhar gan du ldems se ldems// shar phyogs gnam gyi dkyil shed na// mkhar ni nyi zla brtsegs pa'i mkhar// de 'dra'i mkhar gyi nang shed na// rgyal

po dkar po spyan gcig bzhugs/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ chu srin rgyal po ma ga ra// gnas pa rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas// ma ni srid pa'i rgyal mo ste// gnas pa ri rab zoms la gnas// de gnyis rgyud las sprul
pa las// rgyal po ming sring gnyis su byung// ming po dkar po spyan gcig pa// sring mo e ka dza ti ral gcig ma// ming po bcos su gsol/ dkar po spyan gcig pa/ rgyal mkhar ldem pa la/ rta dkar po 'od
can chibs/ dbu la ral gcig shar ra ra// dpral na mig gcig stengs se stengs// zhal nas tshems gcig thems se thems// dung gi mche ba thams se thams// nad kyi kha rlangs thul lu lu// phyag sor
gdug pa shad de shad// 'khar ba'i rnga chung blo la btags// 'dzam bu gling bzhi 'od kyis 'gengs// srog bdag dkar po 'od po che// 'od skar mda' tsam cig ltal la la// phyag na skyogs dkar tal

la la// srid pa'i rgyal po gdug pa can// gnam ral phyed kyi bdag po lags// sa chu phyed kyi bdag po lags// pho brgya ni srog gi bdag mo brgya ni srid kyi bdag rgyal po ni gdug pa can/ glud rta rnam gsum
ste/ glud kyi dang po ni/ g.yag dkar ru dmar dang/ mdzo dkar ru dmar dang/ rta dkar phum dmar te/ glud kyi dang po'o// glud kyi bar pa ni/ lug dkar po bya ga dang/ ra dkar ru dmar/ khyi dkar sna dmar

dang/ bya dkar ze dmar yin/ glud kyi mtha' ma ni/ bshos mchog gre cha dang/ smyug ma ni tshigs bdun dang/ skyes 'phang phud gtsang ngo// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ hUM/ phyogs phyogs pha gi na/ byang shar
pha gi na/ byang ri mthon po'i kha shed na// rtse la gnod sbyin stobs chen gnas// zur la yam shud dmar po bzhugs// rtsa na btsan btsun phyag gnyan grol// bzangs mkhar dmar po ldems se ldems// lo rom
bse sgo mo la/ mthing shun sngon po'i re bzhi la// byi ru dmar po'i g.yag shing gsal// zangs kyi gtan pa can/ zangs khri dmar po'i gdan stengs na// de na yam shud dmar po bzhugs// sku la stag lpags
zhol gsol/ phyag na zangs kyi zhags pa yang// 'dom ni dgu brgya dgu bcu rnams// pha ni dkar po mig gcig pa// ma ni srid pa'i rgyal mo yin// de gnyis sprul pa las/ rgyal po ming sring gnyis byung
ste// ming po yams shud dmar po yin// sring mo b+ha ga hri ti nad kyi bdag/ ming po ni bcos su gsol/ za ma mo brgya yi/ srid kyi ni bdag po yin/ glud kyi dang po ni/ ba dmar glang dmar dang/
lug rta ni dmar gro bo// glud kyi bar pa'o// bya dmar ze'i bdag po yin/ mtha' ma smyug ma tshigs lnga dang// skyes pa btsan gyi bdag po ni// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes la// srid pa'i bdag po mdos

'di long// hUM/ phyogs phyogs pha gi na/ nyi ma shar lho gnam gyi dkyil shed na/ yul de khu le khu stong na/ blon po khu le lag dgu gnas// gser mkhar ser po ldem pa la// g.yu yi kha bad khyil li li// de na

blon po khu le lag dgu gnas/ khyod kyi pha smos pa/ nam mkha' stong pa'i khams shed na// 'od phung stug po lams se lams// 'od phung de yi nang shed na// lcags kyi sdig pa kha dgu gnas// de ni khyod kyi pha
yin no/ khyod kyi ma gser gyi grog ma kha med ma/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gting na gnas/ de ni khyod kyi ma/ de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa las// rgyal po gcig la lag pa dgu// lag cig gnam gyi mthongs su
nyab// lag gcig de 'jom pa la/ lag gcig ston ka'i lo thog snang po/ lag cig dkar gyi thog la/ lag cig skyur gyi drungs kyang 'byin// lag gcig bdud kyi nang du rkyong// lag cig spyan gyi nang du
rkyong// lag cig bud med bu la rkyong// rgod ma de ni rte'u med dang// 'bri g.yag sham du gtong ba'i bdag po yin// lag cig stong khams yongs la nyab// de la ming btags pa/ khyab pa chen po zhes kyang

bya// ngang sprul pa chen po zhes kyang bya/ khu le lag dgu zhes kyang bya// rdzus pa chen po zhes kyang bya// tri se lag dgu zhes kyang bya// sku la gser khrab ser po gsol// phyag na gser mdung mtshams dmigs
bsnams// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// btsan chen ma rungs pa/ rgyal po chen po srog gi bdag/ srog bdag chen po ging dang bcas// 'gongs po sprul pa dgu dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la

byon// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// rgyal po chen po gdug pa can// srad chen bzhi dang sde bzhi dang// rgyal 'phran bcu gnyis 'khor dang bcas// srid pa'i grangs ma 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i
mdos bzhes la// rgyal po chen po sil ma'i tshogs// ma tshogs srid pa'i mdos la gshegs// ces rim par bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po bcos pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum
pa'o//// gdug tshogs ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// rgyal po dag la bsngo ba bya// hUM/ rgyal po ni gdug mchod phyir/ 'bru sna bcu gsum la/ srid pa mi 'gyur mdos su brtsam// mi 'gyur ri rab chen po
brtsigs// mi 'gyur dpag bsam shing bu bskyed// rtan pa'i nam mkha' yul du bri// mda' khra sku rten mkhar du bri// pam rim mdzes pa'i gzugs su ste// sems can mi 'gyur gnas su bstan/
de la 'bru bcud gcal du bkram/ gzugs mdzes ni mang pos bskor/ dar dkar ni yol du bres/ za 'og ni gur du phub/ bzang sku ni ras kyis brgyan/ bcud dgu ni zas kyis bskor/ rin chen ni skyogs
bkram nas/ spyan gzigs ni skor chas brgyan/ rgyal po ni gnyan la mchod/ hUM/ srid pa'i bdag po ste/ tshangs pa ni bskos kyi bdag skye 'gro ni dbang bsdus te/ srog gi bdag por bskor/ srog bdag ni ming
nas phyungs/ gdug pa'i rgyal po mdos 'di bzhes/ hUM/ srid pa'i bdag po ste/ bskos bdag ni gdug chen po/ me dgu ni chu dgu'i mkhar/ dgu mtshams ni gnag tu bsdams/ sprul pa ni mang po'i bdag srog
bdag ni rgyal po'i bu/ dkar po spyan gcig ming nas phyungs/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ hUM/ nam mkha' 'od kyi bu gcig pa// bar snang khams nas sku gshegs te// dra chen kun gyi bdag po
lags// 'od ldan gser chas srog gi bdag/ gzugs mdzes phyag ni dgu ru grag khyab byed chen po zhes kyang bya/ khu le lag dgu mdos 'di bzhes// srid pa yongs kyi mnga' bdag po// srid pa'i bdag po
glud bzhes la// hUM/ zangs ri zangs mkhar gzhal yas nas// yams shud dmar po'i btsan 'gong rje// srid pa gsum la dbang byed de// srog bdag dmar po'i ming nas phyungs// srid pa gdug rtsub zhi bar

gyis// stong khams khyab byed ma rungs pa// sgrol ging the'u rang ming nas phyungs// spun dgu srid pa'i mdos bzhes la// hUM/ srid pa'i sad chen gdug pa can// seng sad sad dang mi 'phangs sad// sprul pa sad

dang khyung pa sad// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes la// ri rab mi 'gyur srid pa'i bdag/ 'byung ba mi 'gyur rten pa'i glud// gzugs brnyan mang po sku yi glud// sgra snyan mang po gsung gi glud// mdangs ldan
mar me thugs kyi glud// zang zing mang po longs spyod glud// rin chen sna lnga gter gyi glud// spyan gzigs mang po zas glud// mdos bdag mdos bzhes la// nam mkha' yul du bsngo// mda' khra rin chen

mkhar du bsngo'o// phyi yi yul la nang gi bcud// yul sems dag pa'i glud du bsngo// de ltar bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po la bsngo ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas ston
pas bka' stsal pa/ ma bdud bcu gsum bcos pa ni/ gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des/ mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna bcu gsum phye ma la// byin
gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab gzugs byas te// cha gsum dag tu de bzhin te// cig la ri rab chen po yi/ kha dog rigs dang dpag bsam shing// tshon rdzogs nam mkha'i gur
kyang dbug/ 'byung ba'i rten ni dar sna lnga// bshos bu bcu gnyis dag la ni// mda' dang nam mkhas brgyan pa'o// 'brang rgyas bcu gsum dag la ni// mo 'phang mdzes pa bcu gsum mo// de ltar bya nag lug
nag dang/ khyi nag la sogs gsob gzugs dang// gcan gzan sha dang 'dab chags sgro// sha khrag la sogs gtor ma khrag/ snying sna khrag dang gtor mar bcas// 'bru sna'i gcal dang rin chen phud// mthing

nag gser gyi yol dang bcas// lo ma me tog 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing// de ltar rim pas bya ba ste// de ltar rim par bsags nas ni// mthun rdzas rim pas bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las// ma bdud bcu gsum gyi rdzas gsag pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// hUM/ srid pa'i bdag po ma rungs pa// tshe srog dbugs kyi bdag po yin// srid pa'i bdud mo ma yams tshogs// de ring srid pa'i

mdos la byon// yul dang bdud yul ma gi na/ khro bo dung chen ma gi ta/ khrag gi khu 'phang sil li li// srid pa'i bdag mo bzhugs pa'i gnas/ khrag gi 'bab chu zul lu li// dur bya kang ka dir ri ri/ khra skad
mang po dir ri ri// bdud kya byung ka ya ma phyungs// de yi yul shed na/ ma bdud bcu gsum de na bzhugs// thod rus 'bar ba'i mkhar chen ldems se ldems// thod pa gdug pa ma rungs pa// la la stag dang
gzig gi thod// la la bya dang rgod kyi thod// la la mi dang sbra yi thod// la la g.yag dang sha skya thod// thod pa'i mkhar la gnam lcags gzer// de na bdud mo bcu gsum gnas// la la bdud mo bro gang
'cha'// la la bdud mo ni mdun stangs gcod// la la bdud mo g.yab mo 'debs// la la bdud mo mtshon kha 'bal// la la bdud mo nad rkyal 'khur// la la bdud mo sha khrag gcod// la la khram bam shod
d+he togs// ma bdud bcu gsum de na bzhugs// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud mo stong khri rgyal mo de// sku mdog mthing kha chen mo la/ khrag li dmar po khyil li li// sku la sma thul mdzes pa
gsol// phyag na khrag gi phor ba bsnams// ma bdud chen po bcu gsum yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos bzhes la// nag mo chen mo ma rungs pa// bdud mo khram bdag chen mo ste// gsod pa'i las la rab tu
brtson// gdug byed ma lus sprul pa che// sha za khrag 'thung ral pa can// sku ni mthing nag chen mo la// ral pa'i zar bu mun ltar gtibs// mche ba rgya zor brjid pas gtsigs// chibs su bdud rta rkang
gsum chibs/ khram bam g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon/ sku la re lde stag sham can// srid pa'i bdag mo yin par grags// stong gsum rgyug cing nad gtong ma// nad bdag ma rungs srid pa'i
bdag 'khor yang nag mo bong zhon tshogs// srid pa'i nad gtong tshogs kyis bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud mo gdug pa ma rungs pa// de yi nu mo chen mo ni// sku ni mi mngon mdzes pa
la// sku la na bza' smu thul gsol// phyag na g.yu yi zor ba bsnams// chibs su g.yu mdzod ru ldem chibs// 'khor yang nad gtong tshogs kyis bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// ma bdud de yi 'og

ma ni// ral pa can la mtshon zhags can/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skem// sna nas rlung byung bskal pa 'khrug/ gdung byed khram dang zhags pa thogs// sprul pa mi zad nad du gtong// chibs su mthing gi mdzo mo
chibs// skye 'gro yongs la nad gtong ma// ma bdud chen mo ma rungs pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// yul dang bdud yul ma gi na// bdud mo de ni gcung mo ni// bdud mo rngam pa'i 'phrul mo

che// chibs su rnga mo ga pa chibs// skye 'gro'i skeg rtsis khram shing g.yas// ye shes mtshon gyi gru gu g.yon// sku la 'ja' tshon thul pa gsol// nad dang rims kyi bskos 'debs ma// bdud mo chen mo mdos la

byon// bdud mo de yi gcung mo ni// dkar nag 'jig pa'i mgo mo ti// sku la dred thul stag thul gsol// phyag na b+ha na d+ha khrag gis bkang// spyug pa'i glu len sprul pa 'gyed// mi zad pas ni yongs bkang
nas// pags pa'i g.yab 'dor lings se lings// mi la skrangs thor 'brum nad gtong// mi zad khrag la rab tu rngams// bdud byed chen mo mdos la byon// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur ma// nad yams dag

gi bdag mo ste// smin ma gzings shing mche ba gtsig/ gsad pa'i las la rab tu brtson// skye shi gnyis kyi rtsad gcod ma// rngams pa'i gzugs kyis zangs kyi so le thogs// sha dang khrag la rab tu dad// mi

bzad chen mo mdos la byon// de yi gcung mo mi bzad ma// bdud mo rngam pa'i nga ro can/ khrag gi nga ro 'jigs par sgrog/ bdud mo gdug pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// phyag na nad kyi rkyal pa dang// mtshon cha sna

lnga'i gru gu thogs// mi bzad gdug pa srid pa'i bdag/ skye shi gnyis kyi bya ra mdzad// sha la dga' zhing khrag la dad// spyugs glu len cing dur khrod nyul// thod pa thogs nas khams gsum bskor// mchog

phur rtsang phur thogs nas dur khrod klog/ mi nad phyugs nad gtong zhing khams gsum khyab par nyul/ gsod pa'i las la rab tu brtson// mi bzad gdung ba mang po tshogs// de yi gcung mo ma rungs pa// sku ni
sngon mo 'od 'bar ma// sku la na bza' ber chen gsol// phyag na thod khrag zhags pa bsnams// chibs su chu rta zhur chen la// gru dang rdzings kyi sga bstad ma// gru dang rdzings kyi nang shed na// dar

sgra sngon po gur du phub// gur chen de yi nang shed na// dom dang kyung ka ro ta dang/ 'khor yang chu bdud rol pa stong gis bskor// nad bdag chen mo ma rungs pa// pho lhog glang thabs bdag mo yin/ khris pa sha
ya'i bdag mo ste// skrangs 'bur rdzings pa'i bdag mo yin// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud mo de yi 'og ma ni// me bdud dmar po ral pa can// dmar mo mche gtsig rnga mo chibs// mda' dang me
zhags rtog 'phen ma// tsha ba'i bdag mo gdug pa can// srid pa'i bdag mo yin par grag/ ma bdud chen mo gdug pa can// gdug byed srid pa'i kha lo sgyur/ khams gsum dbang sdud ma rungs ma// gsod
sogs ma rungs rngam pa can// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud mo gdug pa ma rungs ma// bdud mo'i lus la rngams stabs can// sprul pa yongs su gtong bar byed// bdud mo dur khrod gnas kyi

'jol chen ma// dur khrod gnas la rgyu byed cing// rgya grogs 'dus la dred mo'i mgo/ ral pa g.yag rgod 'jug ma 'dra// lag na mgo rgyal rtsed mo rtse// smin mtshams gong nas kha skad 'thor// gang nas gang

du rbad pa'i tshe// lcags kyi tshub nag smra zhing 'gro// tshub nag nang nas lcags mda' 'phen// dur khrod gnas kyi 'jol le ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bdud mo rngams pa ma rungs pa// srid pa'i sha

khrag za byed ma// nag mo khrag mig za byed ma// bdud mo rngams pa ma rungs pa// srid pa'i mnga' bdag dur khrod gnas// bdud mo kha bkra sprug 'gro ma// bdud mo chen mo ma rungs pa// tsha len dbugs len
bdag mo yin// yams nad khrag skyug gtong ba dang// smyo 'bog gtong dang ldog rgal bdag/ bdud mo ma rungs 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// nad ka bdud ka slar la brtul// bdud
mo ma rungs srid pa'i bdag/ bdud mo stobs tshogs rngams pa che// bdud mo rngam pa khug pa len// srid pa'i bdag mo ma rungs pa// bdud mo kha 'dar la sogs te// srid pa byad ma la sogs kun// tshe srog
dbugs kyi glud 'di bzhes// ces rim par bsngos la rdzogs par bskyal ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo'i mdos kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal
pa// ma bdud dag la bsngo ba ni// hUM/ srid pa yongs la mnga' byed pa// ma bdud ni gnyan mchod phyir// mdzes pa'i ni gdan stengs su// 'bru sna ni gcal du bkram/ 'byung ba'i rigs su brtsegs/ ri rab
chen po'i rten/ dpag bsam ni mi 'gyur shing/ rin chen ni lnga'i gur/ mthing kha dar gyi yol du bres/ gzugs brnyan ni mang pos bskor/ spyan gzigs ni bskor chas bskor/ sha khrag ni gtor
ma dang/ snying sna'i 'phreng ba dang/ 'bru bcud ni rtsi sman dang/ mda' nas ni g.yul mkha' dang/ srid pa'i ras dgu dang/ zas ni bcud dgu dang/ rin chen 'phreng ba dang/ byi ru'i skras pa dang/ gzugs

mdzes ni mang po dang/ mthun pa'i ni yas kyis mchod/ hUM/ dri za ni khril sgrol ma/ gsod byed ni ma tshogs dang/ tshems gcig ni gdug pa'i tshogs/ rngams pa ni ma rungs pa/ sprul pa ni gsod brtson ma/ las
la ni rab tu grags/ gsod dang ni gcod la dga'/ sprul pas yongs ni dbang du byed/ mdos bdag lags kyis mdos bzhes cig/ srid pa yongs kyi nyul le ma// mche gtsigs rngam pa khrag mig ma// rngam
pa'i nad gtong mdos 'di bzhes// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// gdug tshogs sprul pas khams gsum gang// mi bzad nag mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag lags kyis mdos bzhes cig/ za byed
gdug pa nyul le ma// sha za khrag 'thung nyul le can// nad gtong mi zad pa'i 'khor// srid pa'i bdag ste sprul pa che/ khyab byed chen mo'i sprul pa che// gdug pa'i tshogs la gdug pa can/ khrag gi

bdag mo mdos la byon// srid pa'i bya ra ma rungs pa// gsod byed ral can skye 'gro sgrol// gdug byed ma lus kun sgrol ba// ma mo khrag mig sprul pa che// hUM/ thod mkhar gdug pa sprul pa ste/ khrag 'thung dur khrod
chags ldan ma// bcu gsum grangs dang rab ldan la// skye 'gro kun gyi bdag bskos pa// bdud mo bcu gsum ming nas phyung// ma bdud chen mo mdos la byon// 'byung ba kun la dbang sgyur ma// srid pa'i
bdag mo mdos bzhes la// srid pa yongs la dbang byed cing// gdug pa'i tshogs dang srin po'i ste// sha za chen mo'i ming nas phyungs// stong khams kun tu khyab byed ma// sil ma stong tshogs mdos la
byon// bdud mo ma rungs gdug pa can// nam ni ye shes rigs pas te// mkha' ni skye ba med pa'i don// yul sems dag pa'i glud 'di bzhes// gsang ba'i dam rdzas 'di bzhes la// ma rungs nad rnams zhi

bar gyis// ces rim par de ltar bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mo la bsngo ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ the'u rang stong rtsa gcig bcos pa
ni// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma'i gdan stengs su// 'bru sna bcu gsum phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab chen po
brtsigs/ kha dog 'dra ba'i rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba'i dar gyis brgyan par bya// de la rim par bsag par bya// bshos bu stong dang rtsa gcig

la// mda' khra stong dang rtsa gcig btsugs shar du'o// ngar mi stong dang rtsa gcig la/ nam mkha' stong dang rtsa gcig btsugs lho ru'o// bya stor rtsa gcig la phod kyis btsugs pa nub/ byang bshos stong rtsa gcig

la 'gongs thum pa stong rtsa gcig byang du'o// rta thod la mkhar stong bris pa shar du'o// drel thod la mkhar brgya bris pa lho ru'o// rtol thod la mkhar stong rtsa gcig bris pa nub tu'o// bong thod la mkhar stong rtsa

gcig bris pa byang du'o// de ltar bris pa dang/ gzugs brnyan rta dgu/ glang dgu/ lug dgu ngar mi dgu sha khrag dang/ gzugs brnyan mang po rin po che sna lnga'o// bso shas phud dang 'bru gcal dang/ dar gyi

yol ba dang bcas par bya/ de ltar bsags la bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang bcos pa'i rdzas gsag pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// hUM/ srid pa'i rgyug 'gro ma lus pa// the brang

stong tshogs ma lus pa// stong khams rgyug cing tshe srog nyams/ khyab bya stong tshogs mdos la byon// srid pa'i the'u rang stong gi rje// la la byang chub sems dpa' yi// rigs te sa la gnas pa'i tshul// la la brgya

byin lha'i sde dpon srid pa'i 'dzin byed// la la zhe sdang bdud kyi sde ste bdud spyod las rnams byed// la la nga rgyal btsan gyi sde ste gzer ba'i nad rnams gtong// la la dkor bdag rgyal po'i sde ste srog gi

bdag po byed// la la bdud mo ma yams bu ste nad yams ma rungs gtong// la la the brang stong tshogs sde ste bang chen pa// la la sde brgyad cho 'phrul bu ste drag po'i thog ser 'bebs// la la gnod sbyin bu ste

sha dang khrag la dga'// la la sa bdag gdug pa'i bu ste nad gdug ma rungs gtong// la la gdug pa klu yi bu ste mdze nad ngan grum 'on dig skrangs 'bur gtong// the brang stong tshogs ma rungs pa// srid pa

yongs la khyab byed pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// the brang gdug pa ma rungs pa// rgyu ni byang chub sems sde ste// sa la gnas shing gnod mi byed/ khyed la zhe sdang mi mnga' yang/ 'khor ste the brang gdug

pa zhi phyir mdos la byon// the brang gdug pa ma rungs pa// brgya ni brgya byin lha yi sde// srid pa'i nor gyi mdzod 'dzin byed// sku lus mdzes pa'i 'od 'bar ba// rin chen rgyan ni mdzes par brgyan// longs spyod
che la 'khor tshogs ldan// brgya byin 'khor bcas mdos la byon// brgya ni zhe sdang bdud kyi bu// mthing nag ral can bdud gcod byed// gsad pa'i las la rab tu brtson// la la dom bu nag gu chibs nas
rgyug/ la la stag mo ri bkra chibs// la la bya nag skyung kha chibs// la la rta nag rting dkar chibs// la la rngam pa ma rungs pa// la la khra chen dang dmar chibs// la la gzig chen thig le

chibs// la la pags rlon gyon pa ste// la la gri dang star chen sog le thogs// la la rngams shing khrag la dang// srid pa yongs su rgyug byed cing// bdud gcod las la rab tu brtson// srid pa'i the brang ma

lus pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// brgya ni nga rgyal btsan gyi bu// dmar ser ral pa gtibs pa ste// la la bya chen dmar la chibs// la la 'ug pa su ru/ la la 'phar spyang gdug pa/ za 'og dmar po

lus la bdon// lag na zangs gri so le bsnams// srid pa'i sha la 'dre rgyang rtse// sha la dad cing khrag la rngam// ma rung gdug pa 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// rgyal 'gong khra bo brgya byung

ste// rgyal 'gong ma lus gdug pa'i tshogs// la la rte rid ga pa chibs nas rgyug/ la la phud bya gzhad mo chibs nas rgyug/ la la rgya bya de pho chibs nas rgyug/ rgyal 'gong gdug pa ma rungs pa// de ring srid
pa'i mdos la byon// brgya ni bdud mo ma yams te// gdug pa'i lus la nad gtong ma// brgya ni gdug pa klu yi tshogs// rngam pa mi sdug lus po la// 'brum bu dag gi cha ga can/ kha nas nad kyi rlang ba

'phur// sna nas sdom dang sdig pa 'thor/ khyed ni sa bdag klu tshogs te// ma rungs gdug pa 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// srid pa yongs kyi bdag po yin// srid pa'i the brang spun dgu
byung// sku ni mdzes pa'i 'od 'bar la// gnam la gnas pa'i spyan dgu byung// gnam gyi dkar po 'od chen dang// gnam the dkar po dang// gnam lha byang chub gsum du byung// dar kar ral ka re re la// za

'og dkar khra'i cha ga can// shel gyi zangs gri sked la btsugs// ba dan rgyal mtshan re re bsnams// srid pa yongs la dbang du byed// bzhugs pa ni gnam la bzhugs// rgyu ni 'dzam gling khyab par rgyu// pho

brgya'i srog kyang gcod par byed// mo brgya'i srid kyang 'phrog par byed// byis pa chung brgya'i ngur kyang 'debs// the'u rang 'khor dang bcas pa yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// bar na gnas pa spun

gsum byung// ti se la ge ba ge gsum// klu la dri se dkar khra dang// ba ti nag po dang/ khri cig nag po ri lde gsol// lag na lde tshon dkar po re re bsnams// bzhugs pa bar snang khams la bzhugs// rgyu ba

'dzam bu khyab par rgyu// tshe len dbugs len bdag po lags// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa la gnas pa spun gsum byung// the se kun dge mchu rings gsum// zwo skya mkhar skya sde rgyal 'dzin// sle khra'i
gos ni re re gyon// gsad pa'i las la rab tu brtson// dkar gyi thog la nyab/ skyur gyi drungs la 'jib/ grong kha ni khyab par nyul/ mi la ni nad tu gtong/ phyugs la ni sod du byed/ sa la gnas

pa'i spun gsum yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// the brang gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// spyi rings dang ni lan to re// mang po tshe te re re/ khram do re dang ma rungs pa// btsan

to re dang yul to re/ khyed ni the brang gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// chas ni rin chen sna lnga'i chas// gdug pa ma rungs 'khor dang bcas// srid pa yongs la dbang du byed// gdug

tshogs nad kyi bdag po kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// the brang gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// spyi rings dang ni lan to re// yang le shod kyi skyes cig po// gdug pa'i the brang

ma lus pa// srid pa'i mdos la ma thogs myur du shog/ shar phyogs de ni pha gi na// byang shar bse mkhar sgo gcig na// the brang rgyal po ma rungs pa// pha ni tshangs pa stag gdong yin// ma ni srid ldeg ma mo

yin// de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa las// bu ni tshags chen stag chas can// lha yi yul du phyin pa las// lha yi bu mo chung mar byin// longs spyod bsam yas de na yod// lha yi nor bu brkus nas bros// phyag na
rdo rje thugs khros nas// lcags kyi ga'ur bsnol te bzhag tshangs 'gong khyod kyi mchid na re// bdag ni ma brdung ma bsad cig/ bdag ni sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrungs// bdag la yul gcig bri/ bdag la
zas gcig bskos/ ston pas yul dang zas bskos pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// srid pa'i mdos bdag chen po ste// lcags kyi mi rang sngon po bdun// mkhar ba lcags la grong kha khyab// phung 'gong

gdug pa mdos la byon// zangs kyi ming rang dmar po brgyad// bse yi sba ba gur tsam re re skye// byur 'gong spun brgyad mdos la byon// mi rang ni ser po lnga/ sgye ser ni blo la btags/ 'khar sen ni lag

tu thogs/ ra lpags ni gos su gyon// byur 'gong phung 'gong spun lnga yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// gdug tshogs ni ma rungs pa/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// the brang stong tshogs ma rungs
byed// las su gsod dang gcod la dga'// stong gsum rgyug cing stong gsum du/ 'gro cing 'byung po'i rims su gtong// ma rungs gdug pa mdos la byon// ces spyan drangs la rim par bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong

gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang gi mdos kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ hUM/ the brang ni gdug mchod phyir/ gzhi ma gtsang dkar gzhi/ 'bru sna ni gcal du bkram/ rin
chen ni ri rab dang/ mi 'gyur ni dpag bsam shing/ gur chen ni rin chen gur/ dung gi ni skas dang ldan// gzugs ni mang pos bskor// srog chags ni kun rdzogs so// gdug pa ni ma rungs
'khor// dar dkar ni yol du bres// sha sna ni gtor du bcas/ phud dang ni rin chen chas/ mda' dang ni nam mkhar ldan/ rin chen sna lngar bcas/ dar dang zab chen dang/ dgos pa ni kun bsog na/ the brang
ni bdud tshogs mchod/ gdug pa ni the brang stong tshogs dang/ ma thogs ni glud 'di bzhes/ sa la ni gnas pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ brgya byin ni nor bdag kyang/
srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ zhe sdang ni bdud kyi bu/ bdud gcod ni ming nas phyung/ srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ gdug pa ni bdud gcod kyang/ srid pa'i yongs la dbang du byed/ nga rgyal ni btsan gyi bu/
dkor bdag ni rgyal po'i bu/ bdud mo ni ma yams bu/ sa bdag ni klu yi bu/ gdug pa'i tshogs bcas kun/ srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ gdug pa ma rungs 'khor dang bcas// srid pa'i sa la dbang sgyur
byed// srid pa'i bdag po ma rungs rnams// sgrol byed rngam pa'i gdug pa can// ma lus 'khor bcas mdos bzhes la// gnam la gnas pa'i spun gnas te// gdug byed srid pa'i 'od zhon pa// dkar po spun

gsum ming nas phyungs// srid pa bar gyi rgyug byed pa/ khra bo spun gsum rgyug byed pa// ya 'grims khyab byed ma lus pa// nag po spun gsum rgyug byed pa// srid pa'i bdud po ma rungs pa// spun dgu srid pa'i
mdos bzhes la// gdug rtsub nad rnams zhi bar gyis// lan to re dang bse to re/ khri to re dag bcas pa rnams// btsan to re dang yul to re// gdug pa'i btsan stong 'khor dang bcas// mdos bzhes gdug

pa zhi bar gyis// srid pa'i the brang ma rungs 'khor// mi zad kha 'grim legs nyes lta// skye to re yi ming nas phyung// phung byed grong gi kha 'grims ma// phung 'go spun lnga'i kha 'grims ma/ khams gsum 'grims

zhing tshe len pa// dkar po mig gcig tshe len pa// ma rungs gdug pa zhi ba'i phyir// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// ma rugs smyo 'bogs nad kyi bdag/ srid pa'i the brang ma yin nam// sba bcan la mkhar

ba can/ phung 'gong spun tshogs zhes grags pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// stong gsum khyab byed mig nas phyugs// the brang stong tshogs ma rungs pa// srid pa khyab byed 'khor dang bcas// mdos bzhes

gdug pa zhi bar gyis// de ltar bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// sa bdag ces par bya ba na// sa bdag gdug
pa ma rungs pa'i// nad ni gtong bar byed pa ste// zha grum 'on dig skrangs 'bur dang// rdzings dang mdze nad g.yan pa dang// grum bu dang ni glang shu dang/ sha skam khrag 'gyur rus grum dang// spu

chad ma rungs gtong ba ste// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas der 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma dar gyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna bcu gsum phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin
bya// de la ri rab chen po brtsig kha dog 'dra ba'i rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba dar gyis brgyan pa'o// de la sbrul ni rigs bzhi gzugs// ri rab mkha' la phyogs
bzhi'i mgo 'jug rnams// nam mkha' rigs mthun dgu yang gzugs// ngar mi dgu dang bya dgu ste// 'brang rgyas dgu dang 'phang dgu yin// bshong bu de bzhin 'dra ba la// mda' mo nya mig re re
gzugs// de la gsang ba'i rdzas kyang bsogs// sman sna 'bru sna me tog sngos// dkar gtor dang ni mdzes pas bskor// gzhan yang lo chen bcu gnyis gzugs// shar du stag yos lho rta sbrul// nub tu bya

spre'u byang byi phag/ shar lhor 'brug la lho nub lug/ nub byang khyi la byang shar glang// ra sha khyi sha phag sha bsag/ de ltar bsag go/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag gi rdzas bsags pa'i le'u
ste nyer gcig pa'o//// hUM/ sa bdag gdug pa gnyan gyi bu// klu gnyan ma rungs gdug pa can// gdug byed gdug pa nad kyi bdag/ nad bdag ma rungs srid pa'i bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la

byon// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// 'byung ba lnga la gnas pa ste// la la 'byung ba nam mkhar gnas// la la 'byung ba sa la gnas// la la 'byung ba chu la gnas// shing dang rdo la gnas pa dang// sa bdag
gdug pa ma rungs pa// gser pa rim dgu la ni// sa bdag srid pa spun dgu gnas// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa'i sa bdag gnyan po kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// steng na bya khyung
gshog rdeb dang// rim dgu dur phag 'khun pa dang// phyogs mtshams kun nas g.yo ba dang// bar na 'dre lnga mchid 'tshal dang// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// gdug pa ma rungs 'khor dang
bcas// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs so// dbus la mnga' mdzad gtsang gtsang dang// rin chen gser la mnga' mdzad brtan ma yin// gtsang gtsang ni 'khor ba ste/ sa bdag
ni gnyan gyi bu/ mdzes khril ni gdug pa can/ sa bdag ni 'khor dang bas/ gtsang gtsang ni gdug pa can/ gnas ni dbus kyi sa la gnas// rgyu ni phyogs bzhi dag la rgyu// de la gdug pa'i nad bdag
ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// sa yi lha mo brtan ma ste// rin chen gser gyi sa la mnga' mdzad pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// sa yi dbang de
sangs rgyas bka'// gser gyi phag mo 'od 'bar ma// 'khor ni gdug pa mang po yang// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// srid pa'i sa bdag ma rungs pa// sa bdag gtsang kun gdug pa can// gdug pa che
la ko long sdom// gzugs sdug pa la sprul pa mang// ma rungs gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs kyang// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag be sna bya ba de// ma rungs gdug pa gya nom gzugs// dud 'gro'i
gzugs can mang pos bskor// gdug pa nad kyi bdag po yin// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag lag chen sprul pa che// mdzes pa'i rgyan la gdug pa che/ khros na nad rnams gtong bar byed// ma
rungs gdug pa mdog mi sdug/ sa bdag hong paN the se ste// gdug pa can la ma rungs pa// mdze grum 'on dig zha grum bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag chen po gdug pa can// shar gyi spo
la gnas pa yin// sa bdag mi lus stag skya'i mgo/ shing lo dkar khra gos su gyon// gdug pa'i lag na shing rings rgyal mtshan bsnams// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// 'byung ba shing la mnga'

yang mdzad// lho yi spo la gnas pa ni// mi yi lus la rta yi mgo/ gdug pa ma rungs srid pa'i bdag/ sho pho ser khra'i gon su gyon// gdug pa ma rungs nad kyi bdag/ nub kyi spo la gnas pa ni// mi lus phag
gi mgo bo can// shing lo dmar khri'i gos su gyon// byang gi spo la gnas pa ni// sa bdag mi lus byi ba'i mgo/ shing lo ljang khu gos su gyon// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// dbus kyi spo la gnas pa
ni// rus sbal khra bo ga pa'i tshul// shing lo smug po gos su gyon// gdug pa ma rungs nad kyi bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// la la dud 'gro nag chags
gzugs// la la dmar dang zal gyi gzugs// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// la la gya nom ma rungs gzugs// la la gdug pa sbrul gyi gzugs// la la nya sbal ljong mo'i gzugs// la la sdom sdig rtsang
pa'i gzugs// la la 'bu srin grog sbur gzugs// la la gya nom sprul pa che// gdug tshogs ma lus mdos la byon// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// pha ni shri pa ta yin te// ma ni 'byung ba lcags mig

ma// de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa las// ming po sa bdag khra bo spun dgu byung// sring mo sa bdag khra mo spun dgu byung// phyogs bzhi dbus la dbang yang bsgyur// nad rigs bzhi yang gtong bar byed// sring mo
khra mo spun dgu byung// ngams dang 'obs dang khron pa dang// ngam grog zam rdur shang shong dang// shing gcig dang ni lu ma gnas// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa/ khro mo'i lus la nya sbal thul pa
can// la la sdom sdig sna nas 'brul// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs khyed// lag na thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang// la la sbrul nag zhags pa bsnams// nya dag dag gis brgyan pa'o// gdug pa'i sa bdag 'khor
tshogs rnams// zhe sdang brtul las mdos la byon// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// sa skam dag la gnas pa ste// mi sdug gzugs la rtsang pa'i kha// nad du mdze dang grum bu dang// sha skam gzhogs g.yon
rdzings pa gtong// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// sa bdag gnyan po ma rungs rnams// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag gnyan tshogs sprul pa che// la la nad gtong shing la gnas// la la
nad gtong rdo la gnas// la la nad gtong ska dang rdzing dang lteng kar gnas// la la drung gcig shing la gnas// sa bdag gdug pa 'dam la gnas// sa bdag sa srin ma rungs pa// sa bdag sa la gnas

pa'i 'khor// rdo la gnas pa'i rdo bdag 'khor// sa bdag stong tshogs ma lus pa// 'byung ba'i bdag po da tshur byon// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag stong sde mang po yang// 'byung ba dag la dbang
sgyur te// sa bdag de le bya ba de// sku mdog sngon po zhags pa can// sa bdag dur len bya ba de// dkar ser bel mgo sprul pa stong// sa bdag sil ma stong tshogs 'gyed// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi

nas// sa bdag lo chen srid ma 'gyur// mtshams bzhi gshed bzhi ma skyon cig/ steng nas bya khyung gshog ma rdeb// 'og nas dur phag ma 'khun cig/ bar na 'dre lnga mchid ma 'tshal// gdug pa'i tshogs chen ni
mdos bzhes la// zhe sdang khrol la gti mug sol// nga rgyal chings la 'dod chags skoms// phrag dog ngan pa slar la brtul// gdug pa'i tshogs chen kun/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ sa bdag ni ral chen dang/
stag ral ni chen po dang/ sa bdag ni ma rungs pa/ gcer bu tshogs chen dang/ 'bod snyan ni gdug pa rnams/ sil ma ni stong gi tshogs/ 'dzam gling sa stengs khyab pa'i gnas// srid pa'i sa bdag gdug pa
can// klu dug ni gdug pa can/ 'od 'dra ni gzhal 'dra dang/ mi sdug ni gzugs 'dzin dang/ la la gzhon nu mdzes pa dang/ gdug pa'i klu gnyan kun/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar

gyis/ ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag mchod pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// ma rungs gdug pa zhi ba'i phyir// sa bdag gnyan tshogs
mchod pa'o//// hUM/ sa bdag ni gnyan mchod phyir/ gtsang dar ni gzhi stengs su/ 'bru sna gcal du bkram/ ri rab gling du bcas/ srog chags ni mang pos bskor/ dpag bsam ni rten pa'i
gnas/ srid pa ni yongs kyi gzhi/ gzugs mdzes ni srid pa'i bdag sha khrag sna tshogs mdzes pa mang pos bskor/ 'bru bcud ni rin chen bcas/ rigs bzhi sbrul gyis brgyan/ sa bdag ni gdug pa'i 'khor/
ma rungs ni gdug tshogs rnams/ sku yi mkhar du bris/ rten pa'i yul kyang bris/ gso byed ni sman dang bcas/ rin chen rnam lnga'i klong/ gdug tshogs ni mchod par bzhes/ sa bdag ni ma rungs pas/ sa
bdag ni gnyan gyi bu/ gtsang gtsang ni mdos 'di bzhes/ rin chen dbang sgyur ba/ lha mo brtan ma mdos 'di bzhes/ rigs bzhi'i nad rnams zhi bya'i phyir/ sa bdag ni rigs bzhi yang/ gnyan mchod ni
ming nas phyung/ bsam sbyor ni slar la brtul/ gdug pa ma rungs pa/ sa bdag ni khra bo ste/ khra bo spun dgu dang/ khra mo spun dgu dang/ zha grum bdag po mdos 'di bzhes// srid pa'i sa bdag ma rungs
pa// gdug pa'i 'khor tshogs ma rungs pa// phyogs bzhi'i spo la gnas pa yang// srid pa'i yongs la dbang du byed// srid pa ma rungs 'khor dang bcas// sa bdag sa stengs gnas pa ste// gzugs mi sdug la

gya nom pa// mi bzang dud 'gro'i gzugs 'dzin ma// srid pa'i gdug pa sa bdag 'khor// zhe sdang sbrul gyi gzugs 'dzin pa// nga rgyal rtsang pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ kha brgyad sdom gyi gzugs 'dzin pa// rdol
pa sbal pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa// bya dang ljong mo'i gzugs 'dzin pa// gti mug phag gi gzugs 'dzin pa// grog sbur dag gi gzugs 'dzin pa// bya dmar glang dmar gzugs 'dzin pa// ma rungs gdug
pa'i nad 'dzin dang// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs kyi nad bdag yin// ma rungs gdug pa gnyan tshogs te// rgyal rigs rje rigs dmangs rigs gdol
pa'i rigs// sha nad rus nad khrag nad chu ser nad// ma rungs gdug pa nad kyi bdag/ sa bdag skom dang sa bdag gtum po dang// sa bdag ma rungs srid pa'i bdag/ gdug pa gnyan tshogs ma rungs
pa// sa bdag gdug pa ma rungs pa// chu mig sngo dgu nas/ rin chen sbal pa dgu/ gdug pa ni gnyan yin te/ kha rlangs ni nad kyang gtong// gdug rtsubs bdag ming nas phyung/ mthun pa'i mdos 'di

bzhes/ gdug pa'i nad rnams zhi bar gyis/ de ltar bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag la bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten du ma
rungs pa'i nad yams dang/ khrag skyug dang/ smyo ba dang/ 'bog pa dang/ lkug pa dang/ rdzings pa dang/ gzhogs bskams pa dang/ kha son pa dang/ ma rungs pa sna tshogs gtong ba ni/ byang
'brog gdug pa can te/ byin gyis bcos par bya'o// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma ras kyi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna bcu gsum phye ma la// byin gyis

brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// gru bzhi ri rab tshul bzhin bya// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i gur// tha ma g.yag rkyang sha ba dang// gzhon pa'i bud med ral can dgu yis bskor// nam mkha' nag po dgu ni ri

rab de la gzug/ 'brang rgyas za ma tog dang bzhi dang mtshal gyi thig btab la// jo mo byang sman bzhi yi rdzas so// gzhan yang sha ras rtsod dang 'bri dang gzugs mang pos bskor// chan dang/ gtor ma dang/

snying 'phreng dang/ 'phang khra dang bcas pa'o// phud dang/ rin po che'i rdzas rnams bkram mo// de ltar bsags la spyan drangs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byang 'brog gi gsag pa'i le'u ste nyer

gsum pa'o//// hUM/ jo mo ni byang sman gtse/ sman chen ni mched de bzhi/ gtse bzhi ni steng la gnas/ byang gi gser thang g.yu le ma/ g.yu dang ni cho long rigs/ dung gi sman cig ma/ byang ho len rgyal mo
dang/ byang sman ni mched de bzhi/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ 'brog mo gdug pa ma rungs pa/ 'brog mo ni srid pa'i bdag nad yams ni ma rungs pa/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa/ gdug pa'i nad bdag
mdos la byon// srid pa'i bdag mo gtso chen ma// nag po ral can sprul pa che// 'brog mo gdug pa ma rungs pa// 'brog yul mgon pa grom pa na// 'brog ltar ni nar mo la/ sha rkyang ni krab se krab/ 'brog
mtsho ni stengs se stengs/ 'brog bya ni dir ri ri/ 'brog yul ni gdug pa'i gnas/ 'brog gnas ni ma rungs pa/ thod mkhar ni ldems se ldems/ de la lcags kyi sgo mo rtsal/ de yi nang shed na/ pha ni 'brog

gnas rgyal drad yin// ma ni hab sha sha zan ma// de gnyis rgyud las sprul pa las// 'brog chen ni spun gsum dang// 'brog mo ni spun dgu byung// gdug pa'i 'brog mo ma rungs pa// sha dang khrag la rab tu
dad// srin mo'i gzugs can rngam par byung// de ni gdug pa'i nad bdag ste// srid pa yongs la gnod pa dang// gdug lus rngam pa spun dgu byung// 'brog mo bu mo chen mo ni// nag mo ral can gdug pa
can// mche ba rgya zor bkug pa 'dra// mas kyi mche bas smin khung bslebs// yas mche brang gi lhen snar bslebs// smin ma khro chu 'breng mar 'dug/ mig ni khrag mig dmar por byung// g.yag lpags rlon pa
gos su gyon// lag na thod pa khrag bkang bsnams// 'brong pa rwa sngon chibs shing rgyug/ srid pa'i tshe ni rku bar byed// srid pa'i srog la sbar 'debs ma// srid pa yongs kyi bdag mo yin pa

ste// tshe len gdug pa gsod la brtson/ khyab byed ma rungs gdug pa can// srid pa rgyug cing nad 'debs ma// gang ltar rgyus pa'i sa phyogs der// thog dang ser ba 'bebs par byed// srog la bab pa rdul du
rlog khyed ni 'brog chen gdug pa mo// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// de yi nu mo ma rungs pa// sku mdog sngon mo 'od 'bar ma// mche ba can la ral pa can// ral pa gser g.yu mdzes pas bltams// sku
la g.yag lpags rlon pa gyon// tha ma gcan gzan gdug thod can// ral pa gser g.yu mdzes pas spras// phyag na thod pa mtshan zhabs khrag/ gdug pa'i tshogs dang bcas pa kun/ spyug pa'i glu len gad

rgyangs sgrog/ bden pa'i don bsrungs nyams pa sgrol// 'brog mo chen mo rgyug tsam na// rkyang bu dom bu shar ra ra// sha rkyang dmigs pa khrabs se khrabs// byang srin 'brog srin sil li li// gdug tshogs mi
bzad mdos la byon/ de yi gcung mo ma rungs pa// gdug pa mo ste ral pa can// mthing nag 'bar ba mche ba gtsigs// gsod byed rngam pa mche ba gtsigs// nag mo cibs su rtses mo rdu len chibs// dar
gyi gos zu nag po gsol// gser dang g.yu yi cha ga can// gdug pa'i tshogs can ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs su rgyug byed cing// nag mo nad dang ma rungs 'bebs// drag po thog ser mda' mo
mdzod// yan lag srid pa ma rungs pa// gdug byed rngam pa sprul pa'i bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// de yi nu bo mdos la byon// mthing nag sa le grus la chibs// ral pa mthing nag mun ltar
gtibs// ral pa'i gseb nas me stag 'phro// gdug byed ma la sprul pa 'phro// gdug pa 'khor bcas ma rungs pa// gsod pa'i las la rab tu brtson// 'brog mo sham sham nyams pa sgrol// 'brog mo ma
rungs sprul pa'i bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// 'brog mo rngam pa sprul pa che// 'brog mo ma rungs gsod la brtson// ser nag lus la khro mig ma// gtsod lpags rlon pa sku la gsol// gdug pa ma
rungs srid pa'i bdag/ srid pa'i ni ma rungs ma// srid pa yongs la dbang byed ma// gdug pa'i 'brog mo sprul pa che// lag pa pags pa'i g.yab 'dor ba// srid pa'i byin byed sha khrag za// 'dir byon srid

pa'i mdos la byon// srid pa'i gtsang chen byed mo yin// lus ni sel ba'i skye 'dra ma// mig gis mgo lus med par khengs// srid pa yongs la rgyug byed pa/ pho brgya'i srog la sbar thabs byed// mo brgya'i srog
la rkun ma byed/ byis pa'i dur yang 'debs par byed/ thab g.yag rog po zhon nas rgyug/ gang la bab pa rdul du gtang// mi bzad 'brog mo ral can rgyug/ thod pa'i 'phreng can rta thogs
pa// 'khor bcas ma lus mdos la byon// gdug byed ma rungs sprul pa'i bdag/ chibs su rnga mo ga pa chibs// gdug byed ma rungs nad bdag mo// ral pa mun nag kyil li li// mche ba gdug pa tal la
la// me mig dmar po khyims se khyims// sbar gdengs srog la shad de shad// nyams pa ma lus sgrol la brtson// srog dbugs kun gyi bdag po mdzad// byang srin dmar mo pho nyar 'gyed// btsan chen 'bar
ba dpung du byed// smyo 'bog gdug pa'i las rnams gtong// gdug pa ma lus nad kyi bdag/ gdug pa che zhing sprul pa che// g.yag rog mdzo rog rgyu ba'i tshul// bya dang bud med 'thab par ston// mi zad

gdug pa'i mdos la byon// de yi gcung mo mdos la byon// 'brog mo rdo rje drel sna ma// 'brog mo'i lus la yang dag ma// rngam pa'i tshul ni srin mo ste// nag mo ha ra mig gcig ma// ri 'bri nag mo'i ral ka
ma// lkugs ma lpags kyi thod ka can// lcags mda' lcags gzhu phyag na bsnams// sprul pa gdug pa ma rungs ma// srid pa ni yongs la rgyug/ gdug tshogs ma lus las la shog/ 'brog mo ma rungs srid pa'i
yum// srid mo rngam pa'i gtum bag can// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms par byed// gang ltar rgyu ba'i sa phyogs der// nad dang ma rungs gdug pa'i bdag kha nas khrag gi gru char 'bebs// mig nas me
'bar lams se lam// gdug tshogs ma lus sprul pa'i bdag/ srid pa yongs su nad gtong ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// de yi nu mo ma rungs pa// 'joms byed 'bar ba sprul pa mo// mthing nag

ral pa mda' tsam shar ra ra// dred thul skyugs thul zhal la la/ khrag phor 'khyil zhing lag na 'gyed// rta rkyang 'bri gnag ra lug 'phral la bcug/ sbra nag gur nag ldir ri ri// sgye mo gdug pa lams se
lam// 'brog mo lcog mo lhangs se lhangs// ra rgod lug rgod rta rgod 'phral la bcug/ gdug pa'i byang srin ral can dpa' la rngam// nad stong srin mo shar ra ra// mi bzad chen mo mdos la byon// srid pa
yongs la dbang byed pa// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// rje mo byang sman mched bzhi ni// dam bdag nad bdag mdos la byon// dam sri dben bdag khra mo 'khor// ma rungs dben la khra mo'i
'khor// gdug byed 'khor tshogs mdos la byon// ces rim par bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'brog mo dpon g.yog bcos pa te le'u nyer bzhi pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal
pa// byang 'brog rim par bsngo bya ba// hUM/ srid pa'i las mdzad gdug pa can// byang 'brog ma lus mchod bya'i phyir// 'bru sna ni gcal du bkram/ ri rab chen po brtsigs/ dpag bsam ni shing
bu la/ mtshon dang ni gur du phub/ srid pa'i zas nor brgyan/ gzugs brnyan mang pos bskor/ mdzes pa'i yas kyis bskor/ sha khrag gtor ma dang/ phud dang rin chen bcas/ hUM/ byang sman ni mdzes ldan ma/

gser gyi rgyan dang ldan/ g.yu yi ni 'od dang ldan/ dung gi ni mdangs dang ldan/ he le ni rgyal mo bzhi/ sman chen ni ming nas phyung/ mdos bdag ni mdos bzhes/ hUM/ 'brog chen ni ma rungs ma/ gdug pa ni
ma rungs ma/ gdug pa ni na bza' gsol/ phyag na ni mtshon thogs pa/ rngam chen ni ming nas phyungs/ mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ glud bdag glud long la/ yul dang 'brog yul ya gi na/ dgon pa ni

gnas chen na/ 'brog srin ni ral pa can/ mi sha ni kham kham za/ mi khrag ni rngam du 'thung/ mi lpags ni gos su gyon/ rngam tshogs ni ma lus kun/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// 'brog srin dmar mo sgrol
la brtson// 'brog srin sgrol byed ma rungs pa// gsod pa'i las la rab tu brtson// ral pa can la mche ba gtsig/ rngam pa can la ma rungs pa/ khams gsum yongs la khyab par nyul// gdug pa'i tshogs kun
ma rungs pa// ral brtson ma lus mdos 'di bzhes// gdug pa'i 'brog srin ma lus pa// rab tu srin mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// srin mo'i gzugs la rngam bag can// ral pa mun nag gtibs pa la// mche
ba gangs ri bsnol ba 'dra// g.yu yi go cog can du rdzu// ral gri gsod byed lag na thogs/ kha nas dug mda' khol ma 'phen// rngam bag can rnams mdos la byon// ri rab ni brten pa'i gzhi// 'byung ba
rim brtsegs brten pa'i gnas// mi 'gyur dpag bsam shing du btsugs// gzugs brnyan ni mang pos bskor/ spyan gzigs bskor chas bskor/ nam ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// mkha' ni skye ba med pa'i

don// nam ni bde ba chen po ste// mkha' ni ye shes de yi ngang// nam ni nang gi bcud yin te// mkha' ni phyi yi yul yin no// yul sems dag gi glud du bsngo'o// mda' ni sku rten mkha' yin no// mkhar la ni

sku cig brten/ gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes/ de ltar bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ byang 'brog la bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// de

nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// klu rnams bcos par bya ba ni// gsang ba stobs dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// gtsang ma dag gi gzhi stengs su// 'bru sna tshang ma'i phye ma
la// byin gyis brlab pa byas nas ni// de la ri rab chen po brtsigs/ kha dog 'dra ba'i rigs dang sbyar// dpag bsam mi 'gyur shing bu la// rten dar sna lngas ldan pa'o/ kha la rigs bzhi sbrul
gyis brgyan// nam mkha' rigs can brgyad kyang gzugs// tha ma glud tshogs mang pos bskor// sbrul dang nya sbal rtsang pa dang// sdom sdig khyi dang phag pa glang// gzhan yang gzugs mdzes mang pos
bskor// gzhan yang ngar bu bya dang bcas// mi lus rta phyi phag mgo dang// gzhan yang 'bras chan gtor ma dang// sman dang rtsi sman bcud dang bcas// de ltar 'bru sna gcal bkram pa// zhes gsag go/ lha

'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu'i rdzas gsag pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// hUM/ klu gdug pa ni ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// klu gdug ma rungs mdos la byon// klu tshogs ni
mang po kun// gdug pa'i sems khrol la/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ klu tshogs ni ma rungs pa/ la la ni nam mkha' 'ja' tshon 'dra// la la gzugs med sgo nga 'dra// la la 'dod chags bya yi gzugs// la la

gti mug phag gi mgo/ la la nga rgyal rtsangs pa'i gzugs// la la gyer gling rta yi gzugs// la la gya nom klu yi gzugs// la la gdug rtsub ma rungs pa// srid pa'i klu tshogs mang po kun// gdug pa ma rungs

srid pa'i bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// klu chen ni brgyad po ste// ri rab bang rim dag la gnas// klu rgyal ni dga' bo ste// sku mdog dkar po bum pa 'dzin// klu rgyal 'jog po ste/ sku mdog dmar

nag nor bu 'dzin// klu rgyal mtha' yas gdug pa can// sku mdog ser po bum pa 'dzin// klu rgyal dung skyong bya ba de// sku mdog dkar ser gser bum 'dzin// gdug pa sbrul ser drung na gnas// klu rgyal pad+ma

bya ba de// sku mdog dmar ser rin po che// klu rgyal kar ko bya ba de// sku mdog ljang khu g.yu bum 'dzin// klu rgyal wa ru bya ba de// sku mdog dmar ljang bum pa 'dzin// klu chen brgyad po 'khor dang
bcas// gdug pa sbrul gyi drung na gnas// lan 'ga' zhig nu mdzes pa ste// 'od 'bar gdug pa mdzes pa ste// gzhon nu ni 'od 'bar ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// klu gdug ni ma rungs pa/ sbrul
mgo ni dgu pa dang/ sbrul mgo ni bdun pa dang/ sbrul mgo ni lnga pa dang/ sbrul mgo ni gsum pa dang/ sbrul mgo ni gcig pa dang/ gdug pa'i klu bdud ma rungs pa// sbrul mgo ma rungs gdug pa'i
tshogs// klu tshogs ni gnyan po'i tshogs/ mdze nad zha grum dang/ 'on dig lkugs pa'i bdag po yin// gdug pa'i nad rnams ma lus gtong// chen rngam pa bya ba dang/ klu rgyal byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
can dang// klu yi sangs rgyas ston pa dang// klu yi gya nom gdug pa dang// na ga 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// klu rgyal dge ba'i ngang tshul can// rgyal rigs dmangs rigs dang/ gdol pa'i

rigs la sogs pa yi/ klu gdug ni 'khor dang bcas la/ mchod kyis ni da tshur byon/ mdzes pa'i mdangs dang ldan/ 'bru bcud ni stong dang ldan/ rtsi sman ni mang po dang/ 'bru sna ni mang po dang/ dkar gsum

ni mngar gsum dang/ 'bras yos ni me tog dang/ dri zhim ni sna tshogs dang/ rin chen ni rnam lnga dang/ mthun pa'i ni yas kyis mchod/ gdug pa ni klu yi bu/ chu mig ni sngo sngo nas/ sbal pa ni nag ser gnyis/
gdug pa'i nad bdag lags/ srid pa'i mdos bzhes la/ gdug pa yi ni klu tshogs rnams// la la ma rungs gdug pa klu yi 'khor// klu gdug ni 'khor dang bcas// zhe sdang gdug pa'i nad rnams zhi bar
gyis// gti mug 'thibs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar gyis// gdug pa'i klu tshogs mang po kun// la la 'byung ba nam mkhar gnas// la la rdo dang shing la gnas// la la rdzing dang khron par gnas// la la lu ma
lteng kar gnas// la la ska dang yur la gnas// la la 'dam gnyan dag la gnas// la la gra ma lang ling gnas// la la brag ri dag la gnas// gdug pa'i tshogs kun ma lus pa// ri rab gling dang bcas
pa dang// 'bru'i bcud dang glings chen dang// dkar gtor mngar dang bcas pa dang// me tog 'bras bur bcas pa dang// sman dang dkar gsum dngar gsum dang// gzugs mdzes mthun pa mang po

dang// de la sogs pa mang po ste// rigs bzhi mdzes pa mang po dang// nam mkha' mda' dang mo 'phang g.yu lo dang// mdzes brgyan mang po bkram nas ni// glud tshogs mang po khyed la mchod// gdug pa'i klu

tshogs mang po kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// gdug pa'i nad rnams zhi bar gyis// de ltar klu rnams spyan drangs shing bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu bcos pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun
pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ klu rnams dag la bsngo ba ni/ hUM/ klu tshogs ni mchod pa'i phyir/ gtsang ma'i gzhi stengs su/ 'bru sna gcal du bkram/ mdzes dgu yas su bkram/ mthun pa'i ri

rab la/ klu gzugs ni rgyan dang bcas/ kha dog ni rigs kyis bsgyur/ nam mkha' ni yul du byas/ mnga' ni mkhar du byas/ mthun pa sku yi rten/ mo 'phang shing ris brgyan/ sman sna stong dang bcas/ srid pa'i

mdos 'di bzhes/ klu gdug ni ma rungs pa/ srid pa'i mdos la byon/ klu chen brgyad po ni/ dga' bo dang 'jog po dang/ mtha' yas dang ni dung skyong dang/ ma rungs srid pa'i bdag de ring srid pa'i mdos la
byon/ klu rgyal pad+ma kar ko Ta/ pad chen dang ni hu lun dang// gdug pa sbrul gyi drung na gnas// gdug pa'i klu nad gtong bar byed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// rgyal rigs ni rje rigs
dang// bram ze dmangs rigs gdol pa'i tshogs// sbrul mgo mang po ldan pa rnams// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// klu rgyal byang chub sems dpa'i rigs// klu yi sangs rgyas ston pa dang// klu rgyal dge

ba'i ngang tshul can// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// klu chen rngam pa ma rungs pa// gdug pa 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// mdze nad zha grum dang/ 'on dig ni lkugs pa'i bdag gdug pa yi nad gtong ba/ klu

gnyan ni ma rungs pa/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ sman sna ni mngar sna dang/ rin chen ni sna lnga'i tshogs/ dkar gsum ni mngar gsum zas/ mthun pa'i dam rdzas 'bul/ klu chen ni gdug pa'i tshogs/ mdos bdag ni
mdos bzhes shig nam mkha' yul la mda' 'phang mkhar// klu sman longs spyod rdzas su 'bul// nad dang gdug rtsub zhi bar mdzod// gdug pa'i klu'i tshogs ma lus pa// ri rab gling dang
bcas pa dang// gzugs mdzes mthun pa mang po 'bul// rigs bzhi mdzes pa mang po dang// nam mkha' mda' 'phang g.yu lo dang// mdzes brgyan ni mang po 'bul/ gdug pa ni klu yi tshogs rnams/ de ring

srid pa'i mdos la byon// gdug pa'i nad rnams zhi bar gyis// ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu la bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ mtsho sman
bcos pa ni/ stobs dang ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// dar dkar ma nyams gzhi stengs su// 'bru na bcu gsum phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la ri rab
chen po brtsigs/ kha dog 'dra ba'i rigs dang bstun// dpag bsam shing dang nam mkha'i gur// 'byung ba dar gyis brgyan pa'o// de la dar gur lnga phub bo// shar nub gur dkar re phub bo// lho ru ser la

nub tu dmar// byang du ljang khu dar gyi gur// gur chen brgyad dang ldan par bya// snyug bam cig la rin chen gtsug spud lnga// phyogs mtshams dbus su smyug ma re re'o// nam mkha' brgya brgyad ri rab la'o// mo

'phang grangs kyang de bzhin no// gtor ma dgu ni bsham par bya// shar du dkar gtor bsham par bya// shar lhor me tog sna tshogs kyi bsham par bya// lho ru 'bru sna tshogs kyi bsham par bya// nub tu sman sna

tshogs kyi bsham par bya// lho nub tu rtsi sman sna tshogs kyi bsham par bya// nub byang du chu sna tshogs kyi bsham par bya// byang du tshwa sna tshogs kyi bsham par bya// byang shar du sha khrag sna tshogs kyi bsham par
bya// dbus su 'o ma dang 'bras chen sna tshogs kyi gtor ma'o// phud dang rin chen bcas pa'o// gsob brgya rtsa brgyad/ nya mgo dgu sman dgu/ rtse dgu 'brang rgyas mtshal thig can dgu/ de ltar

bsags la spyan drangs/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mtsho sman gyi gsag pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// hUM/ snang srid bdag po e ka ma// sha za khrag 'thung srid pa'i yum// dbang gi rgyal mo

srid pa'i yum// 'khor ni sman dang ma mo dang// the brang sa bdag klu tshogs rnams// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// e ka dza ti sa ma ya ni b+h+yo/ ma rak+sha mu tra b+h+yo/ rak+sha ru ti ma ma ti ti b+h+yo/ tsa mun sha ri b+h+yo/ ya
ni baM sha ru ru b+h+yo/ hUM/ srid pa'i bdag po ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur te// ma rungs gdug pa nad bdag gtso// e ka yum chen chos kyi dbyings// srid pa'i bdag mo yum chen ma rungs

pa// 'khor ni gdug pa zhi bya'i phyir// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// dkar mo dbu dgu srid pa'i yum// sha za khrag 'thung ral pa can// nag mo mche gtsig sgrol la brtson// rngams byed ma rungs dus la
bab// srid pa'i ma mo ma rungs pa'i// nag mo lus la chas mi sdug/ ral pa can la mche gtsig ma/ drel rta rkang gsum chibs pa ste// thod rus sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o// nyid kyi ral ka zangs nag la/ khram
bam thod dbyug bsnams pa'o// 'khor yang gdug pa'i ma tshogs la// nad bdag chen mo mdos la byon// mdos bdag mdos bzhes la/ srid pa khyab byed mdos bzhes la// tsa mun ti ni klu yi bdag/ rgya mtsho

dag la gnas pa mo// gdug byed ma la sprul pa mang// gdug pa nad kyi bdag mo yin// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// srid pa'i bdag mo ma rungs pa// dkar mo chen mo ma rungs pa// hUM/ rgya mtsho chen po'i

rdzings dkyil nas// dar dkar 'bar ba gur du phub// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang// gur chen de yi nang shed na// nya chen mkhar ba gcal du bkram// nya chen de yi steng

shed na// dkar po sbrul gyi za ra tshogs// sbrul chen de yi kha shed na// sbal pa nag po'i rgyal mtshan can// pad+ma dkar dmar gdan stengs na// rus sbal dkar po'i gdan stengs na// srid pa'i dkar mo dbu
dgu bzhugs// sku ni dkar mo mdzes ma la// dbu dgu rin chen zhal du bstan// phyag lnga bdud rtsi'i bum tshogs 'dzin// zhabs kyis brjid gnon de bzhin te// mdzes ma mdangs ldan me tog tshom bus

brgyan// zhi ba'i sku yis snang srid gzigs/ khros pa'i sku yis gdug rtsub 'joms/ khyed ni sman gyi rgyal mo ste// bzhugs ni rgya mtsho'i 'jings la gnas// rgyu ni bar snang khams su rgyu// chibs su chu srin pir
la chibs// las ni bsad gso gnyis su mdzad// sku la na bza' mdzes pa ste// dar dkar gos zu g.yu yi cha ga can// srid pa'i bdag mo ma rungs pa// bzhugs ni res 'ga' bar snang khams
la bzhugs// res 'ga' rgya mtsho'i gting na bzhugs// res 'ga' sbrul pa mang dang bzhugs// bdud mo gdug pa ma rungs pa// srid pa yongs la dbang byed pa// de ring srid pa'i 'khor bcas rnams// de

ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// gur chen de yi shar phyogs na// dar dkar 'bar ba gur du phub// gur chen de yi nang shed na// nya chen rtsa ba gcal du bkram// nya chen de yi stengs shed na// dkar khra sbrul gyi za
ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen dung gi gzhal yas khang// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan stengs na// chu srin dkar po'i gdan stengs na// shar gyi dbang gi rgyal mo bzhugs// sku mdog dkar mo
mdzes pa la// g.yu yi thod gdeng 'bar ba'o// phyag na dung gi bum pa bsnams// mdzes pa'i shing lo bsnams pa'o// sku la dar dkar ral ka gsol// gser g.yu mdzes pa'i cha ga can// shar phyogs dbang

gi rgyal po yin// chibs su sha pa yu mo chibs// 'khor ni sman dang ma mos bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// hUM/ ri rab de yi lho phyogs na// gur chen 'bar ba'i lho phyogs na// dar ser 'bar ba gur

du phub// gur chen de yi steng shed na// nya chen ldum pa gcal du bkram// nya chen de yi steng shed na// ser khra sbrul gyi za ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen gser gyi gzhal yas khang// pad+ma

'bar ba'i gdan steng na// chu srin spir gyi gdan stengs na// lho phyogs dbang gi rgyal mo bzhugs// sku mdog ser mo 'od 'bar ma// phyag na gser gyi bum pa 'dzin// chibs su rnga mo ga pa chibs// 'khor du

sman dang ma mos bskor// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// hUM/ gur chen de yi nub phyogs na// dar chen dmar po'i gur du phub// gur chen de yi nang shed na// nya chen dmangs ma gcal du bkram// nya chen de

yi steng shed na// dmar khra sbrul gyi za ra tshags// gur chen de yi nang shed na// rin chen mchong gi gzhal yas khang// pad+ma dmar po'i gdan stengs na// chu srid spir gyi gdan stengs na// nub phyogs dbang gi

rgyal mo bzhugs// sku la dar dmar na bza' gsol// tha ma rin chen cha ga can// phyag na zangs kyi phur pa bsnams// chibs su rkyang bu lto dkar chibs// 'khor kyang sman dang ma mor bcas// de ring srid pa'i

mdos la byon// hUM/ gur chen de yi byang phyogs na// ljang khu dar gyi gur du phub// gur chen de yi stengs shed na// nya chen gser gyi bkram/ nya chen de yi stengs shed na// ljang khra sbrul gyi za ra tshags/ gur chen
de yi steng shed na// pad+ma 'bar ba'i gdan stengs na// byang phyogs dbang gi rgyal mo bzhugs// sku mdog ljang khu 'od 'bar ma// na bza' mdzes pa'i g.yus brgyan pa// phyag na g.yu yi rdo rje

bsnams// chibs su bya chen chibs pa mo// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// hUM/ rgya mtsho 'jing gi shar phyogs na// dung gi sbu ba gur tsam skan ne skan// sbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// ma mo dkar mo stong sde
bzhugs// dkar mo mdzes ma 'khor bcas gnas// dkar mo lus la sbrul zhags can/ dkar mo'i lus la thod pa khyer// dkar mo'i lus la mig gcig ma// dkar mo'i lus la nad rkyal 'dzin// dkar mo

mtshon gyi zhags 'dzin ma// mi bzad nad kyi bdag mo khyed// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// hUM chen de yi 'og shed na// lcags kyi sbu ba gur tsam skan ne skan// de na ma mo nag mo 'bum sde gnas// nag mo
mi bzad stong gsum bdag/ la la thod pa'i mda' 'phen ma// la la bong zhon ba dan 'phyar// la la nad gtong spyugs pa len// la la mda' mtshon srid pa sgrol// la la khrag mda' dmar po 'phen// ma rungs
gdug tshogs khyed rnams kyang// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon/ khram bdag nag mo khram 'debs ma// nad 'tshong ma la gdug pa ma// gser gyi sbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// de na ser mo stong sde
gnas// srin mo'i lus la cho 'phrul can// la la ser mo rnga rta can// la la ser mo gyer ling chibs// la la sha rkyang bong bur chibs// gdug pa'i ma mo khyed rnams kyang// mkhris nad bsha' ya gtong bar
byed// rgya nad mig ser gtong ba'i bdag/ bal nad gdug pa gtong ba'i bdag/ ser mo khris 'thor la sogs pa// se mo gdug pa ma rungs 'khor// de ni gdug pa'i nad bdag ste// de ring srid pa'i mdos

la byon// zangs kyi sbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// de na dmar mo 'bum sde gnas// dmar mo nad gtong ma rungs ma// dmar mo'i lus la cho 'phrul can// zangs kyi sbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// dmar mo yang

dag sprul pa mo// dmar mo mche gtsigs srol byed ma// tsha ba'i bdag mo gdug pa can// tsha ba khrag 'khrug bdag mo yin// tsha ba ma mo ma rungs ma// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// g.yu yi sbu ba gur tsam

nang shed na// de na ljang mo ma mo gnas// phol mig skam dang rdzings kyi bdag/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// mchong gi sbu ba gur tsam nang shed na// de ring srid pa'i bdag mo gnas// de na smug mo stong sde

gnas// ma mo smug mo sde de/ srid pa'i las mdzad gdug pa can// smyo 'bog glang thabs bdag mo yin// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// de 'khor sman mo stong sde de// sman bran srid pa yongs la rgyu// sman
gzer nad kyi bdag mo yin// la la sman rnams thog 'bebs ma// la la bar sman bu gsos tshe sring ma// la la sman gzer nad gzer gtong// gdug pa'i sman tshogs ma rungs pa// de ring srid

pa'i mdos la byon// the brang gdug pa stong gi sde// srid pa'i the brang bskos pa lnga// bar gyi gdug pa'i rigs byed bdun// srid pa'i 'gong po spun dgu dang// dregs pa stong gi bang chen dang// the brang ni stong
tshogs kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa bdag ni klu yi rigs/ klu ba su rigs bzhi/ sde bzhi brgyad/ mgo dgu'i bdag po dang/ sil ma ni stong tshogs dang/ de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// sa
bdag rigs bzhi spos mtshams bzhi// steng 'og spyi dang bcas pa dang/ khro bo spun dgu khro mo spun dgu dang// sa bdag sil ma stong tshogs dang// gdug pa ma rungs 'khor bcas rnams// de ring srid pa'i
mdos la byon// mtsho sman the brang sa bdag klu gnyan tshogs// gdug pa ma rung zhi phyir mdos 'di bzhes// mthun pa'i yas dang dga' mgu gcal du bkram// legs dgu ris su bris/ bda' dgu ni zas su
sbyar/ gces dgu bskor du 'bul/ ma lus 'khor bcas mchod/ gdug pa zhi bar gyis/ ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mtsho sman 'khor bcas mchod pa'i le'u ste sum cu
pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa/ mtsho sman 'khor bcas la bsngo ba'o// hUM/ mtsho sman 'khor dang bcas mchod phyir/ gtsang ma'i gdan stengs su/ 'bru sna gcal du bkram/ mdzes dgu ni yas su
bkram/ bcud dgu ni zas su sbyar/ bzang dgu ni gter du stsal/ sman dgu ni gsos su sbyar/ rtsi dgu ni bda' ru sbyar/ gtsang ma'i dkar dmar sbyar/ 'bru bcud ni skyems su gtam/ kha dog ni dar gyi gur/

bso dang shas su sbyar/ nam mkha' yul la mda' ni shar kha ra/ mo 'phang sku yi tshad du 'bul// sman dang ma mo the brang dang// sa bdag klu gnyan mdos 'di bzhes// rgya mtsho'i gting nas grub pa mo// dbyings
las ma bskyed skur bzhengs la// e ka ma ni mdos 'di bzhes// 'jig rten las las grub pa mo/ khrag 'thung ral can srid par rgyug/ nag mo ri ti mdos 'di bzhes// klu lcam drag rtsal ldan pa mo// tsa mun
rgyal mo ldan pa mo// nam mkha' bar dang 'og gsum gyi// rgya mtsho dag las grub pa mo// gtso mchog dbu dgu mdos la byon// 'byung ba bzhi las grub pa mo// rgyal po dbang btsan gdug pa mo// dbang chen
bzhi yang grub pa mo// lcags gur dag las grub pa mo// nag mo stong tshogs grub pa mo/ khram bdag nad tshogs grub pa mo// dung gur sbu ba las grub pa// dkar mo stong tshogs grub pa mo// gser gur stong
tshogs grub pa mo// ser mo stong tshogs grub pa mo// zangs gur stong tshogs grub pa mo// dmar mo stong tshogs grub pa mo// srid pa'i las dgu grub pa mo// sman mo stong tshogs grub pa mo// zhe sdang
gti mug las grub pa// klu tshogs gdug pa las grub pa// sa bdag gdug pa stong gi tshogs// mi zad nad kyi bdag po rnams// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// stong tshogs khyab byed nad bdag rnams// the

brang ma rungs mdos la byon// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// de ring klu dang ma mor phye// de ring gnyan dang sman btsun phye// de ring sa bdag 'gong po phye// de ring sman dang 'gong por phye/ de ring klu dang sa
bdag phye// gnod tshogs phye la gnas su skyol// rin chen sna lnga bzhugs kyis sa dang phul// nam mkha' yul la mda' mo mkhar// sman ni gsos la dkar gsum mngar gsum zas// gnas dang rten la
longs spyod bsngo'o// me tog mdangs ldan kha dog 'bul/ mdos bdag lags kyis mdos 'di bzhes// glud bdag lags kyis glud 'di bzhes// klu ni rgya mtsho'i gting na gnas// sa bdag sa la

gshegs/ the brang lam gyi gzhi mdor bskyal// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mtsho sman la bsngo ba'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad
ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i bdag po 'di rnams la// las kyi rnam pa de ltar na// dregs pa'i rgyal po de rnams kyis// mi la ma rungs btang ba ji ltar lags// bcom
ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams kyis// las ni rnam pa 'di lta ste// dregs pa

rnams kyis mi rnams la// ltas ngan btang ba 'di lta ste// ngan pa rnams kyi sna 'dren pa// than ngan ni ces kyang bya/ 'phrin ngan ni ces kyang bya/ ltas ngan ces kyang bya/ ltas ngan dgu bcu rtsa gcig mi la btang ste/

nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso/ dgu bcu rtsa gcig ni/ sna la mi zhing rnams la shul bcu/ spyi dang bcu gcig btang ste/ bdud rnams kyis nyal ba 'dra ba cig btang/ btsan rnams kyis gru bzhi 'dra ba cig
btang/ rgyal po rnams kyis 'ja' bkug pa 'dra ba gcig btang/ ma bdud rnams kyis long ka 'dra ba cig btang/ the brang rnams kyis gru bzhi 'dra ba gcig btang/ ja la mas kyi 'dra ba cig btang/ sde
brgyad kyi thig brgyab pa 'dra ba cig btang/ gnod sbyin gyis mda' 'dra ba cig btang/ sa bdag klu gnyan gyis sbrul gcus pa 'dra ba cig btang/ sman rnams kyis thig lam 'dra ba cig btang/ dregs
pa spyis bkug pa 'dra ba cig btang ngo// de nas dregs pa rnams kyis sbram bcu gcig btang ste/ bdud rnams kyis rgod sbram btang/ btsan rnams kyis brlag sbram rgod sbram gcig btang/ rgyal

po rnams kyis sha sbram cig btang/ rnga sbram gcig btang/ ma bdud kyis stag sbram gzig sbram gcig btang/ the brang gyis bong sbram/ srog sbram/ wa sbram btang/ ja la mas 'phar sbram/ lha srin sde brgyad kyis

grum pa btang/ go sbram/ gnod sbyin gyis spyong dag kam ka'i sbram/ sa bdag gis sbal pa'i sbram/ klu rnams kyis nya sbram/ spyis dred mo'i sbram btang ngo// de nas dregs pa rnams kyis 'dzings bcu gcig btang

ste/ bdud rnams kyis rgod brlag sder 'dzings btang/ btsan rnams kyis wa 'phar btang/ rgyal po rnams kyis sha ba dang stag btang/ ma bdud rnams kyis pho rog dang bya nag btang/ the brang gis khra btang/

ja la mas sre mong btang/ sde brgyad kyis gsa' btang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis wa 'phar btang/ sa bdag rnams kyis byi lha btang/ klu rnams kyis nya mo rnga 'dzings btang/ spyis pho rog dang sre mo spu 'dzings

btang ngo// yang tshe ma bcu gcig btang ste/ bdud rnams kyis mi tshe ma btang/ btsan rnams kyis ra lug tshe ma btang/ rgyal pos rta btang/ ma bdud kyis ba btang/ the brang gis bong bu btang/ ja la mas rta

btang/ sde brgyad kyis mdzo btang/ gnod sbyin gyis pho rogabatang/ sa bdag gis ra tshe ma btang/ klus ba ru tshe ma btang/ spyis ba tshe ma btang ngo// de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis 'od bcu gcig btang ste/
bdud kyis 'od 'phro ba btang/ btsan gyis dmar ba sbreng ba btang/ rgyal pos dkar lam pa btang/ ma bdud kyis 'od 'phro ba btang/ the brang gis sgron ma btang/ gnod sbyin gyis mig mang bar btang/ ja

la mas nya mig 'dra bar btang/ sde brgyad kyis thog 'dra ba btang/ klus 'phang lo 'dra bar btang/ sa bdag gis skam thog la nyi ma shar ba 'dra bar btang/ spyis nyi ma 'dril ba 'dra ba btang ngo// de nas

yang dregs pa rnams kyis than bcu gcig btang ste/ than pa ni ltas ngan gyi than pa ma rungs pa ste/ than ngan skyel ba bcu gcig bya ba yin te/ bdud kyis than pa khra dar ba gtong/ btsan gyis pu shud gtong/

rgyal pos go bo 'dra ba/ the brang gis sreg pa/ ja la mas wa gtong/ sde brgyad kyis kyung ka gnod sbyin gyis ne'u le/ sa bdag gis so bya rog po gtong/ klus ngur pa bu 'ded gtong/ dreg pa spyis 'ug pa gtong

ngo// srin bya dang pu shud kyang gtong ngo// de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis/ bdud rnams kyis khyi la sog pa btang/ btsan rnams kyis ra la skar ma btang/ rgyal pos rta la drug 'khrum btang/ ma mos lug la
ro rgal btang/ the brang gis grum bu btang/ ja la mas kha yon btang/ sde brgyad kyis sha bkra btang/ gnod sbyin gyis g.yan shu btang/ klus sman gyis 'khrud btang/ sa bdag gis mdze
btang/ spyis long pa stong btang ngo// de nas yang bdud kyis sho re/ btsan gyis kha ltag par song ba btang/ mig gcig las med pa btang/ rgyal pos kha mig med pa btang/ ma bdud kyis rkang lag med pa
btang/ the brang gis kha yon btang/ ja ma las gcig la gcig zhon pa btang/ sde brgyad kyis dud 'gro gcig la gcig zhon pa btang/ gnod sbyin gyis mon pho mo btang/ klu dang sa bdag gis sbal sbrul

btang/ spyis rmi lam log pa dang/ mthong rgyu med par 'bros pa dang/ dregs pa sngon du mthong nas 'bros pa'am/ khrid pa dang/ snying mi dga' ba dang/ dgu bcu go gcig btang ngo// de rnams ni ltas ngan dgu

bcu rtsa gcig go/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pas ltas ngan btang ba'i le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan
'das gsang ba'i bdag po/ dregs pa 'di rnams la ltas ngan de ltar na/ bcol ba'i las rnams ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po
'di rnams la// ltas ngan bcos pa'i las bstan pa// zhing ni shul ba rnams la ni// mdos dang srid pa'i rtsal gyis bzlog/ nya sbram byung na de'i sha'i gtor ma byas pas bzlog/ 'dzings rnams ni gtor chen
yas kyis bzlog/ tshe ma rnams ni snang srid gzugs kyis bskang bzlog bya// 'di rnams dus kyi mdos kyis bzlog/ than ngan 'phrin ngan gzhan du lto yis bsgyur// rtsed la sogs pa mi sdug dus gsum lto yis

bzlog/ sho re kha mangs mig mangs cig la gcig zhon rnams// de rnams 'jig rten srog gi the tshom sgyur ro// rmi lam log na srog gi yas kyis bya// ma mthong snying mthong dngos mthong snying mi dga'// lto dang

drag po'i las gnyis bya// de ltar byas na gang yang bzlog/ gsang ba'i bdag pos de skad gsungs// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ltas ngan bzlog pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams las// nan ltar mi la bdud babs na// mi yi glud du bsngo ba ni// ra dang khyi dang bya yis 'thoms// de la byin

brlabs byas nas su// de dang gnyis su med par bya// de la spos dang dri yis byug/ rkang lag rin chen khu gur gzhug/ lus la dar tshon sna lnga btags// de la dar dang brgyan pa ste// mnyam nyid 'thoms te de
yis brje// de la rim par bskyed pa la// hUM/ skye 'gro sems kyis bsdus pa la// 'byung ba lnga la brten pa yi// sems can mnyam gnyis brje ba re// srid pa'i lha 'dre ma rungs pa// srid pa'i de
ni lha 'dre kun// byol song gtso bo 'di la 'thoms// dungs pa sems kyi gzhi mo stengs// rus pa rin chen mkhar du brtsigs// rtsa rgyus gser gyi dra bas gtums// phung po sha yi bseb tshag nas// mi 'gyur
khrag dang chu ser bcas// rus pa rin chen pags kyis g.yog/ 'di ni glud kyi mchog yin no// glud 'thoms mnyam pa 'di yin no// smu bdud mtshams dang gsum// srid bskos dpal dang gsum// tshe srog
dbugs dang gsum/ bdag po khyed yin kyang/ srid pa mdos 'di bzhes/ rten pa 'byung bas rten/ bskos pa srid pa'i bdag sha khrag rus dang gsum/ tshe srog dbugs dang gsum/ srid pa cha dang gsum/
mnyam pa'i glud 'bul lo// srid pa'i 'thoms pa yin no// 'thoms chen 'di la 'thoms/ 'byung ba ni rten pa'i glud/ mnyam nyid srid pa'i glud/ glud mchog dam pa 'di bzhes la// bcol ba'i las 'di grub
par gyis// hUM/ bdud btsan rgyal dang gsum/ the brang ja la srid dang gsum/ klu gnyan sa bdag gsum/ lha srin spyi dang gsum/ 'dre bkren yi dwags gsum/ srid pa'i 'thoms la rol/ phyi yi yul du mnyam/
nang gi bcud du mnyam/ yan lag bde bzhi mnyam/ lhu bcu gnyis mdo dang bcu gsum mnyam/ phung po khams dang skye mched mnyam// 'byung ba rnam shes kun dang mnyam// nang khrol smad lnga mnyam/ mnyam
gnyis glud du brje/ bden gnyis tshig gis bkrol/ mthun gnyis yas kyis brje/ zhes rim par bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ mi glud 'thoms pa'i le'u ste so bzhi pa'o//// de nas
ston pas bka' stsal pa// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// gsang ba'i sngags bde bcu re// bskyed pa'i yi ge bstan pa dang// dregs pa spyi yi dril sngags bcu// bskyed pa'i yi ge bstan pa ni// bdud ya
las bskyed/ btsan las bskyed/ rgyal po ra las bskyed/ ma bdud ma las bskyed/ the brang rda las bskyed/ ja la ma ja las bskyed/ sde brgyad na las bskyed/ gnod sbyin sha las bskyed/ sa bdag sa las

bskyed/ klu pha las bskyed/ de la bskyed dang bshig las bya'o// de la dregs pa spyi sngags bstan pa ni/ oM ya ta sa man ta sha ram sa ya/ shu tri sa ta ya/ tsa sha laM b+h+yo/ ra tsa a ti sa sha yu ting b+h+yo/ ma ma ru ru/ rak+sha

sarba na hril b+h+yo/ tri tsab sha laM tra la sa ma ni/ ya tra le sa tri ma tri rbad ye/ ya tre ya sha b+ha na ril b+h+yo/ ya sha kha 'dar ba ni ri ya b+h+yo/ sa ma ya na ga le/ he baM ha hi raM ya/ de ni bskyed dang spyan drangs dza/ de ltar byas
la las bya'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa'i yi ge dang rtsa sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste so lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di
skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag dregs pa'i bdag po de rnams la// sngags kyi rim pa de ltar na// dmigs pa brlag pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// dmigs pa brlag par bya ba la// gtad dang khram gyi las yin
