te// de dag las ni bstan pa ni// las kyi rim pa ril bstan pa// gsad pa dang ni gso ba dang// dbab pa dang ni bskrad pa dang// mnan pa dang ni gzir ba dang// dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang// zhi ba

dang ni bsrung ba dang// rgyas pa dang ni dbang bsdu'o// de ni spyi yi las su bstan// gtad dang khram gyi las bstan pa// bdud rnams dag la gtad pa ni// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bsgrub pa'i
gnas der 'dug nas ni// sha khrag phud dang bcas pas mchod// bstod dang las ni bcol ba'o// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa la// sme khrag rnam pa gsum gyis ni// de la 'khor lo bri bya ste// dbus ni zlum
por bcas pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gsum bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bdud kyi sngags// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten btsugs la// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// de la gdug shing phur pas
gzir// nyungs dang khrag gis bskang nas ni/ kha ni mthing nag dar gyis gcad// sna lnga'i thag pas rgya gram bcings// de la sngags bzlas byas nas su// bdud rnams mchod cing las rnams bcol// bden
bdar dbang gzugs byas nas su// gong gsum dag tu mnan pa'o// des dmigs khrag skyugs nad kyis 'chi// bdud la rim par gtad pa'o// btsan rnams dag la gtad pa ni// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan
pa des// 'phar ba dmar po'i thod pa la// gsang ba'i las rnams rdzogs par bya/ khrag sna rta la sogs pa yi/ khrag gis 'khor lo rtsibs dgu bri// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten btsugs la// ming dang rus su

ldan par bya// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la btsan gyi sngags// de la thod pa'i nang du ni/ khrag dang nyungs kar dug chang sbyar/ kha ni dar dmar dag gis bcad// tshon gyi thag pas rgya gram bcings// mthun pa'i rdzas
kyis btsan bcos la// ma nyes dpang btsugs 'dis nyes bya// de nas mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mchod// brag gi them par mnan par bya'o// des ni khrag skyugs gzer nas 'chi// btsan la rim par gtad

pa'o// rgyal po dag la gtad pa ni// gsang stobs ting 'dzin ldan pa des// spyang ki sngon po'i thod pa la// ra khyi mi yi khrag gis ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni lnga pa bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la rgyal po'i
sngags// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten btsugs la// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// de la skyer mde phur pas gzir/ khrag nyungs dug dang bcas pa yis// bkang la kha ni dar dkar bcad// tshon lnga'i thag pas
rgya gram bcings// de la bsnyen cing bsgrubs nas ni// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis rgyal po mchod// ma nyes dbang gzugs 'dis nyes bya// gtsug lag mchod pa mchod rten 'og/ des ni smyo 'bog nad kyis
'chi// rgyal po la gtad pa'o//// ma bdud dag la gtad pa ni// gsang stobs ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun rdzas bdud mo mchod byas la// dbus su ra yi thod pa la// ngan khrag rnam pa gsum gyis
ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gsum bri// thod par nyungs kar ske tshe myongs chang btug/ 'khor lo dag la bdud mo'i sngags// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten btsugs la// ming dang rus su ldan par bya// gdug
pa'i phur pas gzir ba'o// mthing nag dar gyis kha yang gcad// tshon lnga'i thag pas rgya gram bcings// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis bdud mo mchod/ dpang gzugs dam bdar bskul bya nas// dmigs pa gtad
pa'i las bcol la// dur khrod dag tu mnan pa'o// des na dmigs pa rlag par byed// bdud mo la gtad pa'i rim pa'o// the brang dag la gtad pa ni// gsang ba'i ting 'dzin ldan pa des// ri bong rna

rings thod pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu pa bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la the brang sngags// dbus su rten gzugs phur pa'o/ khrag dang nyungs kar blug nas ni// thod pa'i kha ni dar gyis gcad// tshon gyi thag
pas rgya gram bcings// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis the brang mchod// ma nyes dpang gzugs 'dis nyes bya/ de las las bcol lung gsum mnan// de yis dmigs pa rlag par byed// the brang dag la gtad

pa'o// de la klu la gtad pa ni// gsang ba stobs kyi ting 'dzin ldan pa des// mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// phag pa nag po'i thod pa ru// 'khor lo rtsibs ni brgyad pa bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la klu yi
sngags// dbus su dmigs pa'i rten btsugs pa// gdug shing phur pas gzir ba'o/ khrag dang dug dang de bzhin dag kha ni ljang khu dar gyis gcad// tshon lnga'i thag pas rgya gram bcings// mthun pa'i rdzas
kyis blud mo mchod// ma nyes dpang gzugs 'dis nyes bya// bstod bskul dmigs gtad las kyang bcol// las bcol byas nas de ni mchod// chu yi mig gam gsang du mnan// de ni dmigs pa brlag
ces bya'o// klu la gtad pa'i rim pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dmigs pa gtad pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o//// rdzogs so////
rgya gar skad du/ de wa ya ti san tri nyu nya ta pi sam ga nA ma ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po/ bam po gnyis pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po 'khor
dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas mchog dam pa na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yang lha'i dbang po
brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// 'gro rnams srog gis bsdus pa la// dregs chen rnams kyi lag tu tshe
shor glud shor na// de nas dgug na ji ltar bgyi// glud kyis bslu na ci rnams 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig

brgya byin lha yi gtso// 'gro rnams tshe srog bsdus pa la// dregs pa rnams kyi lag tu tshe shor bla shor na// de nas 'gug par bya ba ni// mthu dang glud kyis tshe srog bslu// srog dang srog gis brje ba dang// rin

chen sna lngas bslu ba dang// 'jig rten rdzas kyis bslu ba dang// lto dang dpyad kyis dgug pa dang// rtsi bcud 'bru bcud zas kyis bslu ba'o// ting 'dzi ldan pas drag pos dgug de yis bstan pa ni/ dregs

pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad smros/ ces bka' stsal to// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das la/ brgya byin gyis gleng gzhi zhu ba gnang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar/ ya bdud bcu gsum dang/ bdud sil ma stong gis rang rang gi las 'di smras te/ 'gro ba'i tshe srog bsdu 'dod na// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// gtsang ma dar gyi gzhi stengs
su// 'bru sna tshang ba'i phye ma la// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// de la dar nag rgyan ldan la// pho yi mda' khra bcu gsum gzug/ nam mkha' yang ni bcu gsum gzug/ g.yas su gser la g.yon du
g.yu// dpral bar dung la thugs kar rin po che// phud dang rin chen gzugs dang bcas// bshos bu mtha' bskor me long mda' dang bcas pa'o// tsa ra rog po dag la ni/ rwa la bse yi chu yis byug g.yas pa

khram shing bcing ba dang// g.yon pa shod rde'u dang bcas pa ste/ ske nas zhags pas bskor ba ste// de la dar dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ bdud rnams kyi gsag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// hUM/ bdud yul nag po bgo dgu ru// bdud rnams thams cad der tshogs te// bdud rnams kyis ni mdun ma bsdus// bdud rje

rgyal po mi bzad pa// bdud chen ri ti 'gong yag zhal na re// bdud rnams zhe sdang chen po ste// tshe srog dbugs kyi bdag po yin// tshe las gzhan po gang du btsal// srog ni thams cad sdud pa yin// srog

las bsdus pa gang nas rnyed// sha dang rus pa bcud yin te// bcud las lhag pa gang na yod/ khrag dang chu ser skom yin te// de las bda' ba gang na yod// tshe srog ma lus bsdu dgos zer// sha khrag ma lus
bza' dgos zer// mtshams bdud yu po zhal na re// 'u zhe sdang bdud kyi bu// bdud las gdug che gang na yod// bdud las gnyan pa ma mchis te// mnyam gnyis brje na bslu ru rung// mtshun gnyis gsor

na bslu ru rung// srog dang srog brje bslu ru rung// lus dang lus brje na glud du rung// nor dang longs spyod bzang na glud du 'ong// bdud bskos kyi bdag po'i zhal na re// 'u zhe sdang bdud kyi bu/ bdud las
gnyan pa ma mchis te// ji ltar yas thags bdud chad kyang// glud kyis bslu na lo bar bcad// ces zer ro// de nas bdud kyi mdun ma byas pas/ mdun ma 'dus pa'i 'dun rjes la/ thams cad glud kyis
lo bar bcad/ hUM/ zhe sdang chen po bdud kyi bu// bdud las gnyan pa ma mchis// pho bdud ni bcu gsum ste/ gdug pa chen po da tshur spyon// dang po srid pa chags shing srid pa las// pho bdud bcu gsum
srid// bdud thams cad kyi bdag po lags// de ring srid pa'i mdos cig 'bul// zhe sdang gdug pa zhi bar gyis// bdud srin ma ni stong gi tshogs// bdud las gnyan pa ma mchis// de ring srid pa'i mdos
la byon// zhe sdang bdud kyi rigs/ mi sdug pa'i lus can te/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// chibs su dud 'gro mi srun chibs// skye 'gro ma lus dmyal thag gcod// zhags pa nag po mda' ltar

'phen// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// dar gyi mi chen sdem pa 'di phul nas// 'di bskyed ni 'byung ba lnga las bskyed// dag pa'i ting 'dzin byin gyis brlabs// sha lta bse la rus pa dung/ khrag lta mtshal

la chu ser gser// mdzes pa'i skra la rin chen snying// phung po dang ni khams gsum tshang// skye mched dang ni bcas pa ste// 'di ni mnyam gnyis brje ba'i glud// mda' ni rten pa'i sku mkhar te// ri chen sna lnga'i
rtsig pa la// 'bar ba'i rin chen thog ru bcas// 'ja' tshon sna lnga 'od du 'bar// sku yi tshad la sku rten cig/ nam mkha' 'di ni yul yin te// nam ni nang gi bcud yin te// mkha' ni phyi yi yul du
brtag/ nam ni rig pa ye shes te// mkha' ni gnyis med dag pa'i don// nam ni bskyed pa'i phyi mo ste// mkha' ni rten pa'i tshul du gnas// gnyis med dag pa'i glud du bsngo// tsa ra 'di ni glud

mchog ste// dang po 'byung ba chen pos bskyed// bar du skye 'gro gzugs kyis bsdus// ra yi 'byung ba lnga bshams pas// phung po lnga yis bdud rnams bskongs// rnam pa lnga yis bdud yul bskongs// rnam shes
brgyad kyis rol pa'i tshogs// lhu chen bcu gnyis mgo dang bcu gsum gyis// ya bdud bcu gsum dag la 'bul// bdud rnams 'di yis skongs par shog/ ru bdud chen po ru yis mtshon/ khram bdud khram
chen 'di yis bzlog/ 'byung ba chen po lnga yis// 'byung lnga bdud la 'bul/ tsit+ta chen po bdud chen rnams la 'bul/ spu rtog yul dang bcas pas// bdud sil ma rnams la 'bul/ mkhal ma dang ni mcher
pas ging chen mchod/ khrag dang chu ser dag gis mchod// bdud rnams yongs su lo bar gyis// bdud rnams glud kyis lo bar gyis// zhe sdang sems kyi mdud pa khrol// gdug pa glud kyis zhi bar gyis// nges

pa'i sngags kyis byin brlabs te// bden pa'i tshig gis bkrol te mchod// gces pa'i bam po dang po ltar te mchod/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud mchod cing glud gtang ba'i le'u ste gsum
pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ btsan thams cad kyis rang re'i glud kyis bslu ba 'di smras te/ mi rnams bslu bar 'dod pa na// gsang ba'i bdag pos 'dzin pa des// 'bru sna tshang

ba'i phye ma de// gtsang ma'i gzhi stengs dag tu gsag/ byin gyis brlabs cing gzugs byas na// ngar chen ldem pa dag la ni// de la kha dog dmar por bya// de la mda' bkra nyi shu brtsig/ mtshon tshogs nam
mkha' de bzhin bya// tha ma btsan gyis mi rta bcu yis bskor// ra dmar dang ni rgyan can la// bse'i ba'i chas su bcug la bya// btsan zhags dmar po ske nas gdags// btsan khram thod pa dag dang rwa la
bcing// dar dang nor dang mdzes pas brgyan// rang la g.yas su gser la g.yon du g.yu// ri chen sna lngas brgyan par bya// gzugs brnyan phud dang bcas pas mchod// de ltar dmar po dar gyi yol ba

bya// lhab lhub mang po bcas pa dang/ 'bru sna gcal du bkram pas mchod// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan gyi gsag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// hUM/ nga rgyal

ni btsan gyi bu/ btsan chen ni 'khor dang bcas/ btsan yul dngo sum na/ btsan gyi sdong sde bzhugs/ btsan chen ni mi bzad de/ kha drag bdud la rgol/ mthu che phywa la rku/ 'gran tshol klu la tshol/ sdong sde rgyal
dang sdong/ btsan chen mes pho ba/ spyi mes rgyal bas bya/ bse ru 'khyil/ bse mkhar dmar po nang na bzhugs/ khrag gzer kun gyi bdag po yin// nad gzer kun gyi bdag po yin/ kha blon

chen po ste/ nga rgyal drag tu khengs/ 'dod pa mtsho ru 'khyil/ btsan ni stong gis bskor/ spyi btsan chen po'i bka' stod byed// 'byung ba lnga btsan gyi phyogs su bsrung// rol pa phyogs kyi phyogs mtshams

bsrung// ya ma'i tshogs kyis nyul dper byed// sil ma stong sde khyab par stong// la la 'byung ba skyed pa bsrun// de ring srid pa'i mdos la byon// mnyam gnyis de ring brje 'tshal lo// grangs kyang 'byung ba

'di la tshang// mtshur gyis gsor te da tshur spyon// rin chen sna lnga'i mi bo che// rten dang yul cig de ring skong// mda' bkra mkhar la nam mkha' yul// mnyam gnyis brje 'o mdes pa tsa ra khyod/ skos rje bra ma

nga rgyal dang/ spyi btsan chen po kha brgyad ming nas phyung/ skye dang srog gcod sdud pa'o// dug lnga nad kyis nyon shing bskams// nad rnams ma lus myos byed pa// 'byung ba lnga'i btsan chen ming nas phyung// nga rgyal
chen po'i phung po la// btsan dmar stong sde 'gyed par byed/ khrag gzer nad kyis gsod byed pa// skyes bu btsan chen ming nas phyung/ kha yogs gnam nas 'bebs byed cing// skye 'gro ma lus sgrol ba'i
bdag/ gnam btsan 'phrul bu ming nas phyung// dkar po lag na zhags thogs snying rtsa sdud// gsang btsan chen po ming nas phyung// g.ya' spangs nag dang g.yel la gnas bcas shing dang// tshe dang srog

gcod sprul pa'i tshe// bar gyi btsan lnga ming nas phyung// 'byung ba sa la dbang sgyur skam gyi bdag/ sa btsan chen po ming nas phyung// sa brtan brag la dbang byed 'gro ba 'phel 'grib byed// mtshon gyi zhags

dang gdug mtshon mang po sgrol// brag btsan chen po ming nas phyung// nga rgyal gti mug gnyis kyi bu ste skye 'gro ma lus sgrol// gdug rtsub nad kyi bdag po 'byung ba'i sa mtshams srun byed pa// gdug pa klu
btsan mched gsum ming nas phyung/ khams gsum myug byed zhag dang khram gyis 'debs// yam rkang tshogs ming nas phyung/ khams gsum rgyug cing khrag dang mkhris pa 'thor// shod rde'u dag la 'grang zhing

btsan khram dmar la 'debs/ sil ma stong tshogs ming nas phyung/ skyes bu btsan gyi stong sde 'gyed// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// ces bsngo zhing gtang ngo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/

btsan la glud kyis bslu bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po rnams kyi rang rang gis glud kyis bslu ba 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa
des// gtsang gdan dar gyi gzhi stengs su// gti mug nad kyi gcal bkram la// de la byin brlabs byas nas su// rin chen mi bo che gcig bya// de la g.yas su gser dang g.yon dang
g.yu// mda' bkra lnga ni gzug par bya// nam mkha' rigs mthun lnga yang gzug/ bi nu bzhi dang bcas pa ste// bya la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bskor// phud dang rin chen spyan gzigs bcas// de ltar

dkar dkar mdzes brgyan dang// bya dang thod pa de bzhin gsag/ de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// rgyal po gsag pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// hUM/ chen ni 'khor dang
bcas/ skyong pa ni rigs bzhi dang/ srog bdag ni mched bzhi dang/ sde bzhi ni srid bzhi dang/ 'bru bzhi ni sde bcu gnyis/ rgyal po srog gi bdag 'khor ni ging dang bcas/ srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ dkar

gsum 'od kyi dkyil nas sgrub pa mang po 'gyed/ sha khrag srog dbugs dang snyings 'jig rten byan po khyod/ srog bdag chen po'i ming nas byung// srid pa dag las bskyed pa yi// srid pa'i bdag po dung 'od

can// the brang stong gi tshogs chen po// gnam po chen po gnam la dbang// nyi zla 'od kyi rta la zhags pa 'phen// 'ja' tshon sna lnga'i dbu thod can// dung gi ni ri mo can/ rma bya mdongs kyi thul pa gsol/ khol

brgyad rje dang dgu/ mi sngon 'tsher ba la/ lag pa brgyad du byung/ lag pa brgyad po la/ g.yu dang mu men lag glo dang snying la'ang 'debs/ smyo dang 'bog 'dre mdzad/ sngon po bya gdong chibs/ che bzhi gnyan dang
lnga yis bskor/ srid pa'i bdag po de/ dkar po phur dmar chibs/ bar snang khams su rgyu/ dkar po phud dmar chibs/ ging chen bco brgyad bskor/ srog gcod las rnams byed/ shel rta mig gcig chibs/
bar snang khams su rgyu/ 'od dang ser chen 'bebs/ zer gsum skya rings 'chags/ nyi zer zhags pa 'phen/ srid pa yongs kyi srog gi bdag chu bya sngon po chibs/ klu rgyal 'khor gyis bskor/ gza' dgu nang

dang 'gying/ gza' chen pa wa sangs/ the brang stong gi nang na 'gying/ dkar po 'od chen yin/ skye 'gro ma lus sgrol/ rgyal po rma ru tshe// gsod byed 'bar ba yin/ rgyal po gdug po che/ 'byung ba lnga la gnas/

gser gyi pha bong bskor ro// rgyal yum chen mo ni/ g.yu mtsho sngon po khyil li li/ de gnyis sprul pa las/ rgyal sde chen po dang/ rgyal phran bcu gnyis byung/ rten bcu gnyis srun/ rgyal po chen po'i 'khor/ tshe
srog dbugs len bdag po yin// srid pa'i mdos la spyon/ rgyal po stong gi sde/ dpon chen drug cu gcig rgyal po srog gi bdag 'byung ba lnga la gnas/ rgyal sde ma lus kun/ mnyam gnyis brje bar bya/
mda' dang nam mkha' mkhar dang yul/ rgyal pos brje bar gyis/ grangs su tshang lug mnyam/ zhes bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po glud kyis bslu bar bstan pa'i le'u
ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ru/ ma bdud bcu gsum dang ma yams su bcas pas rang rang gis glud kyis bslu ba 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// gtsang

gzhi dar gdan stengs su ni// 'bru sna tshang la byin brlabs te// de la dar nag rgyan ldan bya// mtha' ma rta bong drel dang mdzo rtol rnga zhon tshogs/ ra dang khyi dang bya nag dang/ khrag dang sha sna bcas pa bsham/
mkhar thabs mda' ni bcu gsum dang/ mo 'phang bcu gsum nam mkha' bcu gsum dang/ ra nag de la gzugs par bya/ lug nag gcig la zhags dang sgro ba dang ni byang dmar dang/ khram shing mtshon gyi gru

gu la sogs dag gser dang g.yu dang bcas pas brgyan/ de ltar bsags la bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ma bdud kyi gsag pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// hUM/ yul bdud ma ki ni/ khri

lo drung gcig dur khrod brtsegs/ khrag gi gru char sil li li// bdud bya nag po phang ma phung// lce spyang mang po 'dral zhung zhung// de na bdud mo stong tshogs te// drug cu srid pa'i byin pa po yis byed// brgya ni

srid khram nag bdag byed// gcig ging gtso mo khri ro btsun// brgya ni sho gam 'chang ba byed de gdug pa che// brgya ni srin mo khrag 'tshog ma// brgya ni ser mo mkhris 'thor ma// brgya ni khrag pa rgyu gzer

gtong// brgya ni srid pa'i srog dbugs 'byin// brgya ni mkhris dang rdzings kyi bdag/ nyi shu rtsa gcig 'jig rten nyul le byed/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bsgeg ma nad kyi bdag sum cu srid pa'i kha lo sgyur/ bdud mi

zad nad gtong ma/ lco dang rdzings dang mkhris par bskyil/ khrag tu skyug cing cha 'dum gcod// 'bar ma chen mo ma rungs ma// gdug pa nad kyi bdag po ste// la la mtshon gyi gru bu 'khal// la la khram bam sa
la rdeb// la la shod rde dkar nag 'grems// la la bdud gcod las rnams byed// la la rims nad mang po gtong// la la glang thabs nad yams gtong// la la nad kyi rkyal pa rdeb// la la ru mtshon chen po
'phyar// la la byang dmar bam por rbed// la la rgyu gzer khrag 'khrug gtong// la la bal nad mig ser gtong// la la mkhris nad rdzings phol gtong// la la gdug pa'i khrag gzer 'phen// la la mi nad
lang dgu gtong// srid pa yongs kyi nad gtong ma/ khrag gi phor thogs mda' 'phen ma// bdud mo ma yams stong gi tshogs// la la sha rngas mang po chibs// la la gdug pa'i stag gzig mang po chibs// la
la thab g.yag rog po chibs// la la mdzo rtol bong drel chibs// la la skyugs dang rtsos la chibs// nad gtong srin mo'i 'khor dang bcas// de ring srid pa'i dar chen smra shes gzugs brnyan

mang po dang// nam mkha' yul te mda' khra mkhar// lug nag mnyam gnyis brje bar 'khrob// zang zing longs spyod rgyan ldan mchod// ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ ma bdud lag na
gnas pa bslu ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ sa bdag sil ma rnams kyis rang rang gis bcol ba'i las 'di smras so// 'bru sna tshang ba gtsang ma'i steng du gsal/

byin brlabs ni gzugs rnams te/ dbus su gru bzhi gdan stengs su// mgo lnga pa yi gzugs su bya// smad ni mi lus dag tu bya// tha ma 'brang rgyas dgu la 'phang bkra dgu/ ngar mo dgu la ni kha dgu/ bya dgu

ni phud dgu ste/ bshos bu dgu la mda' dgu gzug/ nya sbal sbrul dang chu srin dang// ra phag kyi dang rta yi gzugs// 'brug dang glang dang kyi dang lug/ mtshams bzhir ma lus mgo brnyan bya// glang bu dang ni ba

glang gzugs// rtsang pa ru rtsa nya chen rnams// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag bsog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/
sa bdag rnams kyis tshig 'di skad smras so// bdag cag sa bdag gdug pa ste// gti mug byol song rigs su gtogs// gdug pa gnyan gyi bu yin te// sa bdag sil ma stong gi tshogs// 'byung ba sa dang chu

la gnas// 'byung ba lnga la gnas pa las// 'byung ba'i bu ni gdug pa che// rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// 'byung ba sa la dbang sgyur te// sa la sa bdag chen po gnas// shri pa ta ral pa can// gdug sril

ral nad srid par rgyug/ de gnyis rgyud las bco brgyad byung// dgu ni ming po yin pa ste/ sa bdag phyogs mtshams dbus dang lnga na gnas// dgu ni sa srin khra mo ral pa can// ngams dang 'obs dang skyibs
rnams dang// brag skam shing drung sa phug gnas// la la ral can khrag mig ma// la la sems can skem byed ma// la la ral chen lag rings ma// la la ral chen bya mig ma// la la ral chen phag gdong
ma// la la ral chen 'phreng thogs la// sa bdud sa srin chen mo'i tshogs// sa bdag sde ni gdug pa can// sa la gnas shig gdug rtsub che// gdug pa'i sa bdag chen mo ni// mi yi lus la rtsangs pa'i
mgo/ 'khor ni dud 'gro gzugs ni mang pos bskor// gdug pa gnyan las che ba med// sa skam dag la gnas mal bcas/ kha nas gdug pa'i nad chen gtong// mdze nad sna dgu gtong bar byed// skam dang
rus nad chen po dang// grum bu dang ni skem byed dang// sha 'chad rus khol bam log dang// sha bkra dang ni gdug rtsub gtong// gzugs brnyan mang po'i sa bdag lags// sa bdag gnyan chen
gdug pa can// gcig ni dug sbrul dkar por ston// gcig ni g.yu sbrul sngon por ston// gcig ni zangs sbrul dmar por ston// gcig ni gser sbrul ser por 'khyug/ gcig ni rin chen 'bar ba'i

sbrul// sbal pa'i kha dog rigs lnga byung// smra ba mi skad smra bar byed// rgyug pa 'od zer sbrul ltar 'khyil/ kha rlangs na bun gtong bar byed// sna nas sdom sdig mang po 'gyed// rma shu dang ni skrangs 'bur
gtong// de yang srid pa'i mdos bzhes cig/ steng gi sa bdag chen po ste// bya khyung sngon po gshog pa rdeb// 'og gi sa bdag chen mo ni// dur phag chen mo 'khun cing 'debs// bar ni rigs bzhi gdug pa
che// mtshams nas gshed bzhi smyo zhing 'tshig/ 'byung ba'i bdag mdos long zhig/ gzhan yang sa bad ma rungs pa// mi yi lus la dud 'gro'i mgo/ shing lo gos la sbo la gnas// dbus kyi spo la gnas pa

dang// shar gyi spo la gnas pa dang// lho yi spo la gnas pa dang// nub kyi spo la gnas pa dang// byang gi spo la gnas pa dang// gtsang brtsang 'khor dang brtan ma dang// be snang dang ni lag chen dang/ gtsang

kun dang ni chen po dang// hong phan dang ni the se dang// da le dang ni du le dang// sa stag rdo stag chu stag dang// me bdag rlung bdag 'byung ba'i bdag/ zhe sdang gdug pa'i mdud pa khrol// sa bdag sil ma stong

tshogs la// 'byung ba'i ri rab dag la gnas// bsdus pa rin chen dag tu bsdus// de ring srid pa'i mdos long zhig/ ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag la glud kyis bslu ba'i
le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams kyi mdos 'di bsngo ba dang/ glud kyis bslu ba'i rabs 'di smras so// mdos dang yas gtong ba'i dus chen du/ tshig

gis bsngo ba 'di rnams so// hUM/ da srid pa'i mdos 'di bsngo// bdud kyi sgo bas sgo phye dang// bdud kyi 'phrang pas 'phrang sol dang// btsan gyi sgo bas sgo phye dang// 'phrang pa chen pos 'phrang sol dang// rgyal

po'i sgo bas sgo phye dang// 'phrang pa chen pos 'phrang sos dang// bdud mo ma yams sgo phye dang// bdud kyi 'phrang bas 'phrang sol dang// the'u rang ja lang sgo phye dang// sa bdag klu gnyan sgo phye dang// drags pa'i

'phrang pas 'phrang sol dang// da ni mi glud gtong nge chas// da ni nor dang dbang thang glud de chas// glud la snga ba sa gzhi ste// sa gzhi ma skyes dgu zhig skyes// da ni srid pa'i rgyal mos bskyed// sa yum chen mo

srid pa'i bdag/ srid pa'i bdag mo chen mos te// 'byung ba lnga las bskyed pa ste// 'byung bas ma bskyed gang yang med// glud la snga ba sa gzhi ste// sa las kham pa'i mi mo byung// rin chen sna lnga'i

gter dang chas// 'byung bas byin brlabs smra re mkhas// thugs rje can gyis byin brlabs pas// glud kyi dang po mi bo che// ya bla bdud dang ma bla bcud// byi bo btsan dang dkor bdag rgyal// the'u brang ja la
mang po dang// sa bdag klu gdug 'khor rnams khyed// mi bas glud chen glud 'di bzhes// ji ltar ya thag chad kyang glud 'di long// de nas gzugs brnyan mang po ste// skye 'gro gzugs kyis bsdus pa'i
glud// 'di yis mi mnyes gang yang med// 'di la 'bru bcud bshos dang chang// sha khrag spyan gzigs mang pos mchod// 'di yis mi skongs gang yang med// dregs chen 'khor dang bcas pa khyed// mda' bkra

'di ni sku mkhar chen// nam mkha' 'di ni yul chen mdzes// 'phang khra 'di ni sku yi tshad// rin chen mdzes pas brgyan pa ste// 'di yis mi mnyes ma mchis so// chas so mi yi glud du chas// srog chen mnyam

gnyis brje ba'i glud// thom chen tshom gnyis bsor ba'i glud// gdug pa'i dregs pa stong sde yang/ khyed kyang 'byung ba lnga las bskyed// rten kyang 'byung ba lnga la brten// glud rnams kun kyang 'byung ba lnga yis

bskyed// rten kyang 'byung ba lnga la rten// 'byung ba chen po dbyer med pas// gnyis med dag pa'i glud du bsngo// dug lnga gdug pa zhi bar gyis// ces kun la bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/

dregs pa spyi'i mdos bsngo ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ the brang rnams kyis rang rang gi las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa ste// 'bru sna tshang ba'i

bshos bu la// ngar nag gcig la rgyan gyis brgyan// de la 'gong rdzas mang pos brgyan// bong bu rna rings thod pa la// de la mkhar dang bcas pa bri// thang bshos dgu la snying zan dgu// de la mgo thums dgu

bcu gsal// mtha' ma phud dang sha snas brgyan// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang sil ma gsag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// hUM/ the'u brang chen po ma

rungs pa// 'byung ba lnga yi bar mtshams na// 'od kyi khang pa gru chen na// pha ni rgyal lde ma skyes dang// ma ni btsun mo ma btsun mo// de la bu dgu srid dang bcu ru byung// nangs kyi phu bo gcen po de// do nag thab
g.yag rog po zhon// sku la stag lpags khra bo gyon// lag na zhags pa nag po 'phen// bdud po stong gi bang chen byad// bdud 'gong nag po ming nas phyung// de yi 'og ma ba/ dmar po lag rings po/ chibs
su bya dmar 'dab bzangs chibs/ lag zangs kyang so le thogs/ btsan byed stong gi bang chen byed// btsan 'gong dmar po ming nas phyung// de yi 'og ma mi zad pa// sku ni dkar la ral ka

gsol// lag na gri gug 'dzin par byed// chibs su rgya bya de bong chibs// rgyal po kun gyi bang chen byed// rgyal 'gong chen po ming nas phyung// cig ni ser skya sna yon po// chibs su rnga mo gwa ba chibs// sku la

ber chen ser khrab gsol// phyag na bdud kyi nad rkyal 'dzin// bdud mo kun gyi bang chen byed// 'byung po ser skya ming nas phyung// cig ni spyi rings srid par rgyug/ thams cad kun gyi thob nyob po// the'u rang
rgyug 'phro'i ming nas phyung// cig ni mthing nag gdug pa che// chibs su gtsangs sam nya chen chibs// klu gdug kun gyi bang chen byed// the brang gdug pa'i ming nas phyung// gsum ni stong gsum kun tu

rgyug/ 'jig rten ma lus khyab par nyul// tshe srog ma lus nyams par byed// srid pa yongs kyi bdag po byed// srid cig gdug pa cho 'phrul can// nad bdag chen mo'i ming nas phyung// the brang chen po khyed

rnams ni// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// sa bdag kun la dbang byed rgyug 'gro dang// skye ser can dang mkhar skya can// the se gu ge mchu rings dang// tri se ma ge ba ge dang// dkar po gnam the'u

gnam lha byang chub dang// byung 'gong spun lnga ngan 'gong spun lnga dang// sdug 'gong lnga dang sil ma drug cu gcig/ nyi le nyi shu rtsa gcig kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos la spyon// sa 'khor kun na gnas pa

kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos la bzhes// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ the brang bcos pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ sil ma'i btsan rnams kyis

rang rang bcos pa'i las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// snod chen nang du 'bru bsogs la/ byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya/ de la btsan bshos gru bzhi pa la/ stod ngar du bya'o// ngar

dmar po la btsan khram dang btsan zhags bskor ro// tha ma btsan bshos gru gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ btsan gyi mda' khra re re gzug/ mi rta nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// gla glo ra lug bya rnams bsog/ phud dang rin

chen spyan gzigs bcas// de ltar bsags la bsngo ba'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sil ma btsan gyi gsag pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// hUM/ btsan chen sil ma rnams/ stong tshogs sil

ma glud la spyon// lha 'dre mi bsrun nga rgyal can/ btsan yul sde yi sum/ 'od ma zangs rum na/ btsan mkhar dmar po ldem pa na// btsan rje thod dkar bzhugs/ 'khor ni btsan phran stong gis bskor// btsan
gyi rta pa stong tsho gcig/ rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan byas nas// mchog dkar gzhu la 'od ma mda'// tshigs gsum lcags la 'ching byed zhags// zhags mda' dmar po zor tu 'phen// la la se

btsan rol bu rje// smug rum gdug pa'i mtshon cha can// la la dri tsan ral pa can// brag btsan dmar po rtse rum 'bar// spang btsan kha ru 'od du rje// g.ya' btsan ram chen khrag chen 'jug/ klu btsan chen
po mdze nad bdag/ shing btsan kha se ram bu rje// rdo btsan spang bskor rje bzhi bdag/ sil ma stong sde ma lus kun// gdug gzer nad gzer ma lus gtong// skyes bu btsan rnams ma lus 'dren// de ring
srid pa yongs la dbang// brag btsan sum brgya drug cu yis// yang yul sa ru bgos/ sa btsal gnas su btsal/ se btsan rol po yis/ brag ri sha sha thob/ brag btsan dmar po yis/ brag dmar ngos

bzangs thob/ klu btsan mched gsum gyis/ chu ro brag zur thob/ sngon po gzhung rings kyis/ chu dang lam chen thob/ sil ma stong tsho yis/ brag bu skya re thob/ kye gdug pa nad kyi bdag po chen/ 'byung ba lnga la

sna lnga/ bra bu stong la zer nad stong/ chu stong la lkugs pa stong/ dung btsan dang ni se btsan dang// btsan bu stong sil mdos la spyon// ya ma skya tshogs mdos la byon// rol pa skya tshogs la spyon// ces pa rim

par bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan sil ma bcos pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ klu bdud sil ma rnams kyis rang rang bcos pa'i thabs
'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// 'bru sna tshang ba dag la ni// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad nas su// de la gzugs mgo lnga pa gcig byas// mtha' ma klu gzugs mang pos bskor// chal mgo

dang ni sgong ba dang// nya dang sbal pa lcong mo dang// gtsangs pa dang ni rta gzugs dang// 'jam 'dra dang ni gzugs med dang// gtsang chen dang ni sdom sdig dang// gdug pa klu gzugs mang pos bskor// klu
mda' dang ni nam mkhas brgyan// de ltar bsags la bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu gsag pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// hUM/ gdug pa ni klu yi bu/ dga' bo dang 'jog po dang/

mtha' yas dang ni dung skyong dang// pad+ma dang ni chu lha dang// ka rko dang ni pu rgu dang// sbrul mgo dgu dang brgyad pa dang// bdun pa dang ni lnga pa dang// gsum pa dang ni gcig pa'i 'khor// gya nom gzugs
med chen po'i 'khor// nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon lta bu dang// gzugs med sgo dang 'dra ba dang// 'dod chags bu ron gzugs/ nga rgyal rtsang pa'i gzugs/ gti mug glang gi gzugs/ chu chen rta yi gzugs/ klu
phran sil pa stong/ la la mdze skrang shu ba'i bdag/ la la bas lhag chad pa'i bdag/ la la rus skram sha skram bdag/ la la mdzes pa gdug pa can// la la gdug pa sprul pa 'gyed// 'byung ba lnga
la gnas pa kun// de ring srid pa'i mdos 'di bzhes// de ring zhe sdang ngan pa khrol// klu la glud 'bul lo// klu las gnyan ma mchis/ gdug pa chen po'i 'khor/ mda' bkra yas kyi glud/ mthun pa'i rdzas
kyis bslu/ klu sil ba stong gi tshogs/ yul dang mkhar dang longs spyod dang/ rin chen lnga'i gtor du 'bul/ rtsi bcud sman rnams sobs su 'bul// thams cad gso ba'i sman chen 'bul// rtsi bcud sman gyis
bsab lags so// mthun pa'i yas rnams phul lags so// yul dang mkhar gyi bsob 'bul lo// nor dang gter gyi bsob 'bul lo// sman dang bdun yas sna tshogs 'bul// ces bsngo'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra
ba'i rgyud chen po las/ sa bdag bcos pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bam po gnyis pa rdzogs so//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ lha'i
bang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// rten pa'i dam rdzas rnams ji ltar lags// thun gyi rdzas rnams ji ltar
lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig brgya byin lha yi gtso// dregs pa 'di yi rten pa'i dam rdzas ni// sha zan gdug pa mi zad

dang// nag chags dgu yi snying khrag dang// rta nag lug nag bya nag dang/ khyi nag glang nag bong nag dang// nya nag stag nag dom nag dgu yi snying/ khrag dgu sha khrag gtor ma ni// bdud rnams rten pa'i dam

rdzas so// wa 'phar bya dmar snying rnams dang/ khyi dmar ra dmar lug dmar snying// rta dmar dang ni bla rgod snying// de'i snying dang bcas gtor ma ni// btsan rnams rten pa'i dam rdzas so// rta dkar g.yag

dkar lug dkar snying// ra dkar bya dkar khyi dkar snying// seng ge bya che mi smra'i snying// rgyal sha khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma ni// rgyal po rten pa'i dam rdzas so// mi snying ra snying rta yi snying/ khyi nag snying dang

lug nag snying// bya nag snying dang gdug dgu'i snying/ kha khrag gtor mar bcas pa ni// bdud mo rten pa'i dam rdzas so// rnga mo bong bu byi la'i snying// sha khrag gtor mar bcas pa ni// the brang rten pa'i dam

rdzas so// nya yi snying dang ri bya'i snying// glang bu snying dang rtsi sman bcas// dkar dang bcas pa'i dam rdzas ni// klu rnams rten pa'i dam rdzas so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi dam

rdzas bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas dregs pa rnams kyis zor gyi sngags 'di smras so// sro shar ril li shar la b+h+yo d+h+yaM ti ya rbad/ ya ba tri nu ru rbad li dur shaM b+h+yo/ pu tra ru tri sham rbad ya

b+h+yo/ khar ro re rag sen rag shen ya b+h+yo/ phu ra sha ra yaM rbad ya hur tri kha la b+h+yo/ mu pi ling shar rag to tsar li ya b+h+yo/ sha ma la dan sham har ser yam rbad b+h+yo/ da ma rus na kha to rbad ya b+h+yo/ her tir pir shar

rbad ya b+h+yo/ ru ti par sha kha la du na b+h+yo/ bra sha na ga de b+h+yo/ hri tha par sha ya b+h+yo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi mnag pa'i zor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams kyis thun mong gi sngags 'di rnams smras so// ruM ruM shaM yag shang stam pa thun ya/ tsa ro sha traM traM/ skor chu ma tri thun ya/ ra to ra to ra ra ga srog par sha pi ta yaM thun ya/ kri

ru thun rbad rag to ya thun/ pre sha ra yaM thun/ tsa ro sa ma tu ti ya thun/ mu pa ra ya thun/ pra sha ha ra thun ya/ khal ru ti sa ma dan thun ya/ pri sha ra ga thun ya/ na ro ro shi then pa ra thun/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud

chen po las/ drag po sngags kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis mnan pa khram gyi sngags 'di smras so// ra sho ra ri thun dra rbad/ khraM to ya/ mu pa pra sha bskor khri ti ya/ pra ma ru tri khram

tri/ ru ru pi to khram ti/ ra de rje de khram ti/ pi su raM khraM ti/ pra ti raM khraM ti/ mu sha do mya thun khram ti/ ku maM khraM thun/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi gtad pa khram chen sngags kyi le'u ste

bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyi/ thun rdzas drag rdzas 'di rnams so// ru ru sha'i sha khrag dang// nyungs mo dang ni lcags kyi phye// de rnams bsres la brdeg pa ni// bdud kyi drag po thun rdzas

yin// 'ug pa'i khrag dang gser phye dang// nyungs kar sbyar ba'i thun rnams ni// btsan gyi drag po thun gyi rdzas// rta yi khrag dang rdo phye dang// dung rgya 'bras nyungs bcas pa ni// rgyal po drag po thun gyi rdzas/ khyi

dang mi yi khrag chen dang// nyungs mo zir ske tshe dang// sgyur phye dang ni sbyar ba ni// ma bdud drag po thun gyi rdzas// bong bu khrag dang zangs lcags phye// nyungs mo dang ni sbyar ba ni// the brang dz+wa la drag po thun gyi

rdzas// nyungs pa yung ba 'bru phye dang// nya yi khrag tu sbyar nas ni// drag po klu dang sa bdag rdzas// dug shing phye dang yungs mo khrag sna ni// gnod sbyin sde brgyad thun rdzas so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po

las/ dregs pa rnams kyi thun rdzas kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang dregs pa rnams kyis drag sngags 'di smras te/ las thams cad la drag po'i dregs pa'i drag sngags 'di smras so// sni shar ma yan har

li kong di chum ya/ ba ri dar sham trag tsar ling/ khrag la mu ta ya hUM phaT/ sha ma rur pre yaM te ka ra she rbad/ ru ti par sham rbad ya/ taM lan pre sha ya rbad ya/ sri du kha la har hor tri shi rbad/ ru ru

shaM te pa tro rbad lang te pad yaM/ trag mo rag to// mul chum rbad ya/ kha la dru rbad sta mo tshul/ dza dur kha sham rbad ya/ thums thums me ta kha la har hor phob rbad/ snying mgo la chu ma hril ya b+h+yo/ lha 'dre stong gi dra

ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa thams cad kyi drag sngags smras pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud rnams kyis drag sngags bdun pa 'di smras so// yag+sho ya ti hu la

ni chu mas/ ta kem pra sha ya thums rbad/ sa ma ya kha la dan sa ma ya rbad/ mu d+h+ring sha rbad/ snying mgo rbad/ kar nye dza dur snying la rbud rbad/ mu me re sho trag tsar rbad/ kha 'dar ru pa sha rbad/ lha 'dre stong gi dra

ba'i rgyud chen po las// bdud rnams kyis drag sngags bdun pa phul ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang btsan rnams kyis 'di smras so// sa to ru ru tsar ming rbad/ tsa sham baM raM thun rbud/ kar re ba ro

rbud/ tsa phe su sha ra ge rbud/ ni ra rbad ling chum rbud/ bra ga li rbad ya/ mu hri gi garti ya rbad/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan rnams kyis drag sngags phul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas

yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal pos las 'di smras so// rA dza a so thum rbad yaM/ mu 'gram pa te rbad ya/ ru ri sha thaM rbad ya/ ga ro ni/ ro sad la/ thums rbad ya/ sa ma ru shaM shaM rbad rbad/ mu hrims

srab shaM thum rbad/ a li rbad tre yaM rbad/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal pos drag sngags bdun pa smras pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang klu rnams kyis rang rang gi drag sngags 'di smras

so// na ge ro ru na/ go ru ro rbad/ na ro pri sha rbad/ mu pi yaM rbad ya/ ga ro sha yaM rbad/ pra pra raM raM thum rbad/ ma ma hrim na kro ta rbad/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu'i rang sngags phul ba'i le'u ste

bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa spyi sde dang bcas pas dril ba'i drag sngags 'di smras so/ kha ti par ta shaM rbad rbad/ mur ti gri ba rbad/ hab shaM da ro rbad ya/ mu ti ni li
rbad ya/ sa ma ya ru shaM shaM ka lo rbad/ sre shi rbad thums myogs ya/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa spyi'i drag sngags te bcu gcig pa'o//// rdzogs so////

rgya gar skad du/ de wa ya tra/ san tri shu na da pi phro ma sha tri sha ma hA nan tre/ bod skad du/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bam po gsum pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po
'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po dam pa na bzhugs pa na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ma chags pa'i mchod pas
mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po/ 'jig rten dregs pa 'di rnams la// rtsal gyi khyad par ji tsam yod// nus pa'i mthu ni ci dang ldan// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsol cig/ ces zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma byams mgon thugs rje'i bdag/ dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams
la// so so rang re mthun rdzas kyi// bod dang rbad dang gsad gsum gyi// las rnams rab tu bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig dbang po spobs ldan che// legs par bshad

kyis nges par zung// dregs pa'i rgyal po 'di rnams la// bsgrub pa'i las su bya ba na// bod rbad gsad pa gsum yod de// sngags kyis bod dang tshig gis bod// sngags kyis rbad dang tshig gis rbad// sngags

kyis gsad dang tshig gis gsad// rdzas kyis bod dang rdzas kyis rbad// rdzas kyis gsad pa rnams yod de// dregs pa rnams kyi grangs yod de// grangs ni spu gri nags tshal mi bzhin gnas// tshig rnams gnas
dang 'bul 'dra'o// dmigs pa rab tu spel byas nas// rtsi spur sha rul lta bur gnas// sngags ni dregs pa'i bla mtsho ste// dmigs pa nus mthu rab tu gsal bas nus mthu dpag las 'das// ma bzlas

kyang ni srog la 'khor lo bskor// dregs pa'i rgyal po'i sgrub thabs 'di rnams kyis// gang bsgrub las la the tshom med// dregs pa'i rgyal po rnams yis smras so// ces bka' stsal lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i
rgyud chen po las/ bod rbad gsad dang dbye ba stan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams las 'di smras te/ dregs pa stong gi nang nas/ bdud nag po
bkram med dang/ snya le ngag btsan dang/ ma le ge shag dang/ bdud rje smra gu dang bzhi langs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rang rang gi bsgrub pa 'di smras te/ gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa
des// brag ri ngo nag mcho ris can// de ru dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// nang du gru gsum gsum byas te// dbus su las bzhi ldan par byas// dbus su gtsan dang gru phyogs su// shar du nag po lho ru snya le
ste// nub tu ma le byang du rma khu'o// gru gsum de ru ling ga re// ling ga re la bdud phung re// de ru mthun pa'i rdzas rnams gsag/ gcan gzan snying dang 'dab chags khrag/ gdug pa 'bru dang
dug rdzas thun// dri bo thod par bsog cing thun// rten la bod mchod gnas rnams bya// bdud ring bskul zhing phur ri dril// sngags re bzlas la gnas der gdab// g.yab nag bzhi dang pags pa

bzhi// gdug pa'i mtshon dang bcas pa'o// tshig gis spyan drangs sngags kyis mchod// phud gtor sha khrag bcas pas mchod// de la bod pa'i sngags rtsa ni// yak+sha kha la zhung tri dza/ yak+sha ni ro bshi dza/ kha par sha

ni yag tri dza/ rag+sho ti ram pa ri sha dza/ de ni bdud bzhi gsod pa'i sngags/ ya tro pa d+h+rim thum rbad/ tra le 'u pan pan sam rbad/ pa tra pa sha ra ma rbad/ ka lo rbad ni tsa sha rbad/ de ni rbad pa thun bzhi sngags/ ra sha
ni ra sha ni/ nir mgo rbad sod/ pi ni ti ke sod/ shu ra pa tri kaM ka sod/ ri shi ka ma 'gal thums myogs sod/ de ni bdud bzhi bsngags pa'i sngags// de ltar las rnams bya zhing bsgrub// gdug pa'i mda'

chen bzhi po la// bya rog 'ug pa khra chen dang// srin bya ngag gi sgro bzhis sgron// gdug pa shing gi mde'u gsal// bse yi gzhu la lcags kyi mchog ma can// gzhu la bdud chen bzhi sngags bkod// mda' zor

bzhi yi sngags bkod de// sra sha ma ki li traM b+h+yo/ hu ti ka la raM raM b+h+yo/ ba mu shi ha ra traM b+h+yo/ ko tra raM traM bri ling traM b+h+yo/ 'di ni bdud bzhi zor gyi sngags/ de ltar 'phang zhing las bya'o// de nas bod rbad la sogs bya/
hUM/ bdud yul ni pha ki ni/ nag po sgo chen na/ bdud kyi mkhar gcig ldems se ldems// bdud kyi nag po 'dar zhung zhung// bdud kyi bya chen lings se ling// bdud kyi yul chen ma rungs pa// de na bdud

blon chen po bzhi// skye 'gro ma lus lings su 'debs// bdud chen ni ging chen po// skyes bu mched de bzhi/ bdud kyi rgyal po bzhi/ nad rnams ma lus spyod/ srid pa chab dbab pa'i phyir/ bla mtsho sngags kyi

'phreng ba klob/ zhe sdang bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ gti mug ni mun ltar 'thibs/ nga rgyal bse ltar khengs/ 'dod chags mtsho ltar 'khyil/ phrag dog rlung ltar 'tshub/ nad rnams char ltar 'phro/ mtshon rnams

rtsi ltar sbyor/ bdud kyi rgyal po ba/ ri ti 'gong yag de/ mthing nag 'bar ba ha ra dmig/ ral pa mthing nag gyen du 'khyil// bdud rta rnga bzangs mthing nag chibs// rgyab na lcags kyi dra ba mig mangs

khur// lcags kyi so le nag po thogs// rgyab na bdud kyi khra chen lding// ral pa sprugs pa mun ltar dkyil li li/ khrag mdab dmar po 'phen par byed// nad dang dug gi kha rlangs phyur ru ru// gdug pa'i nga ro
sgrog par byed// lag pa srog rtsa ma lus 'byab// snying khrag 'thung zhing dpyug glu len// dmigs pa ma lus rdul du rlog/ glang thabs khrag skem bdag po yin// snya lde ngag btsan ma rungs
pa// ser nag 'khyil ba'i ral pa can// mche gtsigs rkan sgra gdug 'dul tshogs// ral pa ser nag gyen du 'khyil// chibs su rtsang chen dmar po chibs// sku la stag slag khra bo gsol/ khrag rims
'bebs shing srid pa 'joms// bya khra chen po rgyab na lding// rdzings dang big pa'i nang du 'gyed/ khrag 'gyur chu ser nad du byed// spyug pa'i glu len kyur ru ru// pags chen g.yab 'dor lings se
lings// mtshon 'khris 'dren pa'i bdud chen po// dus la bab kyis 'dren pa'i tshogs// bdud rgyal ma le ge shag ni// smug nag brjid pas ral pa gyen la brdzes// mche gtsigs spyan zlum gdug pa
che// rngam pa'i lus la gdug pa'i zhal/ khram bam nag po stong sdeb cing// skye 'gro ma lus gsol la dga'// chibs su bdud sha nag po chibs// g.yon pa bskyal pa kha dmar thogs// snying dang nang khrol

'dren par byed// glo snying dug khrag bsres kyin gsol// rngam pa chen po'i sgra 'byin pa'o// gdug byed dus la bab kyis da tshur spyon// bdud rje rmang khu rngam chen po/ dmar nag ral pa gyen du brdzes// spyan
bzlog tsam gyi ser chen 'bebs// mche gtsigs pas ni skye 'gro sgrol// mthing nag 'bar ba'i khrag chen lding// rngam pa gcan chen thul par gsol// zangs zhags dmar po rdeg cing 'phen// chibs su
lcags spyang sngon po chibs// gdug pa nad kyi brlangs pa 'byung// gdug pa'i glu len gcan gyis g.yab kyis 'debs// bdud chen ma thogs da tshur byon// bdud rgyal chen po mched bzhi ni// gdug pa'i

gying thabs log ge log/ dpyug pa glu len kyur ru ru// bdud bzhi srog la rngam pa'i tshe// bdud kyi lcags kyi yang dmigs can// dung gi me long khral la la// ral pa sprug cing rgyug stabs can// bla rkun sprul

pa khye zhes bya// glog byed sbrul nag chen po bzhi// rgyug byed mon pa chen po bzhi/ khrag chen dang ni mda' zor 'phongs// ces bskul zhing las bcol lo// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'joms byed

lcags mda' can zhes bya ste/ bdud nag po mched bzhi'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang/ thom po dang/ thom chung dang/
skyin po mchu dmar bzhis rang rang gi bsgrub pa 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// brag dmar chol zangs 'dra ba'am// mthun pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor bri// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ldem pa
la// dbus su pho brang zlum pos bskor// bar gyi phyogs bzhir gru gsum bzhi// dbus lnga ru bya'o// gru gsum re la ling ka re// bdud phur re dang bcas pa'o// skyes pa dar ma'i thod pa

ru// stag gzig seng ge dred kyi snying// rgang leb khrag dang gtor ma dang// phud dang spyan gzigs bcas pas mchod// dug dang smre dang khrag gsum po// za ro rgya sran rnams bsregs mthun gyis rdeg/ spags

pa zangs kyi thun gyis bya// bse mda' bse gzhu sngags dang bcas// gdug pa shing gi mda' dang bcas// de sngags spyan drangs sngags kyis mchod// de la 'bod rbad gsum bya ste// pra sha yag de gye tsa dur ya

dza/ mu ti ni pra sha dza/ hab sha pra ta ya dza/ pra sha ga ro na thum dza/ de ni bod pa'i sngags yin no// sa ma ya hu ra prag ti laM rbad/ ke ka raM rbad/ khu mur shi ti rbad/ ha ti phur phur rbad/ de ni rbad pa'i sngags su shes/

hre tri yag+sha nri ma ra ya/ sa rbed gar rbed ma ra ya/ shaM shaM hu ra ka ru yaM/ pra he sham ma ra du ma rbad/ de ni dregs pa'i gsad pa'i sngags// dang po bod cing bar du rbad// tha mar gsad par bya ba'o// sngags dang
gdab cing bstab pa'o// de nas drag po zor du 'phang// mnan na 'khor lo de bzhin bya// de nas tshig kyi bod dang/ rbad dang/ gsad pa dang/ 'phang ba'i las rnams bya'o// tsa ra 'gram dmar de bzhin
bya// mnan pa khyi thod nag po dang// 'phang ba bse mda' bse gzhu'o// hUM/ zhe sdang chen po bdud kyi bu// bdud yul zangs dmar 'dod chen na// bse mkhar dmar po ldem pa na// tha ma bse yi 'khor yug

bcas// bse bya bse khyi dir ri ri// de na bdud chen bzhi bzhugs te// cig ni bse yi 'be tse can// cig ni byu ru'i be tshe can// cig ni zangs kyi be tse can// cig ni gzhon mar 'be tse can// bdud kyi gcan

bzhi zhes bya ste// gang ltar rbad pa'i sa phyogs na// bse yi byan lag lding zhing 'dums// zangs kyi khyi bzhi slad nas rgyug/ bse'i mon pa phu rung rje zhing dgra snying 'byin// bse yi the brang las la rgyun// bdud

po bzhi ni dpa' la rngam// bse yi 'phar ba bzhi la zhon zhing rgyug/ gcan gzan thul pa re re gsol// zangs kyi so lo re re thogs// mche ba gtsigs shing rngam pa che// skye 'gro srog rtsa 'dren par byed// mkhris

nad khrag nad gtong bar byed// nang rol 'brab cing tsit+ta 'byin// gdug pa'i nga ro gtogs pa 'byin// bse yi khrag chen thon par gtong// bse yi mon chen 'gying bar byed// snying dang glo ba bsregs shing

gsol// mi mgo skya mo grungs su gcer// thod pa'i 'phreng ba bgrang bar bya// bdud chen pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma de// srid par rgyug cing nang khrol 'dren// bdud chen thoms po ma rungs pa// sha la 'drad
cing khrag la rgyug/ bdud chen thoms chung ma rungs pa// mgo dang yan lag 'brel bar byed// bdud po skyin po mchu dmar de// rtsangs dang dang ma 'dren par byed// bdud chen ni khyed bzhi

yang// dam tshig dus la bab kyis da tshur spyon// ces pas bskul zhing las rnams bya// gdug pa mched bzhi'i bsgrub pa ste// ming ni can gzhi zangs mda' can// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/
bdud bzhi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud nag po ri ti 'gong yang lcags kyi mkhar ba can dang/ btsan shu bo bse'i mkhar ba can/ rgyal po dkar

po spyan gcig pa dung gi mkhar ba can dang/ the brang rdo rje legs pa zangs kyi mkhar ba can dang bzhis rang rang gi bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di smras te/ gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// rkang pa'i shing gi drung

ngam mtsho chen gling// yang na brag ri gdug pa can du ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi gru gsum bzhi ru bya// gru gsum dmar nag sngo dang dkar po ru// dbus su dmigs pa'i ling ga gzhug/ tha ma can bzhi phur pa
dgod// mtshon thag khram dang bcas pa dgram par bya// rtsang phur gdug pas tha ma bskor// sha khrag gtor ma phud dang bcas pa dang// spyan gzigs 'bru bcud shing thog 'bras// rabs chad khra bo thod pa

ru// spyi'i sha khrag dam rdzas rnams// zangs lcags bse mdung phye ma dang// mud ka ra yi mchan dang sbyar// ske tshe nyungs nag zi ra dang// brag rgya dang ni til nag dang// de'i thun gyi bya ba'o/ khyi dang wa

'phar spyang ka'i thod pa ru// 'khor lo bris la mnan pa'o// rin chen mda' gzhu gdug pa'i mda'// yi ge bkod dang sngags bskul bas// drag po zer gyis bsgral ba'o// bod cing rbad de las bcol lo// oM dza ru ru gam he kha dza/ tsa shar de
dza kar sen pa tro bi dza/ badzra pa tre ya dza/ de ni can bzhi bod pa'i sngags so// ga ro yag tri sham rbad/ tsa sho yag sha shaM rbad/ tri si ba tro trag shaM rbad/ ging ka ra sen sen skor rbad/

de ni rbad pa'i sngags su shes// shag sha se la kem sod/ ra to shu la haM shaM sod/ de ni gsad pa'i sngags yin no// zor dus b+h+yo'i sham bu'o// de ltar las bya bskul bas/ hUM/ zhe sdang chen po dam la

'du// bdud rgyal ri che 'gong yag ste// bos pa'i tshe na pha bas gdung// 'phangs pa'i tshe na mda' bas tsha// mngags pa'i tshe na bu bas gnyen// nag po ral can dom la chibs/ khro gnyer spyan bzlog mche ba

gtsigs// gang ltar mngags pas mdungs pas zor// srid pa'i skye 'gro ma lus la// zhe sdang lcags kyi zhags pa 'debs// lcags kyi dra ba nang du 'dzud// rtsa rgyus khram rnams 'byin par byed// lcags mkhar
brdabs pas srid pa 'joms// glang zabs nad kyis da tshur spyon// nga rgyal chen po btsan gyi bu// dmar po khro gnyer ral gsig klad la dga'// dmar po ral pa gyen du brdzes// mche ba
gtsigs dang 'bru chugs lta// gdug pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon po ste// zangs mkhar brdabs pas srid pa 'khrugs// 'joms byed sprug cing 'drig pa'i tshe/ khrag gi ser chen char ltar 'bebs/ khrag gzer dmar

po tal la la/ chu ser mda' chen breng nge breng/ tsha ba'i langs pa phyur ru ru// 'joms byed chen mo las la spyon// bar snang 'od kyi khams shed na// gdug pa'i shel mkhar rtse dgu lams se lam// de na srog
gi bdag po sgrol byed can cig bzhugs// dung ral dkar po nyil li li// dung so dkar po thams se thams// gcan gzan thul pa gsol// srog gshed shan pa lcags gri can// dung mkhar srid pa 'joms

byed pa// gdug pa'i gcan gzan rngam stabs can// bar snang lding zhing ltas ngan gtong// zer chen chibs nas snying khrag 'thung/ gdug pa chen po las la shog/ the brang rdo rje legs pa ste// the brang rigs la
cho 'phrul can// 'dre srin kun gyi blo gcig pa// ma yam kun gyi ming gcig po// ser shul dkar po gsol nas ni// zangs kyi mkhar ba gdug pa 'joms// mkhar ba bzhi chab dag pa'i mod mdo mkhar te/
gang la brdabs pas las rnams byed/ khyed rgyal thabs kus pa ste/ sprug cing mgo gcod zhal du rdub// de ring mchog la las la spyon// ces bskul te las bcol lo// brnag pa'i mtha' gsum byas/ 'di ni

mkhar ba can bzhi bsgrub pa ste/ ming ni ka ti zim gyi thog mda' can/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ can bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ skyes bu lung
btsan gdug pa'i mtshon cha thogs pa btsan dmag dpon dang/ bdud mo nag mo gdug pa'i mtshon cha can sting bdud mo'i dmag dpon dang gnyis kyis rang rang gi bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di smras so// gsang
bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// lung gsum mdo'am brag ri gnas// de ru dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// mtha' ma gru bzhi sdam pa la// dbus su gru gsum sum brtsegs bya// gru gsum dmar nag dkar dang
bcas// dbus su dmigs pa'i ling ka gzhug/ nyon mongs lnga dang ldan par bya// ming rus dang ni bcas pa ste// sngon dmar thag pas bcas su// gtso bo'i phur pa dag la brtod// zur du btsan dang ma mo'i

phur pa dgod// bya 'ug pa'i thod pa ru/ rta mtshal bu'i snying khrag gzhug ra dmar po'i snying khrag bya mtshal bu'i snying khrag dang snying dang bcas pa dang/ rabs chad nag po'i thod pa ru/ snying dang dar ba'i snying khrag

ra rog po'i snying khrag dang/ khyi pho'i snying khrag snying dang bcas pa dang/ sha sna khrag sna gtor ma bshams/ de ni mchod cing rten pa'i dam rdzas so// chu phud can gcig bcas pa dang// spyan gzigs
dag kyang mchod pa'o// mda' dang thun rdzas gong bzhin bshams/ khrag nyungs dang ni bcas pa bshams// mda' gzhu gdug pa bcas pa bshams// mda' gzhu gdug pa bcas pa'i zor// de ltar las rnams

'tshogs bshams la// bod dang rbad dang gsad pa gsum// spyan drangs bzhugs phyag mchod bstod las// sngags dang tshig gi sham bur ldan// hUM sa ma kri sham nag mo las la thun te dza/ tsa sha ga ro haM sham dza/

de ni bod pa'i sngags yin no// ru ru te laM shaM shaM ma ma las la thun rbad/ te sha ra ra dza ba nub rbad/ de ni rbad pa'i sngags su shes/ tsa la tsam hur srig sham breng sod/ pra tsa ma traM rgyug chum sor sod/ de ltar drag
po'i las gsum bya// gdag dang bstabs dang las bcol bya// de yis las rnams grub par byed/ hUM/ nga rgyal btsan gyi bu/ skyes bu chen po gdug pa can// dmar po 'du' bu ral pa can// ral pa dmar po
gyen du brdzes// chibs su bse rta dmar po chibs// sku la ber chen dmar po gsol// g.yas na btsan phran gdug pa rgyug/ g.yon na sil ma stong sde 'gyed// ral pa gsig pas gza' rgod char du

'bebs// srid pa'i btsan chen 'da' rub khyed kyi 'byung ba lnga rnams la// 'byung ba lnga'i btsan phran stong sde 'gyed// zhabs ni gdug pa klu rnams mnan// mche gtsigs rngam pa gsod la dga'// btsan gyi
gdug pa sgo mo nas/ khrag gzer dmar po tal la la// gzer nad gtong zhing srid pa sgrol// btsan rnams kun gyi dmag dpon byed// dmag dpon chen po dam la shog/ gdug byed srin mo bdud mo'i
tshogs// bdud mo chen mo la rungs ma// sha la khrag 'thung ral pa can// gnas ni gnag pa dgur na gnas// bdud yul nag po ma gi na/ khri 'du rdungs cig bsil ba mtshal// mkhar 'bar ba'i nang

shed na// bdud mo chen mo de na gnas/ khrag gi gru char sil li li// bya nag mang po phung nge phung// lce spyang kang+ka'i tshogs ni dir ri ri/ khrag zags 'bab chu zul lu lu// rngam stabs mi lpags g.yab
'dor ma// gdung ba'i glu dang spyug pa'i brda'i tshogs dir ri ri// mthing nag 'bar ba'i re ldes dkris// bdud po zhon nas khyab par rgyug/ dregs pa rnams kyi dmag dpon byed// lha 'dre kun gyi rgyug

'gro byed/ khrag gdug 'bar ba'i mda' ru 'phen// ba dan dmar po 'phyar zhing dregs pa sdud// 'khris dang g.yag sha klad tshir gzer ba dang// gag pa dang ni rgyu gzer gtong// tsha grang gnyis ni 'chos par
byed// 'byung ba lnga po dkrug par byed// dmag dpon chen po da tshur spyon// ces bskul la las rnams bya'o// 'di'i las sgrub thos pa med pa ste// mi dmar nag gdu' mda' can// lha 'dre stong
gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ skyes bu btsan chen dang/ bdud mo dmag dpon bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ brag btsan dmar pos rang gi bsgrub pa'i las
'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// brag dmar 'thoms sam mgon gnas su// de ru maN+Dal gru bzhi pa// dbus su gru gsum dmar po bya// gru gsum nang du ling ka gzhug/ sngo dmar ske nas

gdag par bya// skyer phur gcig la btsan du bskyed// gru gsum ling ka der gzir ro/ khra dang 'ug pa'i rgyal mtshan bya// wa yi thod par thun rdzas de// zangs phye nyungs kar gcan gzan khrag/ gzhan yang thun
rdzas gsag pa'o// 'ug pa'i thod par kyi khrag dang// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis bkang pa'o// bshos bu spyan gzigs gtsang phud bcas// mda' dang gdug pa'i yas dang bsag/ bod bskul rbad dang gsad par

bya// mnan dang 'phang ba las kyis su// phur ba gdab dang brdeg pa dang// zor du 'phang ba'i las rnams bya'o// tsa ra dmar dang bcas pa'o// tsa sho ra ma hA ra te ya dza/ sa ma ya dza/ 'dur dgra bo'i snying mgo

chod/ gzer dprugs ma hA bram bre thun rbad/ ka la nad tro rbad kyi he rbad/ de ni bod pa rbad pa yin no// sa ma ya rgyug breng skor sod/ tshu har rbad sod/ de ni gsang ba'i sngags yin no// thams cad las rnams
bsgrubs pa ste// phur btab dril btab las bcol te// phur pa 'dril zhing drag sngags bzlas// btsan chen bskul la las bcol lo// hUM/ nga rgyal chen po btsan gyi bu// btsan chen rngam pa'i skyes gcig
pa// ming ni gdug pa'i skyes cig ag se rgyal// 'byung ba brag ni them par gnas// gdug pa'i brag btsan chen po bzhugs// sku ni dmar la gdug pa ste// ral pa dmar po gyen la 'khyil// spyan mig zur
gsum gdug pa'i mig/ dbu la la thod dmar po bcings// phyag na bse gzhu bsnams/ rgyab na bse yi mdung rings btsugs// g.yas na brag bya dmar po lding// sku la ber chen dmar po gsol// chibs su

btsan rta dmar po chibs// brag bya 'ug pa khra ru thogs// brag sha bra ba rol du khrid// brag sha gla ba lan 'ga' chibs// srin bya bu mo than po/ bgag ya sring mo khug brlangs brnal pa btsan// g.ya' sngon po
'og na nyal/ lan 'ga' chas bzangs mdzes bag can// brag btsan chen po ma rungs pa// mtshon gyi zhags pa rtog cing 'phen/ khrag gi zer mda' dmar po 'phen// btsan chen gdug pa dug mda'
'phen// snying 'phrog gzer ba'i nad gtong ba// brag btsan dmar po bskyod tsam na// 'byung ba 'khrug cing tsha sngags grang sngags 'debs// srid pa'i btsan rnams g.yob byed cing// gdug pa ma

lus rdul du rlog/ btsan gyi shod mangs 'debs par byed// btsan gdug gdug rtsub bdag po da tshur spyon// ces bskul ba'i las bcol rbad pa'o// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ brag btsan rgyal
ba bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud mo nag mo ral gcig dang/ btsan ya ma ral gcig gsum gyis rang rang gi bsgrub pa 'di smras so// gsang bdag
ting 'dzin ldan pa des// lung gsum mdo'am lha rten sa// lung gsum chu 'gram brag ral phung// de lta bur yi gnas por// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs ma// zur gsum dag tu gru gsum re// tha ma

gru bzhi sgo dang bcas// de ru phur re ling ka re// mtshon dang byad dang ming rus gsal// sngags brjod tsam gyis phur pa dregs par gsal/ de la rten pa'i dam rdzas ni/ khyi nag snying gcig glang nag snying

gcig ra dmar snying cig sha sna khrag snas brgyan pa'i gtor ma dang// dug dang thun rdzas phye zangs phye rdo phye dang// til dang nyungs kar ske tsher bcas// gdug pa'i gzhu dang gdug pa'i mda'// de ltar 'tshogs

par bshams pa dang// bod rbas gsad pa'i las rnams bya// ma sha thums rak+sho ba ti dza/ ga dza le d+h+ril har sha ya/ da ni bod pa'i sngags su shes/ hi ta pa la raM rbad/ dus raM rbad ya/ tsa le sha raM rbad/ de ni rbad

pa'i sngags su shes/ ma d+h+ril d+h+ril gaM k+sha ya sod/ mdun lam rag sho byed sod/ kar dung tshe ri shi then sod ya/ de ni gsang ba'i sngags su shes// de ltar bod rbad gsad cing dmigs pa gtab// las bcol
phur pas gdab// de yis las rnams grub par byed// hUM/ srid pa zhig 'dzin bdud kyi bu// bdud chen rngam pa ral gcig pa// sku lus mthing nag 'bar ba la// ral pa gcig po gyen du 'khyil// dpral na
mig gcig dug gi mig kha na swo med kho nas gcod// nya so bzhin du khong nas gcod// bya mig bzhin du mas yar 'gebs// mun nag shwa dang 'od pa gtong// chibs su bdud rta ral gcig chibs// bdud
kyi mtshon ltar khram bam thogs// dar nag ber chen sku la gsol// phyag na bdud khram chen po d+hebs// srog rtsa gcod cing nyams pa dgrol// bdud dmag mtshon ltar slob par nus// bdud chen 'bar ba'i

dus la bab// hUM/ srid pa'i bu mo ral gcig ma// mthing nag rngam tshul 'gying tshul ston// spyan zlum bzlog cing mche ba gdug pas dgrol ba ste// sku la khrag nad thul pa gsol// rdo rje brtsegs pa'i sku ru lan
'ga' 'byung// lan 'ga' bal sor bsgyegs pa'i sku ru byung// lan 'ga' stong khams khyab par nyul// mi nad phyugs nad stong zhi stod// stong gsum bse byang rtsis la 'debs/ khrab bam thod

dbyug thogs nas nyams pa rdul du rlog/ sdig pa gad mor rgad cing srid pa khrag nad spyod// gdug pa'i kha rlangs phyur ru ru// dmod pa'i mtshon cha yams nad sil li li// gsod byed chen po da tshur spyon// hUM/
btsan chen ya ma rkyang cig po// ral gcig srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar// zhal gcig skye shi lam chen byed// gdug pa'i nga rgyal btsan chen pho btsan ma rungs las la spyon// gdug pa'i btsan chen rngam pa'i
tshogs// dmar po ral can kham kham rbad// srid pa yongs la dbang sgyur cing// gang la bab pa rdul du rlog/ g.yas pa btsan gyi zhags pa 'debs// g.yon pa btsan gyi mda' gzhu 'gengs// btsan chen
gdug pa zer gyi bdag/ btsan chen 'bar ba gtum khro'i tshogs// btsan chen gzer byed da tshur spyon// ces bcol rbad gtad zor bya// drag po mde rtse gsum par bya// de yis las rnams grub par byed// lha
'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gdug pa ral gcig gsum gyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal 'gong gdung gi 'be tshe can dang/ gnod sbyin
bse'i 'be tshe can dang// gsum gyis rang gi bsgrub pa'i las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// lung gsum mdo'am nags tshal du// de ru dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gru

gsum sum brtsegs la// de la gru gsum re re ste// de ru ling+ka re dang phur pa re// sha khrag gtor ma phud dang bcas// ra kyi rta gsum khyi yi snying// yol dang dpags pa rgyal mtshan gzugs// de ltar bsags

la bsgrub pa ste// bod cing rbad la gsad pa dang// nyungs dang ske tshe zi ra gsum/ khrag gsum sme ba'i khrag gis bya// rdo phye zangs phye gser phye bcas// de ltar spyan drangs bzhugs dang mchod cing las bcol

bya// dang por so gsum gzhung bya/ hUM i 'dra pa la shar dza/ grang go long ti ling dza/ sha tri pat+ta ya dza/ de ni bod pa'i sngags su shes/ sa ma ya tri ba duM ra ge rbad/ mur ta pa la ha bya rbad/ her du sha tri shaM rbad/ de

ni rbad pa'i sngags zhes bya/ yag+sha tri snying khrag rtsa le brang sod/ phu ra shaM thums thums rbad sod/ chu rta ra ge tri zhung sod ya ya/ de ni gsad pa'i sngags zhes bya// bod pa'i dus su mchod pa dang// rbad pa'i dus su

zor gyi las// gsad pa'i dus su gdab pa'o// spyi ru dril te 'phang ba'o// hUM/ nga rgyal mgo chen ma rungs pa// sku ni 'bar ba chen po la// phyag ni srid pa nyab par byed// dbu la dung gi 'be tshe can// chibs su
rgyal rta phud dmar chibs// rin chen rgyan dang gdug pa'i mtshon// srid pa gsum du rgyug 'phro byed// tshe dang srog la rab tu rgyug dregs pa rnams kyi ging pa byed// ging chen 'bar ba gsod la

dga'// srid pa gsum du rgyug 'phro byed// skyes pa rnams kyi bdud du byed// na chung srid rnams rku bar byed// bus pa chung gi dur yang 'debs// gdug byed chen po'i dus la bab// the brang zangs kyi 'be tshe

can// gdug pa'i lus la ke ber gsol// dbu la zangs kyi 'be tshe can// phyag na zangs kyi gri rnon bsnams// skye 'gro srog la 'debs par byed// chibs su rnga mo ske rings chibs// rgyug pa'i stabs dang rol

pa che// drag la mthu rtsal ldan pa ste// gsang ba'i las rnams grub par byed// srog rtsa dmar po lag tu 'dren// snying rtsa dmar po zhal du 'dren// srid par 'gro zhing las la drag/ bsad bcad las la thog pa
med// gung dang srod dang tho rangs rgyu// gri yis gtub kyin phur gyis 'debs// gdug byed chen mo'i dus la bab// gnod sbyin chen mo ma rungs ma// mar can gdug pa che/ sku la ber chen rjid pa

gsol// chibs su glang dmar ldem pa chibs// sha la dga' zhing khrag la dang// rkang dang rus pa 'cha' bar byed/ khrag dang chu ser 'thung bar byed// phyag na gdug pa'i mtshon bsnams shing// zhal nas mche
gtsigs 'dzam bur rgyug/ snying khrag rtsad nas 'dren par byed// ya ma thams cad dam la sdud/ khrag 'thung sdig pa'i gad mo rgod// spyugs pa'i glu len kyur ru ru// mi lpags g.yab 'debs lings se
lings// srid pa 'joms byed dus la bab// ces bskul zhing las bcol/ thun dang phur pa gdab/ bsgral na bstan pa brlag par bya// tha ma zor gyi las bya'o// de las byas pas gang bsams 'grub// ming
ni btsan gsum zer ba can// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las// gcan gsum bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ gcen po mi zan dang/ btsan gyi gcen
po mi zan dang/ btsan gyi gcen po lag dmar dang/ rgyal po'i gcen po gnam gyi dkar po lag rings dang/ rtsi thams cad kyi gcen po gram pa kha dmar dang bzhis rang rang gi las 'di smras so// gsang

bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// brag ri dag ni gnas chen du// de ru dkyil 'khor gru gsum brtsegs bya'o// tha ma gru gsum bzhi yis bskor// de'i tha ma gru bzhi ru bya'o// sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya// de ru

phur pa bzhi ling ka bzhi/ spyang ki'i thod pa dang/ 'phar ba'i thod pa dang/ sram gyi thod pa dang/ khra'i thod pa dang bzhi ru/ sha khrag sna tshogs pa'i gtor mas mchod cing/ las bcol phur pa gdab/ khrag

dang thun rdzas kun gyis brdeg/ bstab cing bstab la las bcol te// bod dang rbad dang gsad pa bya// oM tri thums go ti dza/ sa tsus ka ma ye rbu na dza/ mu bra dza shaM dza/ oM pra ta ka ru tra dza/ de ni bod

pa'i sngags yin no// oM raM pa du kro ta yaM pra shaM rbad/ ka ru da pra ya ma rbad/ ha ra sa ma bu ni rbad/ pu ri pra praM yaM rbad/ de ni thun du shes par bya/ praM tri ra ga thum rbad ya/ gtubs sod ra ma ke ta pra ti yaM sprugs ya/

gram ya ti sha ra tsa/ rbu na rbu na sod yaM yaM/ sa ma ya ti lam rbad ya/ de ni gsad pa'i sngags yin no// de ltar drag po'i las rnams bya/ hUM/ gdug pa chen po ma rungs pa// bdud kyi gcen po mi zan te// rngam pa

lag rings don snying 'byin// gsod cing rngam la thogs pa med// dom bu nag gu chibs cing rgyug/ lag na gri dang thod pa 'dzin// nyin zhing ri gsum rtse la nyal// mtshan mo 'gro ba'i tshe srog nyab// 'chi bdag
bdud kyi bang chen mdzad// mche gtsigs spyan bzlog khrag mthor rgyug/ srid par rgyug cing 'dre brgya rtse// gcan chen 'bar ba'i dus la bab// btsan gyi gcen po lag rings so// dmar po ral can mi grungs
pa// lus la stag lpags rlon pa gsol// g.yas na gdug pa'i ral gri 'dzin// g.yon na thod pa khrag phor thogs// chibs su 'phar ba dmar po chibs/ khrag 'thor gzer nad gtong byed cing// srid par
rgyug cing gzer nad gtong// gdug pa btsan gyi gcen po de// lag dmar dgra snying 'byin pa'i gtso// sha med khrag med rgod ral can// gdug pa btsan gyi char du 'bebs// nyams pa ma lus don snying

'byin// gdug byed btsan gyi dus la bab// rgyal gyi btsan gyi dkar po khyod/ rngam pa lag rings gri rings 'dzin/ gnam la rgyu zhing sa yi gying// gying chen ma rungs kun gyi gtso// chibs su bong bu lte dkar
chibs// lan 'ga' spyang po mgo dgu chibs// srid pa'i gdug pa ma lus 'dzin// tshe srog nyab byed dus la bab// rgyal gyi gcen po da tshur byon// srid gcan khram pa kha dmar de// lus po gcig la mgo bo
dgu// mgo lus med par mig gis bkang/ kha dmar gdug pa can du byed/ kha dgu srid pa'i can du byed// lag dgu srid pa'i gying du byed// dmig stong srid pa'i 'dre ru che// chibs su phag mo dbu dgu

chibs// mgo brgya dag ni 'phreng bar bsgreng// mche ba 'dar zhing srid par rgyug khros na the brang ma yams sgrol// dregs can kun gyi sna drangs nas// srid pa yongs la gcan du byed// gcan chen 'bar ba'i
dus la bab// gdug byed 'bar ba'i dus la bab// sgrol byed 'bar ba'i dus la bab// gcan chen kha dmar dus la bab// ces bskul zhing las bcol lo// drag po kun dang sbyar/ de yis las rnams grub
par byed// ming ni sgrol byed zangs mda' can// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gcan bzhi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ bdud po
ral gcig dang/ bdud mo kha bgrad ma dang/ khri gzher ma dang/ bdud mo dpus mo 'gro ya dang/ rgyal po ya cho dang/ dkar po spyan gcig pa dang/ yams shud dmar po dang/ khu le lag dgu dang brgyad kyis/
rang rang gi bsgrub pa 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// brag ri gdug par bsgrub par bya// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// gru bzhi nang du gru gsum brgyad// gru gsum de ru ling ka

re// phur re gtor ma re re'o// de ltar dam rdzas mang po bsag/ sha khrag gtor ma mang po dang// snying sna dang ni sha sna dang// phud dang spyan gzigs bshos bu dkar chas mchod do/ khrag dug rdo phye sbyar

ba thun/ thun phor brgyad dam gcig tu bya// ba dan rgyal mtshan ra lug gi/ de ltar mdos dang bcas pa btang// de nas bod rbad gsad pa bya// oM ra dza i dan dza dza/ ra dza yag+sho dza dza/ ra dza pra ta ya dza/ ra dza tri

ga ra ya dza/ ma ma raM du khri mun di dza/ bdud mo kha kra ma ru shi dza/ ma ke ru ra kraM raM yaM bi dza/ ma mo ha pu pe she dza/ de ni bod pa'i sngags su shes/ ra dza har ting hril rbad/ ra dza shaM tri ga khyer ya rbad/ ra dza haM shaM pra

she rbad/ ka ru pra sha ya rbad/ ru ru shaM shaM hu ra breng rbad/ ru ru ke ke mu d+hil rbad/ ru ru ting gi har her rbad/ ma ma ru sha ya rbad/ de ni rbad pa'i sngags yin no// yag+sha tri ling ya dza/ yag+sha praM ya sring ling srod yaM/

yag+sha kha la dun rgyon sod ya/ yag+sha tri ling shaM sod ya/ ma raM k+kaM shaM sod sod/ ma ma nga dung khyer sod ya/ rak+sha mo sog shi khyer sod ya/ kha la ma taM rbad ya sod sod/ de ni gsad pa'i sngags su shes// de ltar bod

cing rbad pa gsad par bya// de nas bskul cing rbad par bya// hUM/ khyab byed chen po ma rungs byed// 'jig rten sgrol byed pho mo brgyad// gdug pa ma rungs las la spyon// rngam pa chen po khyed brgyad kyang// de
ring srid pa'i las mdzod cig/ dkar po ma choms srid pa'i bdag/ dkar po spyan gcig rngam ma'i tshogs// yams shud dmar po gsod byed 'bar/ khu le lag dgu rngam pa'i tshogs// rgyal po chen po khyed
bzhi yang// gdug pa chen po dregs pa'i tshogs// dregs chen mi zad sprul par byed// drag pos sgrol ba'i dus bab la// skye 'gro ral gcig khams gsum sgrol// mkha' 'gro 'jig rten nad yams gtong/ khri
gzher nad spyod bro ga chang// dbus 'gro 'byung ba dkrug pa'i bdag/ srid pa yongs la dbang byed ma// nad khrag spyo zhing gdug pa sgrol// phung byed ma tshogs dus la bab// ces bskul las bcol lan gsum
bya/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ gdug pa pho mo brgyad kyi las te/ dug mda' can gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams

kyis rang rang gi gtad pa'i las 'di smras te/ bdud kyi nang nas khram gyi las 'di rnams smras te/ bdud kyi gshed pho bzhi ste/ khyab pa lag rings dang/ zangs pa ngam chen dang/ dmu bdud stod dkar dang/

gza' bdud rngam pa'ang bzhis rang rang la gtad pa'i 'di smras so// spyang ki sngon po'i thod pa la// 'khor lo zlum po'i ri bzhi ste// phyogs bzhir bdud kyi zhal bzhi bya// dbus su dmigs pa ldan pa la// ming
dang rus dang nyes pa dgod// mtha' ma zlum po sum rim la// bdud po bzhi yi sngags kyis bskor// g.yon nas bskor la yig mgo phyi// bdud po zhi ba lto bar bskor// de nas ngan sngags 'di yin te// oM ri

ru rak+to sham/ pa har te/ breng to raM yang/ ma ru kaM taM khraM shaM ya/ pra ta ya dong pa ru na yaM ga ro da ni chus dam/ de ltar 'khor lo bri ba ste// sme khrag gsum la ngan bya'i sgros// phyi'i dus na bri bar bya/ kha ni mthing

nag dar gyis bcad pa ste// tshon skud dag gis rgya gram bcings// de nas ma nyes dang ni 'dis nyes dbang// shing gcig drung du mnan par bya// de yis dmigs pa khrag skyud nad kyis 'chi// lha 'dre stong gi dra
ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud kyi gshed po bzhi la gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ btsan gyi rgyal po ang mi gter dang/ du ra ra rtse dang/ yang
btsan thod kar gsum gyis rang rang la gtad pa'i las 'di smras so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des/ gro ga ras sam shing shun la/ dmigs pa'i gzugs ni bris nas su// de la ming rus ldan pa dang/

mgo la ang mi gter gyi sngags// snying kar du ra ra rtse'i sngags// gsang bar btsan sngags bris te/ ma nyes dpang dang 'dis nyes bya// bden pa btsan chen mchod nas ni// 'khor lo ling+kar dril byas la// dri

bu dag ni thod par gzhug/ tshon skud sngon dmar rgya gram bcings/ khrag thems sa la mnan pa'o// u ru ro ru shaM rbad ya/ nyi pa raM ta ya khraM ta sod ya/ pa ta khraM ti yaM yaM rbad na rbad tshal ya/ de ltar sngags bkod
nas mnan byas na// dmigs pa gdug pa'i nad kyis 'chi// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ btsan chen po gsum la gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar/ rgyal po mched gsum gyis rang rang la gtad pa'i las 'di smras so// skya drang dang/ nyi pa sad dang/ khu trang gsum gyis smras pa ni// dmigs pa brlag par bya ba ni// spyang ki sngon po'i ya mkhal

dang// lu gu 'dzing nag snying gnyis la// spyang ki'i mche ba dag la ni// nyi pa sad kyi sngags kyang bri// ya rkan skya drang sngags su bri// ma mkhal khu trang sngags su bri// lu gu'i snying la dmigs pa'i

ming rus bri// bar du snying bcug thod pa bsdams// tshon gyi skud pas rgya gram bcing// dur mchod dag tu sbas byas na// gang la dmigs pa gdon mi za// yag kro ta ni/ mu ta la ti ti shaM shaM mu la ro sha khraM te yaM/

kha la par ta sre sha yaM/ de ltar las byas thog pa med/ ces gsungs so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rgyal po mched la gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
kyi spyan sngar/ klu rigs bzhis rang rang la gtad pa 'di smras so// klu bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// ras sam shing shun gro ga la// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug bya// tha ma rigs bzhi sbrul gyis

bskor// dbus su sbal pa chen po'i gzugs// gzugs khyim dag la dmigs pa'i ming rus bri// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la klu gnyan sngags// oM pre taM ya/ traM praM sad ya/ kar lo ya mu se khraM ya/ aM traM pa re ya/ ku

ru chum ya/ sa ra traM sa ra ya/ mu kro ta la yaM/ pur shaM rtse yaM/ du ga ro yaM/ sa ma ru to khraM 'ding/ su ro sha ya/ kaM te ro 'u yaM/ saM saM te pa ya/ ka ru po ti ya/ phyogs bzhir ma nor 'khor lo rtsibs la bri/ de ltar

bris pa mnan pa ni/ 'khor lo dril la rdzas kyi ril bu bya/ de nas mtsho rgyur ram shing brdung ngam/ yang na chu mig snying ma'o// dmigs pa mdze yis 'dzin par byed/ mdze nag las kyi 'khor lo zhes/ lha 'dre stong
gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ klu rigs bzhi la gtad pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa'i sil ma stong sdes rang rang gi khrag zor gyi las 'di smras

so// gsang bdag ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dregs pa'i khrag zor 'phang ba ni// mon pa nag po'i thod pa la// dregs pa'i sil ma stong gi snying po bkod nas ni// de ru dug rdzas sna tshogs dang// ske tshe nyungs

kar nyungs nag dang/ khri ra dang ni til nag dang// rgya bra zum gsum la sogs bshams// sha zan dgu'i snying/ 'dab chags dgu'i snying/ rmig zlum dgu'i snying/ rkang leb dgu'i snying/ rta dang/ dre'u dang/

bong bu dang/ bcos dang glang 'chi 'khris/ de ltar bsag cing bsres la skyur gyis bsing// de la drag po'i zor sngags bzlas// oM khre te sa la raM raM/ traM b+h+yo/ se me te 'u raM shing khA hi b+h+yo/ ma ma tang le/ shaM khyer

b+h+yo/ ma ru thibs na ga ya b+h+yo/ yak+sha la/ sha sa zor ya/ zhes bzlas shing dregs pa thams cad bskul zhing/ las bcol la 'phang bar bya'o// de yis las rnams grub par byed/ lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po
las/ dregs pa khrag zor gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dregs pa rnams kyis las kun la 'jug pa'i sngags 'di dril te smras so// oM dza dur yaM hi

rbad/ dza dur yaM hi rbad/ srog la skur sri li shaM khyer ya kha la dan se sam ti rbad/ gsha' ma dza dur yaM/ zhes smras so// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dregs pa rnams kyi spyir dril ba'i sngags kyi le'u
ste bcu bdun pa'o//// lha 'dre stong gi dra ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bam po gsum pa rdzogs so//// mang+ga laM//
